analyzed: vālmīki rāmāyaṇa bālakāṇḍa
tapaḥ svādhyāya niratam tapasvī vāc vidām varam
nāradam paripapraccha vālmīkiḥ muni puṃgavam

original: 1.001.002a ko nv asmin sāmprataṃ loke guṇavān kaś ca vīryavān
analyzed: kaḥ nu asmin sāmpratam loke guṇavān kaḥ ca vīryavān

original: 1.001.002c dharmajñaś ca kṛtajñaś ca satyavākyo dṛḍhavrataḥ
analyzed: dharma jñaḥ ca kṛtajñaḥ ca satya vākyaḥ dṛḍha vrataḥ

original: 1.001.003a cāritreṇa ca ko yuktaḥ sarvabhūteṣu ko hitaḥ
analyzed: cāritreṇa ca kaḥ yuktaḥ sarva bhūteṣu kaḥ hitaḥ

original: 1.001.003c vidvān kaḥ kaḥ samarthaś ca kaś caikapriyadarśanaḥ
analyzed: vidvān kaḥ kaḥ samarthaḥ ca kaḥ ca eka priya darśanaḥ
ātmavān kaḥ jita krodhaḥ matimān kaḥ anasūyakaḥ

original: 1.001.004c kasya bibhyati devāś ca jātaroṣasya saṃyuge
analyzed: kasya bibhyati devāḥ ca jāta roṣasya saṃyuge

original: 1.001.005a etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
analyzed: etat icchāmi aham śrotum param kautūhalam hi me

original: 1.001.005c maharṣe tvaṃ samartho 'si jñātum evaṃvidhaṃ naram
analyzed: mahā ṛṣe tvam samarthaḥ asi jñātum evaṃvidham naram

original: 1.001.006a śrutvā caitat trilokajño vālmīker nārado vacaḥ
analyzed: śrutvā ca etat triloka jñaḥ vālmīkeḥ nāradaḥ vacaḥ

original: 1.001.006c śrūyatām iti cāmantrya prahṛṣṭo vākyam abravīt
analyzed: śrūyatām iti ca āmantrya prahṛṣṭaḥ vākyam abravīt

original: 1.001.007a bahavo durlabhāś caiva ye tvayā kīrtitā guṇāḥ
analyzed: bahavaḥ durlabhāḥ ca eva ye tvayā kīrtitāḥ guṇāḥ

original: 1.001.007c mune vakṣyāmy ahaṃ buddhvā tair yuktaḥ śrūyatāṃ naraḥ
analyzed: mune vakṣyāmi aham buddhvā taiḥ yuktaḥ śrūyatām naraḥ
ikṣvāku vaṃśa prabhavaḥ rāmaḥ nāma janaiḥ śrutaḥ
niyata ātmā mahā vīryaḥ dyutimān dhṛtimān vaśī
buddhimān nītimān vāgmī śrīmān śatru nibarhaṇaḥ
vipula aṃsaḥ mahā bāhuḥ kambu grīvaḥ mahā hanuḥ
mahā uraskaḥ mahā iṣvāsaḥ gūḍha jatruḥ ariṃdamaḥ
ājānu bāhuḥ su śirāḥ su lalāṭaḥ su vikramaḥ
samaḥ sama vibhakta aṅgaḥ snigdha varṇaḥ pratāpavān

original: 1.001.012a dharmajñaḥ satyasaṃdhaś ca prajānāṃ ca hite rataḥ
analyzed: dharma jñaḥ satya saṃdhaḥ ca prajānām ca hite rataḥ
yaśasvī jñāna saṃpannaḥ śuciḥ vaśyaḥ samādhimān
rakṣitā jīva lokasya dharmasya parirakṣitā
veda vedāṅga tattva jñaḥ dhanurvede ca niṣṭhitaḥ
sarva śāstra artha tattva jñaḥ smṛtimān pratibhānavān
sarvadā abhigataḥ sadbhiḥ samudraḥ iva sindhubhiḥ
āryaḥ sarva samaḥ ca eva sadā eka priya darśanaḥ
sa ca sarva guṇa upetaḥ kausalyā ānanda vardhanaḥ

original: 1.001.016c samudra iva gāmbhīrye dhairyeṇa himavān iva
analyzed: samudraḥ iva gāmbhīrye dhairyeṇa himavān iva
viṣṇunā sadṛśaḥ vīrye soma vat priya darśanaḥ
kālāgni sadṛśaḥ krodhe kṣamayā pṛthivī samaḥ

original: 1.001.018a dhanadena samas tyāge satye dharma ivāparaḥ
analyzed: dhanadena samaḥ tyāge satye dharmaḥ iva aparaḥ
tam evaṃguṇa saṃpannam rāmam satya parākramam

original: 1.001.019a jyeṣṭhaṃ śreṣṭhaguṇair yuktaṃ priyaṃ daśarathaḥ sutam
analyzed: jyeṣṭham śreṣṭha guṇaiḥ yuktam priyam daśarathaḥ sutam
yauvarājyena saṃyoktum aicchat prītyā mahīpatiḥ
tasya abhiṣeka saṃbhārān dṛṣṭvā bhāryā atha kaikayī

original: 1.001.020c pūrvaṃ dattavarā devī varam enam ayācata
analyzed: pūrvam datta varā devī varam enam ayācata
vivāsanam ca rāmasya bharatasya abhiṣecanam
sa satya vacanāt rājā dharma pāśena saṃyataḥ

original: 1.001.021c vivāsayām āsa sutaṃ rāmaṃ daśarathaḥ priyam
analyzed: vivāsayām āsa sutam rāmam daśarathaḥ priyam

original: 1.001.022a sa jagāma vanaṃ vīraḥ pratijñām anupālayan
analyzed: sa jagāma vanam vīraḥ pratijñām anupālayan
pituḥ vacana nirdeśāt kaikeyyāḥ priya kāraṇāt

original: 1.001.023a taṃ vrajantaṃ priyo bhrātā lakṣmaṇo 'nujagāma ha
analyzed: tam vrajantam priyaḥ bhrātā lakṣmaṇaḥ anujagāma ha
snehāt vinaya saṃpannaḥ sumitrā ānanda vardhanaḥ
sarva lakṣaṇa saṃpannā nārīṇām uttamā vadhūḥ

original: 1.001.024c sītāpy anugatā rāmaṃ śaśinaṃ rohiṇī yathā
analyzed: sītā api anugatā rāmam śaśinam rohiṇī yathā

original: 1.001.025a paurair anugato dūraṃ pitrā daśarathena ca
analyzed: pauraiḥ anugataḥ dūram pitrā daśarathena ca
śṛṅgavera pure sūtam gaṅgā kūle vyasarjayat

original: 1.001.026a te vanena vanaṃ gatvā nadīs tīrtvā bahūdakāḥ
analyzed: te vanena vanam gatvā nadīḥ tīrtvā bahu udakāḥ
citrakūṭam anuprāpya bharadvājasya śāsanāt

original: 1.001.027a ramyam āvasathaṃ kṛtvā ramamāṇā vane trayaḥ
analyzed: ramyam āvasatham kṛtvā ramamāṇāḥ vane trayaḥ
deva gandharva saṃkāśāḥ tatra te nyavasan sukham
citrakūṭam gate rāme putra śoka āturaḥ tadā

original: 1.001.028c rājā daśarathaḥ svargaṃ jagāma vilapan sutam
analyzed: rājā daśarathaḥ svargam jagāma vilapan sutam

original: 1.001.029a mṛte tu tasmin bharato vasiṣṭhapramukhair dvijaiḥ
analyzed: mṛte tu tasmin bharataḥ vasiṣṭha pramukhaiḥ dvijaiḥ
niyujyamānaḥ rājyāya na aicchat rājyam mahā balaḥ
sa jagāma vanam vīraḥ rāma pāda prasādakaḥ

original: 1.001.030a pāduke cāsya rājyāya nyāsaṃ dattvā punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: pāduke ca asya rājyāya nyāsam dattvā punar punar
nivartayām āsa tatas bharatam bharatāgrajaḥ
sa kāmam an avāpya eva rāma pādau upaspṛśan
nandigrāme akarot rājyam rāma āgamana kāṅkṣayā

original: 1.001.032a rāmas tu punar ālakṣya nāgarasya janasya ca
analyzed: rāmaḥ tu punar ālakṣya nāgarasya janasya ca
tatra āgamanam ekāgre daṇḍakān praviveśa ha

original: 1.001.033a virādhaṃ rākṣasaṃ hatvā śarabhaṅgaṃ dadarśa ha
analyzed: virādham rākṣasam hatvā śarabhaṅgam dadarśa ha

original: 1.001.033c sutīkṣṇaṃ cāpy agastyaṃ ca agastya bhrātaraṃ tathā
analyzed: sutīkṣṇam ca api agastyam ca agastya bhrātaram tathā
agastya vacanāt ca eva jagrāha aindram śarāsanam
khaḍgam ca parama prītaḥ tūṇī ca akṣaya sāyakau

original: 1.001.035a vasatas tasya rāmasya vane vanacaraiḥ saha
analyzed: vasataḥ tasya rāmasya vane vana caraiḥ saha
ṛṣayaḥ abhyāgaman sarve vadhāya asura rakṣasām
tena tatra eva vasatā janasthāna nivāsinī
virūpitā śūrpaṇakhā rākṣasī kāmarūpiṇī
tatas śūrpaṇakhā vākyāt udyuktān sarva rākṣasān

original: 1.001.037c kharaṃ triśirasaṃ caiva dūṣaṇaṃ caiva rākṣasaṃ
analyzed: kharam triśirasam ca eva dūṣaṇam ca eva rākṣasam

original: 1.001.038a nijaghāna raṇe rāmas teṣāṃ caiva padānugān
analyzed: nijaghāna raṇe rāmaḥ teṣām ca eva padānugān
rakṣasām nihatāni āsan sahasrāṇi caturdaśa
tatas jñāti vadham śrutvā rāvaṇaḥ krodha mūrchitaḥ

original: 1.001.039c sahāyaṃ varayām āsa mārīcaṃ nāma rākṣasaṃ
analyzed: sahāyam varayām āsa mārīcam nāma rākṣasam
vāryamāṇaḥ su bahuśas mārīcena sa rāvaṇaḥ

original: 1.001.040c na virodho balavatā kṣamo rāvaṇa tena te
analyzed: na virodhaḥ balavatā kṣamaḥ rāvaṇa tena te

original: 1.001.041a anādṛtya tu tad vākyaṃ rāvaṇaḥ kālacoditaḥ
analyzed: an ādṛtya tu tat vākyam rāvaṇaḥ kāla coditaḥ
jagāma saha marīcaḥ tasya āśrama padam tadā
tena māyāvinā dūram apavāhya nṛpa ātmajau

original: 1.001.042c jahāra bhāryāṃ rāmasya gṛdhraṃ hatvā jaṭāyuṣam
analyzed: jahāra bhāryām rāmasya gṛdhram hatvā jaṭāyuṣam

original: 1.001.043a gṛdhraṃ ca nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛtāṃ śrutvā ca maithilīm
analyzed: gṛdhram ca nihatam dṛṣṭvā hṛtām śrutvā ca maithilīm
rāghavaḥ śoka saṃtaptaḥ vilalāpa ākula indriyaḥ

original: 1.001.044a tatas tenaiva śokena gṛdhraṃ dagdhvā jaṭāyuṣam
analyzed: tatas tena eva śokena gṛdhram dagdhvā jaṭāyuṣam

original: 1.001.044c mārgamāṇo vane sītāṃ rākṣasaṃ saṃdadarśa ha
analyzed: mārgamāṇaḥ vane sītām rākṣasam saṃdadarśa ha
kabandham nāma rūpeṇa vikṛtam ghora darśanam

original: 1.001.045c taṃ nihatya mahābāhur dadāha svargataś ca saḥ
analyzed: tam nihatya mahā bāhuḥ dadāha svargataḥ ca saḥ

original: 1.001.046a sa cāsya kathayām āsa śabarīṃ dharmacāriṇīm
analyzed: sa ca asya kathayām āsa śabarīm dharma cāriṇīm
śramaṇīm dharma nipuṇām abhigaccha iti rāghava
saḥ abhyagacchat mahā tejāḥ śabarīm śatru sūdanaḥ
śabaryā pūjitaḥ samyak rāmaḥ daśaratha ātmajaḥ
pampā tīre hanumatā saṃgataḥ vānareṇa ha
hanumat vacanāt ca eva sugrīveṇa samāgataḥ

original: 1.001.048c sugrīvāya ca tat sarvaṃ śaṃsad rāmo mahābalaḥ
analyzed: sugrīvāya ca tat sarvam śaṃsat rāmaḥ mahā balaḥ
tatas vānara rājena vaira anukathanam prati
rāmāya āveditam sarvam praṇayāt duḥkhitena ca

original: 1.001.049e vālinaś ca balaṃ tatra kathayām āsa vānaraḥ
analyzed: vālinaḥ ca balam tatra kathayām āsa vānaraḥ

original: 1.001.050a pratijñātaṃ ca rāmeṇa tadā vālivadhaṃ prati
analyzed: pratijñātam ca rāmeṇa tadā vāli vadham prati

original: 1.001.050c sugrīvaḥ śaṅkitaś cāsīn nityaṃ vīryeṇa rāghave
analyzed: sugrīvaḥ śaṅkitaḥ ca āsīt nityam vīryeṇa rāghave

original: 1.001.051a rāghavaḥ pratyayārthaṃ tu dundubheḥ kāyam uttamam
analyzed: rāghavaḥ pratyaya artham tu dundubheḥ kāyam uttamam
pādāṅguṣṭhena cikṣepa saṃpūrṇam daśa yojanam

original: 1.001.052a bibheda ca punaḥ sālān saptaikena maheṣuṇā
analyzed: bibheda ca punar sālān sapta ekena mahā iṣuṇā

original: 1.001.052c giriṃ rasātalaṃ caiva janayan pratyayaṃ tadā
analyzed: girim rasātalam ca eva janayan pratyayam tadā

original: 1.001.053a tataḥ prītamanās tena viśvastaḥ sa mahākapiḥ
analyzed: tatas prīta manāḥ tena viśvastaḥ sa mahā kapiḥ

original: 1.001.053c kiṣkindhāṃ rāmasahito jagāma ca guhāṃ tadā
analyzed: kiṣkindhām rāma sahitaḥ jagāma ca guhām tadā
tatas agarjat harivaraḥ sugrīvaḥ hema piṅgalaḥ
tena nādena mahatā nirjagāma hari īśvaraḥ
tatas sugrīva vacanāt hatvā vālinam āhave

original: 1.001.055c sugrīvam eva tad rājye rāghavaḥ pratyapādayat
analyzed: sugrīvam eva tat rājye rāghavaḥ pratyapādayat

original: 1.001.056a sa ca sarvān samānīya vānarān vānararṣabhaḥ
analyzed: sa ca sarvān samānīya vānarān vānara ṛṣabhaḥ
diśaḥ prasthāpayām āsa didṛkṣuḥ janakātmajām

original: 1.001.057a tato gṛdhrasya vacanāt saṃpāter hanumān balī
analyzed: tatas gṛdhrasya vacanāt saṃpāteḥ hanumān balī
śata yojana vistīrṇam pupluve lavaṇārṇavam
tatra laṅkām samāsādya purīm rāvaṇa pālitām
dadarśa sītām dhyāyantīm aśoka vanikām gatām
nivedayitvā abhijñānam pravṛttim ca nivedya ca

original: 1.001.059c samāśvāsya ca vaidehīṃ mardayām āsa toraṇam
analyzed: samāśvāsya ca vaidehīm mardayām āsa toraṇam

original: 1.001.060a pañca senāgragān hatvā sapta mantrisutān api
analyzed: pañca senā agragān hatvā sapta mantri sutān api

original: 1.001.060c śūram akṣaṃ ca niṣpiṣya grahaṇaṃ samupāgamat
analyzed: śūram akṣam ca niṣpiṣya grahaṇam samupāgamat
ātmānam jñātvā paitāmahāt varāt

original: 1.001.061c marṣayan rākṣasān vīro yantriṇas tān yadṛcchayā
analyzed: marṣayan rākṣasān vīraḥ yantriṇaḥ tān yadṛcchayā

original: 1.001.062a tato dagdhvā purīṃ laṅkām ṛte sītāṃ ca maithilīm
analyzed: tatas dagdhvā purīm laṅkām ṛte sītām ca maithilīm

original: 1.001.062c rāmāya priyam ākhyātuṃ punar āyān mahākapiḥ
analyzed: rāmāya priyam ākhyātum punar āyāt mahā kapiḥ
saḥ abhigamya mahātmānam kṛtvā rāmam pradakṣiṇam
nyavedayat ameya ātmā dṛṣṭā sītā iti tattvataḥ
tatas sugrīva sahitaḥ gatvā tīram mahā udadheḥ
samudram kṣobhayām āsa śaraiḥ āditya saṃnibhaiḥ

original: 1.001.065a darśayām āsa cātmānaṃ samudraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ
analyzed: darśayām āsa ca ātmānam samudraḥ saritām patiḥ
samudra vacanāt ca eva nalam setum akārayat

original: 1.001.066a tena gatvā purīṃ laṅkāṃ hatvā rāvaṇam āhave
analyzed: tena gatvā purīm laṅkām hatvā rāvaṇam āhave
abhyaṣiñcat sa laṅkāyām rākṣasa indram vibhīṣaṇam
karmaṇā tena mahatā trailokyam sa carācaram
sa devarṣi gaṇam tuṣṭam rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
tathā parama saṃtuṣṭaiḥ pūjitaḥ sarva daivataiḥ

original: 1.001.068c kṛtakṛtyas tadā rāmo vijvaraḥ pramumoda ha
analyzed: kṛtakṛtyaḥ tadā rāmaḥ vijvaraḥ pramumoda ha

original: 1.001.069a devatābhyo varān prāpya samutthāpya ca vānarān
analyzed: devatābhyaḥ varān prāpya samutthāpya ca vānarān

original: 1.001.069c puṣpakaṃ tat samāruhya nandigrāmaṃ yayau tadā
analyzed: puṣpakam tat samāruhya nandigrāmam yayau tadā
nandigrāme jaṭām hitvā bhrātṛbhiḥ sahitaḥ anaghaḥ

original: 1.001.070c rāmaḥ sītām anuprāpya rājyaṃ punar avāptavān
analyzed: rāmaḥ sītām anuprāpya rājyam punar avāptavān
prahṛṣṭa muditaḥ lokaḥ tuṣṭaḥ puṣṭaḥ su dhārmikaḥ
arogaḥ ca durbhikṣa bhaya varjitaḥ

original: 1.001.072a na putramaraṇaṃ ke cid drakṣyanti puruṣāḥ kva cit
analyzed: na putra maraṇam ke cid drakṣyanti puruṣāḥ kva cit
nāryaḥ ca avidhavāḥ nityam bhaviṣyanti pativratāḥ

original: 1.001.073a na vātajaṃ bhayaṃ kiṃ cin nāpsu majjanti jantavaḥ
analyzed: na vāta jam bhayam kim cit na apsu majjanti jantavaḥ

original: 1.001.073c na cāgrijaṃ bhayaṃ kiṃ cid yathā kṛtayuge tathā
analyzed: na bhayam kim cit yathā kṛta yuge tathā
aśvamedha śataiḥ iṣṭvā tathā bahu suvarṇakaiḥ
gavām koṭi ayutam dattvā vidvadbhyaḥ vidhi pūrvakam
rāja vaṃśām śataguṇān sthāpayiṣyati rāghavaḥ

original: 1.001.075c cāturvarṇyaṃ ca loke 'smin sve sve dharme niyokṣyati
analyzed: cāturvarṇyam ca loke asmin sve sve dharme niyokṣyati
daśa varṣa sahasrāṇi daśa varṣa śatāni ca
rāmaḥ rājyam upāsitvā brahma lokam gamiṣyati

original: 1.001.077a idaṃ pavitraṃ pāpaghnaṃ puṇyaṃ vedaiś ca saṃmitam
analyzed: idam pavitram pāpa ghnam puṇyam vedaiḥ ca saṃmitam
yaḥ paṭhet rāma caritam sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate

original: 1.001.078a etad ākhyānam āyuṣyaṃ paṭhan rāmāyaṇaṃ naraḥ
analyzed: etat ākhyānam āyuṣyam paṭhan rāmāyaṇam naraḥ
sa putra pautraḥ sa gaṇaḥ pretya svarge mahīyate
paṭhan dvijaḥ vāgṛṣabha tvam īyāt
syāt kṣatriyaḥ bhūmipati tvam īyāt
vaṇij janaḥ paṇya phala tvam īyāt
janaḥ ca śūdraḥ api mahat tvam īyāt

original: 1.002.001a nāradasya tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvā vākyaviśāradaḥ
analyzed: nāradasya tu tat vākyam śrutvā vākya viśāradaḥ
pūjayām āsa dharma ātmā saha śiṣyaḥ mahā muniḥ

original: 1.002.002a yathāvat pūjitas tena devarṣir nāradas tadā
analyzed: yathāvat pūjitaḥ tena deva ṛṣiḥ nāradaḥ tadā
āpṛṣṭvā eva abhyanujñātaḥ sa jagāma vihāyasam

original: 1.002.003a sa muhūtaṃ gate tasmin devalokaṃ munis tadā
analyzed: sa muhūtam gate tasmin deva lokam muniḥ tadā
jagāma tamasā tīram jāhnavyāḥ tu avidūrataḥ

original: 1.002.004a sa tu tīraṃ samāsādya tamasāyā mahāmuniḥ
analyzed: sa tu tīram samāsādya tamasāyāḥ mahā muniḥ

original: 1.002.004c śiṣyam āha sthitaṃ pārśve dṛṣṭvā tīrtham akardamam
analyzed: śiṣyam āha sthitam pārśve dṛṣṭvā tīrtham akardamam
akardamam idam tīrtham bharadvāja niśāmaya
ramaṇīyam prasanna ambu sat manuṣya manaḥ yathā

original: 1.002.006a nyasyatāṃ kalaśas tāta dīyatāṃ valkalaṃ mama
analyzed: nyasyatām kalaśaḥ tāta dīyatām valkalam mama
idam eva avagāhiṣye tamasā tīrtham uttamam
evam uktaḥ bharadvājaḥ vālmīkena mahātmanā

original: 1.002.007c prāyacchata munes tasya valkalaṃ niyato guroḥ
analyzed: prāyacchata muneḥ tasya valkalam niyataḥ guroḥ
sa śiṣya hastāt ādāya valkalam niyata indriyaḥ

original: 1.002.008c vicacāra ha paśyaṃs tat sarvato vipulaṃ vanam
analyzed: vicacāra ha paśyan tat sarvatas vipulam vanam
tasya abhyāśe tu mithunam carantam anapāyinam
dadarśa bhagavān tatra krauñcayoḥ cāru niḥsvanam

original: 1.002.010a tasmāt tu mithunād ekaṃ pumāṃsaṃ pāpaniścayaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt tu mithunāt ekam pumāṃsam pāpa niścayaḥ
jaghāna vaira nilayaḥ niṣādaḥ tasya paśyataḥ
tam śoṇita parīta aṅgam veṣṭamānam mahī tale

original: 1.002.011c bhāryā tu nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā rurāva karuṇāṃ giram
analyzed: bhāryā tu nihatam dṛṣṭvā rurāva karuṇām giram

original: 1.002.012a tathā tu taṃ dvijaṃ dṛṣṭvā niṣādena nipātitam
analyzed: tathā tu tam dvijam dṛṣṭvā niṣādena nipātitam
ṛṣeḥ dharma ātmanaḥ tasya kāruṇyam samapadyata
tatas karuṇavedi tvāt adharmaḥ ayam iti dvijaḥ

original: 1.002.013c niśāmya rudatīṃ krauñcīm idaṃ vacanam abravīt
analyzed: niśāmya rudatīm krauñcīm idam vacanam abravīt

original: 1.002.014a mā niṣāda pratiṣṭhāṃ tvam agamaḥ śāśvatīṃ samāḥ
analyzed: mā niṣāda pratiṣṭhām tvam agamaḥ śāśvatīm samāḥ
yat krauñca mithunāt ekam avadhīḥ kāma mohitam

original: 1.002.015a tasyaivaṃ bruvataś cintā babhūva hṛdi vīkṣataḥ
analyzed: tasya evam bruvataḥ cintā babhūva hṛdi vīkṣataḥ

original: 1.002.015c śokārtenāsya śakuneḥ kim idaṃ vyāhṛtaṃ mayā
analyzed: śoka ārtena asya śakuneḥ kim idam vyāhṛtam mayā

original: 1.002.016a cintayan sa mahāprājñaś cakāra matimān matim
analyzed: cintayan sa mahā prājñaḥ cakāra matimān matim

original: 1.002.016c śiṣyaṃ caivābravīd vākyam idaṃ sa munipuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: śiṣyam ca eva abravīt vākyam idam sa muni puṃgavaḥ
pāda baddhaḥ akṣara samaḥ tantrī laya samanvitaḥ

original: 1.002.017c śokārtasya pravṛtto me śloko bhavatu nānyathā
analyzed: śoka ārtasya pravṛttaḥ me ślokaḥ bhavatu nā anyathā

original: 1.002.018a śiṣyas tu tasya bruvato muner vākyam anuttamam
analyzed: śiṣyaḥ tu tasya bruvataḥ muneḥ vākyam anuttamam
pratijagrāha saṃhṛṣṭaḥ tasya tuṣṭaḥ abhavat guruḥ

original: 1.002.019a so 'bhiṣekaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā tīrthe tasmin yathāvidhi
analyzed: saḥ abhiṣekam tatas kṛtvā tīrthe tasmin yathāvidhi

original: 1.002.019c tam eva cintayann artham upāvartata vai muniḥ
analyzed: tam eva cintayan artham upāvartata vai muniḥ

original: 1.002.020a bharadvājas tataḥ śiṣyo vinītaḥ śrutavān guroḥ
analyzed: bharadvājaḥ tatas śiṣyaḥ vinītaḥ śrutavān guroḥ
kalaśam pūrṇam ādāya pṛṣṭhatas anujagāma ha
sa praviśya āśrama padam śiṣyeṇa saha dharma vid

original: 1.002.021c upaviṣṭaḥ kathāś cānyāś cakāra dhyānam āsthitaḥ
analyzed: upaviṣṭaḥ kathāḥ ca anyāḥ cakāra dhyānam āsthitaḥ
ājagāma tatas brahmā lokakartā svayaṃprabhuḥ
caturmukhaḥ mahā tejāḥ draṣṭum tam muni puṃgavam

original: 1.002.023a vālmīkir atha taṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasotthāya vāg yataḥ
analyzed: vālmīkiḥ atha tam dṛṣṭvā sahasā utthāya vāc yatas
prāñjaliḥ prayataḥ bhūtvā tasthau parama vismitaḥ
pūjayām āsa tam devam pādya arghya āsana vandanaiḥ
praṇamya vidhivat ca enam pṛṣṭvā anāmayam avyayam
atha upaviśya bhagavān āsane parama arcite
vālmīkaye mahā ṛṣaye saṃdideśa āsanam tatas
upaviṣṭe tadā tasmin sākṣāt lokapitāmahe

original: 1.002.026c tad gatenaiva manasā vālmīkir dhyānam āsthitaḥ
analyzed: tat gatena eva manasā vālmīkiḥ dhyānam āsthitaḥ
pāpa ātmanā kṛtam kaṣṭam vaira grahaṇa buddhinā

original: 1.002.027c yas tādṛśaṃ cāruravaṃ krauñcaṃ hanyād akāraṇāt
analyzed: yaḥ tādṛśam cāru ravam krauñcam hanyāt akāraṇāt

original: 1.002.028a śocann eva muhuḥ krauñcīm upaślokam imaṃ punaḥ
analyzed: śocan eva muhur krauñcīm upaślokam imam punar
jagau antargata manāḥ bhūtvā śoka parāyaṇaḥ

original: 1.002.029a tam uvāca tato brahmā prahasan munipuṃgavam
analyzed: tam uvāca tatas brahmā prahasan muni puṃgavam

original: 1.002.029c śloka eva tvayā baddho nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
analyzed: ślokaḥ eva tvayā baddhaḥ na atra kāryā vicāraṇā

original: 1.002.030a macchandād eva te brahman pravṛtteyaṃ sarasvatī
analyzed: mad chandāt eva te brahman pravṛttā iyam sarasvatī

original: 1.002.030c rāmasya caritaṃ kṛtsnaṃ kuru tvam ṛṣisattama
analyzed: rāmasya caritam kṛtsnam kuru tvam ṛṣi sattama
dharma ātmanaḥ guṇavataḥ loke rāmasya dhīmataḥ

original: 1.002.031c vṛttaṃ kathaya dhīrasya yathā te nāradāc chrutam
analyzed: vṛttam kathaya dhīrasya yathā te nāradāt śrutam

original: 1.002.032a rahasyaṃ ca prakāśaṃ ca yad vṛttaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ
analyzed: rahasyam ca prakāśam ca yat vṛttam tasya dhīmataḥ

original: 1.002.032c rāmasya saha saumitre rākṣasānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: rāmasya saha saumitre rākṣasānām ca sarvaśas

original: 1.002.033a vaidehyāś caiva yad vṛttaṃ prakāśaṃ yadi vā rahaḥ
analyzed: vaidehyāḥ ca eva yat vṛttam prakāśam yadi vā rahaḥ

original: 1.002.033c tac cāpy aviditaṃ sarvaṃ viditaṃ te bhaviṣyati
analyzed: tat ca api aviditam sarvam viditam te bhaviṣyati

original: 1.002.034a na te vāg anṛtā kāvye kā cid atra bhaviṣyati
analyzed: na te vāc anṛtā kāvye kā cit atra bhaviṣyati

original: 1.002.034c kuru rāma kathāṃ puṇyāṃ ślokabaddhāṃ manoramām
analyzed: kuru rāma kathām puṇyām śloka baddhām manoramām

original: 1.002.035a yāvat sthāsyanti girayaḥ saritaś ca mahītale
analyzed: yāvat sthāsyanti girayaḥ saritaḥ ca mahī tale
tāvat rāmāyaṇa kathā lokeṣu pracariṣyati

original: 1.002.036a yāvad rāmasya ca kathā tvatkṛtā pracariṣyati
analyzed: yāvat rāmasya ca kathā tvad kṛtā pracariṣyati

original: 1.002.036c tāvad ūrdhvam adhaś ca tvaṃ mallokeṣu nivatsyasi
analyzed: tāvat ūrdhvam adhas ca tvam mat lokeṣu nivatsyasi
iti uktvā bhagavān brahmā tatra eva antaradhīyata

original: 1.002.037c tataḥ saśiṣyo vālmīkir munir vismayam āyayau
analyzed: tatas sa śiṣyaḥ vālmīkiḥ muniḥ vismayam āyayau

original: 1.002.038a tasya śiṣyās tataḥ sarve jaguḥ ślokam imaṃ punaḥ
analyzed: tasya śiṣyāḥ tatas sarve jaguḥ ślokam imam punar

original: 1.002.038c muhur muhuḥ prīyamāṇāḥ prāhuś ca bhṛśavismitāḥ
analyzed: muhur muhur prīyamāṇāḥ prāhuḥ ca bhṛśa vismitāḥ

original: 1.002.039a samākṣaraiś caturbhir yaḥ pādair gīto maharṣiṇā
analyzed: sama akṣaraiḥ caturbhiḥ yaḥ pādaiḥ gītaḥ mahā ṛṣiṇā
saḥ anuvyāharaṇāt bhūyas śokaḥ śloka tvam āgataḥ

original: 1.002.040a tasya buddhir iyaṃ jātā vālmīker bhāvitātmanaḥ
analyzed: tasya buddhiḥ iyam jātā vālmīkeḥ bhāvitātmanaḥ

original: 1.002.040c kṛtsnaṃ rāmāyaṇaṃ kāvyam īdṛśaiḥ karavāṇy aham
analyzed: kṛtsnam rāmāyaṇam kāvyam īdṛśaiḥ karavāṇi aham
udāra vṛtta artha padaiḥ manoramaiḥ
tadā asya rāmasya cakāra kīrtimān
sama akṣaraiḥ śloka śataiḥ yaśasvino
yaśaskaram kāvyam udāra dhīḥ muniḥ

original: 1.003.001a śrutvā vas tu samagraṃ tad dharmātmā dharmasaṃhitam
analyzed: śrutvā vaḥ tu samagram tat dharma ātmā dharma saṃhitam

original: 1.003.001c vyaktam anveṣate bhūyo yad vṛttaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ
analyzed: vyaktam anveṣate bhūyas yat vṛttam tasya dhīmataḥ
upaspṛśya udakam saṃyan muniḥ sthitvā kṛtāñjaliḥ
prācīnāgreṣu darbheṣu dharmeṇa anveṣate gatim
janma rāmasya su mahat vīryam sarva anukūla tām
lokasya priya tām kṣāntim saumya tām satya śīla tām
nānā citrāḥ kathāḥ ca anyāḥ viśvāmitra sahāyane

original: 1.003.004c jānakyāś ca vivāhaṃ ca dhanuṣaś ca vibhedanam
analyzed: jānakyāḥ ca vivāham ca dhanuṣaḥ ca vibhedanam
rāma rāma vivādam ca guṇān dāśaratheḥ tathā
tathā abhiṣekam rāmasya kaikeyyāḥ duṣṭa bhāvatām
vyāghātam ca abhiṣekasya rāmasya ca vivāsanam

original: 1.003.006c rājñaḥ śokaṃ vilāpaṃ ca paralokasya cāśrayam
analyzed: rājñaḥ śokam vilāpam ca para lokasya ca āśrayam
prakṛtīnām viṣādam ca prakṛtīnām visarjanam
niṣāda adhipa saṃvādam sūta upāvartanam tathā
gaṅgāyāḥ ca abhisaṃtāram bharadvājasya darśanam
bharadvāja abhyanujñānāt citrakūṭasya darśanam
vāstukarma niveśam ca bharata āgamanam tathā

original: 1.003.009c prasādanaṃ ca rāmasya pituś ca salilakriyām
analyzed: prasādanam ca rāmasya pituḥ ca salilakriyām
pādukā agrya abhiṣekam ca nandigrāma nivāsanam
daṇḍaka araṇya gamanam sutīkṣṇena samāgamam
anasūyā samasyām ca aṅgarāgasya ca arpaṇam
śūrpaṇakhyāḥ ca saṃvādam virūpa karaṇam tathā
vadham khara triśirasoḥ utthānam rāvaṇasya ca

original: 1.003.012c mārīcasya vadhaṃ caiva vaidehyā haraṇaṃ tathā
analyzed: mārīcasya vadham ca eva vaidehyāḥ haraṇam tathā
rāghavasya vilāpam ca gṛdhra rāja nibarhaṇam
kabandha darśanam ca eva pampāyāḥ ca api darśanam
śarbaryāḥ darśanam ca eva hanūmat darśanam tathā
vilāpam ca eva pampāyām rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
ṛṣyamūkasya gamanam sugrīveṇa samāgamam
pratyaya utpādanam sakhyam vāli sugrīva vigraham
vāli pramathanam ca eva sugrīva pratipādanam
tārā vilāpa samayam varṣa rātri nivāsanam
kopam rāghava siṃhasya balānām upasaṃgraham

original: 1.003.017c diśaḥ prasthāpanaṃ caiva pṛthivyāś ca nivedanam
analyzed: diśaḥ prasthāpanam ca eva pṛthivyāḥ ca nivedanam
aṅgulīyaka dānam ca ṛkṣasya bila darśanam
prāya upaveśanam ca eva saṃpāteḥ ca api darśanam
parvata ārohaṇam ca eva sāgarasya ca laṅghanam
rātrau laṅkā praveśam ca ekasya api vicintanam
āpānabhūmi gamanam avarodhasya darśanam
aśoka vanikā yānam sītāyāḥ ca api darśanam
abhijñāna pradānam ca sītāyāḥ ca api bhāṣaṇam
rākṣasī tarjanam ca eva trijaṭā svapna darśanam
maṇi pradānam sītāyāḥ vṛkṣa bhaṅgam tathā eva ca
rākṣasī vidravam ca eva kiṃkarāṇām nibarhaṇam
grahaṇam vāyusūnoḥ ca laṅkā dāha abhigarjanam
pratiplavanam eva atha madhūnām haraṇam tathā
rāghava āśvāsanam ca eva maṇi niryātanam tathā

original: 1.003.024c saṃgamaṃ ca samudrasya nalasetoś ca bandhanam
analyzed: saṃgamam ca samudrasya nalasetoḥ ca bandhanam
pratāram ca samudrasya rātrau laṅkā avarodhanam
vibhīṣaṇena saṃsargam vadha upāya nivedanam
kumbhakarṇasya nidhanam megha nāda nibarhaṇam

original: 1.003.026c rāvaṇasya vināśaṃ ca sītāvāptim areḥ pure
analyzed: rāvaṇasya vināśam ca sītā avāptim areḥ pure
bibhīṣaṇa abhiṣekam ca puṣpakasya ca darśanam
ayodhyāyāḥ ca gamanam bharatena samāgamam
rāma abhiṣeka abhyudayam sarva sainya visarjanam
sva rāṣṭra rañjanam ca eva vaidehyāḥ ca visarjanam

original: 1.003.029a anāgataṃ ca yat kiṃ cid rāmasya vasudhātale
analyzed: anāgatam ca yat kim cit rāmasya vasudhā tale

original: 1.003.029c tac cakārottare kāvye vālmīkir bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: tat cakāra uttare kāvye vālmīkiḥ bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
prāpta rājyasya rāmasya vālmīkiḥ bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
cakāra caritam kṛtsnam vicitra padam ātmavān

original: 1.004.002a kṛtvā tu tan mahāprājñaḥ sabhaviṣyaṃ sahottaram
analyzed: kṛtvā tu tat mahā prājñaḥ sabhaviṣyam saha uttaram

original: 1.004.002c cintayām āsa ko nv etat prayuñjīyād iti prabhuḥ
analyzed: cintayām āsa kaḥ nu etat prayuñjīyāt iti prabhuḥ
tasya cintayamānasya mahā ṛṣeḥ bhāvitātmanaḥ
agṛhṇītām tatas pādau muni veṣau kuśīlavau
kuśīlavau tu dharma jñau rāja putrau yaśasvinau
bhrātarau svara saṃpannau dadarśa āśrama vāsinau

original: 1.004.005a sa tu medhāvinau dṛṣṭvā vedeṣu pariniṣṭhitau
analyzed: sa tu medhāvinau dṛṣṭvā vedeṣu pariniṣṭhitau
veda upabṛhmaṇa arthāya tau agrāhayata prabhuḥ

original: 1.004.006a kāvyaṃ rāmāyaṇaṃ kṛtsnaṃ sītāyāś caritaṃ mahat
analyzed: kāvyam rāmāyaṇam kṛtsnam sītāyāḥ caritam mahat

original: 1.004.006c paulastya vadham ity eva cakāra caritavrataḥ
analyzed: paulastya vadham iti eva cakāra carita vrataḥ

original: 1.004.007a pāṭhye geye ca madhuraṃ pramāṇais tribhir anvitam
analyzed: pāṭhye geye ca madhuram pramāṇaiḥ tribhiḥ anvitam
jātibhiḥ saptabhiḥ yuktam tantrī laya samanvitam
hāsya śṛṅgāra kāruṇya raudra vīra bhayānakaiḥ
bībhatsā ādi rasaiḥ yuktam kāvyam etat agāyatām

original: 1.004.009a tau tu gāndharvatattvajñau sthāna mūrcchana kovidau
analyzed: tau tu gāndharva tattva jñau sthāna mūrcchana kovidau
bhrātarau svara saṃpannau gandharvau iva rūpiṇau
rūpa lakṣaṇa saṃpannau madhura svara bhāṣiṇau
bimbāt iva uddhṛtau bimbau rāma dehāt tathā aparau

original: 1.004.011a tau rājaputrau kārtsnyena dharmyam ākhyānam uttamam
analyzed: tau rāja putrau kārtsnyena dharmyam ākhyānam uttamam

original: 1.004.011c vāco vidheyaṃ tat sarvaṃ kṛtvā kāvyam aninditau
analyzed: vācaḥ vidheyam tat sarvam kṛtvā kāvyam aninditau

original: 1.004.012a ṛṣīṇāṃ ca dvijātīnāṃ sādhūnāṃ ca samāgame
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām ca dvijātīnām sādhūnām ca samāgame
yathopadeśam tattva jñau jagatuḥ tau samāhitau
mahātmānau mahābhāgau sarva lakṣaṇa lakṣitau

original: 1.004.013a tau kadā cit sametānām ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām
analyzed: tau kadā cit sametānām ṛṣīṇām bhāvitātmanām
āsīnānām samīpa sthau idam kāvyam agāyatām
tat śrutvā munayaḥ sarve bāṣpa paryākula īkṣaṇāḥ

original: 1.004.014c sādhu sādhv ity tāv ūcatuḥ paraṃ vismayam āgatāḥ
analyzed: sādhu sādhu iti tau ūcatuḥ param vismayam āgatāḥ
te prīta manasaḥ sarve munayaḥ dharma vatsalāḥ
praśaśaṃsuḥ praśastavyau gāyamānau kuśīlavau

original: 1.004.016a aho gītasya mādhuryaṃ ślokānāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ
analyzed: aho gītasya mādhuryam ślokānām ca viśeṣataḥ

original: 1.004.016c ciranirvṛttam apy etat pratyakṣam iva darśitam
analyzed: cira nirvṛttam api etat pratyakṣam iva darśitam

original: 1.004.017a praviśya tāv ubhau suṣṭhu tadā bhāvam agāyatām
analyzed: praviśya tau ubhau suṣṭhu tadā bhāvam agāyatām
sahitau madhuram raktam saṃpannam svara saṃpadā
evam praśasyamānau tau tapaḥ ślāghyaiḥ mahā ṛṣibhiḥ
saṃraktataram atyartham madhuram tau agāyatām

original: 1.004.019a prītaḥ kaś cin munis tābhyāṃ saṃsthitaḥ kalaśaṃ dadau
analyzed: prītaḥ kaḥ cit muniḥ tābhyām saṃsthitaḥ kalaśam dadau

original: 1.004.019c prasanno valkalaṃ kaś cid dadau tābhyāṃ mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: prasannaḥ valkalam kaḥ cit dadau tābhyām mahā yaśāḥ
āścaryam idam ākhyānam muninā saṃprakīrtitam

original: 1.004.020c paraṃ kavīnām ādhāraṃ samāptaṃ ca yathākramam
analyzed: param kavīnām ādhāram samāptam ca yathākramam

original: 1.004.021a praśasyamānau sarvatra kadā cit tatra gāyakau
analyzed: praśasyamānau sarvatra kadā cit tatra gāyakau
rathyāsu rājamārgeṣu dadarśa bharatāgrajaḥ
sva veśma ca ānīya tatas bhrātarau sa kuśīlavau
pūjayām āsa pūjā arhau rāmaḥ śatru nibarhaṇaḥ

original: 1.004.023a āsīnaḥ kāñcane divye sa ca siṃhāsane prabhuḥ
analyzed: āsīnaḥ kāñcane divye sa ca siṃhāsane prabhuḥ
upopaviṣṭaiḥ sacivaiḥ bhrātṛbhiḥ ca paraṃtapaḥ

original: 1.004.024a dṛṣṭvā tu rūpasaṃpannau tāv ubhau vīṇinau tataḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tu rūpa saṃpannau tau ubhau vīṇinau tatas

original: 1.004.024c uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmaḥ śatrughnaṃ bharataṃ tathā
analyzed: uvāca lakṣmaṇam rāmaḥ śatrughnam bharatam tathā
śrūyatām idam ākhyānam anayoḥ deva varcasoḥ
vicitra artha padam samyak gāyatoḥ madhura svaram
imau munī pārthiva lakṣmaṇa anvitau
kuśīlavau ca eva mahā tapasvinau
mama api tat bhūti karam pracakṣate
mahā anubhāvam caritam nibodhata
tatas tu tau rāma vacaḥ pracoditau
agāyatām mārga vidhāna saṃpadā
sa ca api rāmaḥ pariṣad gataḥ śanais
bubhūṣayā āsakta manāḥ babhūva

original: 1.005.001a sarvāpūrvam iyaṃ yeṣām āsīt kṛtsnā vasuṃdharā
analyzed: sarva apūrvam iyam yeṣām āsīt kṛtsnā vasuṃdharā
prajāpatim upādāya nṛpāṇām jaya śālinām

original: 1.005.002a yeṣāṃ sa sagaro nāma sāgaro yena khānitaḥ
analyzed: yeṣām sa sagaraḥ nāma sāgaraḥ yena khānitaḥ
ṣaṣṭiḥ putra sahasrāṇi yam yāntam paryavārayan

original: 1.005.003a ikṣvākūṇām idaṃ teṣāṃ rājñāṃ vaṃśe mahātmanām
analyzed: ikṣvākūṇām idam teṣām rājñām vaṃśe mahātmanām

original: 1.005.003c mahad utpannam ākhyānaṃ rāmāyaṇam iti śrutam
analyzed: mahat utpannam ākhyānam rāmāyaṇam iti śrutam

original: 1.005.004a tad idaṃ vartayiṣyāmi sarvaṃ nikhilam āditaḥ
analyzed: tat idam vartayiṣyāmi sarvam nikhilam āditas
dharma kāma artha sahitam śrotavyam anasūyayā

original: 1.005.005a kosalo nāma muditaḥ sphīto janapado mahān
analyzed: kosalaḥ nāma muditaḥ sphītaḥ janapadaḥ mahān
niviṣṭaḥ sarayū tīre prabhūta dhana dhānyavān
ayodhyā nāma nagarī tatra āsīt loka viśrutā

original: 1.005.006c manunā mānavendreṇa yā purī nirmitā svayam
analyzed: manunā mānava indreṇa yā purī nirmitā svayam

original: 1.005.007a āyatā daśa ca dve ca yojanāni mahāpurī
analyzed: āyatā daśa ca dve ca yojanāni mahā purī
śrīmatī trīṇi vistīrṇā suvibhakta mahāpathā
rājamārgeṇa mahatā suvibhaktena śobhitā
mukta puṣpa avakīrṇena jala siktena nityaśas
tām tu rājā daśarathaḥ mahā rāṣṭra vivardhanaḥ

original: 1.005.009c purīm āvāsayām āsa divi devapatir yathā
analyzed: purīm āvāsayām āsa divi devapatiḥ yathā
kapāṭatoraṇavatīm suvibhakta antarāpaṇām
sarva yantra āyudhavatīm upetām sarva śilpibhiḥ
sūta māgadha saṃbādhām śrīmatīm atula prabhām
ucca aṭṭāla dhvajavatīm śataghnī śata saṃkulām
vadhū nāṭaka saṅghaiḥ ca saṃyuktām sarvatas purīm
udyāna āmravaṇa upetām mahatīm sāla mekhalām
durga gambhīra parighām durgām anyaiḥ durāsadām
vāji vāraṇa saṃpūrṇām gobhiḥ uṣṭraiḥ kharaiḥ tathā
sāmanta rāja saṅghaiḥ ca bali karmabhiḥ āvṛtām
nānā deśa nivāsaiḥ ca vaṇigbhiḥ upaśobhitām
prasādaiḥ ratna vikṛtaiḥ parvataiḥ upaśobhitām
kūṭāgāraiḥ ca saṃpūrṇām indrasya iva amarāvatīm
citrām aṣṭāpada ākārām vara nārī gaṇaiḥ yutām
sarva ratna samākīrṇām vimāna gṛha śobhitām
gṛha gāḍhām avicchidrām sama bhūmau niveśitām
śāli taṇḍula saṃpūrṇām ikṣu kāṇḍa rasa udakām

original: 1.005.018a dundubhībhir mṛdaṅgaiś ca vīṇābhiḥ paṇavais tathā
analyzed: dundubhībhiḥ mṛdaṅgaiḥ ca vīṇābhiḥ paṇavaiḥ tathā

original: 1.005.018c nāditāṃ bhṛśam atyarthaṃ pṛthivyāṃ tām anuttamām
analyzed: nāditām bhṛśam atyartham pṛthivyām tām anuttamām
vimānam iva siddhānām tapasā adhigatam divi
su niveśita veśma antām nara uttama samāvṛtām

original: 1.005.020a ye ca bāṇair na vidhyanti viviktam aparāparam
analyzed: ye ca bāṇaiḥ na vidhyanti viviktam apara aparam
śabdavedhyam ca vitatam laghu hastāḥ viśāradāḥ
siṃha vyāghra varāhāṇām mattānām nadatām vane

original: 1.005.021c hantāro niśitaiḥ śastrair balād bāhubalair api
analyzed: hantāraḥ niśitaiḥ śastraiḥ balāt bāhu balaiḥ api
tādṛśānām sahasraiḥ tām abhipūrṇām mahā rathaiḥ

original: 1.005.022c purīm āvāsayām āsa rājā daśarathas tadā
analyzed: purīm āvāsayām āsa rājā daśarathaḥ tadā
tām agnimadbhiḥ guṇavadbhiḥ āvṛtām
dvijottamaiḥ veda ṣaḍaṅga pāragaiḥ
sahasra daiḥ satya rataiḥ mahātmabhiḥ
mahā ṛṣi kalpaiḥ ṛṣibhiḥ ca kevalaiḥ
puryām tasyām ayodhyāyām veda vid sarva saṃgrahaḥ
ikṣvākūṇām atirathaḥ yajvā dharma rataḥ vaśī
mahā ṛṣi kalpaḥ rājarṣiḥ triṣu lokṛṣu viśrutaḥ
balavān nihata amitraḥ mitravān vijita indriyaḥ
dhanaiḥ ca saṃcayaiḥ ca anyaiḥ śakra vaiśravaṇa upamaḥ
yathā manuḥ mahā tejāḥ lokasya parirakṣitā

original: 1.006.004c tathā daśaratho rājā vasañ jagad apālayat
analyzed: tathā daśarathaḥ rājā vasam jagat apālayat
tena satya abhisaṃdhena tri vargam anutiṣṭhatā
pālitā sā purī śreṣṭha indreṇa iva amarāvatī

original: 1.006.006a tasmin puravare hṛṣṭā dharmātmanā bahu śrutāḥ
analyzed: tasmin pura vare hṛṣṭāḥ dharma ātmanā bahu śrutāḥ

original: 1.006.006c narās tuṣṭādhanaiḥ svaiḥ svair alubdhāḥ satyavādinaḥ
analyzed: narāḥ tuṣṭa adhanaiḥ svaiḥ svaiḥ alubdhāḥ satya vādinaḥ

original: 1.006.007a nālpasaṃnicayaḥ kaś cid āsīt tasmin purottame
analyzed: na alpa saṃnicayaḥ kaḥ cit āsīt tasmin pura uttame
kuṭumbī yaḥ hi a siddha arthaḥ agava aśva dhana dhānyavān

original: 1.006.008a kāmī vā na kadaryo vā nṛśaṃsaḥ puruṣaḥ kva cit
analyzed: kāmī vā na kadaryaḥ vā nṛśaṃsaḥ puruṣaḥ kva cit

original: 1.006.008c draṣṭuṃ śakyam ayodhyāyāṃ nāvidvān na ca nāstikaḥ
analyzed: draṣṭum śakyam ayodhyāyām na a vidvān na ca nāstikaḥ

original: 1.006.009a sarve narāś ca nāryaś ca dharmaśīlāḥ susaṃyatāḥ
analyzed: sarve narāḥ ca nāryaḥ ca dharma śīlāḥ su saṃyatāḥ
muditāḥ śīla vṛttābhyām mahā ṛṣayaḥ iva amalāḥ
na akuṇḍalī na amukuṭī na asragvī na alpa bhogavān
na amṛṣṭaḥ na anulipta aṅgaḥ na asugandhaḥ ca vidyate
na amṛṣṭa bhojī na adātā na api
na a hasta ābharaṇaḥ vā api dṛśyate na api anātmavān
na anāhitāgniḥ na ayajvā vipraḥ na api a sahasra daḥ

original: 1.006.012c kaś cid āsīd ayodhyāyāṃ na ca nirvṛttasaṃkaraḥ
analyzed: kaḥ cit āsīt ayodhyāyām na ca nirvṛtta saṃkaraḥ
sva karma niratāḥ nityam brāhmaṇāḥ vijita indriyāḥ
dāna adhyayana śīlāḥ ca saṃyatāḥ ca pratigrahe

original: 1.006.014a na nāstiko nānṛtako na kaś cid abahuśrutaḥ
analyzed: na nāstikaḥ na ānṛtakaḥ na kaḥ cit a bahu śrutaḥ

original: 1.006.014c nāsūyako na cāśakto nāvidvān vidyate tadā
analyzed: na asūyakaḥ na ca aśaktaḥ na a vidvān vidyate tadā

original: 1.006.015a na dīnaḥ kṣiptacitto vā vyathito vāpi kaś cana
analyzed: na dīnaḥ kṣipta cittaḥ vā vyathitaḥ vā api kaḥ cana

original: 1.006.015c kaś cin naro vā nārī vā nāśrīmān nāpy arūpavān
analyzed: kaḥ cit naraḥ vā nārī vā na aśrīmān na api arūpavān
draṣṭum śakyam ayodhyāyām nā api rājani abhaktimān
varṇeṣu agrya caturtheṣu devatā atithi pūjakāḥ

original: 1.006.016c dīrghāyuṣo narāḥ sarve dharmaṃ satyaṃ ca saṃśritāḥ
analyzed: dīrgha āyuṣaḥ narāḥ sarve dharmam satyam ca saṃśritāḥ

original: 1.006.017a kṣatraṃ brahmamukhaṃ cāsīd vaiśyāḥ kṣatram anuvratāḥ
analyzed: kṣatram brahma mukham ca āsīt vaiśyāḥ kṣatram anuvratāḥ
śūdrāḥ svadharma niratāḥ trīn varṇān upacāriṇaḥ
sā tena ikṣvāku nāthena purī su parirakṣitā
yathā purastāt manunā mānava indreṇa dhīmatā
yodhānām agni kalpānām peśalānām amarṣiṇām
saṃpūrṇa ākṛta vidyānām guhā kesariṇām iva
kāmboja viṣaye jātaiḥ vāhlīkaiḥ ca haya uttamaiḥ
vanāyu jaiḥ nadī jaiḥ ca pūrṇā hari haya upamaiḥ
mattaiḥ pūrṇā haimavataiḥ api
mada anvitaiḥ ati balaiḥ mātaṅgaiḥ parvata upamaiḥ

original: 1.006.022a añjanād api niṣkrāntair vāmanād api ca dvipaiḥ
analyzed: añjanāt api niṣkrāntaiḥ vāmanāt api ca dvipaiḥ

original: 1.006.022c bhadramandrair bhadramṛgair mṛgamandraiś ca sā purī
analyzed: bhadra mandraiḥ bhadramṛgaiḥ mṛgamandraiḥ ca sā purī
nitya mattaiḥ sadā pūrṇā nāgaiḥ acala saṃnibhaiḥ

original: 1.006.023c sā yojane ca dve bhūyaḥ satyanāmā prakāśate
analyzed: sā yojane ca dve bhūyas satyanāmā prakāśate
tām satyanāmām dṛḍha toraṇa argalām
gṛhaiḥ vicitraiḥ upaśobhitām śivām
purīm ayodhyām nṛ sahasra saṃkulām
śaśāsa vai śakra samaḥ mahīpatiḥ
aṣṭau babhūvuḥ vīrasya tasya amātyāḥ yaśasvinaḥ
śucayaḥ ca anuraktāḥ ca rāja kṛtyeṣu nityaśas
aśokaḥ mantrapālaḥ ca sumantraḥ ca aṣṭamaḥ abhavat
ṛtvijau dvau abhimatau tasya āstām ṛṣi sattamau

original: 1.007.003c vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca mantriṇaś ca tathāpare
analyzed: vasiṣṭhaḥ vāmadevaḥ ca mantriṇaḥ ca tathā apare
śrīmantaḥ ca mahātmānaḥ śāstra jñāḥ dṛḍha vikramāḥ
kīrtimantaḥ praṇihitāḥ yathā vacana kāriṇaḥ
tejaḥ kṣamā yaśaḥ prāptāḥ smita pūrva abhibhāṣiṇaḥ

original: 1.007.005c krodhāt kāmārthahetor vā na brūyur anṛtaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: krodhāt kāma artha hetoḥ vā na brūyuḥ anṛtam vacaḥ

original: 1.007.006a teṣām aviditaṃ kiṃ cit sveṣu nāsti pareṣu vā
analyzed: teṣām aviditam kim cit sveṣu na asti pareṣu vā
kriyamāṇam kṛtam vā api cāreṇa api cikīrṣitam
kuśalāḥ vyavahāreṣu sauhṛdeṣu parīkṣitāḥ

original: 1.007.007c prāptakālaṃ yathā daṇḍaṃ dhārayeyuḥ suteṣv api
analyzed: prāpta kālam yathā daṇḍam dhārayeyuḥ suteṣu api
kośa saṃgrahaṇe yuktāḥ balasya ca parigrahe

original: 1.007.008c ahitaṃ cāpi puruṣaṃ na vihiṃsyur adūṣakam
analyzed: ahitam ca api puruṣam na vihiṃsyuḥ adūṣakam

original: 1.007.009a vīrāṃś ca niyatotsāhā rāja śāstram anuṣṭhitāḥ
analyzed: vīrān ca niyata utsāhāḥ rāja śāstram anuṣṭhitāḥ
śucīnām rakṣitāraḥ ca nityam viṣaya vāsinām
brahma kṣatram a hiṃsantaḥ te kośam samapūrayan
su tīkṣṇa daṇḍāḥ saṃprekṣya puruṣasya balābalam
śucīnām ekabuddhīnām sarveṣām saṃprajānatām

original: 1.007.011c nāsīt pure vā rāṣṭre vā mṛṣāvādī naraḥ kva cit
analyzed: na āsīt pure vā rāṣṭre vā mṛṣāvādī naraḥ kva cit

original: 1.007.012a kaś cin na duṣṭas tatrāsīt paradāraratir naraḥ
analyzed: kaḥ cit na duṣṭaḥ tatra āsīt para dāra ratiḥ naraḥ

original: 1.007.012c praśāntaṃ sarvam evāsīd rāṣṭraṃ puravaraṃ ca tat
analyzed: praśāntam sarvam evā āsīt rāṣṭram puravaram ca tat

original: 1.007.013a suvāsasaḥ suveśāś ca te ca sarve suśīlinaḥ
analyzed: su vāsasaḥ su veśāḥ ca te ca sarve su śīlinaḥ
hita artham ca narendrasya jāgrataḥ naya cakṣuṣā

original: 1.007.014a gurau guṇagṛhītāś ca prakhyātāś ca parākramaiḥ
analyzed: gurau guṇa gṛhītāḥ ca prakhyātāḥ ca parākramaiḥ
videśeṣu api vijñātāḥ sarvatas buddhi niścayāt

original: 1.007.015a īdṛśais tair amātyais tu rājā daśaratho 'naghaḥ
analyzed: īdṛśaiḥ taiḥ amātyaiḥ tu rājā daśarathaḥ anaghaḥ
upapannaḥ guṇa upetaiḥ anvaśāsat vasuṃdharām
avekṣamāṇaḥ cāreṇa prajāḥ dharmeṇa rañjayan

original: 1.007.016c nādhyagacchad viśiṣṭaṃ vā tulyaṃ vā śatrum ātmanaḥ
analyzed: na adhyagacchat viśiṣṭam vā tulyam vā śatrum ātmanaḥ
taiḥ mantribhiḥ mantra hitaiḥ niviṣṭaiḥ
vṛtaḥ anuraktaiḥ kuśalaiḥ samarthaiḥ
sa pārthivaḥ dīptim avāpa yuktaḥ
tejaḥ mayaiḥ gobhiḥ iva uditaḥ arkaḥ

original: 1.008.001a tasya tv evaṃ prabhāvasya dharmajñasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: tasya tu evam prabhāvasya dharma jñasya mahātmanaḥ
suta artham tapyamānasya na āsīt vaṃśa karaḥ sutaḥ
cintayānasya tasya evam buddhiḥ āsīt mahātmanaḥ

original: 1.008.002c sutārthaṃ vājimedhena kimarthaṃ na yajāmy aham
analyzed: suta artham vājimedhena kimartham na yajāmi aham

original: 1.008.003a sa niścitāṃ matiṃ kṛtvā yaṣṭavyam iti buddhimān
analyzed: sa niścitām matim kṛtvā yaṣṭavyam iti buddhimān

original: 1.008.003c mantribhiḥ saha dharmātmā sarvair eva kṛtātmabhiḥ
analyzed: mantribhiḥ saha dharma ātmā sarvaiḥ eva kṛtātmabhiḥ
tatas abravīt idam rājā sumantram mantri sattamam

original: 1.008.004c śīghram ānaya me sarvān gurūṃs tān sapurohitān
analyzed: śīghram ānaya me sarvān gurūn tān sa purohitān

original: 1.008.005a etac chrutvā rahaḥ sūto rājānam idam abravīt
analyzed: etat śrutvā rahaḥ sūtaḥ rājānam idam abravīt
ṛtvigbhiḥ upadiṣṭaḥ ayam purā vṛttaḥ mayā śrutaḥ
sanatkumāraḥ bhagavān pūrvam kathitavān kathām

original: 1.008.006c ṛṣīṇāṃ saṃnidhau rājaṃs tava putrāgamaṃ prati
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām saṃnidhau rājan tava putra āgamam prati

original: 1.008.007a kāśyapasya tu putro 'sti vibhāṇḍaka iti śrutaḥ
analyzed: kāśyapasya tu putraḥ asti vibhāṇḍakaḥ iti śrutaḥ

original: 1.008.007c ṛṣyaśṛṅga iti khyātas tasya putro bhaviṣyati
analyzed: ṛṣyaśṛṅgaḥ iti khyātaḥ tasya putraḥ bhaviṣyati

original: 1.008.008a sa vane nityasaṃvṛddho munir vanacaraḥ sadā
analyzed: sa vane nitya saṃvṛddhaḥ muniḥ vana caraḥ sadā
na anyam jānāti vipra indraḥ nityam pitṛ anuvartanāt
dvaividhyam brahmacaryasya bhaviṣyati mahātmanaḥ

original: 1.008.009c lokeṣu prathitaṃ rājan vipraiś ca kathitaṃ sadā
analyzed: lokeṣu prathitam rājan vipraiḥ ca kathitam sadā
tasya evam vartamānasya kālaḥ samabhivartata
agnim śuśrūṣamāṇasya pitaram ca yaśasvinam

original: 1.008.011a etasminn eva kāle tu romapādaḥ pratāpavān
analyzed: etasmin eva kāle tu romapādaḥ pratāpavān
aṅgeṣu prathitā rājā bhaviṣyati mahā balaḥ
tasya vyatikramāt rājñaḥ bhaviṣyati su dāruṇā
anāvṛṣṭiḥ su ghorā vai sarva bhūta bhaya āvahā
anāvṛṣṭyām tu vṛttāyām rājā duḥkha samanvitaḥ
brāhmaṇām śruta vṛddhān ca samānīya pravakṣyati
bhavantaḥ śruta dharmāṇaḥ loke cāritra vedinaḥ
samādiśantu niyamam prāyaścittam yathā bhavet
vakṣyanti te mahīpālam brāhmaṇāḥ vedapāragāḥ
vibhāṇḍaka sutam rājan sarva upāyaiḥ iha ānaya
ānāyya ca mahīpāle ṛṣyaśṛṅgam su satkṛtam

original: 1.008.016c prayaccha kanyāṃ śāntāṃ vai vidhinā susamāhitaḥ
analyzed: prayaccha kanyām śāntām vai vidhinā su samāhitaḥ

original: 1.008.017a teṣāṃ tu vacanaṃ śrutvā rājā cintāṃ prapatsyate
analyzed: teṣām tu vacanam śrutvā rājā cintām prapatsyate

original: 1.008.017c kenopāyena vai śakyam ihānetuṃ sa vīryavān
analyzed: kena upāyena vai śakyam iha ānetum sa vīryavān

original: 1.008.018a tato rājā viniścitya saha mantribhir ātmavān
analyzed: tatas rājā viniścitya saha mantribhiḥ ātmavān
purohitam amātyān ca preṣayiṣyati satkṛtān

original: 1.008.019a te tu rājño vacaḥ śrutvā vyathitā vanatānanāḥ
analyzed: te tu rājñaḥ vacaḥ śrutvā vyathitāḥ vanata ānanāḥ

original: 1.008.019c na gacchema ṛṣer bhītā anuneṣyanti taṃ nṛpam
analyzed: na gacchema ṛṣeḥ bhītāḥ anuneṣyanti tam nṛpam

original: 1.008.020a vakṣyanti cintayitvā te tasyopāyāṃś ca tān kṣamān
analyzed: vakṣyanti cintayitvā te tasya upāyān ca tān kṣamān

original: 1.008.020c āneṣyāmo vayaṃ vipraṃ na ca doṣo bhaviṣyati
analyzed: āneṣyāmaḥ vayam vipram na ca doṣaḥ bhaviṣyati
evam aṅga adhipena eva gaṇikābhiḥ ṛṣeḥ sutaḥ
ānītaḥ avarṣayat devaḥ śāntā ca asmai pradīyate

original: 1.008.022a ṛṣyaśṛṅgas tu jāmātā putrāṃs tava vidhāsyati
analyzed: ṛṣyaśṛṅgaḥ tu jāmātā putrān tava vidhāsyati
sanatkumāra kathitam etāvat vyāhṛtam mayā
atha hṛṣṭaḥ daśarathaḥ sumantram pratyabhāṣata
yathā ṛṣyaśṛṅgaḥ tu ānītaḥ vistareṇa tvayā ucyatām

original: 1.009.001a sumantraś codito rājñā provācedaṃ vacas tadā
analyzed: sumantraḥ coditaḥ rājñā provāca idam vacaḥ tadā

original: 1.009.001c yatharṣyaśṛṅgas tv ānītaḥ śṛṇu me mantribhiḥ saha
analyzed: yathā ṛṣyaśṛṅgaḥ tu ānītaḥ śṛṇu me mantribhiḥ saha
romapādam uvāca idam saha amātyaḥ purohitaḥ
upāyaḥ nirapāyaḥ ayam asmābhiḥ abhicintitaḥ

original: 1.009.003c anabhijñaḥ sa nārīṇāṃ viṣayāṇāṃ sukhasya ca
analyzed: anabhijñaḥ sa nārīṇām viṣayāṇām sukhasya ca
indriya arthaiḥ abhimataiḥ nara citta pramāthibhiḥ
puram ānāyayiṣyāmaḥ kṣipram ca adhyavasīyatām
gaṇikāḥ tatra gacchantu rūpavatyaḥ su alaṃkṛtāḥ
pralobhya vividha upāyaiḥ āneṣyanti iha satkṛtāḥ

original: 1.009.006a śrutvā tatheti rājā ca pratyuvāca purohitam
analyzed: śrutvā tathā iti rājā ca pratyuvāca purohitam

original: 1.009.006c purohito mantriṇaś ca tathā cakruś ca te tadā
analyzed: purohitaḥ mantriṇaḥ ca tathā cakruḥ ca te tadā

original: 1.009.007a vāramukhyās tu tac chrutvā vanaṃ praviviśur mahat
analyzed: vāramukhyāḥ tu tat śrutvā vanam praviviśuḥ mahat
āśramasya avidūre asmin yatnam kurvanti darśane
ṛṣi putrasya ghorasya nityam āśrama vāsinaḥ
pituḥ sa nitya saṃtuṣṭaḥ na aticakrāma ca āśramāt
na tena janma prabhṛti dṛṣṭa pūrvam tapasvinā

original: 1.009.009c strī vā pumān vā yac cānyat sattvaṃ nagara rāṣṭrajam
analyzed: strī vā pumān vā yat ca anyat sattvam nagara rāṣṭra jam

original: 1.009.010a tataḥ kadā cit taṃ deśam ājagāma yadṛcchayā
analyzed: tatas kadā cit tam deśam ājagāma yadṛcchayā
vibhāṇḍaka sutaḥ tatra tāḥ ca apaśyat vara aṅganāḥ
tāḥ citra veṣāḥ pramadāḥ gāyantyaḥ madhura svaraiḥ
ṛṣi putram upāgamya sarvāḥ vacanam abruvan

original: 1.009.012a kas tvaṃ kiṃ vartase brahmañ jñātum icchāmahe vayam
analyzed: kaḥ tvam kim vartase brahmam jñātum icchāmahe vayam

original: 1.009.012c ekas tvaṃ vijane ghore vane carasi śaṃsa naḥ
analyzed: ekaḥ tvam vijane ghore vane carasi śaṃsa naḥ

original: 1.009.013a adṛṣṭarūpās tās tena kāmyarūpā vane striyaḥ
analyzed: adṛṣṭa rūpāḥ tāḥ tena kāmya rūpāḥ vane striyaḥ

original: 1.009.013c hārdāt tasya matir jātā ākhyātuṃ pitaraṃ svakam
analyzed: hārdāt tasya matiḥ jātā ākhyātum pitaram svakam
pitā vibhāṇḍakaḥ asmākam tasya aham suta aurasaḥ

original: 1.009.014c ṛṣyaśṛṅga iti khyātaṃ nāma karma ca me bhuvi
analyzed: ṛṣyaśṛṅgaḥ iti khyātam nāma karma ca me bhuvi
iha āśrama padaḥ asmākam samīpe śubha darśanāḥ

original: 1.009.015c kariṣye vo 'tra pūjāṃ vai sarveṣāṃ vidhipūrvakam
analyzed: kariṣye vaḥ atra pūjām vai sarveṣām vidhi pūrvakam

original: 1.009.016a ṛṣiputravacaḥ śrutvā sarvāsāṃ matir āsa vai
analyzed: ṛṣi putra vacaḥ śrutvā sarvāsām matiḥ āsa vai

original: 1.009.016c tad āśramapadaṃ draṣṭuṃ jagmuḥ sarvāś ca tena ha
analyzed: tat āśrama padam draṣṭum jagmuḥ sarvāḥ ca tena ha

original: 1.009.017a gatānāṃ tu tataḥ pūjām ṛṣiputraś cakāra ha
analyzed: gatānām tu tatas pūjām ṛṣi putraḥ cakāra ha

original: 1.009.017c idam arghyam idaṃ pādyam idaṃ mūlaṃ phalaṃ ca naḥ
analyzed: idam arghyam idam pādyam idam mūlam phalam ca naḥ

original: 1.009.018a pratigṛhya tu tāṃ pūjāṃ sarvā eva samutsukāḥ
analyzed: pratigṛhya tu tām pūjām sarvāḥ eva samutsukāḥ

original: 1.009.018c ṛṣer bhītāś ca śīghraṃ tu gamanāya matiṃ dadhuḥ
analyzed: ṛṣeḥ bhītāḥ ca śīghram tu gamanāya matim

original: 1.009.019a asmākam api mukhyāni phalānīmāni vai dvija
analyzed: asmākam api mukhyāni phalāni imāni vai dvija

original: 1.009.019c gṛhāṇa prati bhadraṃ te bhakṣayasva ca mā ciram
analyzed: gṛhāṇa prati bhadram te bhakṣayasva ca mā ciram

original: 1.009.020a tatas tās taṃ samāliṅgya sarvā harṣasamanvitāḥ
analyzed: tatas tāḥ tam samāliṅgya sarvāḥ harṣa samanvitāḥ

original: 1.009.020c modakān pradadus tasmai bhakṣyāṃś ca vividhāñ śubhān
analyzed: modakān pradaduḥ tasmai bhakṣyān ca vividhām śubhān

original: 1.009.021a tāni cāsvādya tejasvī phalānīti sma manyate
analyzed: tāni ca āsvādya tejasvī phalāni iti sma manyate
an āsvādita pūrvāṇi vane nitya nivāsinām

original: 1.009.022a āpṛcchya ca tadā vipraṃ vratacaryāṃ nivedya ca
analyzed: āpṛcchya ca tadā vipram vrata caryām nivedya ca

original: 1.009.022c gacchanti smāpadeśāt tā bhītās tasya pituḥ striyaḥ
analyzed: gacchanti sma apadeśāt tāḥ bhītāḥ tasya pituḥ striyaḥ
gatāsu tāsu sarvāsu kāśyapasya ātmajaḥ dvijaḥ
asvastha hṛdayaḥ ca āsīt duḥkham sma parivartate

original: 1.009.024a tato 'paredyus taṃ deśam ājagāma sa vīryavān
analyzed: tatas aparedyus tam deśam ājagāma sa vīryavān

original: 1.009.024c manojñā yatra tā dṛṣṭā vāramukhyāḥ svalaṃkṛtāḥ
analyzed: manojñāḥ yatra tāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ vāramukhyāḥ su alaṃkṛtāḥ

original: 1.009.025a dṛṣṭvaiva ca tadā vipram āyāntaṃ hṛṣṭa mānasāḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā eva ca tadā vipram āyāntam hṛṣṭa mānasāḥ

original: 1.009.025c upasṛtya tataḥ sarvās tās tam ūcur idaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: upasṛtya tatas sarvāḥ tāḥ tam ūcuḥ idam vacaḥ

original: 1.009.026a ehy āśramapadaṃ saumya asmākam iti cābruvan
analyzed: ehi āśrama padam saumya asmākam iti ca abruvan

original: 1.009.026c tatrāpy eṣa vidhiḥ śrīmān viśeṣeṇa bhaviṣyati
analyzed: tatra api eṣa vidhiḥ śrīmān viśeṣeṇa bhaviṣyati

original: 1.009.027a śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tāsāṃ sarvāsāṃ hṛdayaṃgamam
analyzed: śrutvā tu vacanam tāsām sarvāsām hṛdayaṃgamam

original: 1.009.027c gamanāya matiṃ cakre taṃ ca ninyus tadā striyaḥ
analyzed: gamanāya matim cakre tam ca ninyuḥ tadā striyaḥ

original: 1.009.028a tatra cānīyamāne tu vipre tasmin mahātmani
analyzed: tatra ca ānīyamāne tu vipre tasmin mahātmani

original: 1.009.028c vavarṣa sahasā devo jagat prahlādayaṃs tadā
analyzed: vavarṣa sahasā devaḥ jagat prahlādayan tadā
varṣeṇa eva āgatam vipram viṣayam svam narādhipaḥ

original: 1.009.029c pratyudgamya muniṃ prahvaḥ śirasā ca mahīṃ gataḥ
analyzed: pratyudgamya munim prahvaḥ śirasā ca mahīm gataḥ

original: 1.009.030a arghyaṃ ca pradadau tasmai nyāyataḥ susamāhitaḥ
analyzed: arghyam ca pradadau tasmai nyāyataḥ su samāhitaḥ

original: 1.009.030c vavre prasādaṃ viprendrān mā vipraṃ manyur āviśet
analyzed: vavre prasādam vipra indrān mā vipram manyuḥ āviśet
antaḥpuram praviśya asmai kanyām dattvā yathāvidhi

original: 1.009.031c śāntāṃ śāntena manasā rājā harṣam avāpa saḥ
analyzed: śāntām śāntena manasā rājā harṣam avāpa saḥ

original: 1.009.032a evaṃ sa nyavasat tatra sarvakāmaiḥ supūjitaḥ
analyzed: evam sa nyavasat tatra sarva kāmaiḥ su pūjitaḥ
ṛṣyaśṛṅgaḥ mahā tejāḥ śāntayā saha bhāryayā

original: 1.010.001a bhūya eva ca rājendra śṛṇu me vacanaṃ hitam
analyzed: bhūyas eva ca rāja indra śṛṇu me vacanam hitam

original: 1.010.001c yathā sa devapravaraḥ kathayām āsa buddhimān
analyzed: yathā sa deva pravaraḥ kathayām āsa buddhimān
ikṣvākūṇām kule jātaḥ bhaviṣyati su dhārmikaḥ
rājā daśarathaḥ nāmnā śrīmān satya pratiśravaḥ

original: 1.010.003a aṅgarājena sakhyaṃ ca tasya rājño bhaviṣyati
analyzed: aṅga rājena sakhyam ca tasya rājñaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: 1.010.003c kanyā cāsya mahābhāgā śāntā nāma bhaviṣyati
analyzed: kanyā ca asya mahābhāgā śāntā nāma bhaviṣyati

original: 1.010.004a putras tv aṅgasya rājñas tu romapāda iti śrutaḥ
analyzed: putraḥ tu aṅgasya rājñaḥ tu romapādaḥ iti śrutaḥ

original: 1.010.004c taṃ sa rājā daśaratho gamiṣyati mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: tam sa rājā daśarathaḥ gamiṣyati mahā yaśāḥ

original: 1.010.005a anapatyo 'smi dharmātmañ śāntā bhāryā mama kratum
analyzed: anapatyaḥ asmi dharma ātmam śāntā bhāryā mama kratum
āhareta tvayā ājñaptaḥ saṃtāna artham kulasya ca

original: 1.010.006a śrutvā rājño 'tha tad vākyaṃ manasā sa vicintya ca
analyzed: śrutvā rājñaḥ atha tat vākyam manasā sa vicintya ca
pradāsyate putravantam śāntā bhartāram ātmavān

original: 1.010.007a pratigṛhya ca taṃ vipraṃ sa rājā vigatajvaraḥ
analyzed: pratigṛhya ca tam vipram sa rājā vigata jvaraḥ
āhariṣyati tam yajñam prahṛṣṭena antarātmanā

original: 1.010.008a taṃ ca rājā daśaratho yaṣṭukāmaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: tam ca rājā daśarathaḥ yaṣṭu kāmaḥ kṛta añjaliḥ
ṛṣyaśṛṅgam dvijaśreṣṭham varayiṣyati dharma vid

original: 1.010.009a yajñārthaṃ prasavārthaṃ ca svargārthaṃ ca nareśvaraḥ
analyzed: yajña artham prasava artham ca svarga artham ca nareśvaraḥ

original: 1.010.009c labhate ca sa taṃ kāmaṃ dvija mukhyād viśāṃ patiḥ
analyzed: labhate ca sa tam kāmam dvija mukhyāt viśām patiḥ
putrāḥ ca asya bhaviṣyanti catvāraḥ amita vikramāḥ
vaṃśa pratiṣṭhāna karāḥ sarva lokeṣu viśrutāḥ

original: 1.010.011a evaṃ sa devapravaraḥ pūrvaṃ kathitavān kathām
analyzed: evam sa deva pravaraḥ pūrvam kathitavān kathām
sanatkumāraḥ bhagavān purā deva yuge prabhuḥ

original: 1.010.012a sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla tam ānaya susatkṛtam
analyzed: sa tvam puruṣa śārdūla tam ānaya su satkṛtam
svayam eva mahā rāja gatvā sa bala vāhanaḥ

original: 1.010.013a anumānya vasiṣṭhaṃ ca sūtavākyaṃ niśamya ca
analyzed: anumānya vasiṣṭham ca sūta vākyam niśamya ca

original: 1.010.013c sāntaḥpuraḥ sahāmātyaḥ prayayau yatra sa dvijaḥ
analyzed: sa antaḥpuraḥ saha amātyaḥ prayayau yatra sa dvijaḥ

original: 1.010.014a vanāni saritaś caiva vyatikramya śanaiḥ śanaiḥ
analyzed: vanāni saritaḥ ca eva vyatikramya śanais śanais

original: 1.010.014c abhicakrāma taṃ deśaṃ yatra vai munipuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: abhicakrāma tam deśam yatra vai muni puṃgavaḥ
āsādya tam dvijaśreṣṭham romapāda samīpa gam
ṛṣi putram dadarśa ādau dīpyamānam iva analam

original: 1.010.016a tato rājā yathānyāyaṃ pūjāṃ cakre viśeṣataḥ
analyzed: tatas rājā yathānyāyam pūjām cakre viśeṣataḥ
sakhi tvāt tasya vai rājñaḥ prahṛṣṭena antarātmanā
romapādena ca ākhyātam ṛṣi putrāya dhīmate

original: 1.010.017c sakhyaṃ saṃbandhakaṃ caiva tadā taṃ pratyapūjayat
analyzed: sakhyam saṃbandhakam ca eva tadā tam pratyapūjayat
evam su satkṛtaḥ tena saha uṣitvā nara ṛṣabhaḥ
sapta aṣṭa divasān rājā rājānam idam abravīt

original: 1.010.019a śāntā tava sutā rājan saha bhartrā viśāmpate
analyzed: śāntā tava sutā rājan saha bhartrā viśām pate

original: 1.010.019c madīyaṃ nagaraṃ yātu kāryaṃ hi mahad udyatam
analyzed: madīyam nagaram yātu kāryam hi mahat udyatam

original: 1.010.020a tatheti rājā saṃśrutya gamanaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ
analyzed: tathā iti rājā saṃśrutya gamanam tasya dhīmataḥ

original: 1.010.020c uvāca vacanaṃ vipraṃ gaccha tvaṃ saha bhāryayā
analyzed: uvāca vacanam vipram gaccha tvam saha bhāryayā

original: 1.010.021a ṛṣiputraḥ pratiśrutya tathety āha nṛpaṃ tadā
analyzed: ṛṣi putraḥ pratiśrutya tathā iti āha nṛpam tadā
sa nṛpeṇa abhyanujñātaḥ prayayau saha bhāryayā

original: 1.010.022a tāv anyonyāñjaliṃ kṛtvā snehāt saṃśliṣya corasā
analyzed: tau anyonya añjalim kṛtvā snehāt saṃśliṣya ca urasā
nanandatuḥ daśarathaḥ romapādaḥ ca vīryavān
tatas suhṛdam āpṛcchya prasthitaḥ raghunandanaḥ

original: 1.010.023c paurebhyaḥ preṣayām āsa dūtān vai śīghragāminaḥ
analyzed: paurebhyaḥ preṣayām āsa dūtān vai śīghra gāminaḥ

original: 1.010.023e kriyatāṃ nagaraṃ sarvaṃ kṣipram eva svalaṃkṛtam
analyzed: kriyatām nagaram sarvam kṣipram eva su alaṃkṛtam

original: 1.010.024a tataḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ paurās te śrutvā rājānam āgatam
analyzed: tatas prahṛṣṭāḥ paurāḥ te śrutvā rājānam āgatam

original: 1.010.024c tathā pracakrus tat sarvaṃ rājñā yat preṣitaṃ tadā
analyzed: tathā pracakruḥ tat sarvam rājñā yat preṣitam tadā

original: 1.010.025a tataḥ svalaṃkṛtaṃ rājā nagaraṃ praviveśa ha
analyzed: tatas su alaṃkṛtam rājā nagaram praviveśa ha
śaṅkha dundubhi nirghoṣaiḥ puraskṛtya dvijarṣabham

original: 1.010.026a tataḥ pramuditāḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā vai nāgarā dvijam
analyzed: tatas pramuditāḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā vai nāgarāḥ dvijam
praveśyamānam satkṛtya narendreṇa indra karmaṇā

original: 1.010.027a antaḥpuraṃ praveśyainaṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā tu śāstrataḥ
analyzed: antaḥpuram praveśya enam pūjām kṛtvā tu śāstrataḥ
kṛtakṛtyam tadā ātmānam mene tasya upavāhanāt
antaḥpurāṇi sarvāṇi śāntām dṛṣṭvā tathāgatām
saha bhartrā viśāla akṣīm prīti ānandam upāgaman

original: 1.010.029a pūjyamānā ca tābhiḥ sā rājñā caiva viśeṣataḥ
analyzed: pūjyamānā ca tābhiḥ sā rājñā ca eva viśeṣataḥ

original: 1.010.029c uvāsa tatra sukhitā kaṃ cit kālaṃ saha dvijā
analyzed: uvāsa tatra sukhitā kam cit kālam saha dvijā

original: 1.011.001a tataḥ kāle bahutithe kasmiṃś cit sumanohare
analyzed: tatas kāle bahutithe kasmin cit su manohare
vasante samanuprāpte rājñaḥ yaṣṭum manaḥ abhavat

original: 1.011.002a tataḥ prasādya śirasā taṃ vipraṃ devavarṇinam
analyzed: tatas prasādya śirasā tam vipram deva varṇinam

original: 1.011.002c yajñāya varayām āsa saṃtānārthaṃ kulasya ca
analyzed: yajñāya varayām āsa saṃtāna artham kulasya ca

original: 1.011.003a tatheti ca sa rājānam uvāca ca susatkṛtaḥ
analyzed: tathā iti ca sa rājānam uvāca ca su satkṛtaḥ

original: 1.011.003c saṃbhārāḥ saṃbhriyantāṃ te turagaś ca vimucyatām
analyzed: saṃbhārāḥ saṃbhriyantām te turagaḥ ca vimucyatām
tatas rājā abravīt vākyam sumantram mantri sattamam
sumantra āvāhaya kṣipram ṛtvijaḥ brahma vādinaḥ
tatas sumantraḥ tvaritam gatvā tvarita vikramaḥ

original: 1.011.005c samānayat sa tān viprān samastān vedapāragān
analyzed: samānayat sa tān viprān samastān vedapāragān

original: 1.011.006a suyajñaṃ vāmadevaṃ ca jābālim atha kāśyapam
analyzed: suyajñam vāmadevam ca jābālim atha kāśyapam

original: 1.011.006c purohitaṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ ca ye cānye dvijasattamāḥ
analyzed: purohitam vasiṣṭham ca ye ca anye dvijasattamāḥ

original: 1.011.007a tān pūjayitvā dharmātmā rājā daśarathas tadā
analyzed: tān pūjayitvā dharma ātmā rājā daśarathaḥ tadā
idam dharma artha sahitam ślakṣṇam vacanam abravīt

original: 1.011.008a mama lālapyamānasya putrārthaṃ nāsti vai sukham
analyzed: mama lālapyamānasya putra artham na asti vai sukham
tad artham hayamedhena yakṣyāmi iti matiḥ mama

original: 1.011.009a tad ahaṃ yaṣṭum icchāmi śāstradṛṣṭena karmaṇā
analyzed: tat aham yaṣṭum icchāmi śāstra dṛṣṭena karmaṇā
ṛṣi putra prabhāvena kāmān prāpsyāmi ca api aham

original: 1.011.010a tataḥ sādhv iti tad vākyaṃ brāhmaṇāḥ pratyapūjayan
analyzed: tatas sādhu iti tat vākyam brāhmaṇāḥ pratyapūjayan
vasiṣṭha pramukhāḥ sarve pārthivasya mukhāt cyutam
ṛṣyaśṛṅga purogāḥ ca pratyūcuḥ nṛpatim tadā

original: 1.011.011c saṃbhārāḥ saṃbhriyantāṃ te turagaś ca vimucyatām
analyzed: saṃbhārāḥ saṃbhriyantām te turagaḥ ca vimucyatām
sarvathā prāpyase putrān caturaḥ amita vikramān

original: 1.011.012c yasya te dhārmikī buddhir iyaṃ putrārtham āgatāḥ
analyzed: yasya te dhārmikī buddhiḥ iyam putra artham āgatāḥ

original: 1.011.013a tataḥ prīto 'bhavad rājā śrutvā tad dvijabhāṣitam
analyzed: tatas prītaḥ abhavat rājā śrutvā tat dvija bhāṣitam
amātyān ca abravīt rājā harṣeṇa idam śubha akṣaram

original: 1.011.014a gurūṇāṃ vacanāc chīghraṃ saṃbhārāḥ saṃbhriyantu me
analyzed: gurūṇām vacanāt śīghram saṃbhārāḥ saṃbhriyantu me
samartha adhiṣṭhitaḥ ca aśvaḥ sa upādhyāyaḥ vimucyatām
sarayvāḥ ca uttare tīre yajña bhūmiḥ vidhīyatām
śāntayaḥ ca abhivardhantām yathākalpam yathāvidhi

original: 1.011.016a śakyaḥ kartum ayaṃ yajñaḥ sarveṇāpi mahīkṣitā
analyzed: śakyaḥ kartum ayam yajñaḥ sarveṇa api mahīkṣitā

original: 1.011.016c nāparādho bhavet kaṣṭo yady asmin kratusattame
analyzed: na aparādhaḥ bhavet kaṣṭaḥ yadi asmin kratu sattame
chidram hi mṛgayante atra vidvāṃsaḥ brahmarākṣasāḥ
vidhi hīnasya yajñasya sadyas kartā vinaśyati

original: 1.011.018a tad yathāvidhi pūrvaṃ me kratur eṣa samāpyate
analyzed: tat yathāvidhi pūrvam me kratuḥ eṣa samāpyate
tathā vidhānam kriyatām samarthāḥ karaṇeṣu iha

original: 1.011.019a tatheti ca tataḥ sarve mantriṇaḥ pratyapūjayan
analyzed: tathā iti ca tatas sarve mantriṇaḥ pratyapūjayan
pārthiva indrasya tat vākyam yathā ājñaptam akurvata

original: 1.011.020a tato dvijās te dharmajñam astuvan pārthivarṣabham
analyzed: tatas dvijāḥ te dharma jñam astuvan pārthiva ṛṣabham

original: 1.011.020c anujñātās tataḥ sarve punar jagmur yathāgatam
analyzed: anujñātāḥ tatas sarve punar jagmuḥ yathāgatam

original: 1.011.021a gatānāṃ tu dvijātīnāṃ mantriṇas tān narādhipaḥ
analyzed: gatānām tu dvijātīnām mantriṇaḥ tān narādhipaḥ

original: 1.011.021c visarjayitvā svaṃ veśma praviveśa mahā dyutiḥ
analyzed: visarjayitvā svam veśma praviveśa mahā dyutiḥ

original: 1.012.001a punaḥ prāpte vasante tu pūrṇaḥ saṃvatsaro 'bhavat
analyzed: punar prāpte vasante tu pūrṇaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ abhavat

original: 1.012.001c abhivādya vasiṣṭhaṃ ca nyāyataḥ pratipūjya ca
analyzed: abhivādya vasiṣṭham ca nyāyataḥ pratipūjya ca
abravīt praśritam vākyam prasava artham dvijottamam

original: 1.012.002c yajño me kriyatāṃ vipra yathoktaṃ munipuṃgava
analyzed: yajñaḥ me kriyatām vipra yathoktam muni puṃgava

original: 1.012.003a yathā na vighnaḥ kriyate yajñāṅgeṣu vidhīyatām
analyzed: yathā na vighnaḥ kriyate yajña aṅgeṣu vidhīyatām

original: 1.012.003c bhavān snigdhaḥ suhṛn mahyaṃ guruś ca paramo bhavān
analyzed: bhavān snigdhaḥ suhṛd mahyam guruḥ ca paramaḥ bhavān

original: 1.012.004a voḍhavyo bhavatā caiva bhāro yajñasya codyataḥ
analyzed: voḍhavyaḥ bhavatā ca eva bhāraḥ yajñasya ca udyataḥ

original: 1.012.004c tatheti ca sa rājānam abravīd dvijasattamaḥ
analyzed: tathā iti ca sa rājānam abravīt dvijasattamaḥ

original: 1.012.005a kariṣye sarvam evaitad bhavatā yat samarthitam
analyzed: kariṣye sarvam eva etat bhavatā yat samarthitam
tatas abravīt dvijān vṛddhān yajña karmasu niṣṭhitān
sthāpatye niṣṭhitān ca eva vṛddhān parama dhārmikān
karmāntikām śilpakārān vardhakīn khanakān api
gaṇakām śilpinaḥ ca eva tathā eva naṭa nartakān
tathā śucīm śāstra vidaḥ puruṣān su bahu śrutān
yajña karma samīhantām bhavantaḥ rāja śāsanāt
iṣṭakā bahu sāhasrī śīghram ānīyatām iti
aupakāryāḥ kriyantām ca rājñām bahu guṇa anvitāḥ
brāhmaṇa āvasathāḥ ca eva kartavyāḥ śataśas śubhāḥ
bhakṣya anna pānaiḥ bahubhiḥ samupetāḥ su niṣṭhitāḥ
tathā paura janasya api kartavyāḥ bahu vistarāḥ
āvāsāḥ bahu bhakṣyāḥ vai sarva kāmaiḥ upasthitāḥ
tathā jānapadasya api janasya bahu śobhanam

original: 1.012.012a dātavyam annaṃ vidhivat satkṛtya na tu līlayā
analyzed: dātavyam annam vidhivat satkṛtya na tu līlayā
sarva varṇāḥ yathā pūjām prāpnuvanti su satkṛtāḥ
na ca avajñā prayoktavyā kāma krodha vaśāt api
yajña karmasu ye avyagrāḥ puruṣāḥ śilpinaḥ tathā

original: 1.012.014a teṣām api viśeṣeṇa pūjā kāryā yathākramam
analyzed: teṣām api viśeṣeṇa pūjā kāryā yathākramam

original: 1.012.014c yathā sarvaṃ suvihitaṃ na kiṃ cit parihīyate
analyzed: yathā sarvam su vihitam na kim cit parihīyate
tathā bhavantaḥ kurvantu prīti snigdhena cetasā

original: 1.012.015c tataḥ sarve samāgamya vasiṣṭham idam abruvan
analyzed: tatas sarve samāgamya vasiṣṭham idam abruvan

original: 1.012.016a yathoktaṃ tat kariṣyāmo na kiṃ cit parihāsyate
analyzed: yathā uktam tat kariṣyāmaḥ na kim cit parihāsyate

original: 1.012.016c tataḥ sumantram āhūya vasiṣṭho vākyam abravīt
analyzed: tatas sumantram āhūya vasiṣṭhaḥ vākyam abravīt

original: 1.012.017a nimantrayasya nṛpatīn pṛthivyāṃ ye ca dhārmikāḥ
analyzed: nimantrayasya nṛpatīn pṛthivyām ye ca dhārmikāḥ

original: 1.012.017c brāhmaṇān kṣatriyān vaiśyāñ śūdrāṃś caiva sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: brāhmaṇān kṣatriyān vaiśyām śūdrān ca eva sahasraśas
samānayasva satkṛtya sarva deśeṣu mānavān
mithilā adhipatim śūram janakam satya vikramam
niṣṭhitam sarva śāstreṣu tathā vedeṣu niṣṭhitam

original: 1.012.019c tam ānaya mahābhāgaṃ svayam eva susatkṛtam
analyzed: tam ānaya mahābhāgam svayam eva su satkṛtam

original: 1.012.019e pūrvasaṃbandhinaṃ jñātvā tataḥ pūrvaṃ bravīmi te
analyzed: pūrva saṃbandhinam jñātvā tatas pūrvam bravīmi te
tathā kāśi patim snigdham satatam priya vādinam
sat vṛttam deva saṃkāśam svayam eva ānayasva ha
tathā kekaya rājānam vṛddham parama dhārmikam
śvaśuram rāja siṃhasya sa putram tam iha ānaya
aṅga īśvaram mahābhāgam romapādam su satkṛtam
vayasyam rāja siṃhasya tam ānaya yaśasvinam
prācīnān sindhusauvīrān saurāṣṭhreyān ca pārthivān

original: 1.012.023c dākṣiṇātyān narendrāṃś ca samastān ānayasva ha
analyzed: dākṣiṇātyān narendrān ca samastān ānayasva ha

original: 1.012.024a santi snigdhāś ca ye cānye rājānaḥ pṛthivītale
analyzed: santi snigdhāḥ ca ye ca anye rājānaḥ pṛthivī tale
tān ānaya yathākṣipram sa anugān sahabāndhavān

original: 1.012.025a vasiṣṭhavākyaṃ tac chrutvā sumantras tvaritas tadā
analyzed: vasiṣṭha vākyam tat śrutvā sumantraḥ tvaritaḥ tadā

original: 1.012.025c vyādiśat puruṣāṃs tatra rājñām ānayane śubhān
analyzed: vyādiśat puruṣān tatra rājñām ānayane śubhān

original: 1.012.026a svayam eva hi dharmātmā prayayau muniśāsanāt
analyzed: svayam eva hi dharma ātmā prayayau muni śāsanāt
sumantraḥ tvaritaḥ bhūtvā samānetum mahīkṣitaḥ

original: 1.012.027a te ca karmāntikāḥ sarve vasiṣṭhāya ca dhīmate
analyzed: te ca karmāntikāḥ sarve vasiṣṭhāya ca dhīmate

original: 1.012.027c sarvaṃ nivedayanti sma yajñe yad upakalpitam
analyzed: sarvam nivedayanti sma yajñe yat upakalpitam

original: 1.012.028a tataḥ prīto dvijaśreṣṭhas tān sarvān punar abravīt
analyzed: tatas prītaḥ dvijaśreṣṭhaḥ tān sarvān punar abravīt

original: 1.012.028c avajñayā na dātavyaṃ kasya cil līlayāpi vā
analyzed: avajñayā na dātavyam kasya cit līlayā api vā

original: 1.012.028e avajñayā kṛtaṃ hanyād dātāraṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: avajñayā kṛtam hanyāt dātāram na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: 1.012.029a tataḥ kaiś cid ahorātrair upayātā mahīkṣitaḥ
analyzed: tatas kaiḥ cit ahorātraiḥ upayātāḥ mahīkṣitaḥ

original: 1.012.029c bahūni ratnāny ādāya rājño daśarathasya ha
analyzed: bahūni ratnāni ādāya rājñaḥ daśarathasya ha

original: 1.012.030a tato vasiṣṭhaḥ suprīto rājānam idam abravīt
analyzed: tatas vasiṣṭhaḥ su prītaḥ rājānam idam abravīt
upayātāḥ nara vyāghra rājānaḥ tava śāsanāt
mayā api satkṛtāḥ sarve yathārham rāja sattamāḥ

original: 1.012.031c yajñiyaṃ ca kṛtaṃ rājan puruṣaiḥ susamāhitaiḥ
analyzed: yajñiyam ca kṛtam rājan puruṣaiḥ su samāhitaiḥ

original: 1.012.032a niryātu ca bhavān yaṣṭuṃ yajñāyatanam antikāt
analyzed: niryātu ca bhavān yaṣṭum yajña āyatanam antikāt
sarva kāmaiḥ upahṛtaiḥ upetam vai samantataḥ
tathā vasiṣṭha vacanāt ṛṣyaśṛṅgasya ca ubhayoḥ
śubhe divasa nakṣatre niryātaḥ jagatīpatiḥ
tatas vasiṣṭha pramukhāḥ sarve eva dvijottamāḥ
ṛṣyaśṛṅgam puraskṛtya yajña karma ārabhan tadā

original: 1.013.001a atha saṃvatsare pūrṇe tasmin prāpte turaṅgame
analyzed: atha saṃvatsare pūrṇe tasmin prāpte turaṅgame
sarayvāḥ ca uttare tīre rājñaḥ yajñaḥ abhyavartata
ṛṣyaśṛṅgam puraskṛtya karma cakruḥ dvijarṣabhāḥ
aśvamedhe mahā yajñe rājñaḥ asya su mahātmanaḥ
karma kurvanti vidhivat yājakāḥ vedapāragāḥ
yathāvidhi yathānyāyam parikrāmanti śāstrataḥ
pravargyam śāstrataḥ kṛtvā tathā eva upasadam dvijāḥ

original: 1.013.004c cakruś ca vidhivat sarvam adhikaṃ karma śāstrataḥ
analyzed: cakruḥ ca vidhivat sarvam adhikam karma śāstrataḥ

original: 1.013.005a abhipūjya tato hṛṣṭāḥ sarve cakrur yathāvidhi
analyzed: abhipūjya tatas hṛṣṭāḥ sarve cakruḥ yathāvidhi
prātaḥsavana pūrvāṇi karmāṇi muni puṃgavāḥ

original: 1.013.006a na cāhutam abhūt tatra skhalitaṃ vāpi kiṃ cana
analyzed: na ca ahutam abhūt tatra skhalitam vā api kim cana

original: 1.013.006c dṛśyate brahmavat sarvaṃ kṣemayuktaṃ hi cakrire
analyzed: dṛśyate brahmavat sarvam kṣema yuktam hi cakrire

original: 1.013.007a na teṣv ahaḥsu śrānto vā kṣudhito vāpi dṛśyate
analyzed: na teṣu ahaḥsu śrāntaḥ vā kṣudhitaḥ vā api dṛśyate
na a vidvān brāhmaṇaḥ tatra na a śata anucaraḥ tathā

original: 1.013.008a brāhmaṇā bhuñjate nityaṃ nāthavantaś ca bhuñjate
analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ bhuñjate nityam nāthavantaḥ ca bhuñjate

original: 1.013.008c tāpasā bhujate cāpi śramaṇā bhuñjate tathā
analyzed: tāpasāḥ bhujate ca api śramaṇāḥ bhuñjate tathā

original: 1.013.009a vṛddhāś ca vyādhitāś caiva striyo bālās tathaiva ca
analyzed: vṛddhāḥ ca vyādhitāḥ ca eva striyaḥ bālāḥ tathā eva ca
aniśam bhuñjamānānām na tṛptiḥ upalabhyate

original: 1.013.010a dīyatāṃ dīyatām annaṃ vāsāṃsi vividhāni ca
analyzed: dīyatām dīyatām annam vāsāṃsi vividhāni ca

original: 1.013.010c iti saṃcoditās tatra tathā cakrur anekaśaḥ
analyzed: iti saṃcoditāḥ tatra tathā cakruḥ anekaśas
anna kūṭāḥ ca bahavaḥ dṛśyante parvata upamāḥ

original: 1.013.011c divase divase tatra siddhasya vidhivat tadā
analyzed: divase divase tatra siddhasya vidhivat tadā

original: 1.013.012a annaṃ hi vidhivat svādu praśaṃsanti dvijarṣabhāḥ
analyzed: annam hi vidhivat svādu praśaṃsanti dvijarṣabhāḥ

original: 1.013.012c aho tṛptāḥ sma bhadraṃ te iti śuśrāva rāghavaḥ
analyzed: aho tṛptāḥ sma bhadram te iti śuśrāva rāghavaḥ
su alaṃkṛtāḥ ca puruṣāḥ brāhmaṇān paryaveṣayan
upāsate ca tān anye su mṛṣṭa maṇi kuṇḍalāḥ

original: 1.013.014a karmāntare tadā viprā hetuvādān bahūn api
analyzed: karmāntare tadā viprāḥ hetuvādān bahūn api
prāhuḥ su vāgminaḥ dhīrāḥ paraspara jigīṣayā

original: 1.013.015a divase divase tatra saṃstare kuśalā dvijāḥ
analyzed: divase divase tatra saṃstare kuśalāḥ dvijāḥ
sarva karmāṇi cakruḥ te yathāśāstram pracoditāḥ
na a ṣaṣ aṅga vid atra āsīt na a vrataḥ na a bahu śrutaḥ

original: 1.013.016c sadasyas tasya vai rājño nāvādakuśalo dvijaḥ
analyzed: sadasyaḥ tasya vai rājñaḥ na a vāda kuśalaḥ dvijaḥ

original: 1.013.017a prāpte yūpocchraye tasmin ṣaḍ bailvāḥ khādirās tathā
analyzed: prāpte yūpocchraye tasmin ṣaṭ bailvāḥ khādirāḥ tathā
tāvantaḥ bilva sahitāḥ parṇinaḥ ca tathā apare
śleṣmātaka mayaḥ diṣṭaḥ devadāru mayaḥ tathā
dvau eva tatra vihitau bāhu vyasta parigrahau
kāritāḥ sarve eva ete śāstra jñaiḥ yajña kovidaiḥ
śobhā artham tasya yajñasya kāñcana alaṃkṛtāḥ bhavan

original: 1.013.020a vinyastā vidhivat sarve śilpibhiḥ sukṛtā dṛḍhāḥ
analyzed: vinyastāḥ vidhivat sarve śilpibhiḥ su kṛtāḥ dṛḍhāḥ
aṣṭāśrayaḥ sarve eva ślakṣṇa rūpa samanvitāḥ

original: 1.013.021a ācchāditās te vāsobhiḥ puṣpair gandhaiś ca bhūṣitāḥ
analyzed: ācchāditāḥ te vāsobhiḥ puṣpaiḥ gandhaiḥ ca bhūṣitāḥ
saptarṣayaḥ dīptimantaḥ virājante yathā divi

original: 1.013.022a iṣṭakāś ca yathānyāyaṃ kāritāś ca pramāṇataḥ
analyzed: iṣṭakāḥ ca yathānyāyam kāritāḥ ca pramāṇataḥ
citaḥ agniḥ brāhmaṇaiḥ tatra kuśalaiḥ śulba karmaṇi

original: 1.013.022e sa cityo rājasiṃhasya saṃcitaḥ kuśalair dvijaiḥ
analyzed: sa cityaḥ rāja siṃhasya saṃcitaḥ kuśalaiḥ dvijaiḥ
garuḍaḥ rukma pakṣaḥ vai triguṇaḥ aṣṭādaśa ātmakaḥ

original: 1.013.023c niyuktās tatra paśavas tat tad uddiśya daivatam
analyzed: niyuktāḥ tatra paśavaḥ tat tat uddiśya daivatam
uragāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ ca eva yathāśāstram pracoditāḥ

original: 1.013.024c śāmitre tu hayas tatra tathā jala carāś ca ye
analyzed: śāmitre tu hayaḥ tatra tathā jala carāḥ ca ye

original: 1.013.025a ṛtvigbhiḥ sarvam evaitan niyuktaṃ śāstratas tadā
analyzed: ṛtvigbhiḥ sarvam eva etat niyuktam śāstrataḥ tadā

original: 1.013.025c paśūnāṃ triśataṃ tatra yūpeṣu niyataṃ tadā
analyzed: paśūnām tri śatam tatra yūpeṣu niyatam tadā
aśva ratna uttamam tasya rājñaḥ daśarathasya ha

original: 1.013.026a kausalyā taṃ hayaṃ tatra paricarya samantataḥ
analyzed: kausalyā tam hayam tatra paricarya samantataḥ
kṛpāṇaiḥ viśaśāsa enam tribhiḥ paramayā mudā

original: 1.013.027a patatriṇā tadā sārdhaṃ susthitena ca cetasā
analyzed: patatriṇā tadā sārdham su sthitena ca cetasā
avasat rajanīm ekām kausalyā dharma kāmyayā
hotā adhvaryuḥ tathā udgātā hayena samayojayan
mahiṣyā parivṛtthyā atha vāvātām aparām tathā
patatriṇaḥ tasya vapām uddhṛtya niyata indriyaḥ

original: 1.013.029c ṛtvik parama saṃpannaḥ śrapayām āsa śāstrataḥ
analyzed: ṛtvij parama saṃpannaḥ śrapayām āsa śāstrataḥ

original: 1.013.030a dhūmagandhaṃ vapāyās tu jighrati sma narādhipaḥ
analyzed: dhūma gandham vapāyāḥ tu jighrati sma narādhipaḥ
yathākālam yathānyāyam nirṇudan pāpam ātmanaḥ

original: 1.013.031a hayasya yāni cāṅgāni tāni sarvāṇi brāhmaṇāḥ
analyzed: hayasya yāni ca aṅgāni tāni sarvāṇi brāhmaṇāḥ
agnau prāsyanti vidhivat samastāḥ ṣoḍaśa ṛtvijaḥ
plakṣa śākhāsu yajñānām anyeṣām kriyate haviḥ
aśvamedhasya ca ekasya vaitasaḥ bhāgaḥ iṣyate
tri ahaḥ aśvamedhaḥ saṃkhyātaḥ kalpasūtreṇa brāhmaṇaiḥ
catuṣṭomam ahar tasya prathamam parikalpitam
ukthyam dvitīyam saṃkhyātam atirātram tathā uttaram
kāritāḥ tatra bahavaḥ vihitāḥ śāstra darśanāt
jyotiṣṭoma āyuṣī ca eva atirātrau ca nirmitau
abhijit viśvajit ca eva aptoryāmaḥ mahā kratuḥ

original: 1.013.036a prācīṃ hotre dadau rājā diśaṃ svakulavardhanaḥ
analyzed: prācīm hotre dadau rājā diśam sva kula vardhanaḥ

original: 1.013.036c adhvaryave pratīcīṃ tu brahmaṇe dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
analyzed: adhvaryave pratīcīm tu brahmaṇe dakṣiṇām diśam
udgātre tu tathā udīcīm dakṣiṇā eṣā vinirmitā
aśvamedhe mahā yajñe svayambhu vihite purā

original: 1.013.038a kratuṃ samāpya tu tadā nyāyataḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
analyzed: kratum samāpya tu tadā nyāyataḥ puruṣa ṛṣabhaḥ

original: 1.013.038c ṛtvigbhyo hi dadau rājā dharāṃ tāṃ kratuvardhanaḥ
analyzed: ṛtvigbhyaḥ hi dadau rājā dharām tām kratu vardhanaḥ

original: 1.013.039a ṛtvijas tv abruvan sarve rājānaṃ gatakalmaṣam
analyzed: ṛtvijaḥ tu abruvan sarve rājānam gata kalmaṣam

original: 1.013.039c bhavān eva mahīṃ kṛtsnām eko rakṣitum arhati
analyzed: bhavān eva mahīm kṛtsnām ekaḥ rakṣitum arhati

original: 1.013.040a na bhūmyā kāryam asmākaṃ na hi śaktāḥ sma pālane
analyzed: na bhūmyā kāryam asmākam na hi śaktāḥ sma pālane

original: 1.013.040c ratāḥ svādhyāyakaraṇe vayaṃ nityaṃ hi bhūmipa
analyzed: ratāḥ svādhyāya karaṇe vayam nityam hi bhūmipa

original: 1.013.040e niṣkrayaṃ kiṃ cid eveha prayacchatu bhavān iti
analyzed: niṣkrayam kim cit eva iha prayacchatu bhavān iti

original: 1.013.041a gavāṃ śatasahasrāṇi daśa tebhyo dadau nṛpaḥ
analyzed: gavām śata sahasrāṇi daśa tebhyaḥ dadau nṛpaḥ
daśa koṭim suvarṇasya rajatasya caturguṇam

original: 1.013.042a ṛtvijas tu tataḥ sarve pradaduḥ sahitā vasu
analyzed: ṛtvijaḥ tu tatas sarve pradaduḥ sahitāḥ vasu
ṛṣyaśṛṅgāya munaye vasiṣṭhāya ca dhīmate

original: 1.013.043a tatas te nyāyataḥ kṛtvā pravibhāgaṃ dvijottamāḥ
analyzed: tatas te nyāyataḥ kṛtvā pravibhāgam dvijottamāḥ
su prīta manasaḥ sarve pratyūcuḥ muditāḥ bhṛśam

original: 1.013.044a tataḥ prītamanā rājā prāpya yajñam anuttamam
analyzed: tatas prīta manāḥ rājā prāpya yajñam anuttamam
pāpa apaham svarnayanam dustaram pārthiva ṛṣabhaiḥ
tatas abravīt ṛṣyaśṛṅgam rājā daśarathaḥ tadā

original: 1.013.045c kulasya vardhanaṃ tat tu kartum arhasi suvrata
analyzed: kulasya vardhanam tat tu kartum arhasi suvrata

original: 1.013.046a tatheti ca sa rājānam uvāca dvijasattamaḥ
analyzed: tathā iti ca sa rājānam uvāca dvijasattamaḥ

original: 1.013.046c bhaviṣyanti sutā rājaṃś catvāras te kulodvahāḥ
analyzed: bhaviṣyanti sutāḥ rājan catvāraḥ te kula udvahāḥ

original: 1.014.001a medhāvī tu tato dhyātvā sa kiṃ cid idam uttamam
analyzed: medhāvī tu tatas dhyātvā sa kim cit idam uttamam

original: 1.014.001c labdhasaṃjñas tatas taṃ tu vedajño nṛpam abravīt
analyzed: labdha saṃjñaḥ tatas tam tu veda jñaḥ nṛpam abravīt
iṣṭim te aham kariṣyāmi putrīyām putra kāraṇāt
atharvaśirasi proktaiḥ mantraiḥ siddhām vidhānataḥ

original: 1.014.003a tataḥ prākramad iṣṭiṃ tāṃ putrīyāṃ putra kāraṇāt
analyzed: tatas prākramat iṣṭim tām putrīyām putra kāraṇāt
juhāva ca agnau tejasvī mantra dṛṣṭena karmaṇā

original: 1.014.004a tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
analyzed: tatas devāḥ sa gandharvāḥ siddhāḥ ca parama ṛṣayaḥ
bhāga pratigraha artham vai samavetāḥ yathāvidhi

original: 1.014.005a tāḥ sametya yathānyāyaṃ tasmin sadasi devatāḥ
analyzed: tāḥ sametya yathānyāyam tasmin sadasi devatāḥ
abruvan lokakartāram brahmāṇam vacanam mahat
bhagavan tvad prasādena rāvaṇaḥ nāma rākṣasaḥ

original: 1.014.006c sarvānno bādhate vīryāc chāsituṃ taṃ na śaknumaḥ
analyzed: sarvān naḥ bādhate vīryāt śāsitum tam na śaknumaḥ

original: 1.014.007a tvayā tasmai varo dattaḥ prītena bhagavan purā
analyzed: tvayā tasmai varaḥ dattaḥ prītena bhagavan purā

original: 1.014.007c mānayantaś ca taṃ nityaṃ sarvaṃ tasya kṣamāmahe
analyzed: mānayantaḥ ca tam nityam sarvam tasya kṣamāmahe

original: 1.014.008a udvejayati lokāṃs trīn ucchritān dveṣṭi durmatiḥ
analyzed: udvejayati lokān trīn ucchritān dveṣṭi durmatiḥ
śakram tridaśa rājānam pradharṣayitum icchati

original: 1.014.009a ṛṣīn yakṣān sagandharvān asurān brāhmaṇāṃs tathā
analyzed: ṛṣīn yakṣān sa gandharvān asurān brāhmaṇān tathā
atikrāmati durdharṣaḥ vara dānena mohitaḥ

original: 1.014.010a nainaṃ sūryaḥ pratapati pārśve vāti na mārutaḥ
analyzed: na enam sūryaḥ pratapati pārśve vāti na mārutaḥ

original: 1.014.010c calormimālī taṃ dṛṣṭvā samudro 'pi na kampate
analyzed: cala ūrmimālī tam dṛṣṭvā samudraḥ api na kampate

original: 1.014.011a tan manan no bhayaṃ tasmād rākṣasād ghoradarśanāt
analyzed: tat manat naḥ bhayam tasmāt rākṣasāt ghora darśanāt

original: 1.014.011c vadhārthaṃ tasya bhagavann upāyaṃ kartum arhasi
analyzed: vadha artham tasya bhagavan upāyam kartum arhasi

original: 1.014.012a evam uktaḥ suraiḥ sarvaiś cintayitvā tato 'bravīt
analyzed: evam uktaḥ suraiḥ sarvaiḥ cintayitvā tatas abravīt
hanta ayam vihitaḥ tasya vadha upāyaḥ durātmanaḥ
tena gandharva yakṣāṇām deva dānava rakṣasām

original: 1.014.013c avadhyo 'smīti vāg uktā tathety uktaṃ ca tan mayā
analyzed: avadhyaḥ asmi iti vāc uktā tathā iti uktam ca tat mayā

original: 1.014.014a nākīrtayad avajñānāt tad rakṣo mānuṣāṃs tadā
analyzed: na akīrtayat avajñānāt tat rakṣaḥ mānuṣān tadā

original: 1.014.014c tasmāt sa mānuṣād vadhyo mṛtur nānyo 'sya vidyate
analyzed: tasmāt sa mānuṣāt vadhyaḥ mṛtuḥ na anyaḥ asya vidyate

original: 1.014.015a etac chrutvā priyaṃ vākyaṃ brahmaṇā samudāhṛtam
analyzed: etat śrutvā priyam vākyam brahmaṇā samudāhṛtam

original: 1.014.015c devā maharṣayaḥ sarve prahṛṣṭās te 'bhavaṃs tadā
analyzed: devāḥ mahā ṛṣayaḥ sarve prahṛṣṭāḥ te abhavan tadā
etasmin antare viṣṇuḥ upayātaḥ mahā dyutiḥ

original: 1.014.016c brahmaṇā ca samāgamya tatra tasthau samāhitaḥ
analyzed: brahmaṇā ca samāgamya tatra tasthau samāhitaḥ

original: 1.014.017a tam abruvan surāḥ sarve samabhiṣṭūya saṃnatāḥ
analyzed: tam abruvan surāḥ sarve samabhiṣṭūya saṃnatāḥ
tvām niyokṣyāmahe viṣṇo lokānām hita kāmyayā
rājñaḥ daśarathasya tvam ayodhyā adhipateḥ vibho
dharma jñasya vadānyasya mahā ṛṣi sama tejasaḥ
tasya bhāryāsu tisṛṣu hrī śrī kīrti upamāsu ca
viṣṇo putra tvam āgaccha kṛtvā ātmānam caturvidham

original: 1.014.019a tatra tvaṃ mānuṣo bhūtvā pravṛddhaṃ lokakaṇṭakam
analyzed: tatra tvam mānuṣaḥ bhūtvā pravṛddham lokakaṇṭakam

original: 1.014.019c avadhyaṃ daivatair viṣṇo samare jahi rāvaṇam
analyzed: avadhyam daivataiḥ viṣṇo samare jahi rāvaṇam

original: 1.014.020a sa hi devān sagandharvān siddhāṃś ca ṛṣisattamān
analyzed: sa hi devān sa gandharvān siddhān ca ṛṣi sattamān
rākṣasaḥ rāvaṇaḥ mūrkhaḥ vīrya utsekena bādhate
tat uddhatam rāvaṇam ṛddha tejasam
pravṛddha darpam tridaśa īśvara dviṣam
virāvaṇam sādhu tapasvi kaṇṭakam
tapasvinām uddhara tam bhaya āvaham
tatas nārāyaṇaḥ viṣṇuḥ niyuktaḥ sura sattamaiḥ

original: 1.015.001c jānann api surān evaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ vacanam abravīt
analyzed: jānan api surān evam ślakṣṇam vacanam abravīt

original: 1.015.002a upāyaḥ ko vadhe tasya rākṣasādhipateḥ surāḥ
analyzed: upāyaḥ kaḥ vadhe tasya rākṣasa adhipateḥ surāḥ

original: 1.015.002c yam ahaṃ taṃ samāsthāya nihanyām ṛṣikaṇṭakam
analyzed: yam aham tam samāsthāya nihanyām ṛṣi kaṇṭakam

original: 1.015.003a evam uktāḥ surāḥ sarve pratyūcur viṣṇum avyayam
analyzed: evam uktāḥ surāḥ sarve pratyūcuḥ viṣṇum avyayam

original: 1.015.003c mānuṣīṃ tanum āsthāya rāvaṇaṃ jahi saṃyuge
analyzed: mānuṣīm tanum āsthāya rāvaṇam jahi saṃyuge

original: 1.015.004a sa hi tepe tapas tīvraṃ dīrghakālam ariṃdama
analyzed: sa hi tepe tapaḥ tīvram dīrgha kālam ariṃdama
yena tuṣṭaḥ abhavat brahmā lokakṛt loka pūjitaḥ

original: 1.015.005a saṃtuṣṭaḥ pradadau tasmai rākṣasāya varaṃ prabhuḥ
analyzed: saṃtuṣṭaḥ pradadau tasmai rākṣasāya varam prabhuḥ
nānāvidhebhyaḥ bhūtebhyaḥ bhayam na anyatra mānuṣāt
avajñātāḥ purā tena vara dānena mānavāḥ

original: 1.015.006c tasmāt tasya vadho dṛṣṭo mānuṣebhyaḥ paraṃtapa
analyzed: tasmāt tasya vadhaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ mānuṣebhyaḥ paraṃtapa

original: 1.015.007a ity etad vacanaṃ śrutvā surāṇāṃ viṣṇur ātmavān
analyzed: iti etat vacanam śrutvā surāṇām viṣṇuḥ ātmavān

original: 1.015.007c pitaraṃ rocayām āsa tadā daśarathaṃ nṛpam
analyzed: pitaram rocayām āsa tadā daśaratham nṛpam

original: 1.015.008a sa cāpy aputro nṛpatis tasmin kāle mahādyutiḥ
analyzed: sa ca api aputraḥ nṛpatiḥ tasmin kāle mahā dyutiḥ
ayajat putriyām iṣṭim putra īpsuḥ ari sūdanaḥ
tatas vai yajamānasya pāvakāt atula prabham
prādurbhūtam mahat bhūtam mahā vīryam mahā balam
snigdha haryakṣa tanuja śmaśru pravara mūrdhajam
śubha lakṣaṇa saṃpannam divya ābharaṇa bhūṣitam
śaila śṛṅga samutsedham dṛpta śārdūla vikramam
divākara sama ākāram dīpta anala śikhā upamam
tapta jāmbūnada mayīm rājata anta paricchadām
divya pāyasa saṃpūrṇām pātrīm patnīm iva priyām

original: 1.015.013c pragṛhya vipulāṃ dorbhyāṃ svayaṃ māyāmayīm iva
analyzed: pragṛhya vipulām dorbhyām svayam māyā mayīm iva
samavekṣya abravīt vākyam idam daśaratham nṛpam

original: 1.015.014c prājāpatyaṃ naraṃ viddhi mām ihābhyāgataṃ nṛpa
analyzed: prājāpatyam naram viddhi mām iha abhyāgatam nṛpa

original: 1.015.015a tataḥ paraṃ tadā rājā pratyuvāca kṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: tatas param tadā rājā pratyuvāca kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: 1.015.015c bhagavan svāgataṃ te 'stu kim ahaṃ karavāṇi te
analyzed: bhagavan svāgatam te astu kim aham karavāṇi te

original: 1.015.016a atho punar idaṃ vākyaṃ prājāpatyo naro 'bravīt
analyzed: atha u punar idam vākyam prājāpatyaḥ naraḥ abravīt

original: 1.015.016c rājann arcayatā devān adya prāptam idaṃ tvayā
analyzed: rājan arcayatā devān adya prāptam idam tvayā
idam tu nara śārdūla pāyasam deva nirmitam
prajā karam gṛhāṇa tvam dhanyam ārogya vardhanam
bhāryāṇām anurūpāṇām aśnīta iti prayaccha vai

original: 1.015.018c tāsu tvaṃ lapsyase putrān yadarthaṃ yajase nṛpa
analyzed: tāsu tvam lapsyase putrān yad artham yajase nṛpa
tathā iti nṛpatiḥ prītaḥ śirasā pratigṛhyatām
pātrīm deva anna saṃpūrṇām deva dattām hiraṇmayīm

original: 1.015.020a abhivādya ca tad bhūtam adbhutaṃ priyadarśanam
analyzed: abhivādya ca tat bhūtam adbhutam priya darśanam
mudā paramayā yuktaḥ cakāra abhipradakṣiṇam
tatas daśarathaḥ prāpya pāyasam deva nirmitam
babhūva parama prītaḥ prāpya vittam iva adhanaḥ
tatas tat adbhuta prakhyam bhūtam parama bhāsvaram
saṃvartayitvā tat karma tatra eva antaradhīyata
harṣa raśmibhiḥ udyotam tasya antaḥpuram ābabhau
śāradasya abhirāmasya candrasya iva nabhaḥ aṃśubhiḥ
saḥ antaḥpuram praviśya eva kausalyām idam abravīt

original: 1.015.024c pāyasaṃ pratigṛhṇīṣva putrīyaṃ tv idam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: pāyasam pratigṛhṇīṣva putrīyam tu idam ātmanaḥ
kausalyāyai narapatiḥ pāyasa ardham dadau tadā
