original: 1.015.025c ardhād ardhaṃ dadau cāpi sumitrāyai narādhipaḥ
analyzed: ardhāt ardham dadau ca api sumitrāyai narādhipaḥ
kaikeyyai ca avaśiṣṭa ardham dadau putra artha kāraṇāt
pradadau ca avaśiṣṭa ardham pāyasasya amṛta upamam
anucintya sumitrāyai punar eva mahīpatiḥ

original: 1.015.027c evaṃ tāsāṃ dadau rājā bhāryāṇāṃ pāyasaṃ pṛthak
analyzed: evam tāsām dadau rājā bhāryāṇām pāyasam pṛthak

original: 1.015.028a tās tv etat pāyasaṃ prāpya narendrasyottamāḥ striyaḥ
analyzed: tāḥ tu etat pāyasam prāpya narendrasya uttamāḥ striyaḥ
saṃmānam menire sarvāḥ praharṣa udita cetasaḥ

original: 1.016.001a putratvaṃ tu gate viṣṇau rājñas tasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: putra tvam tu gate viṣṇau rājñaḥ tasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 1.016.001c uvāca devatāḥ sarvāḥ svayambhūr bhagavān idam
analyzed: uvāca devatāḥ sarvāḥ svayambhūḥ bhagavān idam
satya saṃdhasya vīrasya sarveṣām naḥ hita eṣiṇaḥ
viṣṇoḥ sahāyān balinaḥ sṛjadhvam kāmarūpiṇaḥ
māyā vidaḥ ca śūrān ca vāyu vega samān jave
naya jñān buddhi saṃpannān viṣṇu tulya parākramān
asaṃhāryān upāya jñān divya saṃhanana anvitān
sarva astra guṇa saṃpannān amṛta prāśanān iva

original: 1.016.005a apsaraḥsu ca mukhyāsu gandharvīṇāṃ tanūṣu ca
analyzed: apsaraḥsu ca mukhyāsu gandharvīṇām tanūṣu ca
yakṣa pannaga kanyāsu ṛṣka vidyādharīṣu ca

original: 1.016.006a kiṃnarīṇāṃ ca gātreṣu vānarīṇāṃ tanūṣu ca
analyzed: kiṃnarīṇām ca gātreṣu vānarīṇām tanūṣu ca
sṛjadhvam hari rūpeṇa putrān tulya parākramān

original: 1.016.007a te tathoktā bhagavatā tat pratiśrutya śāsanam
analyzed: te tathā uktāḥ bhagavatā tat pratiśrutya śāsanam

original: 1.016.007c janayām āsur evaṃ te putrān vānararūpiṇaḥ
analyzed: janayām āsuḥ evam te putrān vānara rūpiṇaḥ
ṛṣayaḥ ca mahātmānaḥ siddha vidyādhara uragāḥ

original: 1.016.008c cāraṇāś ca sutān vīrān sasṛjur vanacāriṇaḥ
analyzed: cāraṇāḥ ca sutān vīrān sasṛjuḥ vana cāriṇaḥ
te sṛṣṭāḥ bahu sāhasrāḥ daśagrīva vadha udyatāḥ
aprameya balāḥ vīrāḥ vikrāntāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
te gaja acala saṃkāśāḥ vapuṣmantaḥ mahā balāḥ
ṛkṣa vānara gopucchāḥ kṣipram eva abhijajñire

original: 1.016.011a yasya devasya yad rūpaṃ veṣo yaś ca parākramaḥ
analyzed: yasya devasya yat rūpam veṣaḥ yaḥ ca parākramaḥ

original: 1.016.011c ajāyata samastena tasya tasya sutaḥ pṛthak
analyzed: ajāyata samastena tasya tasya sutaḥ pṛthak
go lāṅgūlīṣu ca utpannāḥ ke cid saṃmata vikramāḥ

original: 1.016.012c ṛkṣīṣu ca tathā jātā vānarāḥ kiṃnarīṣu ca
analyzed: ṛkṣīṣu ca tathā jātāḥ vānarāḥ kiṃnarīṣu ca
śilā praharaṇāḥ sarve sarve pādapa yodhinaḥ
nakha daṃṣṭra āyudhāḥ sarve sarve sarva astra kovidāḥ
vicālayeyuḥ śaila indrān bhedayeyuḥ sthirān drumān

original: 1.016.014c kṣobhayeyuś ca vegena samudraṃ saritāṃ patim
analyzed: kṣobhayeyuḥ ca vegena samudram saritām patim
dārayeyuḥ kṣitim padbhyām āplaveyuḥ mahā arṇavam

original: 1.016.015c nabhastalaṃ viśeyuś ca gṛhṇīyur api toyadān
analyzed: nabhaḥ talam viśeyuḥ ca gṛhṇīyuḥ api toyadān

original: 1.016.016a gṛhṇīyur api mātaṅgān mattān pravrajato vane
analyzed: gṛhṇīyuḥ api mātaṅgān mattān pravrajataḥ vane
nardamānān ca nādena pātayeyuḥ vihaṃgamān
īdṛśānām prasūtāni harīṇām kāmarūpi mām
śatam śata sahasrāṇi yūthapānām mahātmanām
babhūvuḥ yūthapa śreṣṭhāḥ vīrān ca ajanayan harīn
anye ṛkṣavataḥ prasthān upatasthuḥ sahasraśas

original: 1.016.018c anye nānāvidhāñ śailān kānanāni ca bhejire
analyzed: anye nānāvidhām śailān kānanāni ca bhejire

original: 1.016.019a sūryaputraṃ ca sugrīvaṃ śakraputraṃ ca vālinam
analyzed: sūrya putram ca sugrīvam śakra putram ca vālinam

original: 1.016.019c bhrātarāv upatasthus te sarva eva harīśvarāḥ
analyzed: bhrātarau upatasthuḥ te sarve eva hari īśvarāḥ
taiḥ megha vṛnda acala tulya kāyaiḥ
mahā balaiḥ vānara yūtha pālaiḥ
babhūva bhūḥ bhīma śarīra rūpaiḥ
samāvṛtāḥ rāma sahāya hetoḥ

original: 1.017.001a nirvṛtte tu kratau tasmin hayamedhe mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: nirvṛtte tu kratau tasmin hayamedhe mahātmanaḥ
pratigṛhya surāḥ bhāgān pratijagmuḥ yathāgatam
praviveśa purīm rājā sa bhṛtya bala vāhanaḥ

original: 1.017.003a yathārhaṃ pūjitās tena rājñā vai pṛthivīśvarāḥ
analyzed: yathārham pūjitāḥ tena rājñā vai pṛthivīśvarāḥ
muditāḥ prayayuḥ deśān praṇamya muni puṃgavam
gateṣu pṛthivī īśeṣu rājā daśarathaḥ punar
praviveśa purīm śrīmān puraskṛtya dvijottamān
śāntayā prayayau sārdham ṛṣyaśṛṅgaḥ su pūjitaḥ
anvīyamānaḥ rājñā atha sa anuyātreṇa dhīmatā
kausalyā janayat rāmam divya lakṣaṇa saṃyutam
viṣṇoḥ ardham mahābhāgam putram ikṣvāku nandanam
kausalyā śuśubhe tena putreṇa amita tejasā
yathā vareṇa devānām aditiḥ vajrapāṇinā
bharataḥ nāma kaikeyyām jajñe satya parākramaḥ

original: 1.017.008c sākṣād viṣṇoś caturbhāgaḥ sarvaiḥ samudito guṇaiḥ
analyzed: sākṣāt viṣṇoḥ caturbhāgaḥ sarvaiḥ samuditaḥ guṇaiḥ
atha lakṣmaṇa śatrughnau sumitrā janayat sutau
vīrau sarva astra kuśalau viṣṇoḥ ardha samanvitau

original: 1.017.010a rājñaḥ putrā mahātmānaś catvāro jajñire pṛthak
analyzed: rājñaḥ putrāḥ mahātmānaḥ catvāraḥ jajñire pṛthak
guṇavantaḥ anurūpāḥ ca rucyā proṣṭhapada upamāḥ
atītya ekādaśa aham tu nāma karma tathā akarot
jyeṣṭham rāmam mahātmānam bharatam kaikayī sutam

original: 1.017.012a saumitriṃ lakṣmaṇam iti śatrughnam aparaṃ tathā
analyzed: saumitrim lakṣmaṇam iti śatrughnam aparam tathā
vasiṣṭhaḥ parama prītaḥ nāmāni kṛtavān tadā
teṣām janma kriyā ādīni sarva karmāṇi akārayat

original: 1.017.013a teṣāṃ ketur iva jyeṣṭho rāmo ratikaraḥ pituḥ
analyzed: teṣām ketuḥ iva jyeṣṭhaḥ rāmaḥ rati karaḥ pituḥ

original: 1.017.013c babhūva bhūyo bhūtānāṃ svayambhūr iva saṃmataḥ
analyzed: babhūva bhūyas bhūtānām svayambhūḥ iva saṃmataḥ

original: 1.017.014a sarve vedavidaḥ śūrāḥ sarve lokahite ratāḥ
analyzed: sarve veda vidaḥ śūrāḥ sarve loka hite ratāḥ
sarve jñāna upasaṃpannāḥ sarve samuditāḥ guṇaiḥ
teṣām api mahā tejāḥ rāmaḥ satya parākramaḥ
bālyāt prabhṛti su snigdhaḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ lakṣmi vardhanaḥ
rāmasya loka rāmasya bhrātuḥ jyeṣṭhasya nityaśas
sarva priya karaḥ tasya rāmasya api śarīrataḥ

original: 1.017.017c na ca tena vinā nidrāṃ labhate puruṣottamaḥ
analyzed: na ca tena vinā nidrām labhate puruṣottamaḥ

original: 1.017.017e mṛṣṭam annam upānītam aśnāti na hi taṃ vinā
analyzed: mṛṣṭam annam upānītam aśnāti na hi tam vinā

original: 1.017.018a yadā hi hayam ārūḍho mṛgayāṃ yāti rāghavaḥ
analyzed: yadā hi hayam ārūḍhaḥ mṛgayām yāti rāghavaḥ
tadā enam pṛṣṭhatas abhyeti sa dhanuḥ paripālayan
bharatasya api śatrughnaḥ lakṣmaṇa avarajaḥ hi saḥ

original: 1.017.019c prāṇaiḥ priyataro nityaṃ tasya cāsīt tathā priyaḥ
analyzed: prāṇaiḥ priyataraḥ nityam tasya ca āsīt tathā priyaḥ

original: 1.017.020a sa caturbhir mahābhāgaiḥ putrair daśarathaḥ priyaiḥ
analyzed: sa caturbhiḥ mahābhāgaiḥ putraiḥ daśarathaḥ priyaiḥ
babhūva parama prītaḥ devaiḥ iva pitāmahaḥ

original: 1.017.021a te yadā jñānasaṃpannāḥ sarve samuditā guṇaiḥ
analyzed: te yadā jñāna saṃpannāḥ sarve samuditāḥ guṇaiḥ
hrīmantaḥ kīrtimantaḥ ca sarva jñāḥ dīrgha darśinaḥ

original: 1.017.022a atha rājā daśarathas teṣāṃ dārakriyāṃ prati
analyzed: atha rājā daśarathaḥ teṣām dārakriyām prati
cintayām āsa dharma ātmā sa upādhyāyaḥ sa bāndhavaḥ
tasya cintayamānasya mantri madhye mahātmanaḥ
abhyāgacchan mahā tejaḥ viśvāmitraḥ mahā muniḥ

original: 1.017.024a sa rājño darśanākāṅkṣī dvārādhyakṣān uvāca ha
analyzed: sa rājñaḥ darśana ākāṅkṣī dvāra adhyakṣān uvāca ha

original: 1.017.024c śīghram ākhyāta māṃ prāptaṃ kauśikaṃ gādhinaḥ sutam
analyzed: śīghram ākhyāta mām prāptam kauśikam gādhinaḥ sutam

original: 1.017.025a tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya rājaveśma pradudruvuḥ
analyzed: tat śrutvā vacanam tasya rāja veśma pradudruvuḥ
saṃbhrānta manasaḥ sarve tena vākyena coditāḥ

original: 1.017.026a te gatvā rājabhavanaṃ viśvāmitram ṛṣiṃ tadā
analyzed: te gatvā rāja bhavanam viśvāmitram ṛṣim tadā
prāptam āvedayām āsuḥ nṛpāya ikṣvākave tadā

original: 1.017.027a teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā sapurodhāḥ samāhitaḥ
analyzed: teṣām tat vacanam śrutvā sa purodhāḥ samāhitaḥ
pratyujjagāma saṃhṛṣṭaḥ brahmāṇam iva vāsavaḥ

original: 1.017.028a sa dṛṣṭvā jvalitaṃ dīptyā tāpasaṃ saṃśitavratam
analyzed: sa dṛṣṭvā jvalitam dīptyā tāpasam saṃśita vratam
prahṛṣṭa vadanaḥ rājā tatas arghyam upahārayat
sa rājñaḥ pratigṛhya arghyam śāstra dṛṣṭena karmaṇā
kuśalam ca avyayam ca eva paryapṛcchat narādhipam
vasiṣṭham ca samāgamya kuśalam muni puṃgavaḥ

original: 1.017.030c ṛṣīṃś ca tān yathā nyāyaṃ mahābhāgān uvāca ha
analyzed: ṛṣīn ca tān yathā nyāyam mahābhāgān uvāca ha

original: 1.017.031a te sarve hṛṣṭamanasas tasya rājño niveśanam
analyzed: te sarve hṛṣṭa manasaḥ tasya rājñaḥ niveśanam

original: 1.017.031c viviśuḥ pūjitās tatra niṣeduś ca yathārthataḥ
analyzed: viviśuḥ pūjitāḥ tatra niṣeduḥ ca yathārthataḥ
atha hṛṣṭa manāḥ rājā viśvāmitram mahā munim
uvāca parama udāraḥ hṛṣṭaḥ tam abhipūjayan
yathā amṛtasya saṃprāptiḥ yathā varṣam anūdake
yathā sadṛśa dāreṣu putra janma aprajasya ca

original: 1.017.033e pranaṣṭasya yathā lābho yathā harṣo mahodaye
analyzed: pranaṣṭasya yathā lābhaḥ yathā harṣaḥ mahodaye
tathā eva āgamanam manye svāgatam te mahā mune

original: 1.017.034a kaṃ ca te paramaṃ kāmaṃ karomi kim u harṣitaḥ
analyzed: kam ca te paramam kāmam karomi kim u harṣitaḥ

original: 1.017.034c pātrabhūto 'si me vipra diṣṭyā prāpto 'si dhārmika
analyzed: pātra bhūtaḥ asi me vipra diṣṭyā prāptaḥ asi dhārmika

original: 1.017.034e adya me saphalaṃ janma jīvitaṃ ca sujīvitam
analyzed: adya me saphalam janma jīvitam ca su jīvitam
pūrvam rājarṣi śabdena tapasā dyotita prabhaḥ
brahmarṣi tvam anuprāptaḥ pūjyaḥ asi bahudhā mayā

original: 1.017.036a tad adbhutam idaṃ vipra pavitraṃ paramaṃ mama
analyzed: tat adbhutam idam vipra pavitram paramam mama
śubha kṣetra gataḥ ca aham tava saṃdarśanāt prabho

original: 1.017.037a brūhi yat prārthitaṃ tubhyaṃ kāryam āgamanaṃ prati
analyzed: brūhi yat prārthitam tubhyam kāryam āgamanam prati
icchāmi anugṛhītaḥ aham tvad artha parivṛddhaye

original: 1.017.038a kāryasya na vimarśaṃ ca gantum arhasi kauśika
analyzed: kāryasya na vimarśam ca gantum arhasi kauśika

original: 1.017.038c kartā cāham aśeṣeṇa daivataṃ hi bhavān mama
analyzed: kartā ca aham aśeṣeṇa daivatam hi bhavān mama
iti hṛdaya sukham niśamya vākyam
śruti sukham ātmavatā vinītam uktam
prathita guṇa yaśāḥ guṇaiḥ viśiṣṭaḥ
paramaḥ ṛṣiḥ paramam jagāma harṣam
tat śrutvā rāja siṃhasya vākyam adbhuta vistaram
hṛṣṭa romā mahā tejāḥ viśvāmitraḥ abhyabhāṣata
sadṛśam rāja śārdūla tava etat bhuvi nā anyatas
mahā vaṃśa prasūtasya vasiṣṭha vyapadeśinaḥ

original: 1.018.003a yat tu me hṛdgataṃ vākyaṃ tasya kāryasya niścayam
analyzed: yat tu me hṛd gatam vākyam tasya kāryasya niścayam
kuruṣva rāja śārdūla bhava satya pratiśravaḥ
aham niyamam ātiṣṭha siddhi artham puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: 1.018.004c tasya vighnakarau dvau tu rākṣasau kāmarūpiṇau
analyzed: tasya vighna karau dvau tu rākṣasau kāmarūpiṇau

original: 1.018.005a vrate me bahuśaś cīrṇe samāptyāṃ rākṣasāv imau
analyzed: vrate me bahuśas cīrṇe samāptyām rākṣasau imau

original: 1.018.005c mārīcaś ca subāhuś ca vīryavantau suśikṣitau
analyzed: mārīcaḥ ca subāhuḥ ca vīryavantau su śikṣitau
tau māṃsa rudhira ogheṇa vedim tām abhyavarṣatām
avadhūte tathā bhūte tasmin niyama niścaye
kṛta śramaḥ nirutsāhaḥ tasmāt deśāt apākrame

original: 1.018.007a na ca me krodham utsraṣṭuṃ buddhir bhavati pārthiva
analyzed: na ca me krodham utsraṣṭum buddhiḥ bhavati pārthiva

original: 1.018.007c tathābhūtā hi sā caryā na śāpas tatra mucyate
analyzed: tathābhūtā hi sā caryā na śāpaḥ tatra mucyate
sva putram rāja śārdūla rāmam satya parākramam

original: 1.018.008c kākapakṣadharaṃ śūraṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ me dātum arhasi
analyzed: kākapakṣa dharam śūram jyeṣṭham me dātum arhasi

original: 1.018.009a śakto hy eṣa mayā gupto divyena svena tejasā
analyzed: śaktaḥ hi eṣa mayā guptaḥ divyena svena tejasā

original: 1.018.009c rākṣasā ye vikartāras teṣām api vināśane
analyzed: rākṣasāḥ ye vikartāraḥ teṣām api vināśane

original: 1.018.010a śreyaś cāsmai pradāsyāmi bahurūpaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: śreyaḥ ca asmai pradāsyāmi bahurūpam na saṃśayaḥ

original: 1.018.010c trayāṇām api lokānāṃ yena khyātiṃ gamiṣyati
analyzed: trayāṇām api lokānām yena khyātim gamiṣyati

original: 1.018.011a na ca tau rāmam āsādya śaktau sthātuṃ kathaṃ cana
analyzed: na ca tau rāmam āsādya śaktau sthātum katham cana

original: 1.018.011c na ca tau rāghavād anyo hantum utsahate pumān
analyzed: na ca tau rāghavāt anyaḥ hantum utsahate pumān

original: 1.018.012a vīryotsiktau hi tau pāpau kālapāśavaśaṃ gatau
analyzed: vīrya utsiktau hi tau pāpau kāla pāśa vaśam gatau
rāmasya rāja śārdūla na paryāptau mahātmanaḥ

original: 1.018.013a na ca putrakṛtaṃ snehaṃ kartum arhasi pārthiva
analyzed: na ca putra kṛtam sneham kartum arhasi pārthiva

original: 1.018.013c ahaṃ te pratijānāmi hatau tau viddhi rākṣasau
analyzed: aham te pratijānāmi hatau tau viddhi rākṣasau
aham vedmi mahātmānam rāmam satya parākramam

original: 1.018.014c vasiṣṭho 'pi mahātejā ye ceme tapasi sthitāḥ
analyzed: vasiṣṭhaḥ api mahā tejāḥ ye ca ime tapasi sthitāḥ

original: 1.018.015a yadi te dharmalābhaṃ ca yaśaś ca paramaṃ bhuvi
analyzed: yadi te dharma lābham ca yaśaḥ ca paramam bhuvi

original: 1.018.015c sthiram icchasi rājendra rāmaṃ me dātum arhasi
analyzed: sthiram icchasi rāja indra rāmam me dātum arhasi

original: 1.018.016a yady abhyanujñāṃ kākutstha dadate tava mantriṇaḥ
analyzed: yadi abhyanujñām kākutstha dadate tava mantriṇaḥ

original: 1.018.016c vasiṣṭha pramukhāḥ sarve tato rāmaṃ visarjaya
analyzed: vasiṣṭha pramukhāḥ sarve tatas rāmam visarjaya
abhipretam asaṃsaktam ātmajam dātum arhasi
daśa rātram hi yajñasya rāmam rājīva locanam

original: 1.018.018a nātyeti kālo yajñasya yathāyaṃ mama rāghava
analyzed: na atyeti kālaḥ yajñasya yathā yam mama rāghava

original: 1.018.018c tathā kuruṣva bhadraṃ te mā ca śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ
analyzed: tathā kuruṣva bhadram te mā ca śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ

original: 1.018.019a ity evam uktvā dharmātmā dharmārthasahitaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: iti evam uktvā dharma ātmā dharma artha sahitam vacaḥ
virarāma mahā tejāḥ viśvāmitraḥ mahā muniḥ
iti hṛdaya manaḥ vidāraṇam
muni vacanam tat atīva śuśruvān
narapatiḥ agamat bhayam mahat
vyathita manāḥ pracacāla ca āsanāt
tat śrutvā rāja śārdūla viśvāmitrasya bhāṣitam

original: 1.019.001c muhūrtam iva niḥsaṃjñaḥ saṃjñāvān idam abravīt
analyzed: muhūrtam iva niḥsaṃjñaḥ saṃjñāvān idam abravīt
ūna ṣoḍaśa varṣaḥ me rāmaḥ rājīva locanaḥ

original: 1.019.002c na yuddhayogyatām asya paśyāmi saha rākṣasaiḥ
analyzed: na yuddha yogya tām asya paśyāmi saha rākṣasaiḥ

original: 1.019.003a iyam akṣauhiṇī pūrṇā yasyāhaṃ patir īśvaraḥ
analyzed: iyam akṣauhiṇī pūrṇā yasya aham patiḥ īśvaraḥ

original: 1.019.003c anayā saṃvṛto gatvā yodhāhaṃ tair niśācaraiḥ
analyzed: anayā saṃvṛtaḥ gatvā yodhā aham taiḥ niśācaraiḥ

original: 1.019.004a ime śūrāś ca vikrāntā bhṛtyā me 'straviśāradāḥ
analyzed: ime śūrāḥ ca vikrāntāḥ bhṛtyāḥ me astra viśāradāḥ

original: 1.019.004c yogyā rakṣogaṇair yoddhuṃ na rāmaṃ netum arhasi
analyzed: yogyāḥ rakṣaḥ gaṇaiḥ yoddhum na rāmam netum arhasi
aham eva dhanuṣpāṇiḥ goptā samara mūrdhani

original: 1.019.005c yāvat prāṇān dhariṣyāmi tāvad yotsye niśācaraiḥ
analyzed: yāvat prāṇān dhariṣyāmi tāvat yotsye niśācaraiḥ
nirvighnā vrata varyā sā bhaviṣyati su rakṣitā

original: 1.019.006c ahaṃ tatra gamiṣyāmil na rāma netum arhasi
analyzed: aham tatra gamiṣyāmi id na rāma netum arhasi

original: 1.019.007a bālo hy akṛtavidyaś ca na ca vetti balābalam
analyzed: bālaḥ hi akṛta vidyaḥ ca na ca vetti balābalam
na ca astra bala saṃyuktaḥ na ca yuddha viśāradaḥ

original: 1.019.007e na cāsau rakṣasāṃ yogyaḥ kūṭayuddhā hi te dhruvam
analyzed: na ca asau rakṣasām yogyaḥ kūṭa yuddhāḥ hi te dhruvam

original: 1.019.008a viprayukto hi rāmeṇa muhūrtam api notsahe
analyzed: viprayuktaḥ hi rāmeṇa muhūrtam api nā utsahe

original: 1.019.008c jīvituṃ muniśārdūla na rāmaṃ netum arhasi
analyzed: jīvitum muni śārdūla na rāmam netum arhasi

original: 1.019.009a yadi vā rāghavaṃ brahman netum icchasi suvrata
analyzed: yadi vā rāghavam brahman netum icchasi suvrata

original: 1.019.009c caturaṅgasamāyuktaṃ mayā saha ca taṃ naya
analyzed: catur aṅga samāyuktam mayā saha ca tam naya
ṣaṣṭiḥ varṣa sahasrāṇi jātasya mama kauśikaḥ

original: 1.019.010c duḥkhenotpāditaś cāyaṃ na rāmaṃ netum arhasi
analyzed: duḥkhena utpāditaḥ ca ayam na rāmam netum arhasi

original: 1.019.011a caturṇām ātmajānāṃ hi prītiḥ paramikā mama
analyzed: caturṇām ātmajānām hi prītiḥ paramikā mama

original: 1.019.011c jyeṣṭhaṃ dharmapradhānaṃ ca na rāmaṃ netum arhasi
analyzed: jyeṣṭham dharma pradhānam ca na rāmam netum arhasi

original: 1.019.012a kiṃ vīryā rākṣasās te ca kasya putrāś ca ke ca te
analyzed: kim vīryāḥ rākṣasāḥ te ca kasya putrāḥ ca ke ca te

original: 1.019.012c kathaṃ pramāṇāḥ ke caitān rakṣanti munipuṃgava
analyzed: katham pramāṇāḥ ke ca etān rakṣanti muni puṃgava

original: 1.019.013a kathaṃ ca pratikartavyaṃ teṣāṃ rāmeṇa rakṣasām
analyzed: katham ca pratikartavyam teṣām rāmeṇa rakṣasām

original: 1.019.013c māmakair vā balair brahman mayā vā kūṭayodhinām
analyzed: māmakaiḥ vā balaiḥ brahman mayā vā kūṭa yodhinām

original: 1.019.014a sarvaṃ me śaṃsa bhagavan kathaṃ teṣāṃ mayā raṇe
analyzed: sarvam me śaṃsa bhagavan katham teṣām mayā raṇe
sthātavyam duṣṭa bhāvānām vīrya utsiktāḥ hi rākṣasāḥ
tasya tat vacanam śrutvā viśvāmitraḥ abhyabhāṣata
paulastya vaṃśa prabhavaḥ rāvaṇaḥ nāma rākṣasaḥ

original: 1.019.016a sa brahmaṇā dattavaras trailokyaṃ bādhate bhṛśam
analyzed: sa brahmaṇā datta varaḥ trailokyam bādhate bhṛśam
mahā balaḥ mahā vīryaḥ rākṣasaiḥ bahubhiḥ vṛtaḥ
śrūyate hi mahā vīryaḥ rāvaṇaḥ rākṣasa adhipaḥ
sākṣāt vaiśravaṇa bhrātā putraḥ viśvarasaḥ muneḥ

original: 1.019.018a yadā svayaṃ na yajñasya vighnakartā mahābalaḥ
analyzed: yadā svayam na yajñasya vighna kartā mahā balaḥ

original: 1.019.018c tena saṃcoditau tau tu rākṣasau sumahā balau
analyzed: tena saṃcoditau tau tu rākṣasau su mahā balau

original: 1.019.018e mārīcaś ca subāhuś ca yajñavighnaṃ kariṣyataḥ
analyzed: mārīcaḥ ca subāhuḥ ca yajña vighnam kariṣyataḥ

original: 1.019.019a ity ukto muninā tena rājovāca muniṃ tadā
analyzed: iti uktaḥ muninā tena rājā uvāca munim tadā

original: 1.019.019c na hi śakto 'smi saṃgrāme sthātuṃ tasya durātmanaḥ
analyzed: na hi śaktaḥ asmi saṃgrāme sthātum tasya durātmanaḥ

original: 1.019.020a sa tvaṃ prasādaṃ dharmajña kuruṣva mama putrake
analyzed: sa tvam prasādam dharma jña kuruṣva mama putrake
deva dānava gandharvāḥ yakṣāḥ pataga pannagāḥ

original: 1.019.021a na śaktā rāvaṇaṃ soḍhuṃ kiṃ punar mānavā yudhi
analyzed: na śaktāḥ rāvaṇam soḍhum kim punar mānavāḥ yudhi

original: 1.019.021c sa hi vīryavatāṃ vīryam ādatte yudhi rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: sa hi vīryavatām vīryam ādatte yudhi rākṣasaḥ

original: 1.019.022a tena cāhaṃ na śakto 'smi saṃyoddhuṃ tasya vā balaiḥ
analyzed: tena ca aham na śaktaḥ asmi saṃyoddhum tasya vā balaiḥ

original: 1.019.022c sabalo vā muniśreṣṭha sahito vā mamātmajaiḥ
analyzed: sa balaḥ vā muni śreṣṭha sahitaḥ vā mama ātmajaiḥ
katham api amara prakhyam saṃgrāmāṇām akovidam

original: 1.019.023c bālaṃ me tanayaṃ brahman naiva dāsyāmi putrakam
analyzed: bālam me tanayam brahman nā eva dāsyāmi putrakam
atha kāla upamau yuddhe sutau sunda upasundayoḥ

original: 1.019.024c yajñavighnakarau tau te naiva dāsyāmi putrakam
analyzed: yajña vighna karau tau te nā eva dāsyāmi putrakam

original: 1.019.025a mārīcaś ca subāhuś ca vīryavantau suśikṣitau
analyzed: mārīcaḥ ca subāhuḥ ca vīryavantau su śikṣitau
tayoḥ anyatareṇa aham yoddhā syām sa suhṛd gaṇaḥ
tat śrutvā vacanam tasya sneha paryākula akṣaram
sa manyuḥ kauśikaḥ vākyam pratyuvaca mahīpatim

original: 1.020.002a pūrvam arthaṃ pratiśrutya pratijñāṃ hātum icchasi
analyzed: pūrvam artham pratiśrutya pratijñām hātum icchasi
rāgavāṇām ayuktaḥ ayam kulasya asya viparyayaḥ

original: 1.020.003a yad idaṃ te kṣamaṃ rājan gamiṣyāmi yathāgatam
analyzed: yat idam te kṣamam rājan gamiṣyāmi yathāgatam
mithyāpratijñaḥ kākutstha sukhī bhava sa bāndhavaḥ
tasya roṣa parītasya viśvāmitrasya dhīmataḥ

original: 1.020.004c cacāla vasudhā kṛtsnā viveśa ca bhayaṃ surān
analyzed: cacāla vasudhā kṛtsnā viveśa ca bhayam surān

original: 1.020.005a trastarūpaṃ tu vijñāya jagat sarvaṃ mahān ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: trasta rūpam tu vijñāya jagat sarvam mahān ṛṣiḥ

original: 1.020.005c nṛpatiṃ suvrato dhīro vasiṣṭho vākyam abravīt
analyzed: nṛpatim suvrataḥ dhīraḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ vākyam abravīt

original: 1.020.006a ikṣvākūṇāṃ kule jātaḥ sākṣād dharma ivāparaḥ
analyzed: ikṣvākūṇām kule jātaḥ sākṣāt dharmaḥ iva aparaḥ

original: 1.020.006c dhṛtimānsuvrataḥ śrīmān na dharmaṃ hātum arhasi
analyzed: dhṛtimān su vrataḥ śrīmān na dharmam hātum arhasi

original: 1.020.007a triṣu lokeṣu vikhyāto dharmātmā iti rāghavaḥ
analyzed: triṣu lokeṣu vikhyātaḥ dharma ātmā iti rāghavaḥ
svadharmam pratipadyasva na adharmam voḍhum arhasi
saṃśrutya evam kariṣyāmi iti akurvāṇasya rāghava
iṣṭāpūrta vadhaḥ bhūyāt tasmāt rāmam visarjaya

original: 1.020.009a kṛtāstram akṛtāstraṃ vā nainaṃ śakṣyanti rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: kṛtāstram a kṛtāstram vā na enam śakṣyanti rākṣasāḥ
guptam kuśika putreṇa jvalanena amṛtam yathā

original: 1.020.010a eṣa vigrahavān dharma eṣa vīryavatāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: eṣa vigrahavān dharmaḥ eṣa vīryavatām varaḥ

original: 1.020.010c eṣa buddhyādhiko loke tapasaś ca parāyaṇam
analyzed: eṣa buddhyā adhikaḥ loke tapasaḥ ca parāyaṇam
eṣaḥ astrān vividhān vetti trailokye sa carācare

original: 1.020.011c nainam anyaḥ pumān vetti na ca vetsyanti ke cana
analyzed: na enam anyaḥ pumān vetti na ca vetsyanti ke cana

original: 1.020.012a na devā narṣayaḥ ke cin nāsurā na ca rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: na devāḥ na ṛṣayaḥ ke cit na asurāḥ na ca rākṣasāḥ
gandharva yakṣa pravarāḥ sa kiṃnara mahoragāḥ
sarva astrāṇi kṛśāśvasya putrāḥ parama dhārmikāḥ

original: 1.020.013c kauśikāya purā dattā yadā rājyaṃ praśāsati
analyzed: kauśikāya purā dattāḥ yadā rājyam praśāsati
te api putrāḥ kṛśāśvasya prajāpati sutā sutāḥ
naka rūpāḥ mahā vīryāḥ dīptimantaḥ jaya āvahāḥ

original: 1.020.015a jayā ca suprabhā caiva dakṣakanye sumadhyame
analyzed: jayā ca suprabhā ca eva dakṣakanye sumadhyame
te suvāte astra śastrāṇi śatam parama bhāsvaram

original: 1.020.016a pañcāśataṃ sutāṃl lebhe jayā nāma varān purā
analyzed: pañcāśatam sutān lebhe jayā nāma varān purā
vadhāya asura sainyānām ameyān kāmarūpiṇaḥ
suprabhā ajanayat ca api putrān pañcāśatam punar
saṃhārān nāma durdharṣān durākrāmān balīyasaḥ

original: 1.020.018a tāni cāstrāṇi vetty eṣa yathāvat kuśikātmajaḥ
analyzed: tāni ca astrāṇi vetti eṣa yathāvat kuśika ātmajaḥ

original: 1.020.018c apūrvāṇāṃ ca janane śakto bhūyaś ca dharmavit
analyzed: apūrvāṇām ca janane śaktaḥ bhūyas ca dharma vid
evam vīryaḥ mahā tejāḥ viśvāmitraḥ mahā tapāḥ

original: 1.020.019c na rāmagamane rājan saṃśayaṃ gantum arhasi
analyzed: na rāma gamane rājan saṃśayam gantum arhasi

original: 1.021.001a tathā vasiṣṭhe bruvati rājā daśarathaḥ sutam
analyzed: tathā vasiṣṭhe bruvati rājā daśarathaḥ sutam
prahṛṣṭa vadanaḥ rāmam ājuhāva sa lakṣmaṇam
kṛta svastyayanam mātrā pitrā daśarathena ca
purodhasā vasiṣṭhena maṅgalaiḥ abhimantritam

original: 1.021.003a sa putraṃ mūrdhny upāghrāya rājā daśarathaḥ priyam
analyzed: sa putram mūrdhni upāghrāya rājā daśarathaḥ priyam
dadau kuśika putrāya su prītena antarātmanā

original: 1.021.004a tato vāyuḥ sukhasparśo virajasko vavau tadā
analyzed: tatas vāyuḥ sukha sparśaḥ virajaskaḥ vavau tadā
viśvāmitra gatam rāmam dṛṣṭvā rājīva locanam
puṣpa vṛṣṭiḥ mahatī āsīt deva dundubhi nisvanaḥ
śaṅkha dundubhi nirghoṣaḥ prayāte tu mahātmani

original: 1.021.006a viśvāmitro yayāv agre tato rāmo mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: viśvāmitraḥ yayau agre tatas rāmaḥ mahā yaśāḥ

original: 1.021.006c kākapakṣadharo dhanvī taṃ ca saumitrir anvagāt
analyzed: kākapakṣa dharaḥ dhanvī tam ca saumitriḥ anvagāt
kalāpinau dhanuṣpāṇī śobha yānau diśaḥ daśa
viśvāmitram mahātmānam tri śīrṣau iva pannagau
anujagmatuḥ akṣudrau pitāmaham iva aśvinau
baddha godhā aṅguli trāṇau khaḍgavantau mahā dyutī

original: 1.021.008c sthāṇuṃ devam ivācintyaṃ kumārāv iva pāvakī
analyzed: sthāṇum devam iva acintyam kumārau iva pāvakī
adhyardha yojanam gatvā sarayvāḥ dakṣiṇe taṭe
rāma iti madhurā vāṇīm viśvāmitraḥ abhyabhāṣata

original: 1.021.010a gṛhāṇa vatsa salilaṃ mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ
analyzed: gṛhāṇa vatsa salilam mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ

original: 1.021.010c mantragrāmaṃ gṛhāṇa tvaṃ balām atibalāṃ tathā
analyzed: mantra grāmam gṛhāṇa tvam balām atibalām tathā

original: 1.021.011a na śramo na jvaro vā te na rūpasya viparyayaḥ
analyzed: na śramaḥ na jvaraḥ vā te na rūpasya viparyayaḥ

original: 1.021.011c na ca suptaṃ pramattaṃ vā dharṣayiṣyanti nairṛtāḥ
analyzed: na ca suptam pramattam vā dharṣayiṣyanti nairṛtāḥ

original: 1.021.012a na bāhvoḥ sadṛśo vīrye pṛthivyām asti kaś cana
analyzed: na bāhvoḥ sadṛśaḥ vīrye pṛthivyām asti kaḥ cana

original: 1.021.012c triṣu lokeṣu vā rāma na bhavet sadṛśas tava
analyzed: triṣu lokeṣu vā rāma na bhavet sadṛśaḥ tava

original: 1.021.013a na saubhāgye na dākṣiṇye na jñāne buddhiniścaye
analyzed: na saubhāgye na dākṣiṇye na jñāne buddhi niścaye
na uttare pratipattavyaḥ samaḥ loke tava anagha

original: 1.021.014a etadvidyādvaye labdhe bhavitā nāsti te samaḥ
analyzed: etad vidyā dvaye labdhe bhavitā na asti te samaḥ
balā ca atibalā ca eva sarva jñānasya mātarau

original: 1.021.015a kṣutpipāse na te rāma bhaviṣyete narottama
analyzed: kṣudh pipāse na te rāma bhaviṣyete nara uttama

original: 1.021.015c balām atibalāṃ caiva paṭhataḥ pathi rāghava
analyzed: balām atibalām ca eva paṭhataḥ pathi rāghava

original: 1.021.015e vidyādvayam adhīyāne yaśaś cāpy atulaṃ bhuvi
analyzed: vidyā dvayam adhīyāne yaśaḥ ca api atulam bhuvi
pitāmaha sute hi ete vidye tejaḥ samanvite

original: 1.021.016c pradātuṃ tava kākutstha sadṛśas tvaṃ hi dhārmika
analyzed: pradātum tava kākutstha sadṛśaḥ tvam hi dhārmika

original: 1.021.017a kāmaṃ bahuguṇāḥ sarve tvayy ete nātra saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: kāmam bahu guṇāḥ sarve tvayi ete na atra saṃśayaḥ
tapasā saṃbhṛte ca ete bahu rūpe bhaviṣyataḥ

original: 1.021.018a tato rāmo jalaṃ spṛṣṭvā prahṛṣṭavadanaḥ śuciḥ
analyzed: tatas rāmaḥ jalam spṛṣṭvā prahṛṣṭa vadanaḥ śuciḥ
pratijagrāha te vidye mahā ṛṣeḥ bhāvitātmanaḥ
vidyā samuditaḥ rāmaḥ śuśubhe bhūri vikramaḥ
guru kāryāṇi sarvāṇi niyujya kuśika ātmaje

original: 1.021.019c ūṣus tāṃ rajanīṃ tatra sarayvāṃ susukhaṃ trayaḥ
analyzed: ūṣuḥ tām rajanīm tatra sarayvām su sukham trayaḥ
prabhātāyām tu śarvaryām viśvāmitraḥ mahā muniḥ
abhyabhāṣata kākutstham śayānam parṇa saṃstare

original: 1.022.002a kausalyā suprajā rāma pūrvā saṃdhyā pravartate
analyzed: kausalyā suprajāḥ rāma pūrvā saṃdhyā pravartate
uttiṣṭha nara śārdūla kartavyam daivam āhnikam
tasya ṛṣeḥ parama udāram vacaḥ śrutvā nṛpa ātmajau

original: 1.022.003c snātvā kṛtodakau vīrau jepatuḥ paramaṃ japam
analyzed: snātvā kṛta udakau vīrau jepatuḥ paramam japam
kṛta āhnikau mahā vīryau viśvāmitram tapodhanam
abhivādya abhisaṃhṛṣṭau gamanāya upatasthatuḥ

original: 1.022.005a tau prayāte mahāvīryau divyaṃ tripathagāṃ nadīm
analyzed: tau prayāte mahā vīryau divyam tripathagām nadīm

original: 1.022.005c dadṛśāte tatas tatra sarayvāḥ saṃgame śubhe
analyzed: dadṛśāte tatas tatra sarayvāḥ saṃgame śubhe
tatra āśrama padam puṇyam ṛṣīṇām ugra tejasām
bahu varṣa sahasrāṇi tapyatām paramam tapaḥ

original: 1.022.007a taṃ dṛṣṭvā paramaprītau rāghavau puṇyam āśramam
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā parama prītau rāghavau puṇyam āśramam

original: 1.022.007c ūcatus taṃ mahātmānaṃ viśvāmitram idaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: ūcatuḥ tam mahātmānam viśvāmitram idam vacaḥ

original: 1.022.008a kasyāyam āśramaḥ puṇyaḥ ko nv asmin vasate pumān
analyzed: kasya ayam āśramaḥ puṇyaḥ kaḥ nu asmin vasate pumān

original: 1.022.008c bhagavañ śrotum icchāvaḥ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi nau
analyzed: bhagavan śrotum icchāvaḥ param kautūhalam hi nau

original: 1.022.009a tayos tad vacanaṃ śrutvā prahasya munipuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: tayoḥ tat vacanam śrutvā prahasya muni puṃgavaḥ

original: 1.022.009c abravīc chrūyatāṃ rāma yasyāyaṃ pūrva āśramaḥ
analyzed: abravīt śrūyatām rāma yasya ayam pūrvaḥ āśramaḥ

original: 1.022.010a kandarpo mūrtimān āsīt kāma ity ucyate budhaiḥ
analyzed: kandarpaḥ mūrtimān āsīt kāmaḥ iti ucyate budhaiḥ
tapasyantam iha sthāṇum niyamena samāhitam
kṛta udvāham tu deveśam gacchantam sa marut gaṇam

original: 1.022.011e dharṣayām āsa durmedhā huṃkṛtaś ca mahātmanā
analyzed: dharṣayām āsa durmedhāḥ huṃkṛtaḥ ca mahātmanā
dagdhasya tasya raudreṇa cakṣuṣā raghunandana
vyaśīryanta śarīrāt svāt sarva gātrāṇi durmateḥ

original: 1.022.013a tasya gātraṃ hataṃ tatra nirdagdhasya mahātmanā
analyzed: tasya gātram hatam tatra nirdagdhasya mahātmanā

original: 1.022.013c aśarīraḥ kṛtaḥ kāmaḥ krodhād deveśvareṇa ha
analyzed: aśarīraḥ kṛtaḥ kāmaḥ krodhāt deveśvareṇa ha

original: 1.022.014a anaṅga iti vikhyātas tadā prabhṛti rāghava
analyzed: anaṅgaḥ iti vikhyātaḥ tadā prabhṛti rāghava

original: 1.022.014c sa cāṅgaviṣayaḥ śrīmān yatrāṅgaṃ sa mumoca ha
analyzed: sa ca aṅga viṣayaḥ śrīmān yatra aṅgam sa mumoca ha

original: 1.022.015a tasyāyam āśramaḥ puṇyas tasyeme munayaḥ purā
analyzed: tasya ayam āśramaḥ puṇyaḥ tasya ime munayaḥ purā

original: 1.022.015c śiṣyā dharmaparā vīra teṣāṃ pāpaṃ na vidyate
analyzed: śiṣyāḥ dharma parāḥ vīra teṣām pāpam na vidyate
iha adya rajanīm rāma vasema śubha darśana

original: 1.022.016c puṇyayoḥ saritor madhye śvas tariṣyāmahe vayam
analyzed: puṇyayoḥ saritoḥ madhye śvas tariṣyāmahe vayam

original: 1.022.017a teṣāṃ saṃvadatāṃ tatra tapo dīrgheṇa cakṣuṣā
analyzed: teṣām saṃvadatām tatra tapaḥ dīrgheṇa cakṣuṣā
vijñāya parama prītāḥ munayaḥ harṣam āgaman
arghyam pādyam tathā ātithyam nivedya kuśika ātmaje
rāma lakṣmaṇayoḥ paścāt akurvan atithi kriyām
satkāram samanuprāpya kathābhiḥ abhirañjayan
nyavasan su sukham tatra kāma āśrama pade tadā
tatas prabhāte vimale kṛta āhnikam ariṃdamau
viśvāmitram puraskṛtya nadyāḥ tīram upāgatau

original: 1.023.002a te ca sarve mahātmāno munayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ
analyzed: te ca sarve mahātmānaḥ munayaḥ saṃśita vratāḥ
upasthāpya śubhām nāvam viśvāmitram atha abruvan
ārohatu bhavān nāvam rāja putra puraskṛtaḥ

original: 1.023.003c ariṣṭaṃ gaccha panthānaṃ mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ
analyzed: ariṣṭam gaccha panthānam mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ

original: 1.023.004a viśvāmitras tathety uktvā tān ṛṣīn abhipūjya ca
analyzed: viśvāmitraḥ tathā iti uktvā tān ṛṣīn abhipūjya ca

original: 1.023.004c tatāra sahitas tābhyāṃ saritaṃ sāgaraṃ gamām
analyzed: tatāra sahitaḥ tābhyām saritam sāgaram gamām
atha rāmaḥ sarit madhye papraccha muni puṅgavam

original: 1.023.005c vāriṇo bhidyamānasya kim ayaṃ tumulo dhvaniḥ
analyzed: vāriṇaḥ bhidyamānasya kim ayam tumulaḥ dhvaniḥ
rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā kautūhala samanvitam

original: 1.023.006c kathayām āsa dharmātmā tasya śabdasya niścayam
analyzed: kathayām āsa dharma ātmā tasya śabdasya niścayam
kailāsa parvate rāma manasā nirmitam saraḥ
brahmaṇā nara śārdūla tena idam mānasam saraḥ
tasmāt susrāva sarasaḥ sā ayodhyām upagūhate
saraḥ pravṛttā sarayūḥ puṇyā brahmasaraḥ cyutā
tasya ayam atulaḥ śabdaḥ jāhnavīm abhivartate
vāri saṃkṣobha jaḥ rāma praṇāmam niyataḥ kuru

original: 1.023.010a tābhyāṃ tu tāv ubhau kṛtvā praṇāmam atidhārmikau
analyzed: tābhyām tu tau ubhau kṛtvā praṇāmam ati dhārmikau
tīram dakṣiṇam āsādya jagmatuḥ laghu vikramau
sa vanam ghora saṃkāśam dṛṣṭvā nṛpa vara ātmajaḥ
aviprahatam aikṣvākaḥ papraccha muni puṃgavam
aho vanam idam durgam jhillikā gaṇa nāditam
bhairavaiḥ śvāpadaiḥ kīrṇam śakuntaiḥ dāruṇa āravaiḥ
nānā prakāraiḥ śakunaiḥ vāśyadbhiḥ bhairava svanaiḥ
siṃha vyāghra varāhaiḥ ca vāraṇaiḥ ca api śobhitam
dhava aśvakarṇa kakubhaiḥ bilva tinduka pāṭalaiḥ

original: 1.023.014c saṃkīrṇaṃ badarībhiś ca kiṃ nv idaṃ dāruṇaṃ vanam
analyzed: saṃkīrṇam badarībhiḥ ca kim nu idam dāruṇam vanam
tam uvāca mahā tejāḥ viśvāmitraḥ mahā muniḥ

original: 1.023.015c śrūyatāṃ vatsa kākutstha yasyaitad dāruṇaṃ vanam
analyzed: śrūyatām vatsa kākutstha yasya etat dāruṇam vanam

original: 1.023.016a etau janapadau sphītau pūrvam āstāṃ narottama
analyzed: etau janapadau sphītau pūrvam āstām nara uttama

original: 1.023.016c maladāś ca karūṣāś ca devanirmāṇa nirmitau
analyzed: maladāḥ ca karūṣāḥ ca devanirmāṇa nirmitau
purā vṛtra vadhe rāma malena samabhiplutam
kṣudhā ca eva sahasrākṣam brahmahatyā yadā āviśat

original: 1.023.018a tam indraṃ snāpayan devā ṛṣayaś ca tapodhanāḥ
analyzed: tam indram snāpayan devāḥ ṛṣayaḥ ca tapodhanāḥ

original: 1.023.018c kalaśaiḥ snāpayām āsur malaṃ cāsya pramocayan
analyzed: kalaśaiḥ snāpayām āsuḥ malam ca asya pramocayan

original: 1.023.019a iha bhūmyāṃ malaṃ dattvā dattvā kāruṣam eva ca
analyzed: iha bhūmyām malam dattvā dattvā kāruṣam eva ca
śarīra jam mahā indrasya tatas harṣam prapedire

original: 1.023.020a nirmalo niṣkarūṣaś ca śucir indro yadābhavat
analyzed: nirmalaḥ niṣkarūṣaḥ ca śuciḥ indraḥ yadā abhavat

original: 1.023.020c dadau deśasya suprīto varaṃ prabhur anuttamam
analyzed: dadau deśasya su prītaḥ varam prabhuḥ anuttamam

original: 1.023.021a imau janapadau sthītau khyātiṃ loke gamiṣyataḥ
analyzed: imau janapadau sthītau khyātim loke gamiṣyataḥ
maladāḥ ca karūṣāḥ ca mama aṅga mala dhāriṇau

original: 1.023.022a sādhu sādhv iti taṃ devāḥ pākaśāsanam abruvan
analyzed: sādhu sādhu iti tam devāḥ pākaśāsanam abruvan

original: 1.023.022c deśasya pūjāṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛtāṃ śakreṇa dhīmatā
analyzed: deśasya pūjām tām dṛṣṭvā kṛtām śakreṇa dhīmatā
etau janapadau sthītau dīrgha kālam ariṃdama

original: 1.023.023c maladāś ca karūṣāś ca muditau dhanadhānyataḥ
analyzed: maladāḥ ca karūṣāḥ ca muditau dhana dhānyataḥ

original: 1.023.024a kasya cit tv atha kālasya yakṣī vai kāmarūpiṇī
analyzed: kasya cit tu atha kālasya yakṣī vai kāmarūpiṇī

original: 1.023.024c balaṃ nāgasahasrasya dhārayantī tadā hy abhūt
analyzed: balam nāga sahasrasya dhārayantī tadā hi abhūt

original: 1.023.025a tāṭakā nāma bhadraṃ te bhāryā sundasya dhīmataḥ
analyzed: tāṭakā nāma bhadram te bhāryā sundasya dhīmataḥ
mārīcaḥ rākṣasaḥ putraḥ yasyāḥ śakra parākramaḥ
imau janapadau nityam vināśayati rāghava

original: 1.023.026c maladāṃś ca karūṣāṃś ca tāṭakā duṣṭacāriṇī
analyzed: maladān ca karūṣān ca tāṭakā duṣṭa cāriṇī
sā iyam panthānam āvārya vasati ati ardha yojane

original: 1.023.027c ata eva ca gantavyaṃ tāṭakāyā vanaṃ yataḥ
analyzed: atas eva ca gantavyam tāṭakāyāḥ vanam yatas
sva bāhu balam āśritya jahi imām duṣṭa cāriṇīm

original: 1.023.028c manniyogād imaṃ deśaṃ kuru niṣkaṇṭakaṃ punaḥ
analyzed: mad niyogāt imam deśam kuru niṣkaṇṭakam punar

original: 1.023.029a na hi kaś cid imaṃ deśaṃ śakroty āgantum īdṛśam
analyzed: na hi kaḥ cit imam deśam śakroti āgantum īdṛśam
yakṣiṇyā ghorayā rāmaḥ utsāditam asahyayā

original: 1.023.030a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yathaitad daruṇaṃ vanam
analyzed: etat te sarvam ākhyātam yathā etat daruṇam vanam

original: 1.023.030c yakṣyā cotsāditaṃ sarvam adyāpi na nivartate
analyzed: yakṣyā ca utsāditam sarvam adyā api na nivartate
atha tasya aprameyasya muneḥ vacanam uttamam
śrutvā puruṣa śārdūlaḥ pratyuvāca śubhām giram
alpa vīryāḥ yadā yakṣāḥ śrūyante muni puṃgava
katham nāga sahasrasya dhārayati abalā balam
viśvāmitraḥ abravīt vākyam śṛṇu yena bala uttarā
vara dāna kṛtam vīryam dhārayati abalā balam

original: 1.024.004a pūrvam āsīn mahāyakṣaḥ suketur nāma vīryavān
analyzed: pūrvam āsīt mahā yakṣaḥ suketuḥ nāma vīryavān

original: 1.024.004c anapatyaḥ śubhācāraḥ sa ca tepe mahat tapaḥ
analyzed: anapatyaḥ śubha ācāraḥ sa ca tepe mahat tapaḥ

original: 1.024.005a pitāmahas tu suprītas tasya yakṣapates tadā
analyzed: pitāmahaḥ tu su prītaḥ tasya yakṣapateḥ tadā

original: 1.024.005c kanyāratnaṃ dadau rāma tāṭakāṃ nāma nāmataḥ
analyzed: kanyā ratnam dadau rāma tāṭakām nāma nāmataḥ
dadau nāga sahasrasya balam ca asyāḥ pitāmahaḥ

original: 1.024.006c na tv eva putraṃ yakṣāya dadau brahmā mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: na tu eva putram yakṣāya dadau brahmā mahā yaśāḥ
tām tu jātām vivardhantīm rūpa yauvana śālinīm
jambha putrāya sundāya dadau bhāryām yaśasvinīm

original: 1.024.008a kasya cit tv atha kālalsya yakṣī putraṃ vyajāyata
analyzed: kasya cit tu atha kālalsya yakṣī putram vyajāyata

original: 1.024.008c mārīcaṃ nāma durdharṣaṃ yaḥ śāpād rākṣaso 'bhavat
analyzed: mārīcam nāma durdharṣam yaḥ śāpāt rākṣasaḥ abhavat

original: 1.024.009a sunde tu nihate rāma agastyam ṛṣisattamam
analyzed: sunde tu nihate rāma agastyam ṛṣi sattamam
tāṭakā saha putreṇa pradharṣayitum icchati
rākṣasa tvam bhajasva iti mārīcam vyājahāra saḥ
agastyaḥ parama kruddhaḥ tāṭakām api śaptavān

original: 1.024.011c idaṃ rūpam apahāya dāruṇaṃ rūpam astu te
analyzed: idam rūpam apahāya dāruṇam rūpam astu te
sā eṣā śāpa kṛta amarṣā tāṭakā krodha mūrchitā
deśam utsādayati enam agastya caritam śubham
enām rāghava durvṛttām yakṣīm parama dāruṇām
go brāhmaṇa hita arthāya jahi duṣṭa parākramām

original: 1.024.014a na hy enāṃ śāpasaṃsṛṣṭāṃ kaś cid utsahate pumān
analyzed: na hi enām śāpa saṃsṛṣṭām kaḥ cit utsahate pumān

original: 1.024.014c nihantuṃ triṣu lokeṣu tvām ṛte raghunandana
analyzed: nihantum triṣu lokeṣu tvām ṛte raghunandana

original: 1.024.015a na hi te strīvadhakṛte ghṛṇā kāryā narottama
analyzed: na hi te strī vadha kṛte ghṛṇā kāryā nara uttama
cāturvarṇya hita arthāya kartavyam rāja sūnunā
rājya bhāra niyuktānām eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ

original: 1.024.016c adharmyāṃ jahi kākutsha dharmo hy asyā na vidyate
analyzed: adharmyām jahi kākutsha dharmaḥ hi asyāḥ na vidyate

original: 1.024.017a śrūyate hi purā śakro virocanasutāṃ nṛpa
analyzed: śrūyate hi purā śakraḥ virocana sutām nṛpa
pṛthivīm hantum icchantīm mantharām abhyasūdayat

original: 1.024.018a viṣṇunā ca purā rāma bhṛgupatnī dṛḍhavratā
analyzed: viṣṇunā ca purā rāma bhṛgu patnī dṛḍha vratā
an indram lokam icchantī kāvya mātā niṣūditā
etaiḥ ca anyaiḥ ca bahubhiḥ rāja putra mahātmabhiḥ
a dharma niratāḥ nāryaḥ hatāḥ puruṣa sattamaiḥ
muneḥ vacanam aklībam śrutvā nara vara ātmajaḥ
rāghavaḥ prāñjaliḥ bhūtvā pratyuvāca dṛḍha vrataḥ
pituḥ vacana nirdeśāt pituḥ vacana gauravāt
vacanam kauśikasya iti kartavyam aviśaṅkayā
anuśiṣṭaḥ asmi ayodhyāyām guru madhye mahātmanā

original: 1.025.003c pitrā daśarathenāhaṃ nāvajñeyaṃ ca tad vacaḥ
analyzed: pitrā daśarathena aham na avajñeyam ca tat vacaḥ

original: 1.025.004a so 'haṃ pitur vacaḥ śrutvā śāsanād brahma vādinaḥ
analyzed: saḥ aham pituḥ vacaḥ śrutvā śāsanāt brahma vādinaḥ
kariṣyāmi na saṃdehaḥ tāṭakā vadham uttamam
go brāhmaṇa hita arthāya deśasya asya sukhāya ca
tava ca eva aprameyasya vacanam kartum udyataḥ

original: 1.025.006a evam uktvā dhanurmadhye baddhvā muṣṭim ariṃdamaḥ
analyzed: evam uktvā dhanuḥ madhye baddhvā muṣṭim ariṃdamaḥ

original: 1.025.006c jyāśabdam akarot tīvraṃ diśaḥ śabdena pūrayan
analyzed: jyā śabdam akarot tīvram diśaḥ śabdena pūrayan
tena śabdena vitrastāḥ tāṭakāḥ vana vāsinaḥ

original: 1.025.007c tāṭakā ca susaṃkruddhā tena śabdena mohitā
analyzed: tāṭakā ca su saṃkruddhā tena śabdena mohitā
tam śabdam abhinidhyāya rākṣasī krodha mūrchitā

original: 1.025.008c śrutvā cābhyadravad vegād yataḥ śabdo viniḥsṛtaḥ
analyzed: śrutvā ca abhyadravat vegāt yatas śabdaḥ viniḥsṛtaḥ

original: 1.025.009a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ kruddhāṃ vikṛtāṃ vikṛtānanām
analyzed: tām dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ kruddhām vikṛtām vikṛta ānanām
pramāṇena ati vṛddhām ca lakṣmaṇam saḥ abhyabhāṣata

original: 1.025.010a paśya lakṣmaṇa yakṣiṇyā bhairavaṃ dāruṇaṃ vapuḥ
analyzed: paśya lakṣmaṇa yakṣiṇyāḥ bhairavam dāruṇam vapuḥ

original: 1.025.010c bhidyeran darśanād asyā bhīrūṇāṃ hṛdayāni ca
analyzed: bhidyeran darśanāt asyāḥ bhīrūṇām hṛdayāni ca
enām paśya durādharṣām māyāḥ bala samanvitām
vinivṛttām karomi adya hṛta karṇa agra nāsikām

original: 1.025.012a na hy enām utsahe hantuṃ strīsvabhāvena rakṣitām
analyzed: na hi enām utsahe hantum strī svabhāvena rakṣitām

original: 1.025.012c vīryaṃ cāsyā gatiṃ cāpi haniṣyāmīti me matiḥ
analyzed: vīryam ca asyāḥ gatim ca api haniṣyāmi iti me matiḥ

original: 1.025.013a evaṃ bruvāṇe rāme tu tāṭakā krodhamūrchitā
analyzed: evam bruvāṇe rāme tu tāṭakā krodha mūrchitā
udyamya bāhū garjantī rāmam eva abhyadhāvata

original: 1.025.014a tām āpatantīṃ vegena vikrāntām aśanīm iva
analyzed: tām āpatantīm vegena vikrāntām aśanīm iva

original: 1.025.014c śareṇorasi vivyādha sā papāta mamāra ca
analyzed: śareṇa urasi vivyādha sā papāta mamāra ca

original: 1.025.015a tāṃ hatāṃ bhīmasaṃkāśāṃ dṛṣṭvā surapatis tadā
analyzed: tām hatām bhīma saṃkāśām dṛṣṭvā surapatiḥ tadā

original: 1.025.015c sādhu sādhv iti kākutsthaṃ surāś ca samapūjayan
analyzed: sādhu sādhu iti kākutstham surāḥ ca samapūjayan
uvāca parama prītaḥ sahasrākṣaḥ puraṃdaraḥ

original: 1.025.016c surāś ca sarve saṃhṛṣṭā viśvāmitram athābruvan
analyzed: surāḥ ca sarve saṃhṛṣṭāḥ viśvāmitram atha abruvan

original: 1.025.017a mune kauśike bhadraṃ te sendrāḥ sarve marudgaṇāḥ
analyzed: mune kauśike bhadram te sa indrāḥ sarve marut gaṇāḥ
toṣitāḥ karmaṇā anena sneham darśaya rāghave
prajāpateḥ bhṛśāśvasya putrān satya parākramān
tapaḥ bala bhṛtān brahman rāghavāya nivedaya

original: 1.025.019a pātrabhūtaś ca te brahmaṃs tavānugamane dhṛtaḥ
analyzed: pātra bhūtaḥ ca te brahman tava anugamane dhṛtaḥ

original: 1.025.019c kartavyaṃ ca mahat karma surāṇāṃ rājasūnunā
analyzed: kartavyam ca mahat karma surāṇām rāja sūnunā

original: 1.025.020a evam uktvā surāḥ sarve hṛṣṭā jagmur yathāgatam
analyzed: evam uktvā surāḥ sarve hṛṣṭāḥ jagmuḥ yathāgatam
viśvāmitram pūjayitvā tatas saṃdhyā pravartate
tatas muni varaḥ prītiḥ tāṭakā vadha toṣitaḥ

original: 1.025.021c mūrdhni rāmam upāghrāya idaṃ vacanam abravīt
analyzed: mūrdhni rāmam upāghrāya idam vacanam abravīt
iha adya rajanīm rāma vasema śubha darśana

original: 1.025.022c śvaḥ prabhāte gamiṣyāmas tad āśramapadaṃ mama
analyzed: śvas prabhāte gamiṣyāmaḥ tat āśrama padam mama

original: 1.026.001a atha tāṃ rajanīm uṣya viśvāmiro mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: atha tām rajanīm uṣya viśvāmiraḥ mahā yaśāḥ
prahasya rāghavam vākyam uvāca madhura akṣaram
pati tuṣṭaḥ asmi bhadram te rāja putra mahā yaśaḥ

original: 1.026.002c prītyā paramayā yukto dadāmy astrāṇi sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: prītyā paramayā yuktaḥ dadāmi astrāṇi sarvaśas
deva asura gaṇān vā api sa gandharva uragān api
yaiḥ amitrān prasahya ājau vaśīkṛtya jayiṣyasi

original: 1.026.004a tāni divyāni bhadraṃ te dadāmy astrāṇi sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: tāni divyāni bhadram te dadāmi astrāṇi sarvaśas

original: 1.026.004c daṇḍacakraṃ mahad divyaṃ tava dāsyāmi rāghava
analyzed: daṇḍacakram mahat divyam tava dāsyāmi rāghava

original: 1.026.005a dharmacakraṃ tato vīra kālacakraṃ tathaiva ca
analyzed: dharmacakram tatas vīra kālacakram tathā eva ca

original: 1.026.005c viṣṇucakraṃ tathātyugram aindraṃ cakraṃ tathaiva ca
analyzed: viṣṇucakram tathā ati ugram aindram cakram tathā eva ca

original: 1.026.006a vajram astraṃ naraśreṣṭha śaivaṃ śūlavaraṃ tathā
analyzed: vajram astram nara śreṣṭha śaivam śūlavaram tathā

original: 1.026.006c astraṃ brahmaśiraś caiva aiṣīkam api rāghava
analyzed: astram brahmaśiraḥ ca eva aiṣīkam api rāghava

original: 1.026.007a dadāmi te mahābāho brāhmam astram anuttamam
analyzed: dadāmi te mahā bāho brāhmam astram anuttamam

original: 1.026.007c gade dve caiva kākutstha modakī śikharī ubhe
analyzed: gade dve ca eva kākutstha modakī śikharī ubhe
pradīpte nara śārdūla prayacchāmi nṛpa ātmaja

original: 1.026.008c dharmapāśam ahaṃ rāma kālapāśaṃ tathaiva ca
analyzed: dharmapāśam aham rāma kālapāśam tathā eva ca

original: 1.026.009a vāruṇaṃ pāśam astraṃ ca dadāny aham anuttamam
analyzed: vāruṇam pāśam astram ca dadāni aham anuttamam
aśanī dve prayacchāmi śuṣka ārdre raghunandana

original: 1.026.010a dadāmi cāstraṃ painākam astraṃ nārāyaṇaṃ tathā
analyzed: dadāmi ca astram painākam astram nārāyaṇam tathā

original: 1.026.010c āgneyam astra dayitaṃ śikharaṃ nāma nāmataḥ
analyzed: āgneyam astra dayitam śikharam nāma nāmataḥ

original: 1.026.011a vāyavyaṃ prathamaṃ nāma dadāmi tava rāghava
analyzed: vāyavyam prathamam nāma dadāmi tava rāghava

original: 1.026.011c astraṃ hayaśiro nāma krauñcam astraṃ tathaiva ca
analyzed: astram hayaśiraḥ nāma krauñcam astram tathā eva ca

original: 1.026.012a śakti dvayaṃ ca kākutstha dadāmi tava cānagha
analyzed: dvayam ca kākutstha dadāmi tava ca anagha

original: 1.026.012c kaṅkālaṃ musalaṃ ghoraṃ kāpālam atha kaṅkaṇam
analyzed: kaṅkālam musalam ghoram kāpālam atha kaṅkaṇam

original: 1.026.013a dhārayanty asurā yāni dadāmy etāni sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: dhārayanti asurāḥ yāni dadāmi etāni sarvaśas

original: 1.026.013c vaidyādharaṃ mahāstraṃ ca nandanaṃ nāma nāmataḥ
analyzed: vaidyādharam mahā astram ca nandanam nāma nāmataḥ
asi ratnam mahā bāho dadāmi nṛ vara ātmaja

original: 1.026.014c gāndharvam astraṃ dayitaṃ mānavaṃ nāma nāmataḥ
analyzed: gāndharvam astram dayitam mānavam nāma nāmataḥ
prasvāpana praśamane dadmi sauram ca rāghava
darpaṇam śoṣaṇam ca eva saṃtāpana vilāpane
madanam ca eva durdharṣam kandarpa dayitam tathā

original: 1.026.016c paiśācam astraṃ dayitaṃ mohanaṃ nāma nāmataḥ
analyzed: paiśācam astram dayitam mohanam nāma nāmataḥ
pratīccha nara śārdūla rāja putra mahā yaśaḥ
tāmasam nara śārdūla saumanam ca mahā balam

original: 1.026.017c saṃvartaṃ caiva durdharṣaṃ mausalaṃ ca nṛpātmaja
analyzed: saṃvartam ca eva durdharṣam mausalam ca nṛpa ātmaja

original: 1.026.018a satyam astraṃ mahābāho tathā māyādharaṃ param
analyzed: satyam astram mahā bāho tathā māyā dharam param
ghoram tejaḥprabham nāma para tejaḥ apakarṣaṇam

original: 1.026.019a somāstraṃ śiśiraṃ nāma tvāṣṭram astraṃ sudāmanam
analyzed: soma astram śiśiram nāma tvāṣṭram astram sudāmanam

original: 1.026.019c dāruṇaṃ ca bhagasyāpi śīteṣum atha mānavam
analyzed: dāruṇam ca bhagasya api śīteṣum atha mānavam
etān nāma mahā bāho kāmarūpān mahā balān
gṛhāṇa parama udārān kṣipram eva nṛpa ātmaja

original: 1.026.021a sthitas tu prāṅmukho bhūtvā śucir nivaratas tadā
analyzed: sthitaḥ tu prāc mukhaḥ bhūtvā śuciḥ nivarataḥ tadā
dadau rāmāya su prītaḥ mantra grāmam anuttamam

original: 1.026.022a japatas tu munes tasya viśvāmitrasya dhīmataḥ
analyzed: japataḥ tu muneḥ tasya viśvāmitrasya dhīmataḥ
upatasthuḥ mahārhāṇi sarvāṇi astrāṇi rāghavam

original: 1.026.023a ūcuś ca muditā rāmaṃ sarve prāñjalayas tadā
analyzed: ūcuḥ ca muditāḥ rāmam sarve prāñjalayaḥ tadā

original: 1.026.023c ime sma paramodāra kiṃkarās tava rāghava
analyzed: ime sma parama udāra kiṃkarāḥ tava rāghava

original: 1.026.024a pratigṛhya ca kākutsthaḥ samālabhya ca pāṇinā
analyzed: pratigṛhya ca kākutsthaḥ samālabhya ca pāṇinā

original: 1.026.024c manasā me bhaviṣyadhvam iti tāny abhyacodayat
analyzed: manasā me bhaviṣyadhvam iti tāni abhyacodayat
tatas prīta manāḥ rāmaḥ viśvāmitram mahā munim
abhivādya mahā tejāḥ gamanāya upacakrame
pratigṛhya tatas astrāṇi prahṛṣṭa vadanaḥ śuciḥ

original: 1.027.001c gacchann eva ca kākutstho viśvāmitram athābravīt
analyzed: gacchan eva ca kākutsthaḥ viśvāmitram atha abravīt
gṛhīta astraḥ asmi bhagavan durādharṣaḥ suraiḥ api

original: 1.027.002c astrāṇāṃ tv aham icchāmi saṃhāraṃ munipuṃgava
analyzed: astrāṇām tu aham icchāmi saṃhāram muni puṃgava
evam bruvati kākutsthe viśvāmitraḥ mahā muniḥ
saṃhāram vyājahāra atha dhṛtimān suvrataḥ śuciḥ

original: 1.027.004a satyavantaṃ satyakīrtiṃ dhṛṣṭaṃ rabhasam eva ca
analyzed: satyavantam satyakīrtim dhṛṣṭam rabhasam eva ca
pratihāra taram nāma parāṅmukham avāṅmukham
lakṣākṣa viṣamau ca eva dṛḍhanābha sunābhakau
daśākṣa śatavaktrau ca daśaśīrṣa śatodarau
padmanābha mahānābhau dundunābha sunābhakau

original: 1.027.006c jyotiṣaṃ kṛśanaṃ caiva nairāśya vimalāv ubhau
analyzed: jyotiṣam kṛśanam ca eva nairāśya vimalau ubhau
yaugandhara haridrau ca daitya pramathanau tathā
pitryam saumanasam ca eva vidhūta makarau ubhau
karavīrakaram ca eva dhana dhānyau ca rāghava
kāmarūpam kāma rucim moham āvaraṇam tathā
jṛmbhakam sarvanābham ca santāna varaṇau tathā
bhṛśāśva tanayān rāma bhāsvarān kāmarūpiṇaḥ

original: 1.027.010a pratīccha mama bhadraṃ te pātrabhūto 'si rāghava
analyzed: pratīccha mama bhadram te pātra bhūtaḥ asi rāghava
divya bhāsvara dehāḥ ca mūrtimantaḥ sukha pradāḥ
rāmam prāñjalayaḥ bhūtvā abruvan madhura bhāṣiṇaḥ

original: 1.027.011c ime sma naraśārdūla śādhi kiṃ karavāma te
analyzed: ime sma nara śārdūla śādhi kim karavāma te

original: 1.027.012a gamyatām iti tān āha yatheṣṭaṃ raghunandanaḥ
analyzed: gamyatām iti tān āha yatheṣṭam raghunandanaḥ
mānasāḥ kārya kāleṣu sāhāyyam me kariṣyatha

original: 1.027.013a atha te rāmam āmantrya kṛtvā cāpi pradakṣiṇam
analyzed: atha te rāmam āmantrya kṛtvā ca api pradakṣiṇam

original: 1.027.013c evam astv iti kākutstham uktvā jagmur yathāgatam
analyzed: evam astu iti kākutstham uktvā jagmuḥ yathāgatam

original: 1.027.014a sa ca tān rāghavo jñātvā viśvāmitraṃ mahāmunim
analyzed: sa ca tān rāghavaḥ jñātvā viśvāmitram mahā munim

original: 1.027.014c gacchann evātha madhuraṃ ślakṣṇaṃ vacanam abravīt
analyzed: gacchan eva atha madhuram ślakṣṇam vacanam abravīt
kim nu etat megha saṃkāśam parvatasya avidūrataḥ

original: 1.027.015c vṛkṣaṣaṇḍam ito bhāti paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
analyzed: vṛkṣa ṣaṇḍam itas bhāti param kautūhalam hi me
darśanīyam mṛga ākīrṇam manoharam atīva ca
nānā prakāraiḥ śakunaiḥ valgu bhāṣaiḥ alaṃkṛtam
niḥsṛtāḥ sma muni śreṣṭha kāntārāt romaharṣaṇāt
anayā tu avagacchāmi deśasya sukhavat tayā

original: 1.027.018a sarvaṃ me śaṃsa bhagavan kasyāśramapadaṃ tv idam
analyzed: sarvam me śaṃsa bhagavan kasya āśrama padam tu idam

original: 1.027.018c saṃprāptā yatra te pāpā brahmaghnā duṣṭacāriṇaḥ
analyzed: saṃprāptāḥ yatra te pāpāḥ brahma ghnāḥ duṣṭa cāriṇaḥ
atha tasya aprameyasya tat vanam paripṛcchataḥ
viśvāmitraḥ mahā tejāḥ vyākhyātum upacakrame
eṣa pūrva āśramaḥ rāma vāmanasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 1.028.002c siddhāśrama iti khyātaḥ siddho hy atra mahātapāḥ
analyzed: siddhāśramaḥ iti khyātaḥ siddhaḥ hi atra mahā tapāḥ

original: 1.028.003a etasminn eva kāle tu rājā vairocanir baliḥ
analyzed: etasmin eva kāle tu rājā vairocaniḥ baliḥ
nirjitya daivata gaṇān sa indrān ca sa marut gaṇān

original: 1.028.003e kārayām āsa tad rājyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ
analyzed: kārayām āsa tat rājyam triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ
baleḥ tu yajamānasya devāḥ sa agni purogamāḥ

original: 1.028.004c samāgamya svayaṃ caiva viṣṇum ūcur ihāśrame
analyzed: samāgamya svayam ca eva viṣṇum ūcuḥ iha āśrame

original: 1.028.005a balir vairocanir viṣṇo yajate yajñam uttamam
analyzed: baliḥ vairocaniḥ viṣṇo yajate yajñam uttamam
a samāpte kratau tasmin sva kāryam abhipadyatām

original: 1.028.006a ye cainam abhivartante yācitāra itas tataḥ
analyzed: ye ca enam abhivartante yācitāraḥ itas tatas

original: 1.028.006c yac ca yatra yathāvac ca sarvaṃ tebhyaḥ prayacchati
analyzed: yat ca yatra yathāvat ca sarvam tebhyaḥ prayacchati
sa tvam sura hita arthāya māyā yogam upāśritaḥ

original: 1.028.007c vāmanatvaṃ gato viṣṇo kuru kalyāṇam uttamam
analyzed: vāmana tvam gataḥ viṣṇo kuru kalyāṇam uttamam

original: 1.028.008a ayaṃ siddhāśramo nāma prasādāt te bhaviṣyati
analyzed: ayam siddhāśramaḥ nāma prasādāt te bhaviṣyati

original: 1.028.008c siddhe karmaṇi deveśa uttiṣṭha bhagavann itaḥ
analyzed: siddhe karmaṇi deveśaḥ uttiṣṭha bhagavan itas
atha viṣṇuḥ mahā tejāḥ adityām samajāyata
vāmanam rūpam āsthāya vairocanim upāgamat

original: 1.028.010a trīn kramān atha bhikṣitvā pratigṛhya ca mānataḥ
analyzed: trīn kramān atha bhikṣitvā pratigṛhya ca mānataḥ
ākramya lokān loka ātmā sarva bhūta hite rataḥ

original: 1.028.011a mahendrāya punaḥ prādān niyamya balim ojasā
analyzed: mahā indrāya punar prādāt niyamya balim ojasā

original: 1.028.011c trailokyaṃ sa mahātejāś cakre śakravaśaṃ punaḥ
analyzed: trailokyam sa mahā tejāḥ cakre śakra vaśam punar
tena eṣa pūrvam ākrāntaḥ āśramaḥ śrama nāśanaḥ
mayā api bhaktyā tasya eṣa vāmanasya upabhujyate
etam āśramam āyānti rākṣasāḥ vighna kāriṇaḥ
atra te puruṣa vyāghra hantavyāḥ duṣṭa cāriṇaḥ
adya gacchāmahe rāma siddhāśramam anuttamam

original: 1.028.014c tad āśramapadaṃ tāta tavāpy etad yathā mama
analyzed: tat āśrama padam tāta tava api etat yathā mama
tam dṛṣṭvā munayaḥ sarve siddhāśrama nivāsinaḥ
utpatya utpatya sahasā viśvāmitram apūjayan
yathārham cakrire pūjām viśvāmitrāya dhīmate
tathā eva rāja putrābhyām akurvan atithi kriyām
muhūrtam atha viśrāntau rāja putrau ariṃdamau
prāñjalī muni śārdūlam ūcatuḥ raghunandanau

original: 1.028.018a adyaiva dīkṣāṃ praviśa bhadraṃ te munipuṃgava
analyzed: adyā eva dīkṣām praviśa bhadram te muni puṃgava

original: 1.028.018c siddhāśramo 'yaṃ siddhaḥ syāt satyam astu vacas tava
analyzed: siddhāśramaḥ ayam siddhaḥ syāt satyam astu vacaḥ tava
evam uktaḥ mahā tejāḥ viśvāmitraḥ mahā muniḥ
praviveśa tadā dīkṣām niyataḥ niyata indriyaḥ

original: 1.028.020a kumārāv api tāṃ rātrim uṣitvā susamāhitau
analyzed: kumārau api tām rātrim uṣitvā su samāhitau
prabhāta kāle ca utthāya viśvāmitram avandatām
atha tau deśa kāla jñau rāja putrau ariṃdamau

original: 1.029.001c deśe kāle ca vākyajñāv abrūtāṃ kauśikaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: deśe kāle ca vākya jñau abrūtām kauśikam vacaḥ

original: 1.029.002a bhagavañ śrotum icchāvo yasmin kāle niśācarau
analyzed: bhagavan śrotum icchāvaḥ yasmin kāle niśācarau
saṃrakṣaṇīyau tau brahman na ativarteta tad kṣaṇam
evam bruvāṇau kākutsthau tvaramāṇau yuyutsayā

original: 1.029.003c sarve te munayaḥ prītāḥ praśaśaṃsur nṛpātmajau
analyzed: sarve te munayaḥ prītāḥ praśaśaṃsuḥ nṛpa ātmajau

original: 1.029.004a adya prabhṛti ṣaḍrātraṃ rakṣataṃ rāghavau yuvām
analyzed: adya prabhṛti ṣaṣ rātram rakṣatam rāghavau yuvām

original: 1.029.004c dīkṣāṃ gato hy eṣa munir maunitvaṃ ca gamiṣyati
analyzed: dīkṣām gataḥ hi eṣa muniḥ mauni tvam ca gamiṣyati

original: 1.029.005a tau tu tad vacanaṃ śrutvā rājaputrau yaśasvinau
analyzed: tau tu tat vacanam śrutvā rāja putrau yaśasvinau
anidrau ṣaṣ ahorātram tapovanam arakṣatām
upāsām cakratuḥ vīrau yat tau parama dhanvinau
rarakṣatuḥ muni varam viśvāmitram ariṃdamau

original: 1.029.007a atha kāle gate tasmin ṣaṣṭhe 'hani samāgate
analyzed: atha kāle gate tasmin ṣaṣṭhe ahani samāgate

original: 1.029.007c saumitram abravīd rāmo yatto bhava samāhitaḥ
analyzed: saumitram abravīt rāmaḥ yattaḥ bhava samāhitaḥ
rāmasya evam bruvāṇasya tvaritasya yuyutsayā
prajajvāla tatas vediḥ sa upādhyāya purohitā
mantravat ca yathānyāyam yajñaḥ asau saṃpravartate

original: 1.029.009c ākāśe ca mahāñ śabdaḥ prādur āsīd bhayānakaḥ
analyzed: ākāśe ca mahān śabdaḥ prādur āsīt bhayānakaḥ

original: 1.029.010a āvārya gaganaṃ megho yathā prāvṛṣi nirgataḥ
analyzed: āvārya gaganam meghaḥ yathā prāvṛṣi nirgataḥ
tathā māyām vikurvāṇau rākṣasau abhyadhāvatām

original: 1.029.011a mārīcaś ca subāhuś ca tayor anucarās tathā
analyzed: mārīcaḥ ca subāhuḥ ca tayoḥ anucarāḥ tathā
āgamya bhīma saṃkāśāḥ rudhira oghān avāsṛjan
tau āpatantau sahasā dṛṣṭvā rājīva locanaḥ

original: 1.029.012c lakṣmaṇaṃ tv abhisaṃprekṣya rāmo vacanam abravīt
analyzed: lakṣmaṇam tu abhisaṃprekṣya rāmaḥ vacanam abravīt
paśya lakṣmaṇa durvṛttān rākṣasān piśita aśanān
mānava astra samādhūtān anilena yathā ghanān
mānavam parama udāram astram parama bhāsvaram
cikṣepa parama kruddhaḥ mārīcoḥ asi rāghavaḥ
sa tena parama astreṇa mānavena samāhitaḥ
saṃpūrṇam yojana śatam kṣiptaḥ sāgara saṃplave
vicetanam vighūrṇantam śīteṣu bala pīḍitam

original: 1.029.016c nirastaṃ dṛśya mārīcaṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
analyzed: nirastam dṛśya mārīcam rāmaḥ lakṣmaṇam abravīt
paśya lakṣmaṇa śīteṣum mānavam dharma saṃhitam

original: 1.029.017c mohayitvā nayaty enaṃ na ca prāṇair viyujyate
analyzed: mohayitvā nayati enam na ca prāṇaiḥ viyujyate
imān api vadhiṣyāmi nirghṛṇān duṣṭa cāriṇaḥ
rākṣasān pāpa karma sthān yajña ghnān rudhira aśanān
vigṛhya su mahat ca astram āgneyam raghunandanaḥ

original: 1.029.019c subāhur asi cikṣepa sa viddhaḥ prāpatad bhuvi
analyzed: su bāhuḥ asi cikṣepa sa viddhaḥ prāpatat bhuvi
śeṣān vāyavyam ādāya nijaghāna mahā yaśāḥ
rāghavaḥ parama udāraḥ munīnām mudam āvahan

original: 1.029.021a sa hatvā rākṣasān sarvān yajñaghnān raghunandanaḥ
analyzed: sa hatvā rākṣasān sarvān yajña ghnān raghunandanaḥ

original: 1.029.021c ṛṣibhiḥ pūjitas tatra yathendro vijaye purā
analyzed: ṛṣibhiḥ pūjitaḥ tatra yathā indraḥ vijaye purā

original: 1.029.022a atha yajñe samāpte tu viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ
analyzed: atha yajñe samāpte tu viśvāmitraḥ mahā muniḥ

original: 1.029.022c nirītikā diśo dṛṣṭvā kākutstham idam abravīt
analyzed: nirītikāḥ diśaḥ dṛṣṭvā kākutstham idam abravīt
kṛtārthaḥ asmi mahā bāho kṛtam guru vacaḥ tvayā

original: 1.029.023c siddhāśramam idaṃ satyaṃ kṛtaṃ rāma mahāyaśaḥ
analyzed: siddhāśramam idam satyam kṛtam rāma mahā yaśaḥ

original: 1.030.001a atha tāṃ rajanīṃ tatra kṛtārthau rāmalakṣaṇau
analyzed: atha tām rajanīm tatra kṛtārthau rāma lakṣaṇau
ūṣatuḥ muditau vīrau prahṛṣṭena antarātmanā
prabhātāyām tu śarvaryām kṛta paurvāhṇika kriyau
viśvāmitram ṛṣīn ca anyān sahitau abhijagmatuḥ
abhivādya muni śreṣṭham jvalantam iva pāvakam
ūcatuḥ madhura udāram vākyam madhura bhāṣiṇau
imau svaḥ muni śārdūla kiṃkarau samupasthitau

original: 1.030.004c ājñāpaya yatheṣṭaṃ vai śāsanaṃ karavāva kim
analyzed: ājñāpaya yathā iṣṭam vai śāsanam karavāva kim

original: 1.030.005a evam ukte tatas tābhyāṃ sarva eva maharṣayaḥ
analyzed: evam ukte tatas tābhyām sarve eva mahā ṛṣayaḥ
viśvāmitram puraskṛtya rāmam vacanam abruvan
maithilasya nara śreṣṭha janakasya bhaviṣyati
yajñaḥ parama dharmiṣṭhaḥ tatra yāsyāmahe vayam
tvam ca eva nara śārdūla saha asmābhiḥ gamiṣyasi

original: 1.030.007c adbhutaṃ ca dhanūratnaṃ tatra tvaṃ draṣṭum arhasi
analyzed: adbhutam ca tatra tvam draṣṭum arhasi

original: 1.030.008a tad dhi pūrvaṃ naraśreṣṭha dattaṃ sadasi daivataiḥ
analyzed: tat hi pūrvam nara śreṣṭha dattam sadasi daivataiḥ
aprameya balam ghoram makhe parama bhāsvaram

original: 1.030.009a nāsya devā na gandharvā nāsurā na ca rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: na asya devāḥ na gandharvāḥ na asurāḥ na ca rākṣasāḥ

original: 1.030.009c kartum āropaṇaṃ śaktā na kathaṃ cana mānuṣāḥ
analyzed: kartum āropaṇam śaktāḥ na katham cana mānuṣāḥ

original: 1.030.010a dhanuṣas tasya vīryaṃ hi jijñāsanto mahīkṣitaḥ
analyzed: dhanuṣaḥ tasya vīryam hi jijñāsantaḥ mahīkṣitaḥ
na śekuḥ āropayitum rāja putrāḥ mahā balāḥ
tat dhanuḥ nara śārdūla maithilasya mahātmanaḥ
tatra drakṣyasi kākutstha yajñam ca adbhuta darśanam

original: 1.030.012a tad dhi yajñaphalaṃ tena maithilenottamaṃ dhanuḥ
analyzed: tat hi yajña phalam tena maithilena uttamam dhanuḥ
yācitam nara śārdūla sunābham sarva daivataiḥ

original: 1.030.013a evam uktvā munivaraḥ prasthānam akarot tadā
analyzed: evam uktvā muni varaḥ prasthānam akarot tadā
sa ṛṣi saṃghaḥ sa kākutsthaḥ āmantrya vana devatāḥ

original: 1.030.014a svasti vo 'stu gamiṣyāmi siddhaḥ siddhāśramād aham
analyzed: svasti vaḥ astu gamiṣyāmi siddhaḥ siddhāśramāt aham
uttare jāhnavī tīre himavantam śiloccayam
pradakṣiṇam tatas kṛtvā siddhāśramam anuttamam
uttarām diśam uddiśya prasthātum upacakrame
tam vrajantam muni varam anvagāt anusāriṇām
śakaṭī śata mātram tu prayāṇe brahma vādinām
mṛga pakṣi gaṇāḥ ca eva siddhāśrama nivāsinaḥ
anujagmuḥ mahātmānam viśvāmitram mahā munim

original: 1.030.018a te gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ lambamāne divākare
analyzed: te gatvā dūram adhvānam lambamāne divākare
vāsam cakruḥ muni gaṇāḥ śoṇā kūle samāhitāḥ
te astam gate dinakare snātvā huta hutāśanāḥ
viśvāmitram puraskṛtya niṣeduḥ amita ojasaḥ

original: 1.030.020a rāmo 'pi sahasaumitrir munīṃs tān abhipūjya ca
analyzed: rāmaḥ api sahasaumitriḥ munīn tān abhipūjya ca
agratas niṣasāda atha viśvāmitrasya dhīmataḥ
atha rāmaḥ mahā tejāḥ viśvāmitram mahā munim
papraccha muni śārdūlam kautūhala samanvitaḥ

original: 1.030.022a bhagavan ko nv ayaṃ deśaḥ samṛddhavanaśobhitaḥ
analyzed: bhagavan kaḥ nu ayam deśaḥ samṛddha vana śobhitaḥ

original: 1.030.022c śrotum icchāmi bhadraṃ te vaktum arhasi tattvataḥ
analyzed: śrotum icchāmi bhadram te vaktum arhasi tattvataḥ
coditaḥ rāma vākyena kathayām āsa suvrataḥ
tasya deśasya nikhilam ṛṣi madhye mahā tapāḥ

original: 1.031.001a brahmayonir mahān āsīt kuśo nāma mahātapāḥ
analyzed: brahma yoniḥ mahān āsīt kuśaḥ nāma mahā tapāḥ

original: 1.031.001c vaidarbhyāṃ janayām āsa caturaḥ sadṛśān sutān
analyzed: vaidarbhyām janayām āsa caturaḥ sadṛśān sutān

original: 1.031.002a kuśāmbaṃ kuśanābhaṃ ca ādhūrta rajasaṃ vasum
analyzed: kuśāmbam kuśanābham ca ādhūrta rajasam vasum
dīpti yuktān mahā utsāhān kṣatra dharma cikīrṣayā

original: 1.031.002e tān uvāca kuśaḥ putrān dharmiṣṭhān satyavādinaḥ
analyzed: tān uvāca kuśaḥ putrān dharmiṣṭhān satya vādinaḥ
kuśasya vacanam śrutvā catvāraḥ loka saṃmatāḥ

original: 1.031.003c niveśaṃ cakrire sarve purāṇāṃ nṛvarās tadā
analyzed: niveśam cakrire sarve purāṇām nṛ varāḥ tadā

original: 1.031.004a kuśāmbas tu mahātejāḥ kauśāmbīm akarot purīm
analyzed: kuśāmbaḥ tu mahā tejāḥ kauśāmbīm akarot purīm

original: 1.031.004c kuśanābhas tu dharmātmā paraṃ cakre mahodayam
analyzed: kuśanābhaḥ tu dharma ātmā param cakre mahodayam
ādhūrtarajasaḥ rāma dharmāraṇyam mahīpatiḥ

original: 1.031.005c cakre puravaraṃ rājā vasuś cakre girivrajam
analyzed: cakre puravaram rājā vasuḥ cakre girivrajam

original: 1.031.006a eṣā vasumatī rāma vasos tasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: eṣā vasumatī rāma vasoḥ tasya mahātmanaḥ
ete śaila varāḥ pañca prakāśante samantataḥ
sumāgadhī nadī ramyā māgadhān viśrutā āyayau
pañcānām śaila mukhyānām madhye mālā iva śobhate

original: 1.031.008a saiṣā hi māgadhī rāma vasos tasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: sā eṣā hi māgadhī rāma vasoḥ tasya mahātmanaḥ
pūrva abhicaritā rāma su kṣetrā sasya mālinī
kuśanābhaḥ tu rājarṣiḥ kanyā śatam anuttamam
janayām āsa dharma ātmā ghṛtācyām raghunandana
tāḥ tu yauvana śālinyaḥ rūpavatyaḥ su alaṃkṛtāḥ
udyāna bhūmim āgamya prāvṛṣi iva śatahradāḥ

original: 1.031.011a gāyantyo nṛtyamānāś ca vādayantyaś ca rāghava
analyzed: gāyantyaḥ nṛtyamānāḥ ca vādayantyaḥ ca rāghava
āmodam paramam jagmuḥ vara ābharaṇa bhūṣitāḥ
atha tāḥ cāru sarva aṅgyaḥ rūpeṇa apratimāḥ bhuvi
udyāna bhūmim āgamya tārāḥ iva ghana antare
tāḥ sarva guṇa saṃpannāḥ rūpa yauvana saṃyutāḥ

original: 1.031.013c dṛṣṭvā sarvātmako vāyur idaṃ vacanam abravīt
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā sarva ātmakaḥ vāyuḥ idam vacanam abravīt

original: 1.031.014a ahaṃ vaḥ kāmaye sarvā bhāryā mama bhaviṣyatha
analyzed: aham vaḥ kāmaye sarvāḥ bhāryāḥ mama bhaviṣyatha

original: 1.031.014c mānuṣas tyajyatāṃ bhāvo dīrgham āyur avāpsyatha
analyzed: mānuṣaḥ tyajyatām bhāvaḥ dīrgham āyuḥ avāpsyatha

original: 1.031.015a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā vāyor akliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ
analyzed: tasya tat vacanam śrutvā vāyoḥ akliṣṭa karmaṇaḥ
apahāsya tatas vākyam kanyā śatam atha abravīt

original: 1.031.016a antaś carasi bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ tvaṃ surottama
analyzed: antar carasi bhūtānām sarveṣām tvam sura uttama

original: 1.031.016c prabhāvajñāś ca te sarvāḥ kim asmān avamanyase
analyzed: prabhāva jñāḥ ca te sarvāḥ kim asmān avamanyase
kuśanābha sutāḥ sarvāḥ samarthāḥ tvām sura uttama

original: 1.031.017c sthānāc cyāvayituṃ devaṃ rakṣāmas tu tapo vayam
analyzed: sthānāt cyāvayitum devam rakṣāmaḥ tu tapaḥ vayam

original: 1.031.018a mā bhūt sa kālo durmedhaḥ pitaraṃ satyavādinam
analyzed: mā bhūt sa kālaḥ durmedhaḥ pitaram satya vādinam
na avamanyasva dharmeṇa svayaṃvaram upāsmahe

original: 1.031.019a pitā hi prabhur asmākaṃ daivataṃ paramaṃ hi saḥ
analyzed: pitā hi prabhuḥ asmākam daivatam paramam hi saḥ

original: 1.031.019c yasya no dāsyati pitā sa no bhartā bhaviṣyati
analyzed: yasya naḥ dāsyati pitā sa naḥ bhartā bhaviṣyati

original: 1.031.020a tāsāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā vāyuḥ paramakopanaḥ
analyzed: tāsām tat vacanam śrutvā vāyuḥ parama kopanaḥ
praviśya sarva gātrāṇi babhañja bhagavān prabhuḥ

original: 1.031.021a tāḥ kanyā vāyunā bhagnā viviśur nṛpater gṛham
analyzed: tāḥ kanyāḥ vāyunā bhagnāḥ viviśuḥ nṛpateḥ gṛham

original: 1.031.021c dṛṣṭvā bhagnās tadā rājā saṃbhrānta idam abravīt
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā bhagnāḥ tadā rājā saṃbhrāntaḥ idam abravīt

original: 1.031.022a kim idaṃ kathyatāṃ putryaḥ ko dharmam avamanyate
analyzed: kim idam kathyatām putryaḥ kaḥ dharmam avamanyate

original: 1.031.022c kubjāḥ kena kṛtāḥ sarvā veṣṭantyo nābhibhāṣatha
analyzed: kubjāḥ kena kṛtāḥ sarvāḥ veṣṭantyaḥ na abhibhāṣatha

original: 1.032.001a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā kuśanābhasya dhīmataḥ
analyzed: tasya tat vacanam śrutvā kuśanābhasya dhīmataḥ
śirobhiḥ caraṇau spṛṣṭvā kanyā śatam abhāṣata
vāyuḥ sarva ātmakaḥ rājan pradharṣayitum icchati

original: 1.032.002c aśubhaṃ mārgam āsthāya na dharmaṃ pratyavekṣate
analyzed: aśubham mārgam āsthāya na dharmam pratyavekṣate

original: 1.032.003a pitṛmatyaḥ sma bhadraṃ te svacchande na vayaṃ sthitāḥ
analyzed: pitṛmatyaḥ sma bhadram te svacchande na vayam sthitāḥ

original: 1.032.003c pitaraṃ no vṛṇīṣva tvaṃ yadi no dāsyate tava
analyzed: pitaram naḥ vṛṇīṣva tvam yadi naḥ dāsyate tava
tena pāpa anubandhena vacanam na pratīcchatā

original: 1.032.004c evaṃ bruvantyaḥ sarvāḥ sma vāyunā nihatā bhṛṣam
analyzed: evam bruvantyaḥ sarvāḥ sma vāyunā nihatāḥ bhṛṣam
tāsām tat vacanam śrutvā rājā parama dhārmikaḥ
pratyuvāca mahā tejāḥ kanyā śatam anuttamam

original: 1.032.006a kṣāntaṃ kṣamāvatāṃ putryaḥ kartavyaṃ sumahat kṛtam
analyzed: kṣāntam kṣamāvatām putryaḥ kartavyam su mahat kṛtam
aikamatyam upāgamya kulam ca avekṣitam mama

original: 1.032.007a alaṃkāro hi nārīṇāṃ kṣamā tu puruṣasya vā
analyzed: alaṃkāraḥ hi nārīṇām kṣamā tu puruṣasya vā

original: 1.032.007c duṣkaraṃ tac ca vaḥ kṣāntaṃ tridaśeṣu viśeṣataḥ
analyzed: duṣkaram tat ca vaḥ kṣāntam tridaśeṣu viśeṣataḥ

original: 1.032.008a yādṛśīr vaḥ kṣamā putryaḥ sarvāsām aviśeṣataḥ
analyzed: yādṛśīḥ vaḥ kṣamā putryaḥ sarvāsām aviśeṣatas

original: 1.032.008c kṣamā dānaṃ kṣamā yajñaḥ kṣamā satyaṃ ca putrikāḥ
analyzed: kṣamā dānam kṣamā yajñaḥ kṣamā satyam ca putrikāḥ

original: 1.032.009a kṣamā yaśaḥ kṣamā dharmaḥ kṣamāyāṃ viṣṭhitaṃ jagat
analyzed: kṣamā yaśaḥ kṣamā dharmaḥ kṣamāyām viṣṭhitam jagat
visṛjya kanyāḥ kākutstha rājā tridaśa vikramaḥ

original: 1.032.010a mantrajño mantrayām āsa pradānaṃ saha mantribhiḥ
analyzed: mantra jñaḥ mantrayām āsa pradānam saha mantribhiḥ
deśe kāle pradānasya sadṛśe pratipādanam

original: 1.032.011a etasminn eva kāle tu cūlī nāma mahāmuniḥ
analyzed: etasmin eva kāle tu cūlī nāma mahā muniḥ
ūrdhvaretāḥ śubha ācāraḥ brāhmam tapaḥ upāgamat

original: 1.032.012a tapyantaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ tatra gandharvī paryupāsate
analyzed: tapyantam tam ṛṣim tatra gandharvī paryupāsate

original: 1.032.012c somadā nāma bhadraṃ te ūrmilā tanayā tadā
analyzed: somadā nāma bhadram te ūrmilā tanayā tadā

original: 1.032.013a sā ca taṃ praṇatā bhūtvā śuśrūṣaṇaparāyaṇā
analyzed: sā ca tam praṇatā bhūtvā śuśrūṣaṇa parāyaṇā

original: 1.032.013c uvāsa kāle dharmiṣṭhā tasyās tuṣṭo 'bhavad guruḥ
analyzed: uvāsa kāle dharmiṣṭhā tasyāḥ tuṣṭaḥ abhavat guruḥ

original: 1.032.014a sa ca tāṃ kālayogena provāca raghunandana
analyzed: sa ca tām kāla yogena provāca raghunandana

original: 1.032.014c parituṣṭo 'smi bhadraṃ te kiṃ karomi tava priyam
analyzed: parituṣṭaḥ asmi bhadram te kim karomi tava priyam
parituṣṭam munim jñātvā gandharvī madhura svaram
uvāca parama prītāḥ vākya jñāḥ vākya kovidam
lakṣmyā samuditaḥ brāhmyā brahma bhūtaḥ mahā tapāḥ

original: 1.032.016c brāhmeṇa tapasā yuktaṃ putram icchāmi dhārmikam
analyzed: brāhmeṇa tapasā yuktam putram icchāmi dhārmikam

original: 1.032.017a apatiś cāsmi bhadraṃ te bhāryā cāsmi na kasya cit
analyzed: apatiḥ ca asmi bhadram te bhāryā ca asmi na kasya cit

original: 1.032.017c brāhmeṇopagatāyāś ca dātum arhasi me sutam
analyzed: brāhmeṇa upagatāyāḥ ca dātum arhasi me sutam

original: 1.032.018a tasyāḥ prasanno brahmarṣir dadau putram anuttamam
analyzed: tasyāḥ prasannaḥ brahmarṣiḥ dadau putram anuttamam

original: 1.032.018c brahmadatta iti khyātaṃ mānasaṃ cūlinaḥ sutam
analyzed: brahmadattaḥ iti khyātam mānasam cūlinaḥ sutam

original: 1.032.019a sa rājā brahmadattas tu purīm adhyavasat tadā
analyzed: sa rājā brahmadattaḥ tu purīm adhyavasat tadā

original: 1.032.019c kāmpilyāṃ parayā lakṣmyā devarājo yathā divam
analyzed: kāmpilyām parayā lakṣmyā devarājaḥ yathā divam

original: 1.032.020a sa buddhiṃ kṛtavān rājā kuśanābhaḥ sudhārmikaḥ
analyzed: sa buddhim kṛtavān rājā kuśanābhaḥ su dhārmikaḥ
brahmadattāya kākutstha dātum kanyā śatam tadā
tam āhūya mahā tejāḥ brahmadattam mahīpatiḥ
dadau kanyā śatam rājā su prītena antarātmanā
yathākramam tatas pāṇim jagrāha raghunandana

original: 1.032.022c brahmadatto mahī pālas tāsāṃ devapatir yathā
analyzed: brahmadattaḥ mahī pālaḥ tāsām devapatiḥ yathā
spṛṣṭa mātre tatas pāṇau vikubjāḥ vigata jvarāḥ

original: 1.032.023c yuktāḥ paramayā lakṣmyā babhuḥ kanyāśataṃ tadā
analyzed: yuktāḥ paramayā lakṣmyā babhuḥ kanyā śatam tadā

original: 1.032.024a sa dṛṣṭvā vāyunā muktāḥ kuśanābho mahīpatiḥ
analyzed: sa dṛṣṭvā vāyunā muktāḥ kuśanābhaḥ mahīpatiḥ

original: 1.032.024c babhūva paramaprīto harṣaṃ lebhe punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: babhūva parama prītaḥ harṣam lebhe punar punar
kṛta udvāham tu rājānam brahmadattam mahīpatiḥ

original: 1.032.025c sadāraṃ preṣayām āsa sopādhyāya gaṇaṃ tadā
analyzed: sa dāram preṣayām āsa sa upādhyāya gaṇam tadā
somadā api su saṃhṛṣṭā putrasya sadṛśīm kriyām

original: 1.032.026c yathānyāyaṃ ca gandharvī snuṣās tāḥ pratyanandata
analyzed: yathānyāyam ca gandharvī snuṣāḥ tāḥ pratyanandata

original: 1.033.001a kṛtodvāhe gate tasmin brahmadatte ca rāghava
analyzed: kṛta udvāhe gate tasmin brahmadatte ca rāghava
aputraḥ putra lābhāya pautrīm iṣṭim akalpayat
iṣṭyām tu vartamānāyām kuśanābham mahīpatim
uvāca parama prītaḥ kuśaḥ brahma sutaḥ tadā

original: 1.033.003a putras te sadṛśaḥ putra bhaviṣyati sudhārmikaḥ
analyzed: putraḥ te sadṛśaḥ putra bhaviṣyati su dhārmikaḥ

original: 1.033.003c gādhiṃ prāpsyasi tena tvaṃ kīrtiṃ loke ca śāśvatīm
analyzed: gādhim prāpsyasi tena tvam kīrtim loke ca śāśvatīm

original: 1.033.004a evam uktvā kuśo rāma kuśanābhaṃ mahīpatim
analyzed: evam uktvā kuśaḥ rāma kuśanābham mahīpatim
jagāma ākāśam āviśya brahma lokam sanātanam

original: 1.033.005a kasya cit tv atha kālasya kuśanābhasya dhīmataḥ
analyzed: kasya cit tu atha kālasya kuśanābhasya dhīmataḥ

original: 1.033.005c jajñe paramadharmiṣṭho gādhir ity eva nāmataḥ
analyzed: jajñe parama dharmiṣṭhaḥ gādhiḥ iti eva nāmataḥ

original: 1.033.006a sa pitā mama kākutstha gādhiḥ paramadhārmikaḥ
analyzed: sa pitā mama kākutstha gādhiḥ parama dhārmikaḥ
kuśa vaṃśa prasūtaḥ asmi kauśikaḥ raghunandana

original: 1.033.007a pūrvajā bhaginī cāpi mama rāghava suvratā
analyzed: pūrvajā bhaginī ca api mama rāghava suvratā
nāmnā satyavatī nāma ṛcīke pratipāditā
sa śarīrā gatā svargam bhartāram anuvartinī
kauśikī paramā udārā sā pravṛttā mahā nadī
divyā puṇya udakā ramyā himavantam upāśritā
lokasya hita kāma artham pravṛttā bhaginī mama
tatas aham himavat pārśve vasāmi niyataḥ sukham
bhaginyāḥ sneha saṃyuktaḥ kauśikyāḥ raghunandana

original: 1.033.011a sā tu satyavatī puṇyā satye dharme pratiṣṭhitā
analyzed: sā tu satyavatī puṇyā satye dharme pratiṣṭhitā
pativratā mahābhāgā kauśikī saritām varā

original: 1.033.012a ahaṃ hi niyamād rāma hitvā tāṃ samupāgataḥ
analyzed: aham hi niyamāt rāma hitvā tām samupāgataḥ
siddhāśramam anuprāpya siddhaḥ asmi tava tejasā

original: 1.033.013a eṣā rāma mamotpattiḥ svasya vaṃśasya kīrtitā
analyzed: eṣā rāma mama utpattiḥ svasya vaṃśasya kīrtitā

original: 1.033.013c deśasya ca mahābāho yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
analyzed: deśasya ca mahā bāho yat mām tvam paripṛcchasi
gataḥ ardharātraḥ kākutstha kathāḥ kathayataḥ mama

original: 1.033.014c nidrām abhyehi bhadraṃ te mā bhūd vighno 'dhvanīha naḥ
analyzed: nidrām abhyehi bhadram te mā bhūt vighnaḥ adhvani iha naḥ
niṣpandāḥ taravaḥ sarve nilīnāḥ mṛga pakṣiṇaḥ

original: 1.033.015c naiśena tamasā vyāptā diśaś ca raghunandana
analyzed: naiśena tamasā vyāptāḥ diśaḥ ca raghunandana

original: 1.033.016a śanair viyujyate saṃdhyā nabho netrair ivāvṛtam
analyzed: śanais viyujyate saṃdhyā nabhaḥ netraiḥ iva āvṛtam
nakṣatra tārā gahanam jyotirbhiḥ avabhāsate
uttiṣṭhati ca śītāṃśuḥ śaśī loka tamonudaḥ

original: 1.033.017c hlādayan prāṇināṃ loke manāṃsi prabhayā vibho
analyzed: hlādayan prāṇinām loke manāṃsi prabhayā vibho
naiśāni sarva bhūtāni pracaranti tatas tatas
yakṣa rākṣasa saṃghāḥ ca raudrāḥ ca piśita aśanāḥ
evam uktvā mahā tejāḥ virarāma mahā muniḥ

original: 1.033.019c sādhu sādhv iti taṃ sarve munayo hy abhyapūjayan
analyzed: sādhu sādhu iti tam sarve munayaḥ hi abhyapūjayan

original: 1.033.020a rāmo 'pi saha saumitriḥ kiṃ cid āgatavismayaḥ
analyzed: rāmaḥ api saha saumitriḥ kim cit āgata vismayaḥ
praśasya muni śārdūlam nidrām samupasevate
upāsya rātri śeṣam tu śoṇā kūle mahā ṛṣibhiḥ
niśāyām su prabhātāyām viśvāmitraḥ abhyabhāṣata

original: 1.034.002a suprabhātā niśā rāma pūrvā saṃdhyā pravartate
analyzed: su prabhātā niśā rāma pūrvā saṃdhyā pravartate
uttiṣṭha uttiṣṭha bhadram te gamanāya abhirocaya

original: 1.034.003a tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya kṛtvā paurvāhṇikīṃ kriyām
analyzed: tat śrutvā vacanam tasya kṛtvā paurvāhṇikīm kriyām

original: 1.034.003c gamanaṃ rocayām āsa vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha
analyzed: gamanam rocayām āsa vākyam ca idam uvāca ha
ayam śoṇaḥ śubha jalaḥ gādhaḥ pulina maṇḍitaḥ
katareṇa pathā brahman saṃtariṣyāmahe vayam

original: 1.034.005a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa viśvāmitro 'bravīd idam
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu rāmeṇa viśvāmitraḥ abravīt idam

original: 1.034.005c eṣa panthā mayoddiṣṭo yena yānti maharṣayaḥ
analyzed: eṣa panthāḥ mayā uddiṣṭaḥ yena yānti mahā ṛṣayaḥ

original: 1.034.006a te gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ gate 'rdhadivase tadā
analyzed: te gatvā dūram adhvānam gate ardhadivase tadā
jāhnavīm saritām śreṣṭhām dadṛśuḥ muni sevitām
tām dṛṣṭvā puṇya salilām haṃsa sārasa sevitām
babhūvuḥ muditāḥ sarve munayaḥ saha rāghavāḥ

original: 1.034.007e tasyās tīre tataś cakrus te āvāsaparigraham
analyzed: tasyāḥ tīre tatas cakruḥ te āvāsa parigraham
tatas snātvā yathānyāyam saṃtarpya pitṛ devatāḥ
hutvā ca eva agnihotrāṇi prāśya ca amṛta vat haviḥ
viviśuḥ jāhnavī tīre śucau mudita mānasāḥ
viśvāmitram mahātmānam parivārya samantataḥ
saṃprahṛṣṭa manāḥ rāmaḥ viśvāmitram atha abravīt

original: 1.034.010c bhagavañ śrotum icchāmi gaṅgāṃ tripathagāṃ nadīm
analyzed: bhagavan śrotum icchāmi gaṅgām tripathagām nadīm
trailokyam katham ākramya gatāḥ nadanadīpatim
coditaḥ rāma vākyena viśvāmitraḥ mahā muniḥ

original: 1.034.011c vṛddhiṃ janma ca gaṅgāyā vaktum evopacakrame
analyzed: vṛddhim janma ca gaṅgāyāḥ vaktum eva upacakrame

original: 1.034.012a śailendro himavān nāma dhātūnām ākaro mahān
analyzed: śaila indraḥ himavān nāma dhātūnām ākaraḥ mahān

original: 1.034.012c tasya kanyā dvayaṃ rāma rūpeṇāpratimaṃ bhuvi
analyzed: tasya kanyāḥ dvayam rāma rūpeṇa apratimam bhuvi

original: 1.034.013a yā meruduhitā rāma tayor mātā sumadhyamā
analyzed: yāḥ meru duhitāḥ rāma tayoḥ mātā sumadhyamā

original: 1.034.013c nāmnā menā manojñā vai patnī himavataḥ priyā
analyzed: nāmnā menā manojñā vai patnī himavataḥ priyā

original: 1.034.014a tasyāṃ gaṅgeyam abhavaj jyeṣṭhā himavataḥ sutā
analyzed: tasyām gaṅgā iyam abhavat jyeṣṭhā himavataḥ sutā

original: 1.034.014c umā nāma dvitīyābhūt kanyā tasyaiva rāghava
analyzed: umā nāma dvitīyā abhūt kanyā tasya eva rāghava
atha jyeṣṭhām surāḥ sarve devatā artha cikīrṣayā

original: 1.034.015c śailendraṃ varayām āsur gaṅgāṃ tripathagāṃ nadīm
analyzed: śaila indram varayām āsuḥ gaṅgām tripathagām nadīm
dadau dharmeṇa himavān tanayām loka pāvanīm
svacchanda patha gām gaṅgām trailokya hita kāmyayā
pratigṛhya triloka artham triloka hita kāriṇaḥ
gaṅgām ādāya te agacchan kṛtārthena antarātmanā
yā ca anyā śailaduhitā kanyā āsīt raghunandana

original: 1.034.018c ugraṃ sā vratam āsthāya tapas tepe tapodhanā
analyzed: ugram sā vratam āsthāya tapaḥ tepe tapodhanā

original: 1.034.019a ugreṇa tapasā yuktāṃ dadau śailavaraḥ sutām
analyzed: ugreṇa tapasā yuktām dadau śailavaraḥ sutām
rudrāya apratirūpāya umām loka namaskṛtām

original: 1.034.020a ete te śaila rājasya sute lokanamaskṛte
analyzed: ete te śaila rājasya sute loka namaskṛte

original: 1.034.020c gaṅgā ca saritāṃ śreṣṭhā umā devī ca rāghava
analyzed: gaṅgā ca saritām śreṣṭhā umā devī ca rāghava

original: 1.034.021a etat te dharmam ākhyātaṃ yathā tripathagā nadī
analyzed: etat te dharmam ākhyātam yathā tripathagā nadī

original: 1.034.021c khaṃ gatā prathamaṃ tāta gatiṃ gatimatāṃ vara
analyzed: kham gatā prathamam tāta gatim gatimatām vara

original: 1.035.001a ukta vākye munau tasminn ubhau rāghavalakṣmaṇau
analyzed: ukta vākye munau tasmin ubhau rāghava lakṣmaṇau
pratinandya kathām vīrau ūcatuḥ muni puṃgavam

original: 1.035.002a dharmayuktam idaṃ brahman kathitaṃ paramaṃ tvayā
analyzed: dharma yuktam idam brahman kathitam paramam tvayā
duhituḥ śailarājasya jyeṣṭhāya vaktum arhasi
vistaram vistara jñaḥ asi divya mānuṣa saṃbhavam

original: 1.035.003c trīn patho hetunā kena pāvayel lokapāvanī
analyzed: trīn pathaḥ hetunā kena pāvayet loka pāvanī
katham gaṅgām tripathagā viśrutā sarit uttamā

original: 1.035.004c triṣu lokeṣu dharmajña karmabhiḥ kaiḥ samanvitā
analyzed: triṣu lokeṣu dharma jña karmabhiḥ kaiḥ samanvitā
tathā bruvati kākutsthe viśvāmitraḥ tapodhanaḥ
nikhilena kathām sarvām ṛṣi madhye nyavedayat
purā rāma kṛta udvāhaḥ śitikaṇṭhaḥ mahā tapāḥ
dṛṣṭvā ca spṛhayā devīm maithunāya upacakrame
śitikaṇṭhasya devasya divyam varṣa śatam gatam

original: 1.035.007c na cāpi tanayo rāma tasyām āsīt paraṃtapa
analyzed: na ca api tanayaḥ rāma tasyām āsīt paraṃtapa
tatas devāḥ samudvignāḥ pitāmaha purogamāḥ

original: 1.035.008c yad ihotpadyate bhūtaṃ kas tat pratisahiṣyate
analyzed: yat iha utpadyate bhūtam kaḥ tat pratisahiṣyate
abhigamya surāḥ sarve praṇipatya idam abruvan
devadeva mahādeva lokasya asya hite rata
surāṇām praṇipātena prasādam kartum arhasi

original: 1.035.010a na lokā dhārayiṣyanti tava tejaḥ surottama
analyzed: na lokāḥ dhārayiṣyanti tava tejaḥ sura uttama

original: 1.035.010c brāhmeṇa tapasā yukto devyā saha tapaś cara
analyzed: brāhmeṇa tapasā yuktaḥ devyā saha tapaḥ cara
trailokya hita kāma artham tejaḥ tejasi dhāraya

original: 1.035.011c rakṣa sarvān imāṃl lokān nālokaṃ kartum arhasi
analyzed: rakṣa sarvān imān lokān na a lokam kartum arhasi
devatānām vacaḥ śrutvā sarva loka maheśvaraḥ

original: 1.035.012c bāḍham ity abravīt sarvān punaś cedam uvāca ha
analyzed: bāḍham iti abravīt sarvān punar ca idam uvāca ha

original: 1.035.013a dhārayiṣyāmy ahaṃ tejas tejasy eva sahomayā
analyzed: dhārayiṣyāmi aham tejaḥ tejasi eva saha umayā
tridaśāḥ pṛthivī ca eva nirvāṇam adhigacchatu

original: 1.035.014a yad idaṃ kṣubhitaṃ sthānān mama tejo hy anuttamam
analyzed: yat idam kṣubhitam sthānāt mama tejaḥ hi anuttamam

original: 1.035.014c dhārayiṣyati kas tan me bruvantu surasattamāḥ
analyzed: dhārayiṣyati kaḥ tat me bruvantu sura sattamāḥ

original: 1.035.015a evam uktās tato devāḥ pratyūcur vṛṣabhadhvajam
analyzed: evam uktāḥ tatas devāḥ pratyūcuḥ vṛṣabhadhvajam

original: 1.035.015c yat tejaḥ kṣubhitaṃ hy etat tad dharā dhārayiṣyati
analyzed: yat tejaḥ kṣubhitam hi etat tat dharā dhārayiṣyati
evam uktaḥ surapatiḥ pramumoca mahī tale
tejasā pṛthivī yena vyāptā sa giri kānanā

original: 1.035.017a tato devāḥ punar idam ūcuś cātha hutāśanam
analyzed: tatas devāḥ punar idam ūcuḥ ca atha hutāśanam
praviśa tvam mahā tejaḥ raudram vāyu samanvitaḥ

original: 1.035.018a tad agninā punar vyāptaṃ saṃjātaḥ śvetaparvataḥ
analyzed: tat agninā punar vyāptam saṃjātaḥ śvetaparvataḥ
divyam śaravaṇam ca eva pāvaka āditya saṃnibham
yatra jātaḥ mahā tejāḥ kārtikeyaḥ agni saṃbhavaḥ

original: 1.035.019a athomāṃ ca śivaṃ caiva devāḥ sarṣi gaṇās tadā
analyzed: atha umām ca śivam ca eva devāḥ gaṇāḥ tadā
pūjayām āsuḥ atyartham su prīta manasaḥ tatas

original: 1.035.020a atha śaila sutā rāma tridaśān idam abravīt
analyzed: atha śaila sutā rāma tridaśān idam abravīt
samanyuḥ aśapat sarvān krodha saṃrakta locanā
yasmāt nivāritā ca eva saṃgatā putra kāmyayā
apatyam sveṣu dāreṣu na utpādayitum arhatha

original: 1.035.021e adya prabhṛti yuṣmākam aprajāḥ santu patnayaḥ
analyzed: adya prabhṛti yuṣmākam aprajāḥ santu patnayaḥ

original: 1.035.022a evam uktvā surān sarvāñ śaśāpa pṛthivīm api
analyzed: evam uktvā surān sarvām śaśāpa pṛthivīm api
avane nā ekarūpā tvam bahu bhāryā bhaviṣyasi

original: 1.035.023a na ca putrakṛtāṃ prītiṃ matkrodhakaluṣī kṛtā
analyzed: na ca putra kṛtām prītim mad krodha kaluṣī kṛtā

original: 1.035.023c prāpsyasi tvaṃ sudurmedhe mama putram anicchatī
analyzed: prāpsyasi tvam su durmedhe mama putram an icchatī

original: 1.035.024a tān sarvān vrīḍitān dṛṣṭvā surān surapatis tadā
analyzed: tān sarvān vrīḍitān dṛṣṭvā surān surapatiḥ tadā
gamanāya upacakrāma diśam varuṇa pālitām

original: 1.035.025a sa gatvā tapa ātiṣṭhat pārśve tasyottare gireḥ
analyzed: sa gatvā tapaḥ ātiṣṭhat pārśve tasya uttare gireḥ
himavat prabhave śṛṅge saha devyāḥ maheśvaraḥ

original: 1.035.026a eṣa te vistaro rāma śailaputryā niveditaḥ
analyzed: eṣa te vistaraḥ rāma śailaputryāḥ niveditaḥ
