original: 1.035.026c gaṅgāyāḥ prabhavaṃ caiva śṛṇu me sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: gaṅgāyāḥ prabhavam ca eva śṛṇu me sahalakṣmaṇaḥ

original: 1.036.001a tapyamāne tapo deve devāḥ sarṣigaṇāḥ purā
analyzed: tapyamāne tapaḥ deve devāḥ sa ṛṣi gaṇāḥ purā
senāpatim abhīpsantaḥ pitāmaham upāgaman
tatas abruvan surāḥ sarve bhagavantam pitāmaham
praṇipatya śubham vākyam sa indrāḥ sa agni purogamāḥ

original: 1.036.003a yo naḥ senāpatir deva datto bhagavatā purā
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ senāpatiḥ deva dattaḥ bhagavatā purā

original: 1.036.003c sa tapaḥ param āsthāya tapyate sma sahomayā
analyzed: sa tapaḥ param āsthāya tapyate sma saha umayā
yat atra anantaram kāryam lokānām hita kāmyayā

original: 1.036.004c saṃvidhatsva vidhānajña tvaṃ hi naḥ paramā gatiḥ
analyzed: saṃvidhatsva vidhāna jña tvam hi naḥ paramā gatiḥ
devatānām vacaḥ śrutvā sarva loka pitāmahaḥ

original: 1.036.005c sāntvayan madhurair vākyais tridaśān idam abravīt
analyzed: sāntvayan madhuraiḥ vākyaiḥ tridaśān idam abravīt

original: 1.036.006a śailaputryā yad uktaṃ tan na prajāsyatha patniṣu
analyzed: śailaputryā yat uktam tat na prajā asi atha patniṣu

original: 1.036.006c tasyā vacanam akliṣṭaṃ satyam eva na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: tasyāḥ vacanam akliṣṭam satyam eva na saṃśayaḥ

original: 1.036.007a iyam ākāśagā gaṅgā yasyāṃ putraṃ hutāśanaḥ
analyzed: iyam ākāśa gā gaṅgā yasyām putram hutāśanaḥ
janayiṣyati devānām senāpatim ariṃdamam
jyeṣṭhā śailendra duhitā mānayiṣyati tam sutam

original: 1.036.008c umāyās tad bahumataṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: umāyāḥ tat bahu matam bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ

original: 1.036.009a tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya kṛtārthā raghunandana
analyzed: tat śrutvā vacanam tasya kṛtārthāḥ raghunandana
praṇipatya surāḥ sarve pitāmaham apūjayan

original: 1.036.010a te gatvā parvataṃ rāma kailāsaṃ dhātumaṇḍitam
analyzed: te gatvā parvatam rāma kailāsam dhātu maṇḍitam
agnim putra artham sarva devatāḥ
deva kāryam idam deva samādhatsva hutāśana
śailaputryām mahā tejaḥ gaṅgāyām tejaḥ utsṛja
devatānām pratijñāya gaṅgām abhyetya pāvakaḥ

original: 1.036.012c garbhaṃ dhāraya vai devi devatānām idaṃ priyam
analyzed: garbham dhāraya vai devi devatānām idam priyam

original: 1.036.013a ity etad vacanaṃ śrutvā divyaṃ rūpam adhārayat
analyzed: iti etat vacanam śrutvā divyam rūpam adhārayat

original: 1.036.013c sa tasyā mahimāṃ dṛṣṭvā samantād avakīryata
analyzed: sa tasyāḥ mahimām dṛṣṭvā samantāt avakīryata
samantataḥ tadā devīm abhyaṣiñcata pāvakaḥ
sarva srotāṃsi pūrṇāni gaṅgāyāḥ raghunandana
tam uvāca tatas gaṅgā sarva deva purohitam

original: 1.036.015c aśaktā dhāraṇe deva tava tejaḥ samuddhatam
analyzed: aśaktā dhāraṇe deva tava tejaḥ samuddhatam
dahyamānā agninā tena saṃpravyathita cetanā
atha abravīt idam gaṅgām sarva deva hutāśanaḥ
iha haimavate pāde garbhaḥ ayam saṃniveśyatām

original: 1.036.017a śrutvā tv agnivaco gaṅgā taṃ garbham atibhāsvaram
analyzed: śrutvā tu agni vacaḥ gaṅgā tam garbham ati bhāsvaram
utsasarja mahā tejāḥ srotobhyaḥ hi tadā anagha
yat asyāḥ nirgatam tasmāt tapta jāmbūnada prabham

original: 1.036.018c kāñcanaṃ dharaṇīṃ prāptaṃ hiraṇyam amalaṃ śubham
analyzed: kāñcanam dharaṇīm prāptam hiraṇyam amalam śubham
tāmram kārṣṇāyasam ca eva taikṣṇyāt eva abhijāyata

original: 1.036.019c malaṃ tasyābhavat tatra trapusīsakam eva ca
analyzed: malam tasya abhavat tatra trapu sīsakam eva ca

original: 1.036.020a tad etad dharaṇīṃ prāpya nānādhātur avardhata
analyzed: tat etat dharaṇīm prāpya nānā dhātuḥ avardhata
nikṣipta mātre garbhe tu tejobhiḥ abhirañjitam
sarvam parvata saṃnaddham sauvarṇam abhavat vanam

original: 1.036.022a jātarūpam iti khyātaṃ tadā prabhṛti rāghava
analyzed: jātarūpam iti khyātam tadā prabhṛti rāghava
suvarṇam puruṣa vyāghra hutāśana sama prabham

original: 1.036.023a taṃ kumāraṃ tato jātaṃ sendrāḥ sahamarudgaṇāḥ
analyzed: tam kumāram tatas jātam sa indrāḥ saha marut gaṇāḥ
kṣīra saṃbhāvanā arthāya kṛttikāḥ samayojayan

original: 1.036.024a tāḥ kṣīraṃ jātamātrasya kṛtvā samayam uttamam
analyzed: tāḥ kṣīram jāta mātrasya kṛtvā samayam uttamam

original: 1.036.024c daduḥ putro 'yam asmākaṃ sarvāsām iti niścitāḥ
analyzed: daduḥ putraḥ ayam asmākam sarvāsām iti niścitāḥ

original: 1.036.025a tatas tu devatāḥ sarvāḥ kārtikeya iti bruvan
analyzed: tatas tu devatāḥ sarvāḥ kārtikeyaḥ iti bruvan

original: 1.036.025c putras trailokya vikhyāto bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: putraḥ trailokya vikhyātaḥ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ

original: 1.036.026a teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā skannaṃ garbhaparisrave
analyzed: teṣām tat vacanam śrutvā skannam garbhaparisrave
snāpayan parayā lakṣmyā dīpyamānam iva analam

original: 1.036.027a skanda ity abruvan devāḥ skannaṃ garbhaparisravāt
analyzed: skandaḥ iti abruvan devāḥ skannam garbhaparisravāt
kārtikeyam mahābhāgam kākutstha jvalana upamam
prādurbhūtam tatas kṣīram kṛttikānām anuttamam

original: 1.036.028c ṣaṇṇāṃ ṣaḍānano bhūtvā jagrāha stanajaṃ payaḥ
analyzed: ṣaṇṇām ṣaṣ ānanaḥ bhūtvā jagrāha stana jam payaḥ

original: 1.036.029a gṛhītvā kṣīram ekāhnā sukumāra vapus tadā
analyzed: gṛhītvā kṣīram eka ahnā sukumāra vapuḥ tadā
ajayat svena vīryeṇa daitya sainya gaṇān vibhuḥ
sura senā gaṇapatim tatas tam amala dyutim
abhyaṣiñcan sura gaṇāḥ sametya agni purogamāḥ

original: 1.036.031a eṣa te rāma gaṅgāyā vistaro 'bhihito mayā
analyzed: eṣa te rāma gaṅgāyāḥ vistaraḥ abhihitaḥ mayā

original: 1.036.031c kumārasaṃbhavaś caiva dhanyaḥ puṇyas tathaiva ca
analyzed: kumārasaṃbhavaḥ ca eva dhanyaḥ puṇyaḥ tathā eva ca

original: 1.037.001a tāṃ kathāṃ kauśiko rāme nivedya madhurākṣaram
analyzed: tām kathām kauśikaḥ rāme nivedya madhura akṣaram

original: 1.037.001c punar evāparaṃ vākyaṃ kākutstham idam abravīt
analyzed: punar eva aparam vākyam kākutstham idam abravīt
ayodhyā adhipatiḥ śūraḥ pūrvam āsīt narādhipaḥ

original: 1.037.002c sagaro nāma dharmātmā prajākāmaḥ sa cāprajaḥ
analyzed: sagaraḥ nāma dharma ātmā prajā kāmaḥ sa ca aprajaḥ
vaidarbha duhitā rāma keśinī nāma nāmataḥ
jyeṣṭhā sagara patnī sā dharmiṣṭhā satya vādinī
ariṣṭanemi duhitā rūpeṇa apratimā bhuvi
dvitīyā sagarasya āsīt patnī sumati saṃjñitā

original: 1.037.005a tābhyāṃ saha tadā rājā patnībhyāṃ taptavāṃs tapaḥ
analyzed: tābhyām saha tadā rājā patnībhyām taptavān tapaḥ
himavantam samāsādya bhṛguprasravaṇe girau

original: 1.037.006a atha varṣa śate pūrṇe tapasārādhito muniḥ
analyzed: atha varṣa śate pūrṇe tapasā ārādhitaḥ muniḥ

original: 1.037.006c sagarāya varaṃ prādād bhṛguḥ satyavatāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: sagarāya varam prādāt bhṛguḥ satyavatām varaḥ
apatya lābhaḥ su mahān bhaviṣyati tava anagha
kīrtim ca apratimām loke prāpsyase puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: 1.037.008a ekā janayitā tāta putraṃ vaṃśakaraṃ tava
analyzed: ekā janayitā tāta putram vaṃśa karam tava
ṣaṣṭim putra sahasrāṇi aparā janayiṣyati
bhāṣamāṇam nara vyāghram rāja patnyau prasādya tam
ūcatuḥ parama prīte kṛta añjali puṭe tadā

original: 1.037.010a ekaḥ kasyāḥ suto brahman kā bahūñ janayiṣyati
analyzed: ekaḥ kasyāḥ sutaḥ brahman kā bahūm janayiṣyati

original: 1.037.010c śrotum icchāvahe brahman satyam astu vacas tava
analyzed: śrotum icchāvahe brahman satyam astu vacaḥ tava

original: 1.037.011a tayos tad vacanaṃ śrutvā bhṛguḥ parama dhārmikaḥ
analyzed: tayoḥ tat vacanam śrutvā bhṛguḥ parama dhārmikaḥ
uvāca paramām vāṇīm svacchandaḥ atra vidhīyatām

original: 1.037.012a eko vaṃśakaro vāstu bahavo vā mahābalāḥ
analyzed: ekaḥ vaṃśa karaḥ vā astu bahavaḥ vā mahā balāḥ

original: 1.037.012c kīrtimanto mahotsāhāḥ kā vā kaṃ varam icchati
analyzed: kīrtimantaḥ mahā utsāhāḥ kā vā kam varam icchati

original: 1.037.013a munes tu vacanaṃ śrutvā keśinī raghunandana
analyzed: muneḥ tu vacanam śrutvā keśinī raghunandana
putram vaṃśa karam rāma jagrāha nṛpa saṃnidhau
ṣaṣṭim putra sahasrāṇi suparṇa bhaginī tadā
mahā utsāhān kīrtimataḥ jagrāha sumatiḥ sutān
pradakṣiṇam ṛṣim kṛtvā śirasā abhipraṇamya ca
jagāma sva puram rājā sa bhāryā raghunandana

original: 1.037.016a atha kāle gate tasmiñ jyeṣṭhā putraṃ vyajāyata
analyzed: atha kāle gate tasmin jyeṣṭhā putram vyajāyata
asamañjaḥ iti khyātam keśinī sagara ātmajam
sumatiḥ tu nara vyāghra garbha tumbam vyajāyata
ṣaṣṭiḥ putra sahasrāṇi tumba bhedāt viniḥsṛtāḥ
ghṛta pūrṇeṣu kumbheṣu dhātryaḥ tān samavardhayan
kālena mahatā sarve yauvanam pratipedire
atha dīrgheṇa kālena rūpa yauvana śālinaḥ
ṣaṣṭiḥ putra sahasrāṇi sagarasya abhavan tadā
sa ca jyeṣṭhaḥ nara śreṣṭha sagarasya ātmasaṃbhavaḥ

original: 1.037.020c bālān gṛhītvā tu jale sarayvā raghunandana
analyzed: bālān gṛhītvā tu jale sarayvāḥ raghunandana

original: 1.037.020e prakṣipya prahasan nityaṃ majjatas tān nirīkṣya vai
analyzed: prakṣipya prahasan nityam majjataḥ tān nirīkṣya vai

original: 1.037.021a paurāṇām ahite yuktaḥ pitrā nirvāsitaḥ purāt
analyzed: paurāṇām ahite yuktaḥ pitrā nirvāsitaḥ purāt
tasya putraḥ aṃśumān nāma asamañjasya vīryavān
saṃmataḥ sarva lokasya sarvasya api priyaṃvadaḥ
tatas kālena mahatā matiḥ samabhijāyata
sagarasya nara śreṣṭha yajeyam iti niścitā

original: 1.037.024a sa kṛtvā niścayaṃ rājā sopādhyāyagaṇas tadā
analyzed: sa kṛtvā niścayam rājā sa upādhyāya gaṇaḥ tadā
yajña karmaṇi veda jñaḥ yaṣṭum samupacakrame
viśvāmitra vacaḥ śrutvā kathā ante raghunandana
uvāca parama prītaḥ munim dīptam iva analam

original: 1.038.002a śrotum ichāmi bhadraṃ te vistareṇa kathām imām
analyzed: śrotum ichāmi bhadram te vistareṇa kathām imām

original: 1.038.002c pūrvako me kathaṃ brahman yajñaṃ vai samupāharat
analyzed: pūrvakaḥ me katham brahman yajñam vai samupāharat

original: 1.038.003a viśvāmitras tu kākutstham uvāca prahasann iva
analyzed: viśvāmitraḥ tu kākutstham uvāca prahasan iva
śrūyatām vistaraḥ rāma sagarasya mahātmanaḥ
śaṃkaraśvaśuraḥ nāma himavān acala uttamaḥ
vindhya parvatam āsādya nirīkṣete parasparam

original: 1.038.005a tayor madhye pravṛtto 'bhūd yajñaḥ sa puruṣottama
analyzed: tayoḥ madhye pravṛttaḥ abhūt yajñaḥ sa puruṣa uttama

original: 1.038.005c sa hi deśo naravyāghra praśasto yajñakarmaṇi
analyzed: sa hi deśaḥ nara vyāghra praśastaḥ yajña karmaṇi
tasya aśva caryām kākutstha dṛḍha dhanvā mahā rathaḥ

original: 1.038.006c aṃśumān akarot tāta sagarasya mate sthitaḥ
analyzed: aṃśumān akarot tāta sagarasya mate sthitaḥ

original: 1.038.007a tasya parvaṇi taṃ yajñaṃ yajamānasya vāsavaḥ
analyzed: tasya parvaṇi tam yajñam yajamānasya vāsavaḥ
rākṣasīm tanum āsthāya yajñiya aśvam apāharat

original: 1.038.008a hriyamāṇe tu kākutstha tasminn aśve mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: hriyamāṇe tu kākutstha tasmin aśve mahātmanaḥ
upādhyāya gaṇāḥ sarve yajamānam atha abruvan
ayam parvaṇi vegena yajñiya aśvaḥ apanīyate
hartāram jahi kākutstha hayaḥ ca eva upanīyatām

original: 1.038.010a yajñac chidraṃ bhavaty etat sarveṣām aśivāya naḥ
analyzed: yajña chidram bhavati etat sarveṣām aśivāya naḥ

original: 1.038.010c tat tathā kriyatāṃ rājan yathāchidraḥ kratur bhavet
analyzed: tat tathā kriyatām rājan yathā achidraḥ kratuḥ bhavet

original: 1.038.011a upādhyāya vacaḥ śrutvā tasmin sadasi pārthivaḥ
analyzed: upādhyāya vacaḥ śrutvā tasmin sadasi pārthivaḥ

original: 1.038.011c ṣaṣṭiṃ putrasahasrāṇi vākyam etad uvāca ha
analyzed: ṣaṣṭim putra sahasrāṇi vākyam etat uvāca ha

original: 1.038.012a gatiṃ putrā na paśyāmi rakṣasāṃ puruṣarṣabhāḥ
analyzed: gatim putrāḥ na paśyāmi rakṣasām puruṣa ṛṣabhāḥ
mantra pūtaiḥ mahābhāgaiḥ āsthitaḥ hi mahā kratuḥ

original: 1.038.013a tad gacchata vicinvadhvaṃ putrakā bhadram astu vaḥ
analyzed: tat gacchata vicinvadhvam putrakāḥ bhadram astu vaḥ
samudra mālinīm sarvām pṛthivīm anugacchata
ekaikam yojanam putrāḥ vistāram abhigacchata
yāvat turaga saṃdarśaḥ tāvat khanata medinīm
tam eva haya hartāram mārgamāṇāḥ mama ājñayā
dīkṣitaḥ pautra sahitaḥ sa upādhyāya gaṇaḥ hi aham

original: 1.038.016c iha sthāsyāmi bhadraṃ vo yāvat turagadarśanam
analyzed: iha sthāsyāmi bhadram vaḥ yāvat turaga darśanam
iti uktvā hṛṣṭa manasaḥ rāja putrāḥ mahā balāḥ
jagmuḥ mahī talam rāma pituḥ vacana yantritāḥ
yojanāyām avistāram ekaikaḥ dharaṇī talam
bibhiduḥ puruṣa vyāghra vajra sparśa samaiḥ bhujaiḥ

original: 1.038.019a śūlair aśanikalpaiś ca halaiś cāpi sudāruṇaiḥ
analyzed: śūlaiḥ aśani kalpaiḥ ca halaiḥ ca api su dāruṇaiḥ
bhidyamānā vasumatī nanāda raghunandana
nāgānām vadhyamānānām asurāṇām ca rāghava
rākṣasānām ca durdharṣaḥ sattvānām ninadaḥ abhavat
yojanānām sahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭim tu raghunandana
bibhiduḥ dharaṇīm vīrāḥ rasātalam anuttamam
evam parvata saṃbādham jambūdvīpam nṛpa ātmajāḥ
khanantaḥ nṛpa śārdūla sarvatas paricakramuḥ
tatas devāḥ sa gandharvāḥ sa asurāḥ saha pannagāḥ
saṃbhrānta manasaḥ sarve pitāmaham upāgaman
te prasādya mahātmānam viṣaṇṇa vadanāḥ tadā
ūcuḥ parama saṃtrastāḥ pitāmaham idam vacaḥ
bhagavan pṛthivī sarvā khanyate sagara ātmajaiḥ
bahavaḥ ca mahātmānaḥ vadhyante jalacāriṇaḥ
ayam yajña hanaḥ asmākam anena aśvaḥ apanīyate
iti te sarva bhūtāni nighnanti sagara ātmajaḥ

original: 1.039.001a devatānāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā bhagavān vai pitāmahaḥ
analyzed: devatānām vacaḥ śrutvā bhagavān vai pitāmahaḥ
pratyuvāca su saṃtrastān kṛtānta bala mohitān
yasya iyam vasudhā kṛtsnā vāsudevasya dhīmataḥ

original: 1.039.002c kāpilaṃ rūpam āsthāya dhārayaty aniśaṃ dharām
analyzed: kāpilam rūpam āsthāya dhārayati aniśam dharām

original: 1.039.003a pṛthivyāś cāpi nirbhedo dṛṣṭa eva sanātanaḥ
analyzed: pṛthivyāḥ ca api nirbhedaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ eva sanātanaḥ
sagarasya ca putrāṇām vināśaḥ adīrgha jīvinām
pitāmaha vacaḥ śrutvā trayaḥ triṃśat ariṃdamaḥ
devāḥ parama saṃhṛṣṭāḥ punar jagmuḥ yathāgatam

original: 1.039.005a sagarasya ca putrāṇāṃ prādur āsīn mahātmanām
analyzed: sagarasya ca putrāṇām prādur āsīt mahātmanām
pṛthivyām bhidyamānāyām nirghāta sama niḥsvanaḥ

original: 1.039.006a tato bhittvā mahīṃ sarvāṃ kṛtvā cāpi pradakṣiṇam
analyzed: tatas bhittvā mahīm sarvām kṛtvā ca api pradakṣiṇam

original: 1.039.006c sahitāḥ sagarāḥ sarve pitaraṃ vākyam abruvan
analyzed: sahitāḥ sagarāḥ sarve pitaram vākyam abruvan

original: 1.039.007a parikrāntā mahī sarvā sattvavantaś ca sūditāḥ
analyzed: parikrāntā mahī sarvā sattvavantaḥ ca sūditāḥ
deva dānava rakṣāṃsi piśāca uraga kiṃnarāḥ

original: 1.039.008a na ca paśyāmahe 'śvaṃ tam aśvahartāram eva ca
analyzed: na ca paśyāmahe aśvam tam aśva hartāram eva ca

original: 1.039.008c kiṃ kariṣyāma bhadraṃ te buddhir atra vicāryatām
analyzed: kim kariṣyāma bhadram te buddhiḥ atra vicāryatām

original: 1.039.009a teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā putrāṇāṃ rājasattamaḥ
analyzed: teṣām tat vacanam śrutvā putrāṇām rāja sattamaḥ
sa manyuḥ abravīt vākyam sagaraḥ raghunandana

original: 1.039.010a bhūyaḥ khanata bhadraṃ vo nirbhidya vasudhātalam
analyzed: bhūyas khanata bhadram vaḥ nirbhidya vasudhā talam
aśva hartāram āsādya kṛtārthāḥ ca nivartatha
pituḥ vacanam āsthāya sagarasya mahātmanaḥ
ṣaṣṭiḥ putra sahasrāṇi rasātalam abhidravan
khanyamāne tatas tasmin dadṛśuḥ parvata upamam
diśāgajam virūpākṣam dhārayantam mahī talam
sa parvata vanām kṛtsnām pṛthivīm raghunandana
śirasā dhārayām āsa virūpākṣaḥ mahā gajaḥ
yadā parvaṇi kākutstha viśrama artham mahāgajaḥ

original: 1.039.014c khedāc cālayate śīrṣaṃ bhūmikampas tadhā bhavet
analyzed: khedāt cālayate śīrṣam bhūmikampaḥ tadhā bhavet

original: 1.039.015a taṃ te pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā diśāpālaṃ mahāgajam
analyzed: tam te pradakṣiṇam kṛtvā diśāpālam mahāgajam

original: 1.039.015c mānayanto hi te rāma jagmur bhittvā rasātalam
analyzed: mānayantaḥ hi te rāma jagmuḥ bhittvā rasātalam

original: 1.039.016a tataḥ pūrvāṃ diśaṃ bhittvā dakṣiṇāṃ bibhiduḥ punaḥ
analyzed: tatas pūrvām diśam bhittvā dakṣiṇām bibhiduḥ punar

original: 1.039.016c dakṣiṇasyām api diśi dadṛśus te mahāgajam
analyzed: dakṣiṇasyām api diśi dadṛśuḥ te mahāgajam
mahāpadmam mahātmānam su mahā parvata upamam

original: 1.039.017c śirasā dhārayantaṃ te vismayaṃ jagmur uttamam
analyzed: śirasā dhārayantam te vismayam jagmuḥ uttamam
tatas pradakṣiṇam kṛtvā sagarasya mahātmanaḥ
ṣaṣṭiḥ putra sahasrāṇi paścimām bibhiduḥ diśam
paścimāyām api diśi mahāntam acala upamam
diśāgajam saumanasam dadṛśuḥ te mahā balāḥ

original: 1.039.020a taṃ te pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā pṛṣṭvā cāpi nirāmayam
analyzed: tam te pradakṣiṇam kṛtvā pṛṣṭvā ca api nirāmayam
khanantaḥ samupakrāntāḥ diśam somavatīm tadā
uttarasyām raghu śreṣṭha dadṛśuḥ hima pāṇḍuram

original: 1.039.021c bhadraṃ bhadreṇa vapuṣā dhārayantaṃ mahīm imām
analyzed: bhadram bhadreṇa vapuṣā dhārayantam mahīm imām

original: 1.039.022a samālabhya tataḥ sarve kṛtvā cainaṃ pradakṣiṇam
analyzed: samālabhya tatas sarve kṛtvā ca enam pradakṣiṇam
ṣaṣṭiḥ putra sahasrāṇi bibhiduḥ vasudhā talam

original: 1.039.023a tataḥ prāguttarāṃ gatvā sāgarāḥ prathitāṃ diśam
analyzed: tatas prāguttarām gatvā sāgarāḥ prathitām diśam
roṣāt abhyakhanan sarve pṛthivīm sagara ātmajāḥ
dadṛśuḥ kapilam tatra vāsudevam sanātanam

original: 1.039.024c hayaṃ ca tasya devasya carantam avidūrataḥ
analyzed: hayam ca tasya devasya carantam avidūrataḥ
te tam yajña hanam jñātvā krodha paryākula īkṣaṇāḥ
abhyadhāvanta saṃkruddhāḥ tiṣṭha tiṣṭha iti ca abruvan

original: 1.039.026a asmākaṃ tvaṃ hi turagaṃ yajñiyaṃ hṛtavān asi
analyzed: asmākam tvam hi turagam yajñiyam hṛtavān asi

original: 1.039.026c durmedhas tvaṃ hi saṃprāptān viddhi naḥ sagarātmajān
analyzed: durmedhaḥ tvam hi saṃprāptān viddhi naḥ sagara ātmajān

original: 1.039.027a śrutvā tad vacanaṃ teṣāṃ kapilo raghunandana
analyzed: śrutvā tat vacanam teṣām kapilaḥ raghunandana
roṣeṇa mahatā āviṣṭaḥ huṃkāram akarot tadā
tatas tena aprameyena kapilena mahātmanā
bhasma rāśīkṛtāḥ sarve kākutstha sagara ātmajāḥ
putrān cira gatām jñātvā sagaraḥ raghunandana
naptāram abravīt rājā dīpyamānam sva tejasā

original: 1.040.002a śūraś ca kṛtavidyaś ca pūrvais tulyo 'si tejasā
analyzed: śūraḥ ca kṛta vidyaḥ ca pūrvaiḥ tulyaḥ asi tejasā
pitḥṇām gatim anviccha yena ca aśvaḥ apahāritaḥ
antarbhaumāni sattvāni vīryavanti mahānti ca

original: 1.040.003c teṣāṃ tvaṃ pratighātārthaṃ sāsiṃ gṛhṇīṣva kārmukam
analyzed: teṣām tvam pratighāta artham sa asim gṛhṇīṣva kārmukam
abhivādya abhivādyān tvam hatvā vighna karān api
siddhārthaḥ saṃnivartasva mama yajñasya pāragaḥ
evam uktaḥ aṃśumān samyak sagareṇa mahātmanā

original: 1.040.005c dhanur ādāya khaḍgaṃ ca jagāma laghuvikramaḥ
analyzed: dhanuḥ ādāya khaḍgam ca jagāma laghu vikramaḥ

original: 1.040.006a sa khātaṃ pitṛbhir mārgam antarbhaumaṃ mahātmabhiḥ
analyzed: sa khātam pitṛbhiḥ mārgam antarbhaumam mahātmabhiḥ
prāpadyata nara śreṣṭha tena rājñā abhicoditaḥ
daitya dānava rakṣobhiḥ piśāca pataga uragaiḥ
pūjyamānam mahā tejāḥ diśāgajam apaśyata

original: 1.040.008a sa taṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā pṛṣṭvā caiva nirāmayam
analyzed: sa tam pradakṣiṇam kṛtvā pṛṣṭvā ca eva nirāmayam

original: 1.040.008c pitḥn sa paripapraccha vājihartāram eva ca
analyzed: pitṝn sa paripapraccha vāji hartāram eva ca

original: 1.040.009a diśāgajas tu tac chrutvā prītyāhāṃśumato vacaḥ
analyzed: diśāgajaḥ tu tat śrutvā prītyā āha aṃśumataḥ vacaḥ
āsamañja kṛtārthaḥ tvam saha aśvaḥ śīghram eṣyasi

original: 1.040.010a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā sarvān eva diśāgajān
analyzed: tasya tat vacanam śrutvā sarvān eva diśāgajān
yathākramam yathānyāyam praṣṭum samupacakrame

original: 1.040.011a taiś ca sarvair diśāpālair vākyajñair vākyakovidaiḥ
analyzed: taiḥ ca sarvaiḥ diśāpālaiḥ vākya jñaiḥ vākya kovidaiḥ
pūjitaḥ sa hayaḥ ca eva gantāsi iti abhicoditaḥ

original: 1.040.012a teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā jagāma laghuvikramaḥ
analyzed: teṣām tat vacanam śrutvā jagāma laghu vikramaḥ
bhasma rāśīkṛtāḥ yatra pitaraḥ tasya sāgarāḥ

original: 1.040.013a sa duḥkhavaśam āpannas tv asamañjasutas tadā
analyzed: sa duḥkha vaśam āpannaḥ tu asamañja sutaḥ tadā

original: 1.040.013c cukrośa paramārtas tu vadhāt teṣāṃ suduḥkhitaḥ
analyzed: cukrośa parama ārtaḥ tu vadhāt teṣām su duḥkhitaḥ

original: 1.040.014a yajñiyaṃ ca hayaṃ tatra carantam avidūrataḥ
analyzed: yajñiyam ca hayam tatra carantam avidūrataḥ
dadarśa puruṣa vyāghraḥ duḥkha śoka samanvitaḥ
dadarśa puruṣa vyāghraḥ kartu kāmaḥ jalakriyām
salila arthī mahā tejāḥ na ca apaśyat jalāśayam
visārya nipuṇām dṛṣṭim tatas apaśyat khaga adhipam
pitḥṇām mātulam rāma suparṇam anila upamam

original: 1.040.017a sa cainam abravīd vākyaṃ vainateyo mahābalaḥ
analyzed: sa ca enam abravīt vākyam vainateyaḥ mahā balaḥ
mā śucaḥ puruṣa vyāghra vadhaḥ ayam loka saṃmataḥ
kapilena aprameyena dagdhāḥ hi ime mahā balāḥ

original: 1.040.018c salilaṃ nārhasi prājña dātum eṣāṃ hi laukikam
analyzed: salilam nā arhasi prājña dātum eṣām hi laukikam
gaṅgā himavataḥ jyeṣṭhā duhitā puruṣa ṛṣabha
bhasma rāśīkṛtān etān pāvayet loka pāvanī

original: 1.040.020a tayā klinnam idaṃ bhasma gaṅgayā lokakāntayā
analyzed: tayā klinnam idam bhasma gaṅgayā loka kāntayā
ṣaṣṭim putra sahasrāṇi svarga lokam nayiṣyati
gaccha ca aśvam mahābhāga saṃgṛhya puruṣa ṛṣabha
yajñam paitāmaham vīra nirvartayitum arhasi
suparṇa vacanam śrutvā saḥ aṃśumān ati vīryavān

original: 1.040.022c tvaritaṃ hayam ādāya punar āyān mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: tvaritam hayam ādāya punar āyāt mahā yaśāḥ
tatas rājānam āsādya dīkṣitam raghunandana
nyavedayat yathāvṛttam suparṇa vacanam tathā

original: 1.040.024a tac chrutvā ghorasaṃkāśaṃ vākyam aṃśumato nṛpaḥ
analyzed: tat śrutvā ghora saṃkāśam vākyam aṃśumataḥ nṛpaḥ
yajñam nirvartayām āsa yathākalpam yathāvidhi
sva puram ca agamat śrīmān iṣṭa yajñaḥ mahīpatiḥ
gaṅgāyāḥ ca āgame rājā niścayam na adhyagacchata

original: 1.040.026a agatvā niścayaṃ rājā kālena mahatā mahān
analyzed: a gatvā niścayam rājā kālena mahatā mahān
triṃśat varṣa sahasrāṇi rājyam kṛtvā divam gataḥ
kāladharmam gate rāma sagare prakṛtī janāḥ
rājānam rocayām āsuḥ aṃśumantam su dhārmikam

original: 1.041.002a sa rājā sumahān āsīd aṃśumān raghunandana
analyzed: sa rājā su mahān āsīt aṃśumān raghunandana

original: 1.041.002c tasya putro mahān āsīd dilīpa iti viśrutaḥ
analyzed: tasya putraḥ mahān āsīt dilīpaḥ iti viśrutaḥ
tasmin rājyam samāveśya dilīpe raghunandana
himavat śikhare ramye tapaḥ tepe su dāruṇam
dvādtriṃśat ca sahasrāṇi varṣāṇi su mahā yaśāḥ
tapaḥ vana gataḥ rājā svargam lebhe tapodhanaḥ

original: 1.041.005a dilīpas tu mahātejāḥ śrutvā paitāmahaṃ vadham
analyzed: dilīpaḥ tu mahā tejāḥ śrutvā paitāmaham vadham
duḥkha upahatayā buddhyā niścayam na adhyagacchata
katham gaṅgā avataraṇam katham teṣām jalakriyā

original: 1.041.006c tārayeyaṃ kathaṃ caitān iti cintā paro 'bhavat
analyzed: tārayeyam katham ca etān iti cintā paraḥ abhavat
tasya cintayataḥ nityam dharmeṇa vidita ātmanaḥ
putraḥ bhagīrathaḥ nāma jajñe parama dhārmikaḥ

original: 1.041.008a dilīpas tu mahātejā yajñair bahubhir iṣṭavān
analyzed: dilīpaḥ tu mahā tejāḥ yajñaiḥ bahubhiḥ iṣṭavān
triṃśat varṣa sahasrāṇi rājā rājyam akārayat

original: 1.041.009a agatvā niścayaṃ rājā teṣām uddharaṇaṃ prati
analyzed: a gatvā niścayam rājā teṣām uddharaṇam prati
vyādhinā nara śārdūla kāladharmam upeyivān
indra lokam gataḥ rājā sva arjitena eva karmaṇā
ramye bhagīratham putram abhiṣicya nara ṛṣabhaḥ
bhagīrathaḥ tu rājarṣiḥ dhārmikaḥ raghunandana
anapatyaḥ mahā tejāḥ prajā kāmaḥ sa ca aprajaḥ

original: 1.041.012a sa tapo dīrgham ātiṣṭhad gokarṇe raghunandana
analyzed: sa tapaḥ dīrgham ātiṣṭhat gokarṇe raghunandana
ūrdhvabāhuḥ pañcatapāḥ māsāhāraḥ jita indriyaḥ
tasya varṣa sahasrāṇi ghore tapasi tiṣṭhataḥ

original: 1.041.013c suprīto bhagavān brahmā prajānāṃ patir īśvaraḥ
analyzed: su prītaḥ bhagavān brahmā prajānām patiḥ īśvaraḥ
tatas sura gaṇaiḥ sārdham upāgamya pitāmahaḥ
bhagīratham mahātmānam tapyamānam atha abravīt
bhagīratha mahābhāga prītaḥ te aham janeśvara

original: 1.041.015c tapasā ca sutaptena varaṃ varaya suvrata
analyzed: tapasā ca su taptena varam varaya suvrata
tam uvāca mahā tejāḥ sarva loka pitāmaham
bhagīrathaḥ mahābhāgaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ avasthitaḥ

original: 1.041.017a yṛadi me bhagavān prīto yady asti tapasaḥ phalam
analyzed: me bhagavān prītaḥ yadi asti tapasaḥ phalam
sagarasya ātmajāḥ sarve mattaḥ salilam āpnuyuḥ
gaṅgāyāḥ salila klinne bhasmani eṣām mahātmanām

original: 1.041.018c svargaṃ gaccheyur atyantaṃ sarve me prapitāmahāḥ
analyzed: svargam gaccheyuḥ atyantam sarve me prapitāmahāḥ

original: 1.041.019a deyā ca saṃtator deva nāvasīdet kulaṃ ca naḥ
analyzed: deyā ca saṃtatoḥ deva na avasīdet kulam ca naḥ

original: 1.041.019c ikṣvākūṇāṃ kule deva eṣa me 'stu varaḥ paraḥ
analyzed: ikṣvākūṇām kule devaḥ eṣa me astu varaḥ paraḥ
ukta vākyam tu rājānam sarva loka pitāmahaḥ
pratyuvāca śubhām vāṇīm madhurām madhura akṣarām
manorathaḥ mahān eṣa bhagīratha mahā ratha
evam bhavatu bhadram te ikṣvāku kula vardhana

original: 1.041.022a iyaṃ haimavatī gaṅgā jyeṣṭhā himavataḥ sutā
analyzed: iyam haimavatī gaṅgā jyeṣṭhā himavataḥ sutā

original: 1.041.022c tāṃ vai dhārayituṃ rājan haras tatra niyujyatām
analyzed: tām vai dhārayitum rājan haraḥ tatra niyujyatām

original: 1.041.023a gaṅgāyāḥ patanaṃ rājan pṛthivī na sahiṣyate
analyzed: gaṅgāyāḥ patanam rājan pṛthivī na sahiṣyate

original: 1.041.023c tau vai dhārayituṃ vīra nānyaṃ paśyāmi śūlinaḥ
analyzed: tau vai dhārayitum vīra na anyam paśyāmi śūlinaḥ

original: 1.041.024a tam evam uktvā rājānaṃ gaṅgāṃ cābhāṣya lokakṛt
analyzed: tam evam uktvā rājānam gaṅgām ca ābhāṣya lokakṛt

original: 1.041.024c jagāma tridivaṃ devaḥ saha sarvair marudgaṇaiḥ
analyzed: jagāma tridivam devaḥ saha sarvaiḥ marut gaṇaiḥ
devadeve gate tasmin saḥ aṅguṣṭha agra nipīḍitām
kṛtvā vasumatīm rāma saṃvatsaram upāsata
atha saṃvatsare pūrṇe sarva loka namaskṛtaḥ
umāpatiḥ paśupatiḥ rājānam idam abravīt

original: 1.042.003a prītas te 'haṃ naraśreṣṭha kariṣyāmi tava priyam
analyzed: prītaḥ te aham nara śreṣṭha kariṣyāmi tava priyam
śirasā dhārayiṣyāmi śailarāja sutām aham
tatas haimavatī jyeṣṭhā sarva loka namaskṛtā

original: 1.042.004c tadā sātimahad rūpaṃ kṛtvā vegaṃ ca duḥsaham
analyzed: tadā sā ati mahat rūpam kṛtvā vegam ca duḥsaham

original: 1.042.004e ākāśād apatad rāma śive śivaśirasy uta
analyzed: ākāśāt apatat rāma śive śiva śirasi uta
nā eva sā nirgamam lekhe jaṭā maṇḍala mohitā
devī saṃvatsara gaṇān bahūn
anena toṣitaḥ ca āsīt atyartham raghunandana

original: 1.042.006c visasarja tato gaṅgāṃ haro bindusaraḥ prati
analyzed: visasarja tatas gaṅgām haraḥ bindusaraḥ prati
gaganāt śaṃkara śiraḥ tatas dharaṇim āgatā
vyasarpata jalam tatra tīvra śabda puraskṛtam
tatas deva ṛṣi gandharvāḥ yakṣāḥ siddha gaṇāḥ tathā

original: 1.042.008c vyalokayanta te tatra gaganād gāṃ gatāṃ tadā
analyzed: vyalokayanta te tatra gaganāt gām gatām tadā
vimānaiḥ nagara ākāraiḥ hayaiḥ gaja varaiḥ tathā
pāriplava gatāḥ ca api devatāḥ tatra viṣṭhitāḥ

original: 1.042.010a tad adbhutatamaṃ loke gaṅgā patanam uttamam
analyzed: tat adbhutatamam loke gaṅgā patanam uttamam
didṛkṣavaḥ deva gaṇāḥ sameyuḥ amita ojasaḥ
saṃpatadbhiḥ sura gaṇaiḥ teṣām ca ābharaṇa ojasā
śata ādityam iva ābhāti gaganam gata toyadam
śiṃśumāra uraga gaṇaiḥ mīnaiḥ api ca cañcalaiḥ

original: 1.042.012c vidyudbhir iva vikṣiptair ākāśam abhavat tadā
analyzed: vidyudbhiḥ iva vikṣiptaiḥ ākāśam abhavat tadā
pāṇḍuraiḥ salila utpīḍaiḥ kīryamāṇaiḥ sahasradhā
śārada abhraiḥ iva a krītṇam gaganam haṃsa saṃplavaiḥ

original: 1.042.014a kva cid drutataraṃ yāti kuṭilaṃ kva cid āyatam
analyzed: kva cit drutataram yāti kuṭilam kva cit āyatam

original: 1.042.014c vinataṃ kva cid uddhūtaṃ kva cid yāti śanaiḥ śanaiḥ
analyzed: vinatam kva cit uddhūtam kva cit yāti śanais śanais

original: 1.042.015a salilenaiva salilaṃ kva cid abhyāhataṃ punaḥ
analyzed: salilena eva salilam kva cit abhyāhatam punar

original: 1.042.015c muhur ūrdhvapathaṃ gatvā papāta vasudhāṃ punaḥ
analyzed: muhur ūrdhva patham gatvā papāta vasudhām punar
tat śaṃkara śiraḥ bhraṣṭam bhraṣṭam bhūmi tale punar
vyarocata tadā toyam nirmalam gata kalmaṣam
tatra ṛṣi gaṇa gandharvāḥ vasudhā tala vāsinaḥ
bhava aṅga patitam toyam pavitram iti paspṛśuḥ

original: 1.042.018a śāpāt prapatitā ye ca gaganād vasudhātalam
analyzed: śāpāt prapatitāḥ ye ca gaganāt vasudhā talam
kṛtvā tatra abhiṣekam te babhūvuḥ gata kalmaṣāḥ
dhūpa pāpāḥ punar tena toyena atha su bhāsvatā

original: 1.042.019c punar ākāśam āviśya svāṃl lokān pratipedire
analyzed: punar ākāśam āviśya svān lokān pratipedire

original: 1.042.020a mumude mudito lokas tena toyena bhāsvatā
analyzed: mumude muditaḥ lokaḥ tena toyena bhāsvatā
kṛta abhiṣekaḥ gaṅgāyām babhūva vigata klamaḥ
bhagīrathaḥ api rājarṣiḥ divyam syandanam āsthitaḥ

original: 1.042.021c prāyād agre mahātejās taṃ gaṅgā pṛṣṭhato 'nvagāt
analyzed: prāyāt agre mahā tejāḥ tam gaṅgā pṛṣṭhatas anvagāt
devāḥ sa ṛṣi gaṇāḥ sarve daitya dānava rākṣasāḥ
gandharva yakṣa pravarāḥ sa kiṃnara mahoragāḥ
sarvāḥ ca apsarasaḥ rāma bhagīratha ratha anugāḥ

original: 1.042.023c gaṅgām anvagaman prītāḥ sarve jalacarāś ca ye
analyzed: gaṅgām anvagaman prītāḥ sarve jalacarāḥ ca ye

original: 1.042.024a yato bhagīratho rājā tato gaṅgā yaśasvinī
analyzed: yatas bhagīrathaḥ rājā tatas gaṅgā yaśasvinī
jagāma saritām śreṣṭhā sarva pāpa vināśinī

original: 1.043.001a sa gatvā sāgaraṃ rājā gaṅgayānugatas tadā
analyzed: sa gatvā sāgaram rājā gaṅgayā anugataḥ tadā

original: 1.043.001c praviveśa talaṃ bhūmer yatra te bhasmasātkṛtāḥ
analyzed: praviveśa talam bhūmeḥ yatra te bhasmasātkṛtāḥ

original: 1.043.002a bhasmany athāplute rāma gaṅgāyāḥ salilena vai
analyzed: bhasmani atha āplute rāma gaṅgāyāḥ salilena vai

original: 1.043.002c sarva lokaprabhur brahmā rājānam idam abravīt
analyzed: loka prabhuḥ brahmā rājānam idam abravīt

original: 1.043.003a tāritā naraśārdūla divaṃ yātāś ca devavat
analyzed: tāritāḥ nara śārdūla divam yātāḥ ca deva vat
ṣaṣṭiḥ putra sahasrāṇi sagarasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 1.043.004a sāgarasya jalaṃ loke yāvat sthāsyati pārthiva
analyzed: sāgarasya jalam loke yāvat sthāsyati pārthiva
sagarasya ātmajāḥ tāvat svarge sthāsyanti deva vat

original: 1.043.005a iyaṃ ca duhitā jyeṣṭhā tava gaṅgā bhaviṣyati
analyzed: iyam ca duhitā jyeṣṭhā tava gaṅgā bhaviṣyati

original: 1.043.005c tvatkṛtena ca nāmnā vai loke sthāsyati viśrutā
analyzed: tvad kṛtena ca nāmnā vai loke sthāsyati viśrutā

original: 1.043.006a gaṅgā tripathagā nāma divyā bhāgīrathīti ca
analyzed: gaṅgā tripathagā nāma divyā bhāgīrathī iti ca
tri pathaḥ bhāvayanti iti tatas tripathagā smṛtā
pitāmahānām sarveṣām tvam atra manuja adhipa
kuruṣva salilam rājan pratijñām apavarjaya

original: 1.043.008a pūrvakeṇa hi te rājaṃs tenātiyaśasā tadā
analyzed: pūrvakeṇa hi te rājan tena ati yaśasā tadā
dharmiṇām pravareṇa atha na eṣa prāptaḥ manorathaḥ
tathā eva aṃśumatā tāta loke apratima tejasā
gaṅgām prārthayatā netum pratijñā nā apavarjitā
rājarṣiṇā guṇavatā mahā ṛṣi sama tejasā
mad tulya tapasā ca eva kṣatra dharma sthitena ca
dilīpena mahābhāga tava pitrā ati tejasā

original: 1.043.011c punar na śaṅkitā netuṃ gaṅgāṃ prārthayatānagha
analyzed: punar na śaṅkitā netum gaṅgām prārthayatā anagha
sā tvayā samatikrāntā pratijñā puruṣa ṛṣabha
prāptaḥ asi paramam loke yaśaḥ parama saṃmatam

original: 1.043.013a yac ca gaṅgāvataraṇaṃ tvayā kṛtam ariṃdama
analyzed: yat ca gaṅgā avataraṇam tvayā kṛtam ariṃdama

original: 1.043.013c anena ca bhavān prāpto dharmasyāyatanaṃ mahat
analyzed: anena ca bhavān prāptaḥ dharmasya āyatanam mahat
plāvayasva tvam ātmānam nara uttama sadā ucite
salile puruṣa vyāghra śuciḥ puṇya phalaḥ bhava
pitāmahānām sarveṣām kuruṣva salilakriyām

original: 1.043.015c svasti te 'stu gamiṣyāmi svaṃ lokaṃ gamyatāṃ nṛpa
analyzed: svasti te astu gamiṣyāmi svam lokam gamyatām nṛpa
iti evam uktvā deveśaḥ sarva loka pitāmahaḥ
yathāgatam tathā agacchat deva lokam mahā yaśāḥ
bhagīrathaḥ api rājarṣiḥ kṛtvā salilam uttamam
yathākramam yathānyāyam sāgarāṇām mahā yaśāḥ

original: 1.043.017e kṛtodakaḥ śucī rājā svapuraṃ praviveśa ha
analyzed: kṛta udakaḥ śuciḥ rājā sva puram praviveśa ha
samṛddha arthaḥ nara śreṣṭha sva rājyam praśaśāsa ha

original: 1.043.018c pramumoda ca lokas taṃ nṛpam āsādya rāghava
analyzed: pramumoda ca lokaḥ tam nṛpam āsādya rāghava
naṣṭa śokaḥ samṛddha arthaḥ babhūva vigata jvaraḥ

original: 1.043.019a eṣa te rāma gaṅgāyā vistaro 'bhihito mayā
analyzed: eṣa te rāma gaṅgāyāḥ vistaraḥ abhihitaḥ mayā
svasti prāpnuhi bhadram te saṃdhyā kālaḥ ativartate

original: 1.043.020a dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ svargyaṃ putryam athāpi ca
analyzed: dhanyam yaśasyam āyuṣyam svargyam putryam atha api ca
idam ākhyānam ākhyātam gaṅgā avataraṇam mayā
viśvāmitra vacaḥ śrutvā rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
vismayam paramam gatvā viśvāmitram atha abravīt

original: 1.044.002a atyadbhutam idaṃ brahman kathitaṃ paramaṃ tvayā
analyzed: ati adbhutam idam brahman kathitam paramam tvayā
gaṅgā avataraṇam puṇyam sāgarasya ca pūraṇam

original: 1.044.003a tasya sā śarvarī sarvā saha saumitriṇā tadā
analyzed: tasya sā śarvarī sarvā saha saumitriṇā tadā
jagāma cintayānasya viśvāmitra kathām śubhām
tatas prabhāte vimale viśvāmitram mahā munim
uvāca rāghavaḥ vākyam kṛta āhnikam ariṃdamaḥ

original: 1.044.005a gatā bhagavatī rātriḥ śrotavyaṃ paramaṃ śrutam
analyzed: gatā bhagavatī rātriḥ śrotavyam paramam śrutam
kṣaṇa bhūtā iva sā rātriḥ saṃvṛttā iyam mahā tapaḥ

original: 1.044.005e imāṃ cintayataḥ sarvāṃ nikhilena kathāṃ tava
analyzed: imām cintayataḥ sarvām nikhilena kathām tava

original: 1.044.006a tarāma saritāṃ śreṣṭhāṃ puṇyāṃ tripathagāṃ nadīm
analyzed: tarāma saritām śreṣṭhām puṇyām tripathagām nadīm

original: 1.044.006c naur eṣā hi sukhāstīrṇā ṛṣīṇāṃ puṇyakarmaṇām
analyzed: nauḥ eṣā hi sukha āstīrṇā ṛṣīṇām puṇya karmaṇām

original: 1.044.006e bhagavantam iha prāptaṃ jñātvā tvaritam āgatā
analyzed: bhagavantam iha prāptam jñātvā tvaritam āgatā

original: 1.044.007a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: tasya tat vacanam śrutvā rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
saṃtāram kārayām āsa sa ṛṣi saṃghaḥ sa rāghavaḥ
uttaram tīram āsādya saṃpūjya ṛṣi gaṇam tatha

original: 1.044.008c gaṅgākūle niviṣṭās te viśālāṃ dadṛśuḥ purīm
analyzed: gaṅgā kūle niviṣṭāḥ te viśālām dadṛśuḥ purīm
tatas muni varaḥ tūrṇam jagāma saha rāghavaḥ

original: 1.044.009c viśālāṃ nagarīṃ ramyāṃ divyāṃ svargopamāṃ tadā
analyzed: viśālām nagarīm ramyām divyām svarga upamām tadā
atha rāmaḥ mahā prājñaḥ viśvāmitram mahā munim

original: 1.044.010c papraccha prāñjalir bhūtvā viśālām uttamāṃ purīm
analyzed: papraccha prāñjaliḥ bhūtvā viśālām uttamām purīm
kataraḥ rāja vaṃśaḥ ayam viśālāyām mahā mune

original: 1.044.011c śrotum icchāmi bhadraṃ te paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
analyzed: śrotum icchāmi bhadram te param kautūhalam hi me

original: 1.044.012a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā rāmasya munipuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: tasya tat vacanam śrutvā rāmasya muni puṃgavaḥ
ākhyātum tat samārebhe viśālasya purātanam

original: 1.044.013a śrūyatāṃ rāma śakrasya kathāṃ kathayataḥ śubhām
analyzed: śrūyatām rāma śakrasya kathām kathayataḥ śubhām

original: 1.044.013c asmin deśe hi yad vṛttaṃ śṛṇu tattvena rāghava
analyzed: asmin deśe hi yat vṛttam śṛṇu tattvena rāghava

original: 1.044.014a pūrvaṃ kṛtayuge rāma diteḥ putrā mahābalāḥ
analyzed: pūrvam kṛta yuge rāma diteḥ putrāḥ mahā balāḥ
aditeḥ ca mahābhāgāḥ vīryavantaḥ su dhārmikāḥ

original: 1.044.015a tatas teṣāṃ naraśreṣṭha buddhir āsīn mahātmanām
analyzed: tatas teṣām nara śreṣṭha buddhiḥ āsīt mahātmanām

original: 1.044.015c amarā nirjarāś caiva kathaṃ syāma nirāmayāḥ
analyzed: amarāḥ nirjarāḥ ca eva katham syāma nirāmayāḥ

original: 1.044.016a teṣāṃ cintayatāṃ rāma buddhir āsīd vipaścitām
analyzed: teṣām cintayatām rāma buddhiḥ āsīt vipaścitām

original: 1.044.016c kṣīrodamathanaṃ kṛtvā rasaṃ prāpsyāma tatra vai
analyzed: kṣīroda mathanam kṛtvā rasam prāpsyāma tatra vai

original: 1.044.017a tato niścitya mathanaṃ yoktraṃ kṛtvā ca vāsukim
analyzed: tatas niścitya mathanam yoktram kṛtvā ca vāsukim
manthānam mandaram kṛtvā mamanthuḥ amita ojasaḥ

original: 1.044.018a atha dhanvantarir nāma apsarāś ca suvarcasaḥ
analyzed: atha dhanvantariḥ nāma apsarāḥ ca suvarcasaḥ

original: 1.044.018c apsu nirmathanād eva rasāt tasmād varastriyaḥ
analyzed: apsu nirmathanāt eva rasāt tasmāt vara striyaḥ
utpetuḥ manuja śreṣṭha tasmāt apsarasaḥ abhavan
ṣaṣṭiḥ koṭyaḥ abhavan tāsām apsarāṇām su varcasām

original: 1.044.019c asaṃkhyeyās tu kākutstha yās tāsāṃ paricārikāḥ
analyzed: asaṃkhyeyāḥ tu kākutstha yāḥ tāsām paricārikāḥ

original: 1.044.020a na tāḥ sma pratigṛhṇanti sarve te devadānavāḥ
analyzed: na tāḥ sma pratigṛhṇanti sarve te deva dānavāḥ
a pratigrahaṇāt ca eva tena sādhāraṇāḥ smṛtāḥ
varuṇasya tatas kanyā vāruṇī raghunandana
utpapāta mahābhāgā mārgamāṇā parigraham

original: 1.044.022a diteḥ putrā na tāṃ rāma jagṛhur varuṇātmajām
analyzed: diteḥ putrāḥ na tām rāma jagṛhuḥ varuṇa ātmajām

original: 1.044.022c adites tu sutā vīra jagṛhus tām aninditām
analyzed: aditeḥ tu sutāḥ vīra jagṛhuḥ tām aninditām

original: 1.044.023a asurās tena daiteyāḥ surās tenāditeḥ sutāḥ
analyzed: asurāḥ tena daiteyāḥ surāḥ tena aditeḥ sutāḥ

original: 1.044.023c hṛṣṭāḥ pramuditāś cāsan vāruṇī grahaṇāt surāḥ
analyzed: hṛṣṭāḥ pramuditāḥ ca āsan vāruṇī grahaṇāt surāḥ
uccaiḥśravāḥ haya śreṣṭhaḥ maṇi ratnam ca kaustubham
udatiṣṭhat nara śreṣṭha tathā eva amṛtam uttamam

original: 1.044.025a atha tasya kṛte rāma mahān āsīt kulakṣayaḥ
analyzed: atha tasya kṛte rāma mahān āsīt kula kṣayaḥ

original: 1.044.025c adites tu tataḥ putrā diteḥ putrāṇa sūdayan
analyzed: aditeḥ tu tatas putrāḥ diteḥ sūdayan

original: 1.044.026a aditer ātmajā vīrā diteḥ putrān nijaghnire
analyzed: aditeḥ ātmajāḥ vīrāḥ diteḥ putrān nijaghnire
tasmin ghore mahā yuddhe daiteya ādityayoḥ bhṛśam

original: 1.044.027a nihatya ditiputrāṃs tu rājyaṃ prāpya puraṃdaraḥ
analyzed: nihatya diti putrān tu rājyam prāpya puraṃdaraḥ
śaśāsa muditaḥ lokān sa ṛṣi saṃghān sa cāraṇān
hateṣu teṣu putreṣu ditiḥ parama duḥkhitā

original: 1.045.001c mārīcaṃ kāśyapaṃ rāma bhartāram idam abravīt
analyzed: mārīcam kāśyapam rāma bhartāram idam abravīt
hata putrā asmi bhagavan tava putraiḥ mahā balaiḥ
śakra hantāram icchāmi putram dīrgha tapaḥ arjitam

original: 1.045.003a sāhaṃ tapaś cariṣyāmi garbhaṃ me dātum arhasi
analyzed: sā aham tapaḥ cariṣyāmi garbham me dātum arhasi
īdṛśam śakra hantāram tvam anujñātum arhasi

original: 1.045.004a tasyās tadvacanaṃ śrutvā mārīcaḥ kāśyapas tadā
analyzed: tasyāḥ tat vacanam śrutvā mārīcaḥ kāśyapaḥ tadā
pratyuvāca mahā tejāḥ ditim parama duḥkhitām

original: 1.045.005a evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ te śucir bhava tapodhane
analyzed: evam bhavatu bhadram te śuciḥ bhava tapodhane

original: 1.045.005c janayiṣyasi putraṃ tvaṃ śakra hantāram āhave
analyzed: janayiṣyasi putram tvam śakra hantāram āhave

original: 1.045.006a pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu śucir yadi bhaviṣyasi
analyzed: pūrṇe varṣa sahasre tu śuciḥ yadi bhaviṣyasi

original: 1.045.006c putraṃ trailokya hantāraṃ mattas tvaṃ janayiṣyasi
analyzed: putram trailokya hantāram mattaḥ tvam janayiṣyasi

original: 1.045.007a evam uktvā mahātejāḥ pāṇinā sa mamārja tām
analyzed: evam uktvā mahā tejāḥ pāṇinā sa mamārja tām

original: 1.045.007c samālabhya tataḥ svastīty uktvā sa tapase yayau
analyzed: samālabhya tatas svasti iti uktvā sa tapase yayau
gate tasmin nara śreṣṭha ditiḥ parama harṣitā
kuśaplavanam āsādya tapaḥ tepe su dāruṇam

original: 1.045.009a tapas tasyāṃ hi kurvatyāṃ paricaryāṃ cakāra ha
analyzed: tapaḥ tasyām hi kurvatyām paricaryām cakāra ha
sahasrākṣaḥ nara śreṣṭha parayā guṇa saṃpadā

original: 1.045.010a agniṃ kuśān kāṣṭham apaḥ phalaṃ mūlaṃ tathaiva ca
analyzed: agnim kuśān kāṣṭham apaḥ phalam mūlam tathā eva ca

original: 1.045.010c nyavedayat sahasrākṣo yac cānyad api kāṅkṣitam
analyzed: nyavedayat sahasrākṣaḥ yat ca anyat api kāṅkṣitam
gātra saṃvāhanaiḥ ca eva śrama apanayanaiḥ tathā

original: 1.045.011c śakraḥ sarveṣu kāleṣu ditiṃ paricacāra ha
analyzed: śakraḥ sarveṣu kāleṣu ditim paricacāra ha
atha daśa ūne raghu nandana
ditiḥ parama saṃprītā sahasrākṣam atha abravīt

original: 1.045.013a tapaś carantyā varṣāṇi daśa vīryavatāṃ vara
analyzed: tapaḥ carantyāḥ varṣāṇi daśa vīryavatām vara

original: 1.045.013c avaśiṣṭāni bhadraṃ te bhrātaraṃ drakṣyase tataḥ
analyzed: avaśiṣṭāni bhadram te bhrātaram drakṣyase tatas

original: 1.045.014a tam ahaṃ tvatkṛte putra samādhāsye jayotsukam
analyzed: tam aham tvad kṛte putra samādhāsye jaya utsukam
trailokya vijayam putra saha bhokṣyasi vijvaraḥ

original: 1.045.015a evam uktvā ditiḥ śakraṃ prāpte madhyaṃ divākare
analyzed: evam uktvā ditiḥ śakram prāpte madhyam divākare
nidrayā apahṛtā devī pādau kṛtvā atha śīrṣataḥ

original: 1.045.016a dṛṣṭvā tām aśuciṃ śakraḥ pādataḥ kṛtamūrdhajām
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tām aśucim śakraḥ pādataḥ kṛta mūrdhajām

original: 1.045.016c śiraḥsthāne kṛtau pādau jahāsa ca mumoda ca
analyzed: śiraḥ sthāne kṛtau pādau jahāsa ca mumoda ca
tasyāḥ śarīra vivaram viveśa ca puraṃdaraḥ

original: 1.045.017c garbhaṃ ca saptadhā rāma bibheda paramātmavān
analyzed: garbham ca saptadhā rāma bibheda parama ātmavān
bidhyamānaḥ tatas garbhaḥ vajreṇa śata parvaṇā

original: 1.045.018c ruroda susvaraṃ rāma tato ditir abudhyata
analyzed: ruroda su svaram rāma tatas ditiḥ abudhyata

original: 1.045.019a mā rudo mā rudaś ceti garbhaṃ śakro 'bhyabhāṣata
analyzed: mā rudaḥ mā rudaḥ ca iti garbham śakraḥ abhyabhāṣata

original: 1.045.019c bibheda ca mahātejā rudantam api vāsavaḥ
analyzed: bibheda ca mahā tejāḥ rudantam api vāsavaḥ

original: 1.045.020a na hantavyo na hantavya ity evaṃ ditir abravīt
analyzed: na hantavyaḥ na hantavyaḥ iti evam ditiḥ abravīt
niṣpapāta tatas śakraḥ mātuḥ vacana gauravāt
prāñjaliḥ vajra sahitaḥ ditim śakraḥ abhyabhāṣata
aśuciḥ devi suptā asi pādayoḥ kṛta mūrdhajā
tad antaram aham labdhvā śakra hantāram āhave

original: 1.045.022c abhindaṃ saptadhā devi tan me tvaṃ kṣantum arhasi
analyzed: abhindam saptadhā devi tat me tvam kṣantum arhasi

original: 1.046.001a saptadhā tu kṛte garbhe ditiḥ paramaduḥkhitā
analyzed: saptadhā tu kṛte garbhe ditiḥ parama duḥkhitā
sahasrākṣam durādharṣam vākyam sa anunayā bravīt
mama aparādhāt garbhaḥ ayam saptadhā viphalīkṛtaḥ
na aparādhaḥ asti deveśa tava atra balasūdana

original: 1.046.003a priyaṃ tu kṛtam icchāmi mama garbhaviparyaye
analyzed: priyam tu kṛtam icchāmi mama garbha viparyaye

original: 1.046.003c marutāṃ saptaṃ saptānāṃ sthānapālā bhavantv ime
analyzed: marutām saptam saptānām sthānapālāḥ bhavantu ime

original: 1.046.004a vātaskandhā ime sapta carantu divi putrakāḥ
analyzed: vātaskandhāḥ ime sapta carantu divi putrakāḥ
mārutāḥ iti vikhyātāḥ divya rūpāḥ mama ātmajāḥ
brahma lokam caratu ekaḥ indra lokam tathā aparaḥ

original: 1.046.005c divi vāyur iti khyātas tṛtīyo 'pi mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: divi vāyuḥ iti khyātaḥ tṛtīyaḥ api mahā yaśāḥ

original: 1.046.006a catvāras tu suraśreṣṭha diśo vai tava śāsanāt
analyzed: catvāraḥ tu sura śreṣṭha diśaḥ vai tava śāsanāt
saṃcariṣyanti bhadram te deva bhūtāḥ mama ātmajāḥ

original: 1.046.006e tvatkṛtenaiva nāmnā ca mārutā iti viśrutāḥ
analyzed: tvad kṛtena eva nāmnā ca mārutāḥ iti viśrutāḥ
tasyāḥ tat vacanam śrutvā sahasrākṣaḥ puraṃdaraḥ
uvāca prāñjaliḥ vākyam ditim bala niṣūdanaḥ

original: 1.046.008a sarvam etad yathoktaṃ te bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: sarvam etat yathā uktam te bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
vicariṣyanti bhadram te deva bhūtāḥ tava ātmajāḥ

original: 1.046.009a evaṃ tau niścayaṃ kṛtvā mātāputrau tapovane
analyzed: evam tau niścayam kṛtvā mātā putrau tapaḥ vane

original: 1.046.009c jagmatus tridivaṃ rāma kṛtārthāv iti naḥ śrutam
analyzed: jagmatuḥ tridivam rāma kṛtārthau iti naḥ śrutam

original: 1.046.010a eṣa deśaḥ sa kākutstha mahendrādhyuṣitaḥ purā
analyzed: eṣa deśaḥ sa kākutstha mahā indra adhyuṣitaḥ purā

original: 1.046.010c ditiṃ yatra tapaḥ siddhām evaṃ paricacāra saḥ
analyzed: ditim yatra tapaḥ siddhām evam paricacāra saḥ
ikṣvākoḥ tu nara vyāghra putraḥ parama dhārmikaḥ
alambuṣāyām utpannaḥ viśālaḥ iti viśrutaḥ

original: 1.046.012a tena cāsīd iha sthāne viśāleti purī kṛtā
analyzed: tena ca āsīt iha sthāne viśālā iti purī kṛtā
viśālasya sutaḥ rāma hemacandraḥ mahā balaḥ
sucandraḥ iti vikhyātaḥ hemacandrāt anantaraḥ
sucandra tanayaḥ rāma dhūmrāśvaḥ iti viśrutaḥ
dhūmrāśva tanayaḥ ca api sṛñjayaḥ samapadyata
sṛñjayasya sutaḥ śrīmān sahadevaḥ pratāpavān
kuśāśvaḥ sahadevasya putraḥ parama dhārmikaḥ
kuśāśvasya mahā tejāḥ somadattaḥ pratāpavān

original: 1.046.016c somadattasya putras tu kākutstha iti viśrutaḥ
analyzed: somadattasya putraḥ tu kākutsthaḥ iti viśrutaḥ

original: 1.046.017a tasya putro mahātejāḥ saṃpraty eṣa purīm imām
analyzed: tasya putraḥ mahā tejāḥ saṃprati eṣa purīm imām
āvasati amara prakhyaḥ sumatiḥ nāma durjayaḥ

original: 1.046.018a ikṣvākos tu prasādena sarve vaiśālikā nṛpāḥ
analyzed: ikṣvākoḥ tu prasādena sarve vaiśālikāḥ nṛpāḥ
dīrgha āyuṣaḥ mahātmānaḥ vīryavantaḥ su dhārmikāḥ

original: 1.046.019a ihādya rajanīṃ rāma sukhaṃ vatsyāmahe vayam
analyzed: iha adya rajanīm rāma sukham vatsyāmahe vayam

original: 1.046.019c śvaḥ prabhāte naraśreṣṭha janakaṃ draṣṭum arhasi
analyzed: śvas prabhāte nara śreṣṭha janakam draṣṭum arhasi
sumatiḥ tu mahā tejāḥ viśvāmitram upāgatam
śrutvā nara vara śreṣṭhaḥ pratyudgacchan mahā yaśāḥ

original: 1.046.021a pūjāṃ ca paramāṃ kṛtvā sopādhyāyaḥ sabāndhavaḥ
analyzed: pūjām ca paramām kṛtvā sa upādhyāyaḥ sa bāndhavaḥ
prāñjaliḥ kuśalam pṛṣṭvā viśvāmitram atha abravīt

original: 1.046.022a dhanyo 'smy anugṛhīto 'smi yasya me viṣayaṃ mune
analyzed: dhanyaḥ asmi anugṛhītaḥ asmi yasya me viṣayam mune

original: 1.046.022c saṃprāpto darśanaṃ caiva nāsti dhanyataro mama
analyzed: saṃprāptaḥ darśanam ca eva nā asti dhanyataraḥ mama
pṛṣṭvā tu kuśalam tatra paraspara samāgame
kathā ante sumatiḥ vākyam vyājahāra mahā munim
imau kumārau bhadram te deva tulya parākramau
gaja siṃha gatī vīrau śārdūla vṛṣabha upamau
padma patra viśāla akṣau khaḍga tūṇī dhanuḥ dharau
aśvinau iva rūpeṇa samupasthita yauvanau
yadṛcchayā eva gām prāptau deva lokāt iva amarau

original: 1.047.004c kathaṃ padbhyām iha prāptau kimarthaṃ kasya vā mune
analyzed: katham padbhyām iha prāptau kimartham kasya vā mune
bhūṣayantau imam deśam candra sūryau iva ambaram
parasparasya sadṛśau pramāṇa iṅgita ceṣṭitaiḥ

original: 1.047.006a kimarthaṃ ca naraśreṣṭhau saṃprāptau durgame pathi
analyzed: kimartham ca nara śreṣṭhau saṃprāptau durgame pathi
vara āyudha dharau vīrau śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ

original: 1.047.007a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā yathāvṛtthaṃ nyavedayat
analyzed: tasya tat vacanam śrutvā yathāvṛttham nyavedayat
siddhāśrama nivāsam ca rākṣasānām vadham tathā
viśvāmitra vacaḥ śrutvā rājā parama harṣitaḥ

original: 1.047.008c atithī paramau prāptau putrau daśarathasya tau
analyzed: atithī paramau prāptau putrau daśarathasya tau
pūjayām āsa vidhivat satkāra arhau mahā balau
tatas parama satkāram sumateḥ prāpya rāghavau

original: 1.047.009c uṣya tatra niśām ekāṃ jagmatur mithilāṃ tataḥ
analyzed: uṣya tatra niśām ekām jagmatuḥ mithilām tatas

original: 1.047.010a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā munayaḥ sarve janakasya purīṃ śubhām
analyzed: tām dṛṣṭvā munayaḥ sarve janakasya purīm śubhām

original: 1.047.010c sādhu sādhv iti śaṃsanto mithilāṃ samapūjayan
analyzed: sādhu sādhu iti śaṃsantaḥ mithilām samapūjayan
mithilā upavane tatra āśramam dṛśya rāghavaḥ
purāṇam nirjanam ramyam papraccha muni puṃgavam
śrīmat āśrama saṃkāśam kim nu idam muni varjitam

original: 1.047.012c śrotum icchāmi bhagavan kasyāyaṃ pūrva āśramaḥ
analyzed: śrotum icchāmi bhagavan kasya ayam pūrvaḥ āśramaḥ

original: 1.047.013a tac chrutā rāghaveṇoktaṃ vākyaṃ vākya viśāradaḥ
analyzed: tat śrutā rāghaveṇa uktam vākyam vākya viśāradaḥ
pratyuvāca mahā tejāḥ viśvamitraḥ mahā muniḥ

original: 1.047.014a hanta te kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu tattvena rāghava
analyzed: hanta te kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu tattvena rāghava
yasya etat āśrama padam śaptam kopāt mahātmanā
gautamasya nara śreṣṭha pūrvam āsīt mahātmanaḥ
āśramaḥ divya saṃkāśaḥ suraiḥ api su pūjitaḥ

original: 1.047.016a sa ceha tapa ātiṣṭhad ahalyāsahitaḥ purā
analyzed: sa ca iha tapaḥ ātiṣṭhat ahalyā sahitaḥ purā
varṣa pūgāni anekāni rāja putra mahā yaśaḥ
tasya antaram viditvā tu sahasrākṣaḥ śacīpatiḥ
muni veṣa dharaḥ ahalyām idam vacanam abravīt
ṛtu kālam pratīkṣante na arthinaḥ su samāhite

original: 1.047.018c saṃgamaṃ tv aham icchāmi tvayā saha sumadhyame
analyzed: saṃgamam tu aham icchāmi tvayā saha sumadhyame
muni veṣam sahasrākṣam vijñāya raghunandana
matim cakāra durmedhāḥ devarāja kutūhalāt
athā bravīt suraśreṣṭham kṛtārthena antarātmanā

original: 1.047.020c kṛtārtho 'si suraśreṣṭha gaccha śīghram itaḥ prabho
analyzed: kṛtārthaḥ asi suraśreṣṭha gaccha śīghram itas prabho

original: 1.047.020e ātmānaṃ māṃ ca deveśa sarvadā rakṣa mānadaḥ
analyzed: ātmānam mām ca deveśa sarvadā rakṣa mānadaḥ

original: 1.047.021a indras tu prahasan vākyam ahalyām idam abravīt
analyzed: indraḥ tu prahasan vākyam ahalyām idam abravīt
suśroṇi parituṣṭaḥ asmi gamiṣyāmi yathāgatam

original: 1.047.022a evaṃ saṃgamya tu tayā niścakrāmoṭajāt tataḥ
analyzed: evam saṃgamya tu tayā niścakrāma uṭajāt tatas

original: 1.047.022c sa saṃbhramāt tvaran rāma śaṅkito gautamaṃ prati
analyzed: sa saṃbhramāt tvaran rāma śaṅkitaḥ gautamam prati
gautamam sa dadarśa atha praviśanti mahā munim
deva dānava durdharṣam tapaḥ bala samanvitam
tīrtha udaka pariklinnam dīpyamānam iva analam
gṛhīta samidham tatra sa kuśam muni puṅgavam
dṛṣṭvā surapatiḥ trastaḥ viṣaṇṇa vadanaḥ abhavat
atha dṛṣṭvā sahasrākṣam muni veṣa dharam muniḥ
durvṛttam vṛtta saṃpannaḥ roṣāt vacanam abravīt

original: 1.047.026a mama rūpaṃ samāsthāya kṛtavān asi durmate
analyzed: mama rūpam samāsthāya kṛtavān asi durmate

original: 1.047.026c akartavyam idaṃ yasmād viphalas tvaṃ bhaviṣyati
analyzed: akartavyam idam yasmāt viphalaḥ tvam bhaviṣyati
gautamena evam uktasya sa roṣeṇa mahātmanā
petatuḥ vṛṣaṇau bhūmau sahasrākṣasya tad kṣaṇāt

original: 1.047.028a tathā śaptvā sa vai śakraṃ bhāryām api ca śaptavān
analyzed: tathā śaptvā sa vai śakram bhāryām api ca śaptavān
iha varṣa sahasrāṇi bahūni tvam nivatsyasi
vāyubhakṣā nirāhārā tapyantī bhasma śāyinī
adṛśyā sarva bhūtānām āśrame asmin nivatsyasi

original: 1.047.030a yadā caitad vanaṃ ghoraṃ rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ
analyzed: yadā ca etat vanam ghoram rāmaḥ daśaratha ātmajaḥ
āgamiṣyati durdharṣaḥ tadā pūtā bhaviṣyasi
tasya ātithyena durvṛtte lobha moha vivarjitā

original: 1.047.031c matsakāśe mudā yuktā svaṃ vapur dhārayiṣyasi
analyzed: mad sakāśe mudā yuktā svam vapuḥ dhārayiṣyasi
evam uktvā mahā tejāḥ gautamaḥ duṣṭa cāriṇīm
imam āśramam utsṛjya siddha cāraṇa sevite
himavat śikhare ramye tapaḥ tepe mahā tapāḥ

original: 1.048.001a aphalas tu tataḥ śakro devān agnipurogamān
analyzed: aphalaḥ tu tatas śakraḥ devān agni purogamān
abravīt trasta vadanaḥ sa ṛṣi saṃghān sa cāraṇān
kurvatā tapasaḥ vighnam gautamasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 1.048.002c krodham utpādya hi mayā surakāryam idaṃ kṛtam
analyzed: krodham utpādya hi mayā sura kāryam idam kṛtam

original: 1.048.003a aphalo 'smi kṛtas tena krodhāt sā ca nirākṛtā
analyzed: aphalaḥ asmi kṛtaḥ tena krodhāt sā ca nirākṛtā
śāpa mokṣeṇa mahatā tapaḥ asya apahṛtam mayā

original: 1.048.004a tan māṃ suravarāḥ sarve sarṣisaṃghāḥ sacāraṇāḥ
analyzed: tat mām sura varāḥ sarve sa ṛṣi saṃghāḥ sa cāraṇāḥ
sura sāhya karam sarve saphalam kartum arhatha
śatakratoḥ vacaḥ śrutvā devāḥ sa agni purogamāḥ
pitṛ devān upetya āhuḥ saha sarvaiḥ marut gaṇaiḥ

original: 1.048.006a ayaṃ meṣaḥ savṛṣaṇaḥ śakro hy avṛṣaṇaḥ kṛtaḥ
analyzed: ayam meṣaḥ sa vṛṣaṇaḥ śakraḥ hi avṛṣaṇaḥ kṛtaḥ
meṣasya vṛṣaṇau gṛhya śakrāya āśu prayacchata

original: 1.048.007a aphalas tu kṛto meṣaḥ parāṃ tuṣṭiṃ pradāsyati
analyzed: aphalaḥ tu kṛtaḥ meṣaḥ parām tuṣṭim pradāsyati

original: 1.048.007c bhavatāṃ harṣaṇārthāya ye ca dāsyanti mānavāḥ
analyzed: bhavatām harṣaṇa arthāya ye ca dāsyanti mānavāḥ

original: 1.048.008a agnes tu vacanaṃ śrutvā pitṛdevāḥ samāgatāḥ
analyzed: agneḥ tu vacanam śrutvā pitṛ devāḥ samāgatāḥ
utpāṭya meṣa vṛṣaṇau sahasrākṣe nyavedayan
tadā prabhṛti kākutstha pitṛ devāḥ samāgatāḥ

original: 1.048.009c aphalān bhuñjate meṣān phalais teṣām ayojayan
analyzed: aphalān bhuñjate meṣān phalaiḥ teṣām ayojayan

original: 1.048.010a indras tu meṣavṛṣaṇas tadā prabhṛti rāghava
analyzed: indraḥ tu meṣa vṛṣaṇaḥ tadā prabhṛti rāghava
gautamasya prabhāvena tapasaḥ ca mahātmanaḥ
tadā āgaccha mahā tejaḥ āśramam puṇya karmaṇaḥ
tārayā enām mahābhāgām ahalyām deva rūpiṇīm
viśvāmitra vacaḥ śrutvā rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
viśvāmitram puraskṛtya āśramam praviveśa ha
dadarśa ca mahābhāgām tapasā dyotita prabhām
lokaiḥ api samāgamya durnirīkṣyām sura asuraiḥ

original: 1.048.014a prayatnān nirmitāṃ dhātrā divyāṃ māyāmayīm iva
analyzed: prayatnāt nirmitām dhātrā divyām māyā mayīm iva
dhūmena abhiparīta aṅgīm pūrṇa candra prabhām iva
sa tuṣāra āvṛtām sa abhrām pūrṇa candra prabhām iva
madhye ambhasaḥ durādharṣām dīptām sūrya prabhām iva

original: 1.048.016a sa hi gautamavākyena durnirīkṣyā babhūva ha
analyzed: sa hi gautama vākyena durnirīkṣyā babhūva ha

original: 1.048.016c trayāṇām api lokānāṃ yāvad rāmasya darśanam
analyzed: trayāṇām api lokānām yāvat rāmasya darśanam

original: 1.048.017a rāghavau tu tatas tasyāḥ pādau jagṛhatus tadā
analyzed: rāghavau tu tatas tasyāḥ pādau jagṛhatuḥ tadā

original: 1.048.017c smarantī gautamavacaḥ pratijagrāha sā ca tau
analyzed: smarantī gautama vacaḥ pratijagrāha sā ca tau
pādyam arghyam tathā ātithyam cakāra su samāhitā
pratijagrāha kākutsthaḥ vidhi dṛṣṭena karmaṇā
puṣpa vṛṣṭiḥ mahatī āsīt deva dundubhi nisvanaiḥ
gandharva apsarasām ca api mahān āsīt samāgamaḥ

original: 1.048.020a sādhu sādhv iti devās tām ahalyāṃ samapūjayan
analyzed: sādhu sādhu iti devāḥ tām ahalyām samapūjayan
tapaḥ bala viśuddha aṅgīm gautamasya vaśa anugām
gautamaḥ api mahā tejāḥ ahalyā sahitaḥ sukhī

original: 1.048.021c rāmaṃ saṃpūjya vidhivat tapas tepe mahātapāḥ
analyzed: rāmam saṃpūjya vidhivat tapaḥ tepe mahā tapāḥ
rāmaḥ api paramām pūjām gautamasya mahā muneḥ

original: 1.048.022c sakāśād vidhivat prāpya jagāma mithilāṃ tataḥ
analyzed: sakāśāt vidhivat prāpya jagāma mithilām tatas

original: 1.049.001a tataḥ prāguttarāṃ gatvā rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
analyzed: tatas prāguttarām gatvā rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
viśvāmitram puraskṛtya yajña vāṭam upāgamat
rāmaḥ tu muni śārdūlam uvāca sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
sādhvī yajña samṛddhiḥ hi janakasya mahātmanaḥ
bahūni iha sahasrāṇi nānā deśa nivāsinām
brāhmaṇānām mahābhāga veda adhyayana śālinām
ṛṣi vāṭāḥ ca dṛśyante śakaṭī śata saṃkulāḥ

original: 1.049.004c deśo vidhīyatāṃ brahman yatra vatsyāmahe vayam
analyzed: deśaḥ vidhīyatām brahman yatra vatsyāmahe vayam
rāmasya vacanam śrutvā viśvāmitraḥ mahā muniḥ
niveśam akarot deśe vivikte salila āyute

original: 1.049.006a viśvāmitraṃ muniśreṣṭhaṃ śrutvā sa nṛpatis tadā
analyzed: viśvāmitram muni śreṣṭham śrutvā sa nṛpatiḥ tadā
śatānandam puraskṛtya purohitam aninditam

original: 1.049.007a ṛtvijo 'pi mahātmānas tv arghyam ādāya satvaram
analyzed: ṛtvijaḥ api mahātmānaḥ tu arghyam ādāya satvaram
viśvāmitrāya dharmeṇa daduḥ mantra puraskṛtam

original: 1.049.008a pratigṛhya tu tāṃ pūjāṃ janakasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: pratigṛhya tu tām pūjām janakasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 1.049.008c papraccha kuśalaṃ rājño yajñasya ca nirāmayam
analyzed: papraccha kuśalam rājñaḥ yajñasya ca nirāmayam

original: 1.049.009a sa tāṃś cāpi munīn pṛṣṭvā sopādhyāya purodhasaḥ
analyzed: sa tān ca api munīn pṛṣṭvā sa upādhyāya purodhasaḥ
yathānyāyam tatas sarvaiḥ samāgacchat prahṛṣṭavān
atha rājā muni śreṣṭham kṛtāñjaliḥ abhāṣata
āsane bhagavān āstām saha ebhiḥ muni sattamaiḥ
janakasya vacaḥ śrutvā niṣasāda mahā muniḥ

original: 1.049.011c purodhā ṛtvijaś caiva rājā ca saha mantribhiḥ
analyzed: purodhāḥ ṛtvijaḥ ca eva rājā ca saha mantribhiḥ
āsaneṣu yathānyāyam upaviṣṭān samantataḥ

original: 1.049.012c dṛṣṭvā sa nṛpatis tatra viśvāmitram athābravīt
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā sa nṛpatiḥ tatra viśvāmitram atha abravīt

original: 1.049.013a adya yajñasamṛddhir me saphalā daivataiḥ kṛtā
analyzed: adya yajña samṛddhiḥ me saphalā daivataiḥ kṛtā
adya yajña phalam prāptam bhagavat darśanāt mayā
dhanyaḥ asmi anugṛhītaḥ asmi yasya me muni puṃgava
yajña upasadanam brahman prāptaḥ asi munibhiḥ saha

original: 1.049.015a dvādaśāhaṃ tu brahmarṣe śeṣam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: dvādaśa aham tu brahmarṣe śeṣam āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: 1.049.015c tato bhāgārthino devān draṣṭum arhasi kauśika
analyzed: tatas bhāga arthinaḥ devān draṣṭum arhasi kauśika
iti uktvā muni śārdūlam prahṛṣṭa vadanaḥ tadā

original: 1.049.016c punas taṃ paripapraccha prāñjaliḥ prayato nṛpaḥ
analyzed: punar tam paripapraccha prāñjaliḥ prayataḥ nṛpaḥ
imau kumārau bhadram te deva tulya parākramau
gaja siṃha gatī vīrau śārdūla vṛṣabha upamau
padma patra viśāla akṣau khaḍga tūṇī dhanuḥ dharau
aśvinau iva rūpeṇa samupasthita yauvanau
yadṛcchayā eva gām prāptau deva lokāt iva amarau

original: 1.049.019c kathaṃ padbhyām iha prāptau kimarthaṃ kasya vā mune
analyzed: katham padbhyām iha prāptau kimartham kasya vā mune
vara āyudha dharau vīrau kasya putrau mahā mune
bhūṣayantau imam deśam candra sūryau iva ambaram
parasparasya sadṛśau pramāṇa iṅgita ceṣṭitaiḥ
kākapakṣa dharau vīrau śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
tasya tat vacanam śrutvā janakasya mahātmanaḥ
nyavedayat mahātmānau putrau daśarathasya tau
siddhāśrama nivāsam ca rākṣasānām vadham tathā

original: 1.049.023c tac cāgamanam avyagraṃ viśālāyāś ca darśanam
analyzed: tat ca āgamanam avyagram viśālāyāḥ ca darśanam
ahalyā darśanam ca eva gautamena samāgamam
mahā dhanuṣi jijñāsām kartum āgamanam tathā
etat sarvam mahā tejāḥ janakāya mahātmane
nivedya virarāma atha viśvāmitraḥ mahā muniḥ
tasya tat vacanam śrutvā viśvāmitrasya dhīmataḥ
hṛṣṭa romā mahā tejāḥ śatānandaḥ mahā tapāḥ
gautamasya sutaḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ tapasā dyotita prabhaḥ
rāma saṃdarśanāt eva param vismayam āgataḥ

original: 1.050.003a sa tau niṣaṇṇau saṃprekṣya sukhāsīnau nṛpātmajau
analyzed: sa tau niṣaṇṇau saṃprekṣya sukha āsīnau nṛpa ātmajau
śatānandaḥ muni śreṣṭham viśvāmitram atha abravīt

original: 1.050.004a api te muniśārdūla mama mātā yaśasvinī
analyzed: api te muni śārdūla mama mātā yaśasvinī
darśitā rāja putrāya tapaḥ dīrgham upāgatā

original: 1.050.005a api rāme mahātejo mama mātā yaśasvinī
analyzed: api rāme mahā tejaḥ mama mātā yaśasvinī
vanyaiḥ upāharat pūjām pūjā arhe sarva dehinām
api rāmāya kathitam yathāvṛttam purātanam
mama mātuḥ mahā tejaḥ devena duranuṣṭhitam

original: 1.050.007a api kauśika bhadraṃ te guruṇā mama saṃgatā
analyzed: api kauśika bhadram te guruṇā mama saṃgatā
mātā mama muni śreṣṭha rāma saṃdarśanāt itas

original: 1.050.008a api me guruṇā rāmaḥ pūjitaḥ kuśikātmaja
analyzed: api me guruṇā rāmaḥ pūjitaḥ kuśika ātmaja
iha āgataḥ mahā tejāḥ pūjām prāpya mahātmanaḥ

original: 1.050.009a api śāntena manasā gurur me kuśikātmaja
analyzed: api śāntena manasā guruḥ me kuśika ātmaja
iha āgatena rāmeṇa prayatena abhivāditaḥ

original: 1.050.010a tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ
analyzed: tat śrutvā vacanam tasya viśvāmitraḥ mahā muniḥ
pratyuvāca śatānandam vākya jñaḥ vākya kovidam

original: 1.050.011a nātikrāntaṃ muniśreṣṭha yat kartavyaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā
analyzed: na atikrāntam muni śreṣṭha yat kartavyam kṛtam mayā
saṃgatā muninā patnī bhārgaveṇa iva reṇukā

original: 1.050.012a tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya viśvāmitrasya dhīmataḥ
analyzed: tat śrutvā vacanam tasya viśvāmitrasya dhīmataḥ
śatānandaḥ mahā tejāḥ rāmam vacanam abravīt

original: 1.050.013a svāgataṃ te naraśreṣṭha diṣṭyā prāpto 'si rāghava
analyzed: svāgatam te nara śreṣṭha diṣṭyā prāptaḥ asi rāghava
viśvāmitram puraskṛtya mahā ṛṣim aparājitam

original: 1.050.014c viśvāmitro mahātejā vetsy enaṃ paramāṃ gatim
analyzed: viśvāmitraḥ mahā tejāḥ vetsi enam paramām gatim

original: 1.050.015a nāsti dhanyataro rāma tvatto 'nyo bhuvi kaś cana
analyzed: na asti dhanyataraḥ rāma tvattaḥ anyaḥ bhuvi kaḥ cana

original: 1.050.015c goptā kuśikaputras te yena taptaṃ mahat tapaḥ
analyzed: goptā kuśika putraḥ te yena taptam mahat tapaḥ
śrūyatām ca abhidāsyāmi kauśikasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 1.050.016c yathābalaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇu
analyzed: yathābalam yathāvṛttam tat me nigadataḥ śṛṇu

original: 1.050.017a rājābhūd eṣa dharmātmā dīrgha kālam ariṃdamaḥ
analyzed: rājā abhūt eṣa dharma ātmā dīrgha kālam ariṃdamaḥ

original: 1.050.017c dharmajñaḥ kṛtavidyaś ca prajānāṃ ca hite rataḥ
analyzed: dharma jñaḥ kṛta vidyaḥ ca prajānām ca hite rataḥ

original: 1.050.018a prajāpatisutas tv āsīt kuśo nāma mahīpatiḥ
analyzed: prajāpati sutaḥ tu āsīt kuśaḥ nāma mahīpatiḥ
kuśasya putraḥ balavān kuśanābhaḥ su dhārmikaḥ

original: 1.050.019a kuśanābhasutas tv āsīd gādhir ity eva viśrutaḥ
analyzed: kuśanābha sutaḥ tu āsīt gādhiḥ iti eva viśrutaḥ
gādheḥ putraḥ mahā tejāḥ viśvāmitraḥ mahā muniḥ
viśva mitraḥ mahā tejāḥ pālayām āsa medinīm
bahu varṣa sahasrāṇi rājā rājyam akārayat

original: 1.050.021a kadā cit tu mahātejā yojayitvā varūthinīm
analyzed: kadā cit tu mahā tejāḥ yojayitvā varūthinīm
akṣauhiṇī parivṛtaḥ paricakrāma medinīm

original: 1.050.022a nagarāṇi ca rāṣṭrāṇi saritaś ca tathā girīn
analyzed: nagarāṇi ca rāṣṭrāṇi saritaḥ ca tathā girīn
āśramān kramaśas rājā vicaran ājagāmaha
vasiṣṭhasya āśrama padam nānā puṣpa phala drumam
nānā mṛga gaṇa ākīrṇam siddha cāraṇa sevitam
deva dānava gandharvaiḥ kiṃnaraiḥ upaśobhitam
praśānta hariṇa ākīrṇam dvija saṃgha niṣevitam
brahmarṣi gaṇa saṃkīrṇam devarṣi gaṇa sevitam
tapaḥ caraṇa saṃsiddhaiḥ agni kalpaiḥ mahātmabhiḥ
satatam saṃkulam śrīmat brahma kalpaiḥ mahātmabhiḥ
abbhakṣaiḥ vāyubhakṣaiḥ ca śīrṇa parṇa aśanaiḥ tathā
phala mūla aśanaiḥ dāntaiḥ jita roṣaiḥ jita indriyaiḥ
ṛṣibhiḥ vālakhilyaiḥ ca japa homa parāyaṇaiḥ
vasiṣṭhasya āśrama padam brahma lokam iva aparam
dadarśa jayatām śreṣṭha viśvāmitraḥ mahā balaḥ
sa dṛṣṭvā parama prītaḥ viśvāmitraḥ mahā balaḥ

original: 1.051.001c praṇato vinayād vīro vasiṣṭhaṃ japatāṃ varam
analyzed: praṇataḥ vinayāt vīraḥ vasiṣṭham japatām varam

original: 1.051.002a svāgataṃ tava cety ukto vasiṣṭhena mahātmanā
analyzed: svāgatam tava ca iti uktaḥ vasiṣṭhena mahātmanā

original: 1.051.002c āsanaṃ cāsya bhagavān vasiṣṭho vyādideśa ha
analyzed: āsanam ca asya bhagavān vasiṣṭhaḥ vyādideśa ha
upaviṣṭāya ca tadā viśvāmitrāya dhīmate
yathānyāyam muni varaḥ phala mūlam upāharat

original: 1.051.004a pratigṛhya ca tāṃ pūjāṃ vasiṣṭhād rājasattamaḥ
analyzed: pratigṛhya ca tām pūjām vasiṣṭhāt rāja sattamaḥ
tapaḥ agnihotra śiṣyeṣu kuśalam paryapṛcchata
viśvāmitraḥ mahā tejāḥ vanaspati gaṇe tathā
sarvatra kuśalam ca āha vasiṣṭhaḥ rāja sattamam
sukha upaviṣṭam rājānam viśvāmitram mahā tapāḥ

original: 1.051.006c papraccha japatāṃ śreṣṭho vasiṣṭho brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ
analyzed: papraccha japatām śreṣṭhaḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ

original: 1.051.007a kaccit te kuśalaṃ rājan kaccid dharmeṇa rañjayan
analyzed: kaccit te kuśalam rājan kaccit dharmeṇa rañjayan
prajāḥ pālayase rājan rāja vṛttena dhārmika

original: 1.051.008a kaccit te subhṛtā bhṛtyāḥ kaccit tiṣṭhanti śāsane
analyzed: kaccit te subhṛtāḥ bhṛtyāḥ kaccit tiṣṭhanti śāsane

original: 1.051.008c kaccit te vijitāḥ sarve ripavo ripusūdana
analyzed: kaccit te vijitāḥ sarve ripavaḥ ripu sūdana

original: 1.051.009a kaccid bale ca kośe ca mitreṣu ca paraṃtapa
analyzed: kaccit bale ca kośe ca mitreṣu ca paraṃtapa
kuśalam te nara vyāghra putra pautre tathā anagha
sarvatra kuśalam rājā vasiṣṭham pratyudāharat
viśvāmitraḥ mahā tejāḥ vasiṣṭham vinaya anvitaḥ

original: 1.051.011a kṛtvobhau suciraṃ kālaṃ dharmiṣṭhau tāḥ kathāḥ śubhāḥ
analyzed: kṛtvā ubhau su ciram kālam dharmiṣṭhau tāḥ kathāḥ śubhāḥ

original: 1.051.011c mudā paramayā yuktau prīyetāṃ tau parasparam
analyzed: mudā paramayā yuktau prīyetām tau parasparam
tatas vasiṣṭhaḥ bhagavān kathā ante raghunandana

original: 1.051.012c viśvāmitram idaṃ vākyam uvāca prahasann iva
analyzed: viśvāmitram idam vākyam uvāca prahasan iva
ātithyam kartum icchāmi balasya asya mahā bala
tava ca eva aprameyasya yathārham saṃpratīccha me

original: 1.051.014a satkriyāṃ tu bhavān etāṃ pratīcchatu mayodyatām
analyzed: satkriyām tu bhavān etām pratīcchatu mayā udyatām
rājan tvam atithi śreṣṭhaḥ pūjanīyaḥ prayatnataḥ
evam uktaḥ vasiṣṭhena viśvāmitraḥ mahāmatiḥ

original: 1.051.015c kṛtam ity abravīd rājā pūjāvākyena me tvayā
analyzed: kṛtam iti abravīt rājā pūjā vākyena me tvayā
phala mūlena bhagavan vidyate yat tava āśrame
pādyena ācamanīyena bhagavat darśanena ca
sarvathā ca mahā prājña pūjā arheṇa su pūjitaḥ
gamiṣyāmi namaḥ te astu maitreṇa īkṣasva cakṣuṣā

original: 1.051.018a evaṃ bruvantaṃ rājānaṃ vasiṣṭhaḥ punar eva hi
analyzed: evam bruvantam rājānam vasiṣṭhaḥ punar eva hi
nyamantrayata dharma ātmā punar punar udāra dhīḥ

original: 1.051.019a bāḍham ity eva gādheyo vasiṣṭhaṃ pratyuvāca ha
analyzed: bāḍham iti eva gādheyaḥ vasiṣṭham pratyuvāca ha
yathā priyam bhagavataḥ tathā astu muni sattama

original: 1.051.020a evam ukto mahātejā vasiṣṭho japatāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ mahā tejāḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ japatām varaḥ
ājuhāva tatas prītaḥ kalmāṣīm dhūta kalmaṣaḥ

original: 1.051.021a ehy ehi śabale kṣipraṃ śṛṇu cāpi vaco mama
analyzed: ehi ehi śabale kṣipram śṛṇu ca api vacaḥ mama
sabalasya asya rājarṣeḥ kartum vyavasitaḥ asmi aham
bhojanena mahārheṇa satkāram saṃvidhatsva me
yasya yasya yathākāmam ṣaṣ raseṣu abhipūjitam

original: 1.051.022c tat sarvaṃ kāmadhug divye abhivarṣakṛte mama
analyzed: tat sarvam   divye abhivarṣa kṛte mama
rasena annena pānena lehya coṣyeṇa saṃyutam

original: 1.051.023c annānāṃ nicayaṃ sarvaṃ sṛjasva śabale tvara
analyzed: annānām nicayam sarvam sṛjasva śabale tvara
evam uktā vasiṣṭhena śabalā śatru sūdana

original: 1.052.001c vidadhe kāmadhuk kāmān yasya yasya yathepsitam
analyzed: vidadhe   kāmān yasya yasya yathā īpsitam

original: 1.052.002a ikṣūn madhūṃs tathā lājān maireyāṃś ca varāsavān
analyzed: ikṣūn madhūn tathā lājān maireyān ca vara āsavān

original: 1.052.002c pānāni ca mahārhāṇi bhakṣyāṃś coccāvacāṃs tathā
analyzed: pānāni ca mahārhāṇi bhakṣyān ca uccāvacān tathā
uṣṇa āḍhyasya odanasya api rāśayaḥ parvata upamāḥ

original: 1.052.003c mṛṣṭānnāni ca sūpāś ca dadhikulyās tathaiva ca
analyzed: mṛṣṭa annāni ca sūpāḥ ca dadhi kulyāḥ tathā eva ca
nānā svādu rasānām ca ṣāḍavānām tathā eva ca
bhājanāni su pūrṇāni gauḍāni ca sahasraśas
sarvam āsīt su saṃtuṣṭam hṛṣṭa puṣṭa jana ākulam
viśvāmitra balam rāma vasiṣṭhena abhitarpitam
viśvāmitraḥ api rājarṣiḥ hṛṣṭa puṣṭaḥ tadā abhavat
sa antaḥ puravaraḥ rājā sa brāhmaṇa purohitaḥ
sa amātyaḥ mantri sahitaḥ sa bhṛtyaḥ pūjitaḥ tadā

original: 1.052.007c yuktaḥ pareṇa harṣeṇa vasiṣṭham idam abravīt
analyzed: yuktaḥ pareṇa harṣeṇa vasiṣṭham idam abravīt
pūjitaḥ aham tvayā brahman pūjā arheṇa su satkṛtaḥ
śrūyatām abhidhāsyāmi vākyam vākya viśārada
gavām śata sahasreṇa dīyatām śabalā mama

original: 1.052.009c ratnaṃ hi bhagavann etad ratnahārī ca pārthivaḥ
analyzed: ratnam hi bhagavan etat ratna hārī ca pārthivaḥ

original: 1.052.009e tasmān me śabalāṃ dehi mamaiṣā dharmato dvija
analyzed: tasmāt me śabalām dehi mama eṣā dharmataḥ dvija

original: 1.052.010a evam uktas tu bhagavān vasiṣṭho munisattamaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu bhagavān vasiṣṭhaḥ muni sattamaḥ
viśvāmitreṇa dharma ātmā pratyuvāca mahīpatim
na aham śata sahasreṇa na api koṭi śataiḥ gavām

original: 1.052.011c rājan dāsyāmi śabalāṃ rāśibhī rajatasya vā
analyzed: rājan dāsyāmi śabalām rāśibhiḥ rajatasya vā
na parityāgam arheyam mad sakāśāt ariṃdama

original: 1.052.012c śāśvatī śabalā mahyaṃ kīrtir ātmavato yathā
analyzed: śāśvatī śabalā mahyam kīrtiḥ ātmavataḥ yathā

original: 1.052.013a asyāṃ havyaṃ ca kavyaṃ ca prāṇayātrā tathaiva ca
analyzed: asyām havyam ca kavyam ca prāṇa yātrā tathā eva ca

original: 1.052.013c āyattam agnihotraṃ ca balir homas tathaiva ca
analyzed: āyattam agnihotram ca baliḥ homaḥ tathā eva ca
svāhākāra vaṣaṭkārau vidyāḥ ca vividhāḥ tathā

original: 1.052.014c āyattam atra rājarṣe sarvam etan na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: āyattam atra rājarṣe sarvam etat na saṃśayaḥ

original: 1.052.015a sarva svam etat satyena mama tuṣṭikarī sadā
analyzed: sarva svam etat satyena mama tuṣṭikarī sadā

original: 1.052.015c kāraṇair bahubhī rājan na dāsye śabalāṃ tava
analyzed: kāraṇaiḥ bahubhiḥ rājan na dāsye śabalām tava
vasiṣṭhena evam uktaḥ tu viśvāmitraḥ abravīt tatas
saṃrabdhataram atyartham vākyam vākya viśāradaḥ
hairaṇya kakṣyā graiveyān suvarṇa aṅkuśa bhūṣitān
dadāmi kuñjarāṇām te sahasrāṇi caturdaśa
hairaṇyānām rathānām ca śveta aśvānām catur yujām
dadāmi te śatāni aṣṭau kiṅkiṇīka vibhūṣitān
hayānām deśa jātānām kula jānām mahā ojasām

original: 1.052.019c sahasram ekaṃ daśa ca dadāmi tava suvrata
analyzed: sahasram ekam daśa ca dadāmi tava suvrata
nānā varṇa vibhaktānām vayaḥsthānām tathā eva ca

original: 1.052.020c dadāmy ekāṃ gavāṃ koṭiṃ śabalā dīyatāṃ mama
analyzed: dadāmi ekām gavām koṭim śabalā dīyatām mama

original: 1.052.021a evam uktas tu bhagavān viśvāmitreṇa dhīmatā
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu bhagavān viśvāmitreṇa dhīmatā

original: 1.052.021c na dāsyāmīti śabalāṃ prāha rājan kathaṃ cana
analyzed: na dāsyāmi iti śabalām prāha rājan katham cana

original: 1.052.022a etad eva hi me ratnam etad eva hi me dhanam
analyzed: etat eva hi me ratnam etat eva hi me dhanam

original: 1.052.022c etad eva hi sarvasvam etad eva hi jīvitam
analyzed: etat eva hi sarvasvam etat eva hi jīvitam

original: 1.052.023a darśaś ca pūrṇamāsaś ca yajñāś caivāptadakṣiṇāḥ
analyzed: darśaḥ ca pūrṇamāsaḥ ca yajñāḥ ca eva āpta dakṣiṇāḥ

original: 1.052.023c etad eva hi me rājan vividhāś ca kriyās tathā
analyzed: etat eva hi me rājan vividhāḥ ca kriyāḥ tathā

original: 1.052.024a adomūlāḥ kriyāḥ sarvā mama rājan na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: adomūlāḥ kriyāḥ sarvāḥ mama rājan na saṃśayaḥ

original: 1.052.024c bahūnāṃ kiṃ pralāpena na dāsye kāmadohinīm
analyzed: bahūnām kim pralāpena na dāsye kāmadohinīm

original: 1.053.001a kāmadhenuṃ vasiṣṭho 'pi yadā na tyajate muniḥ
analyzed: kāmadhenum vasiṣṭhaḥ api yadā na tyajate muniḥ
tadā asya śabalām rāma viśvāmitraḥ anvakarṣata

original: 1.053.002a nīyamānā tu śabalā rāma rājñā mahātmanā
analyzed: nīyamānā tu śabalā rāma rājñā mahātmanā
duḥkhitā cintayām āsa rudantī śoka karśitā
parityaktā vasiṣṭhena kim aham su mahātmanā
yā aham rājabhṛtaiḥ dīnā bhṛśa duḥkhitā
kim mayā apakṛtam tasya mahā ṛṣeḥ bhāvitātmanaḥ

original: 1.053.004c yan mām anāgasaṃ bhaktām iṣṭāṃ tyajati dhārmikaḥ
analyzed: yat mām anāgasam bhaktām iṣṭām tyajati dhārmikaḥ

original: 1.053.005a iti sā cintayitvā tu niḥśvasya ca punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: iti sā cintayitvā tu niḥśvasya ca punar punar
jagāma vegena tadā vasiṣṭham parama ojasam

original: 1.053.006a nirdhūya tāṃs tadā bhṛtyāñ śataśaḥ śatrusūdana
analyzed: nirdhūya tān tadā bhṛtyām śataśas śatru sūdana
jagāma anila vegena pāda mūlam mahātmanaḥ

original: 1.053.007a śabalā sā rudantī ca krośantī cedam abravīt
analyzed: śabalā sā rudantī ca krośantī ca idam abravīt
vasiṣṭhasya agratas sthitvā megha dundubhi rāviṇī

original: 1.053.008a bhagavan kiṃ parityaktā tvayāhaṃ brahmaṇaḥ suta
analyzed: bhagavan kim parityaktā tvayā aham brahmaṇaḥ suta

original: 1.053.008c yasmād rājabhṛtā māṃ hi nayante tvatsakāśataḥ
analyzed: yasmāt rājabhṛtāḥ mām hi nayante tvad sakāśataḥ

original: 1.053.009a evam uktas tu brahmarṣir idaṃ vacanam abravīt
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu brahmarṣiḥ idam vacanam abravīt
śoka saṃtapta hṛdayām svasāram iva duḥkhitām

original: 1.053.010a na tvāṃ tyajāmi śabale nāpi me 'pakṛtaṃ tvayā
analyzed: na tvām tyajāmi śabale na api me apakṛtam tvayā

original: 1.053.010c eṣa tvāṃ nayate rājā balān matto mahābalaḥ
analyzed: eṣa tvām nayate rājā balāt mattaḥ mahā balaḥ

original: 1.053.011a na hi tulyaṃ balaṃ mahyaṃ rājā tv adya viśeṣataḥ
analyzed: na hi tulyam balam mahyam rājā tu adya viśeṣataḥ

original: 1.053.011c balī rājā kṣatriyaś ca pṛthivyāḥ patir eva ca
analyzed: balī rājā kṣatriyaḥ ca pṛthivyāḥ patiḥ eva ca
iyam akṣauhiṇī pūrṇā sa vāji ratha saṃkulā
hasti dhvaja samākīrṇā tena asau balavattaraḥ
evam uktā vasiṣṭhena pratyuvāca vinīta vat
vacanam vacana jñā sā brahmarṣim amita prabham
na balam kṣatriyasya āhuḥ brāhmaṇaḥ balavattaraḥ

original: 1.053.014c brahman brahmabalaṃ divyaṃ kṣatrāt tu balavattaram
analyzed: brahman brahma balam divyam kṣatrāt tu balavattaram
aprameya balam tubhyam na tvayā balavattaraḥ
viśvāmitraḥ mahā vīryaḥ tejaḥ tava durāsadam
niyuṅkṣva mām mahā tejaḥ tvad brahma bala saṃbhṛtām

original: 1.053.016c tasya darpaṃ balaṃ yat tan nāśayāmi durātmanaḥ
analyzed: tasya darpam balam yat tat nāśayāmi durātmanaḥ

original: 1.053.017a ity uktas tu tayā rāma vasiṣṭhaḥ sumahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: iti uktaḥ tu tayā rāma vasiṣṭhaḥ su mahā yaśāḥ
sṛjasva iti tadā uvāca balam para balā rujam
tasyāḥ humbhā rava utsṛṣṭāḥ pahlavāḥ śataśas nṛpa
nāśayanti balam sarvam viśvāmitrasya paśyataḥ
sa rājā parama kruddhaḥ krodha visphārita īkṣaṇaḥ

original: 1.053.019c pahlavān nāśayām āsa śastrair uccāvacair api
analyzed: pahlavān nāśayām āsa śastraiḥ uccāvacaiḥ api
viśvāmitra arditān dṛṣṭvā pahlavām śataśas tadā
bhūyas eva asṛjat ghorām śakān yavana miśritān

original: 1.053.021a tair āsīt saṃvṛtā bhūmiḥ śakair yavanamiśritaiḥ
analyzed: taiḥ āsīt saṃvṛtā bhūmiḥ śakaiḥ yavana miśritaiḥ
prabhāvadbhiḥ mahā vīryaiḥ hema kiñjalka saṃnibhaiḥ
dīrgha asi paṭṭiśa dharaiḥ hema varṇa ambara āvṛtaiḥ

original: 1.053.022c nirdagdhaṃ tad balaṃ sarvaṃ pradīptair iva pāvakaiḥ
analyzed: nirdagdham tat balam sarvam pradīptaiḥ iva pāvakaiḥ
tatas astrāṇi mahā tejāḥ viśvāmitraḥ mumoca ha
tatas tān ākulān dṛṣṭvā viśvāmitra astra mohitān

original: 1.054.001c vasiṣṭhaś codayām āsa kāmadhuk sṛja yogataḥ
analyzed: vasiṣṭhaḥ codayām āsa   sṛja yogataḥ
tasyāḥ humbhā ravāt jātāḥ kāmbojāḥ ravi saṃnibhāḥ

original: 1.054.002c ūdhasas tv atha saṃjātāḥ pahlavāḥ śastrapāṇayaḥ
analyzed: ūdhasaḥ tu atha saṃjātāḥ pahlavāḥ śastra pāṇayaḥ

original: 1.054.003a yonideśāc ca yavanaḥ śakṛddeśāc chakās tathā
analyzed: yoni deśāt ca yavanaḥ śakṛt deśāt śakāḥ tathā
romakūpeṣu mecchāḥ ca harītāḥ sa kirātakāḥ

original: 1.054.004a tais tan niṣūditaṃ sainyaṃ viśvamitrasya tatkṣaṇāt
analyzed: taiḥ tat niṣūditam sainyam viśvamitrasya tad kṣaṇāt
sa padāti gajam sa aśvam sa ratham raghunandana
dṛṣṭvā niṣūditam sainyam vasiṣṭhena mahātmanā
viśvāmitra sutānām tu śatam nānāvidha āyudham
abhyadhāvat su saṃkruddham vasiṣṭham japatām varam

original: 1.054.006c huṃkāreṇaiva tān sarvān nirdadāha mahān ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: huṃkāreṇa eva tān sarvān nirdadāha mahān ṛṣiḥ
te sa aśva ratha pādātāḥ vasiṣṭhena mahātmanā
bhasmīkṛtāḥ muhūrtena viśvāmitra sutāḥ tadā

original: 1.054.008a dṛṣṭvā vināśitān putrān balaṃ ca sumahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā vināśitān putrān balam ca su mahā yaśāḥ
sa vrīḍaḥ cintayā āviṣṭaḥ viśvāmitraḥ abhavat tadā
saṃduraḥ iva nirvegaḥ bhagna daṃṣṭraḥ iva uragaḥ
uparaktaḥ iva ādityaḥ sadyas niṣprabha tām gataḥ
hata putra balaḥ dīnaḥ lūna pakṣaḥ iva dvijaḥ
hata darpaḥ hata utsāhaḥ nirvedam samapadyata

original: 1.054.011a sa putram ekaṃ rājyāya pālayeti niyujya ca
analyzed: sa putram ekam rājyāya pālaya iti niyujya ca
pṛthivīm kṣatra dharmeṇa vanam eva anvapadyata
sa gatvā himavat pārśvam kiṃnara uraga sevitam
mahādeva prasāda artham tapaḥ tepe mahā tapāḥ

original: 1.054.013a kena cit tv atha kālena deveśo vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ
analyzed: kena cit tu atha kālena deveśaḥ vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ
darśayām āsa vara daḥ viśvāmitram mahā munim

original: 1.054.014a kimarthaṃ tapyase rājan brūhi yat te vivakṣitam
analyzed: kimartham tapyase rājan brūhi yat te vivakṣitam

original: 1.054.014c varado 'smi varo yas te kāṅkṣitaḥ so 'bhidhīyatām
analyzed: vara daḥ asmi varaḥ yaḥ te kāṅkṣitaḥ saḥ abhidhīyatām

original: 1.054.015a evam uktas tu devena viśvāmitro mahātapāḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu devena viśvāmitraḥ mahā tapāḥ
praṇipatya mahādevam idam vacanam abravīt
yadi tuṣṭaḥ mahādeva dhanurvedaḥ mama anagha
sa aṅga upāṅga upaniṣadaḥ sa rahasyaḥ pradīyatām
yāni deveṣu ca astrāṇi dānaveṣu mahā ṛṣiṣu
gandharva yakṣa rakṣaḥsu pratibhāntu mama anagha
tava prasādāt bhavatu devadeva mama īpsitam

original: 1.054.018c evam astv iti deveśo vākyam uktvā divaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: evam astu iti deveśaḥ vākyam uktvā divam gataḥ
prāpya ca astrāṇi rājarṣiḥ viśvāmitraḥ mahā balaḥ
darpeṇa mahatā yuktaḥ darpa pūrṇaḥ abhavat tadā
vivardhamānaḥ vīryeṇa samudraḥ iva parvaṇi

original: 1.054.020c hatam eva tadā mene vasiṣṭham ṛṣisattamam
analyzed: hatam eva tadā mene vasiṣṭham ṛṣi sattamam
tatas gatvā āśrama padam mumoca astrāṇi pārthivaḥ

original: 1.054.021c yais tat tapovanaṃ sarvaṃ nirdagdhaṃ cāstratejasā
analyzed: yaiḥ tat tapaḥ vanam sarvam nirdagdham ca astra tejasā
udīryamāṇam astram tat viśvāmitrasya dhīmataḥ

original: 1.054.022c dṛṣṭvā vipradrutā bhītā munayaḥ śataśo diśaḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā vipradrutāḥ bhītāḥ munayaḥ śataśas diśaḥ

original: 1.054.023a vasiṣṭhasya ca ye śiṣyās tathaiva mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: vasiṣṭhasya ca ye śiṣyāḥ tathā eva mṛga pakṣiṇaḥ
vidravanti bhayāt bhītāḥ nānā digbhyaḥ sahasraśas
vasiṣṭhasya āśrama padam śūnyam āsīt mahātmanaḥ
muhūrtam iva niḥśabdam āsīt īriṇa saṃnibham

original: 1.054.025a vadato vai vasiṣṭhasya mā bhaiṣṭeti muhur muhuḥ
analyzed: vadataḥ vai vasiṣṭhasya mā bhaiṣṭa iti muhur muhur

original: 1.054.025c nāśayāmy adya gādheyaṃ nīhāram iva bhāskaraḥ
analyzed: nāśayāmi adya gādheyam nīhāram iva bhāskaraḥ

original: 1.054.026a evam uktvā mahātejā vasiṣṭho japatāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: evam uktvā mahā tejāḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ japatām varaḥ

original: 1.054.026c viśvāmitraṃ tadā vākyaṃ saroṣam idam abravīt
analyzed: viśvāmitram tadā vākyam sa roṣam idam abravīt
āśramam cira saṃvṛddham yat vināśitavān asi

original: 1.054.027c durācāro 'si yan mūḍha tasmāt tvaṃ na bhaviṣyasi
analyzed: durācāraḥ asi yat mūḍha tasmāt tvam na bhaviṣyasi

original: 1.054.028a ity uktvā paramakruddho daṇḍam udyamya satvaraḥ
analyzed: iti uktvā parama kruddhaḥ daṇḍam udyamya sa tvaraḥ
vidhūmaḥ iva kālāgniḥ yama daṇḍam iva aparam
evam uktaḥ vasiṣṭhena viśvāmitraḥ mahā balaḥ

original: 1.055.001c āgneyam astram utkṣipya tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
analyzed: āgneyam astram utkṣipya tiṣṭha tiṣṭha iti ca abravīt

original: 1.055.002a vasiṣṭho bhagavān krodhād idaṃ vacanam abravīt
analyzed: vasiṣṭhaḥ bhagavān krodhāt idam vacanam abravīt

original: 1.055.003a kṣatrabandho sthito 'smy eṣa yad balaṃ tad vidarśaya
analyzed: kṣatrabandho sthitaḥ asmi eṣa yat balam tat vidarśaya

original: 1.055.003c nāśayāmy eṣa te darpaṃ śastrasya tava gādhija
analyzed: nāśayāmi eṣa te darpam śastrasya tava gādhija

original: 1.055.004a kva ca te kṣatriyabalaṃ kva ca brahmabalaṃ mahat
analyzed: kva ca te kṣatriya balam kva ca brahma balam mahat
paśya brahma balam divyam mama kṣatriya pāṃsana
tasya astram gādhiputrasya ghoram āgneyam uttamam

original: 1.055.005c brahmadaṇḍena tac chāntam agner vega ivāmbhasā
analyzed: brahmadaṇḍena tat śāntam agneḥ vegaḥ iva ambhasā

original: 1.055.006a vāruṇaṃ caiva raudraṃ ca aindraṃ pāśupataṃ tathā
analyzed: vāruṇam ca eva raudram ca aindram pāśupatam tathā
aiṣīkam ca api cikṣepa ruṣitaḥ gādhinandanaḥ

original: 1.055.007a mānavaṃ mohanaṃ caiva gāndharvaṃ svāpanaṃ tathā
analyzed: mānavam mohanam ca eva gāndharvam svāpanam tathā
jṛmbhaṇam mohanam ca eva saṃtāpana vilāpane

original: 1.055.008a śoṣaṇaṃ dāraṇaṃ caiva vajram astraṃ sudurjayam
analyzed: śoṣaṇam dāraṇam ca eva vajram astram su durjayam

original: 1.055.008c brahmapāśaṃ kālapāśaṃ vāruṇaṃ pāśam eva ca
analyzed: brahmapāśam kālapāśam vāruṇam pāśam eva ca

original: 1.055.009a pinākāstraṃ ca dayitaṃ śuṣkārdre aśanī tathā
analyzed: pināka astram ca dayitam śuṣka ārdre aśanī tathā

original: 1.055.009c daṇḍāstram atha paiśācaṃ krauñcam astraṃ tathāiva ca
analyzed: daṇḍāstram atha paiśācam krauñcam astram tathā iva ca
dharmacakram kālacakram viṣṇucakram tathā eva ca

original: 1.055.010c vāyavyaṃ mathanaṃ caiva astraṃ hayaśiras tathā
analyzed: vāyavyam mathanam ca eva astram hayaśiraḥ tathā

original: 1.055.011a śaktidvayaṃ ca cikṣepa kaṅkālaṃ musalaṃ tathā
analyzed: śakti dvayam ca cikṣepa kaṅkālam musalam tathā

original: 1.055.011c vaidyādharaṃ mahāstraṃ ca kālāstram atha dāruṇam
analyzed: vaidyādharam mahā astram ca kāla astram atha dāruṇam

original: 1.055.012a triśūlam astraṃ ghoraṃ ca kāpālam atha kaṅkaṇam
analyzed: triśūlam astram ghoram ca kāpālam atha kaṅkaṇam
etāni astrāṇi cikṣepa sarvāṇi raghunandana

original: 1.055.013a vasiṣṭhe japatāṃ śreṣṭhe tad adbhutam ivābhavat
analyzed: vasiṣṭhe japatām śreṣṭhe tat adbhutam iva abhavat

original: 1.055.013c tāni sarvāṇi daṇḍena grasate brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ
analyzed: tāni sarvāṇi daṇḍena grasate brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ
teṣu śānteṣu brahmāstram kṣiptavān gādhinandanaḥ

original: 1.055.014c tad astram udyataṃ dṛṣṭvā devāḥ sāgnipurogamāḥ
analyzed: tat astram udyatam dṛṣṭvā devāḥ sa agni purogamāḥ
devarṣayaḥ ca saṃbhrāntāḥ gandharvāḥ sa mahā uragāḥ
trailokyam āsīt saṃtrastam brahmāstre samudīrite

original: 1.055.016a tad apy astraṃ mahāghoraṃ brāhmaṃ brāhmeṇa tejasā
analyzed: tat api astram mahā ghoram brāhmam brāhmeṇa tejasā
vasiṣṭhaḥ grasate sarvam brahmadaṇḍena rāghava
brahmāstram grasamānasya vasiṣṭhasya mahātmanaḥ
trailokya mohanam raudram rūpam āsīt su dāruṇam
romakūpeṣu sarveṣu vasiṣṭhasya mahātmanaḥ
marīcyaḥ iva niṣpetuḥ agneḥ dhūma ākula arciṣaḥ
prājvalat brahmadaṇḍaḥ ca vasiṣṭhasya kara udyataḥ
vidhūmaḥ iva kālāgniḥ yama daṇḍaḥ iva aparaḥ
tatas astuvat muni gaṇāḥ vasiṣṭham japatām varam
