original: 1.055.020c amoghaṃ te balaṃ brahmaṃs tejo dhāraya tejasā
analyzed: amogham te balam brahman tejaḥ dhāraya tejasā
nigṛhītaḥ tvayā brahman viśvāmitraḥ mahā tapāḥ

original: 1.055.021c prasīda japatāṃ śreṣṭha lokāḥ santu gatavyathāḥ
analyzed: prasīda japatām śreṣṭha lokāḥ santu gata vyathāḥ

original: 1.055.022a evam ukto mahātejāḥ śamaṃ cakre mahātapāḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ mahā tejāḥ śamam cakre mahā tapāḥ
viśvāmitraḥ api nikṛtaḥ viniḥśvasya idam abravīt
dhik balam kṣatriya balam brahma tejaḥ balam balam
ekena brahmadaṇḍena sarva astrāṇi hatāni me
tat etat samavekṣya aham prasanna indriya mānasaḥ

original: 1.055.024c tapo mahat samāsthāsye yad vai brahmatvakārakam
analyzed: tapaḥ mahat samāsthāsye yat vai brahmatva kārakam
tatas saṃtapta hṛdayaḥ smaran nigraham ātmanaḥ
viniḥśvasya viniḥśvasya kṛta vairaḥ mahātmanā

original: 1.056.002a sa dakṣiṇāṃ diśaṃ gatvā mahiṣyā saha rāghava
analyzed: sa dakṣiṇām diśam gatvā mahiṣyā saha rāghava
tatāpa paramam ghoram viśvāmitraḥ mahā tapāḥ
phala mūla aśanaḥ dāntaḥ cacāra paramam tapaḥ
atha asya jajñire putrāḥ satya dharma parāyaṇāḥ
haviṣpandaḥ madhuṣpandaḥ dṛḍha netraḥ mahā rathaḥ
pūrṇe varṣa sahasre tu brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ
abravīt madhuram vākyam viśvāmitram tapodhanam
jitāḥ rājarṣi lokāḥ te tapasā kuśika ātmaja

original: 1.056.005c anena tapasā tvāṃ hi rājarṣir iti vidmahe
analyzed: anena tapasā tvām hi rājarṣiḥ iti vidmahe

original: 1.056.006a evam uktvā mahātejā jagāma saha daivataiḥ
analyzed: evam uktvā mahā tejāḥ jagāma saha daivataiḥ
triviṣṭapam brahmalokam lokānām parameśvaraḥ

original: 1.056.007a viśvāmitro 'pi tac chrutvā hriyā kiṃ cid avāṅmukhaḥ
analyzed: viśvāmitraḥ api tat śrutvā hriyā kim cit avāṅmukhaḥ
duḥkhena mahatā āviṣṭaḥ sa manyuḥ idam abravīt

original: 1.056.008a tapaś ca sumahat taptaṃ rājarṣir iti māṃ viduḥ
analyzed: tapaḥ ca su mahat taptam rājarṣiḥ iti mām viduḥ

original: 1.056.008c devāḥ sarṣigaṇāḥ sarve nāsti manye tapaḥphalam
analyzed: devāḥ sa ṛṣi gaṇāḥ sarve na asti manye tapaḥ phalam

original: 1.056.009a evaṃ niścitya manasā bhūya eva mahātapāḥ
analyzed: evam niścitya manasā bhūyas eva mahā tapāḥ
tapaḥ cacāra kākutstha paramam parama ātmavān

original: 1.056.010a etasminn eva kāle tu satyavādī jitendriyaḥ
analyzed: etasmin eva kāle tu satya vādī jita indriyaḥ
triśaṅkuḥ iti vikhyātaḥ ikṣvāku kula nandanaḥ

original: 1.056.011a tasya buddhiḥ samutpannā yajeyam iti rāghava
analyzed: tasya buddhiḥ samutpannā yajeyam iti rāghava
gaccheyam sva śarīreṇa devānām paramām gatim

original: 1.056.012a sa vasiṣṭhaṃ samāhūya kathayām āsa cintitam
analyzed: sa vasiṣṭham samāhūya kathayām āsa cintitam

original: 1.056.012c aśakyam iti cāpy ukto vasiṣṭhena mahātmanā
analyzed: aśakyam iti ca api uktaḥ vasiṣṭhena mahātmanā

original: 1.056.013a pratyākhyāto vasiṣṭhena sa yayau dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
analyzed: pratyākhyātaḥ vasiṣṭhena sa yayau dakṣiṇām diśam

original: 1.056.013c vasiṣṭhā dīrgha tapasas tapo yatra hi tepire
analyzed: vasiṣṭhāḥ dīrgha tapasaḥ tapaḥ yatra hi tepire
triśaṅkuḥ su mahā tejāḥ śatam parama bhāsvaram
vasiṣṭha putrān dadṛśe tapyamānān yaśasvinaḥ

original: 1.056.015a so 'bhigamya mahātmānaḥ sarvān eva guroḥ sutān
analyzed: saḥ abhigamya mahātmānaḥ sarvān eva guroḥ sutān
abhivādya ānupūrvyeṇa hriyā kim cit avāṅmukhaḥ
abravīt su mahā tejāḥ sarvān eva kṛtāñjaliḥ
śaraṇam vaḥ prapadye aham śaraṇyām śaraṇa āgataḥ
pratyākhyātaḥ asmi bhadram vaḥ vasiṣṭhena mahātmanā
yaṣṭu kāmaḥ mahā yajñam tat anujñātum arthatha
guru putrān aham sarvān namaskṛtya prasādaye

original: 1.056.018a śirasā praṇato yāce brāhmaṇāṃs tapasi sthitān
analyzed: śirasā praṇataḥ yāce brāhmaṇān tapasi sthitān

original: 1.056.018c te māṃ bhavantaḥ siddhyarthaṃ yājayantu samāhitāḥ
analyzed: te mām bhavantaḥ siddhi artham yājayantu samāhitāḥ
sa śarīraḥ yathā aham hi deva lokam avāpnuyām
pratyākhyātaḥ vasiṣṭhena gatim anyām tapodhanāḥ

original: 1.056.019c guruputrān ṛte sarvān nāhaṃ paśyāmi kāṃ cana
analyzed: guru putrān ṛte sarvān na aham paśyāmi kām cana

original: 1.056.020a ikṣvākūṇāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ purodhāḥ paramā gatiḥ
analyzed: ikṣvākūṇām hi sarveṣām purodhāḥ paramā gatiḥ

original: 1.056.020c tasmād anantaraṃ sarve bhavanto daivataṃ mama
analyzed: tasmāt anantaram sarve bhavantaḥ daivatam mama
tatas triśaṅkoḥ vacanam śrutvā krodha samanvitam
ṛṣi putra śatam rāma rājānam idam abravīt
pratyākhyātaḥ asi durbuddhe guruṇā satya vādinā
tam katham samatikramya śākhā antaram upeyivān

original: 1.057.003a ikṣvākūṇāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ purodhāḥ paramā gatiḥ
analyzed: ikṣvākūṇām hi sarveṣām purodhāḥ paramā gatiḥ
na ca atikramitum śakyam vacanam satya vādinaḥ

original: 1.057.004a aśakyam iti covāca vasiṣṭho bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: aśakyam iti ca uvāca vasiṣṭhaḥ bhagavān ṛṣiḥ

original: 1.057.004c taṃ vayaṃ vai samāhartuṃ kratuṃ śaktāḥ kathaṃ tava
analyzed: tam vayam vai samāhartum kratum śaktāḥ katham tava

original: 1.057.005a bāliśas tvaṃ naraśreṣṭha gamyatāṃ svapuraṃ punaḥ
analyzed: bāliśaḥ tvam nara śreṣṭha gamyatām sva puram punar
yājane bhagavān śaktaḥ trailokyasya api pārthiva
teṣām tat vacanam śrutvā krodha paryākula akṣaram

original: 1.057.006c sa rājā punar evaitān idaṃ vacanam abravīt
analyzed: sa rājā punar eva etān idam vacanam abravīt
pratyākhyātaḥ asmi guruṇā guru putraiḥ tathā eva ca

original: 1.057.007c anyāṃ gatiṃ gamiṣyāmi svasti vo 'stu tapodhanāḥ
analyzed: anyām gatim gamiṣyāmi svasti vaḥ astu tapodhanāḥ

original: 1.057.008a ṛṣiputrās tu tac chrutvā vākyaṃ ghorābhisaṃhitam
analyzed: ṛṣi putrāḥ tu tat śrutvā vākyam ghora abhisaṃhitam
śepuḥ parama saṃkruddhāḥ caṇḍāla tvam gamiṣyasi

original: 1.057.008e evam uktvā mahātmāno viviśus te svam āśramam
analyzed: evam uktvā mahātmānaḥ viviśuḥ te svam āśramam

original: 1.057.009a atha rātryāṃ vyatītāyāṃ rājā caṇḍālatāṃ gataḥ
analyzed: atha rātryām vyatītāyām rājā caṇḍāla tām gataḥ
citya mālya anulepaḥ ca āyasa ābharaṇaḥ abhavat

original: 1.057.010a taṃ dṛṣṭvā mantriṇaḥ sarve tyaktvā caṇḍālarūpiṇam
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā mantriṇaḥ sarve tyaktvā caṇḍāla rūpiṇam
prādravan sahitāḥ rāma paurāḥ ye asya anugāminaḥ

original: 1.057.011a eko hi rājā kākutstha jagāma paramātmavān
analyzed: ekaḥ hi rājā kākutstha jagāma parama ātmavān
dahyamānaḥ divārātram viśvāmitram tapodhanam

original: 1.057.012a viśvāmitras tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā rājānaṃ viphalīkṛtam
analyzed: viśvāmitraḥ tu tam dṛṣṭvā rājānam viphalīkṛtam
caṇḍāla rūpiṇam rāma muniḥ kāruṇyam āgataḥ

original: 1.057.013a kāruṇyāt sa mahātejā vākyaṃ parama dhārmikaḥ
analyzed: kāruṇyāt sa mahā tejāḥ vākyam dhārmikaḥ

original: 1.057.013c idaṃ jagāda bhadraṃ te rājānaṃ ghoradarśanam
analyzed: idam jagāda bhadram te rājānam ghora darśanam
kim āgamana kāryam te rāja putra mahā bala
ayodhyā adhipate vīra śāpāt caṇḍāla tām gataḥ

original: 1.057.015a atha tad vākyam ākarṇya rājā caṇḍālatāṃ gataḥ
analyzed: atha tat vākyam ākarṇya rājā caṇḍāla tām gataḥ
abravīt prāñjaliḥ vākyam vākya jñaḥ vākya kovidam
pratyākhyātaḥ asmi guruṇā guru putraiḥ tathā eva ca

original: 1.057.016c anavāpyaiva taṃ kāmaṃ mayā prāpto viparyayaḥ
analyzed: an avāpya eva tam kāmam mayā prāptaḥ viparyayaḥ

original: 1.057.017a saśarīro divaṃ yāyām iti me saumyadarśanam
analyzed: sa śarīraḥ divam yāyām iti me saumya darśanam

original: 1.057.017c mayā ceṣṭaṃ kratuśataṃ tac ca nāvāpyate phalam
analyzed: mayā ca iṣṭam kratu śatam tat ca na avāpyate phalam

original: 1.057.018a anṛtaṃ nokta pūrvaṃ me na ca vakṣye kadā cana
analyzed: anṛtam na ukta pūrvam me na ca vakṣye kadā cana

original: 1.057.018c kṛcchreṣv api gataḥ saumya kṣatradharmeṇa te śape
analyzed: kṛcchreṣu api gataḥ saumya kṣatra dharmeṇa te śape

original: 1.057.019a yajñair bahuvidhair iṣṭaṃ prajā dharmeṇa pālitāḥ
analyzed: yajñaiḥ bahuvidhaiḥ iṣṭam prajāḥ dharmeṇa pālitāḥ
guravaḥ ca mahātmānaḥ śīla vṛttena toṣitāḥ
dharme prayatamānasya yajñam ca āhartum icchataḥ
paritoṣam na gacchanti guravaḥ muni puṃgava

original: 1.057.021a daivam eva paraṃ manye pauruṣaṃ tu nirarthakam
analyzed: daivam eva param manye pauruṣam tu nirarthakam

original: 1.057.021c daivenākramyate sarvaṃ daivaṃ hi paramā gatiḥ
analyzed: daivena ākramyate sarvam daivam hi paramā gatiḥ
tasya me parama ārtasya prasādam abhikāṅkṣataḥ
kartum arhasi bhadram te daiva upahata karmaṇaḥ

original: 1.057.023a nānyāṃ gatiṃ gamiṣyāmi nānyaḥ śaraṇam asti me
analyzed: na anyām gatim gamiṣyāmi na anyaḥ śaraṇam asti me
daivam puruṣakāreṇa nivartayitum arhasi
ukta vākyam tu rājānam kṛpayā kuśika ātmajaḥ
abravīt madhuram vākyam sākṣāt caṇḍāla rūpiṇam

original: 1.058.002a ikṣvāko svāgataṃ vatsa jānāmi tvāṃ sudhārmikam
analyzed: ikṣvāko svāgatam vatsa jānāmi tvām su dhārmikam

original: 1.058.002c śaraṇaṃ te bhaviṣyāmi mā bhaiṣīr nṛpapuṃgava
analyzed: śaraṇam te bhaviṣyāmi mā bhaiṣīḥ nṛpa puṃgava
aham āmantraye sarvān mahā ṛṣīn puṇya karmaṇaḥ
yajña sāhya karān rājan tatas yakṣyasi nirvṛtaḥ

original: 1.058.004a guruśāpakṛtaṃ rūpaṃ yad idaṃ tvayi vartate
analyzed: guru śāpa kṛtam rūpam yat idam tvayi vartate
anena saha rūpeṇa sa śarīraḥ gamiṣyasi

original: 1.058.005a hastaprāptam ahaṃ manye svargaṃ tava nareśvara
analyzed: hasta prāptam aham manye svargam tava nareśvara

original: 1.058.005c yas tvaṃ kauśikam āgamya śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: yaḥ tvam kauśikam āgamya śaraṇyam śaraṇam gataḥ
evam uktvā mahā tejāḥ putrān parama dhārmikān
vyādideśa mahā prājñān yajña saṃbhāra kāraṇāt

original: 1.058.007a sarvāñ śiṣyān samāhūya vākyam etad uvāca ha
analyzed: sarvām śiṣyān samāhūya vākyam etat uvāca ha
sarvān ṛṣi varān vatsāḥ ānayadhvam mama ājñayā
sa śiṣyān suhṛdaḥ ca eva sa ṛtvijaḥ su bahu śrutān
yat anyaḥ vacanam brūyāt mad vākya bala coditaḥ
tat sarvam akhilena uktam mama ākhyeyam an ādṛtam

original: 1.058.010a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā diśo jagmus tadājñayā
analyzed: tasya tat vacanam śrutvā diśaḥ jagmuḥ tad ājñayā
ājagmuḥ atha deśebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ brahma vādinaḥ

original: 1.058.011a te ca śiṣyāḥ samāgamya muniṃ jvalitatejasaṃ
analyzed: te ca śiṣyāḥ samāgamya munim jvalita tejasam

original: 1.058.011c ūcuś ca vacanaṃ sarve sarveṣāṃ brahmavādinām
analyzed: ūcuḥ ca vacanam sarve sarveṣām brahma vādinām

original: 1.058.012a śrutvā te vacanaṃ sarve samāyānti dvijātayaḥ
analyzed: śrutvā te vacanam sarve samāyānti dvijātayaḥ
sarva deśeṣu ca agacchan varjayitvā mahodayam
vāsiṣṭham tat śatam sarvam krodha paryākula akṣaram

original: 1.058.013c yad āha vacanaṃ sarvaṃ śṛṇu tvaṃ munipuṃgava
analyzed: yat āha vacanam sarvam śṛṇu tvam muni puṃgava
kṣatriyaḥ yājakaḥ yasya caṇḍālasya viśeṣataḥ

original: 1.058.014c kathaṃ sadasi bhoktāro havis tasya surarṣayaḥ
analyzed: katham sadasi bhoktāraḥ haviḥ tasya sura ṛṣayaḥ
brāhmaṇāḥ vā mahātmānaḥ bhuktvā caṇḍāla bhojanam
katham svargam gamiṣyanti viśvāmitreṇa pālitāḥ
etat vacanam naiṣṭhuryam ūcuḥ saṃrakta locanāḥ
vāsiṣṭhāḥ muni śārdūla sarve te sa mahodayāḥ
teṣām tat vacanam śrutvā sarveṣām muni puṃgavaḥ
krodha saṃrakta nayanaḥ sa roṣam idam abravīt

original: 1.058.018a yad dūṣayanty aduṣṭaṃ māṃ tapa ugraṃ samāsthitam
analyzed: yat dūṣayanti aduṣṭam mām tapaḥ ugram samāsthitam
bhasmībhūtāḥ durātmānaḥ bhaviṣyanti na saṃśayaḥ
adya te kāla pāśena nītāḥ vaivasvata kṣayam
sapta jāti śatāni eva mṛtapāḥ santu sarvaśas
śva māṃsa niyata āhārāḥ muṣṭikāḥ nāma nirghṛṇāḥ

original: 1.058.020c vikṛtāś ca virūpāś ca lokān anucarantv imān
analyzed: vikṛtāḥ ca virūpāḥ ca lokān anucarantu imān

original: 1.058.021a mahodayaś ca durbuddhir mām adūṣyaṃ hy adūṣayat
analyzed: mahodayaḥ ca durbuddhiḥ mām adūṣyam hi adūṣayat
dūṣiṭaḥ sarva lokeṣu niṣāda tvam gamiṣyati
prāṇa atipāta nirataḥ niranukrośa tām gataḥ
dīrgha kālam mama krodhāt durgatim vartayiṣyati
etāvat uktvā vacanam viśvāmitraḥ mahā tapāḥ
virarāma mahā tejāḥ ṛṣi madhye mahā muniḥ
tapaḥ bala hatān kṛtvā vāsiṣṭhān sa mahodayān
ṛṣi madhye mahā tejāḥ viśvāmitraḥ abhyabhāṣata
ayam ikṣvāku dāyādaḥ triśaṅkuḥ iti viśrutaḥ

original: 1.059.002c dharmiṣṭhaś ca vadānyaś ca māṃ caiva śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: dharmiṣṭhaḥ ca vadānyaḥ ca mām ca eva śaraṇam gataḥ
svena anena śarīreṇa deva loka jigīṣayā
yathā ayam sva śarīreṇa deva lokam gamiṣyati

original: 1.059.003c tathā pravartyatāṃ yajño bhavadbhiś ca mayā saha
analyzed: tathā pravartyatām yajñaḥ bhavadbhiḥ ca mayā saha
viśvāmitra vacaḥ śrutvā sarve eva mahā ṛṣayaḥ
ūcuḥ sametya sahitāḥ dharma jñāḥ dharma saṃhitam
ayam kuśika dāyādaḥ muniḥ parama kopanaḥ

original: 1.059.005c yad āha vacanaṃ samyag etat kāryaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: yat āha vacanam samyak etat kāryam na saṃśayaḥ

original: 1.059.006a agnikalpo hi bhagavāñ śāpaṃ dāsyati roṣitaḥ
analyzed: agni kalpaḥ hi bhagavān śāpam dāsyati roṣitaḥ

original: 1.059.006c tasmāt pravartyatāṃ yajñaḥ saśarīro yathā divam
analyzed: tasmāt pravartyatām yajñaḥ sa śarīraḥ yathā divam
gacchet ikṣvāku dāyādaḥ viśvāmitrasya tejasā
tatas pravartyatām yajñaḥ sarve samadhitiṣṭhate

original: 1.059.008a evam uktvā maharṣayaḥ saṃjahrus tāḥ kriyās tadā
analyzed: evam uktvā mahā ṛṣayaḥ saṃjahruḥ tāḥ kriyāḥ tadā
yājakāḥ ca mahā tejāḥ viśvāmitraḥ abhavat kratau
ṛtvijaḥ ca ānupūrvyeṇa mantravat mantra kovidāḥ
cakruḥ sarvāṇi karmāṇi yathākalpam yathāvidhi
tatas kālena mahatā viśvāmitraḥ mahā tapāḥ
cakāra āvāhanam tatra bhāga artham sarva devatāḥ
na ahi āgaman tad āhūtāḥ bhāga artham sarva devatāḥ
tatas krodha samāviṣṭaḥ viśvamitraḥ mahā muniḥ

original: 1.059.012a sruvam udyamya sakrodhas triśaṅkum idam abravīt
analyzed: sruvam udyamya sa krodhaḥ triśaṅkum idam abravīt

original: 1.059.012c paśya me tapaso vīryaṃ svārjitasya nareśvara
analyzed: paśya me tapasaḥ vīryam sva arjitasya nareśvara

original: 1.059.013a eṣa tvāṃ svaśarīreṇa nayāmi svargam ojasā
analyzed: eṣa tvām sva śarīreṇa nayāmi svargam ojasā
duṣprāpam sva śarīreṇa divam gaccha narādhipa

original: 1.059.014a svārjitaṃ kiṃ cid apy asti mayā hi tapasaḥ phalam
analyzed: sva arjitam kim cit api asti mayā hi tapasaḥ phalam

original: 1.059.014c rājaṃs tvaṃ tejasā tasya saśarīro divaṃ vraja
analyzed: rājan tvam tejasā tasya sa śarīraḥ divam vraja
ukta vākye munau tasmin sa śarīraḥ nareśvaraḥ

original: 1.059.015c divaṃ jagāma kākutstha munīnāṃ paśyatāṃ tadā
analyzed: divam jagāma kākutstha munīnām paśyatām tadā
deva loka gatam dṛṣṭvā triśaṅkum pākaśāsanaḥ

original: 1.059.016c saha sarvaiḥ suragaṇair idaṃ vacanam abravīt
analyzed: saha sarvaiḥ sura gaṇaiḥ idam vacanam abravīt

original: 1.059.017a triśaṅko gaccha bhūyas tvaṃ nāsi svargakṛtālayaḥ
analyzed: triśaṅko gaccha bhūyas tvam na asi svarga kṛta ālayaḥ
guru śāpa hataḥ mūḍha pata bhūmim avākśirāḥ

original: 1.059.018a evam ukto mahendreṇa triśaṅkur apatat punaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ mahā indreṇa triśaṅkuḥ apatat punar
vikrośamānaḥ trāhi iti viśvāmitram tapodhanam

original: 1.059.019a tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya krośamānasya kauśikaḥ
analyzed: tat śrutvā vacanam tasya krośamānasya kauśikaḥ

original: 1.059.019c roṣam āhārayat tīvraṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
analyzed: roṣam āhārayat tīvram tiṣṭha tiṣṭha iti ca abravīt
ṛṣi madhye sa tejasvī prajāpatiḥ iva aparaḥ
sṛjan dakṣiṇa mārga sthān saptarṣīn aparān punar
nakṣatra mālām aparām asṛjat krodha mūrchitaḥ
dakṣiṇām diśam āsthāya muni madhye mahā yaśāḥ
sṛṣṭvā nakṣatra vaṃśam ca krodhena kaluṣīkṛtaḥ

original: 1.059.022c anyam indraṃ kariṣyāmi loko vā syād anindrakaḥ
analyzed: anyam indram kariṣyāmi lokaḥ vā syāt an indrakaḥ

original: 1.059.022e daivatāny api sa krodhāt sraṣṭuṃ samupacakrame
analyzed: daivatāni api sa krodhāt sraṣṭum samupacakrame
tatas parama saṃbhrāntāḥ sa ṛṣi saṃghāḥ sura ṛṣabhāḥ
viśvāmitram mahātmānam ūcuḥ sa anunayam vacaḥ
ayam rājā mahābhāga guru śāpa parikṣataḥ

original: 1.059.024c saśarīro divaṃ yātuṃ nārhaty eva tapodhana
analyzed: sa śarīraḥ divam yātum na arhati eva tapodhana
teṣām tat vacanam śrutvā devānām muni puṃgavaḥ
abravīt su mahat vākyam kauśikaḥ sarva devatāḥ

original: 1.059.026a saśarīrasya bhadraṃ vas triśaṅkor asya bhūpateḥ
analyzed: sa śarīrasya bhadram vaḥ triśaṅkoḥ asya bhūpateḥ
ārohaṇam pratijñāya na anṛtam kartum utsahe
sargaḥ astu sa śarīrasya triśaṅkoḥ asya śāśvataḥ

original: 1.059.027c nakṣatrāṇi ca sarvāṇi māmakāni dhruvāṇy atha
analyzed: nakṣatrāṇi ca sarvāṇi māmakāni dhruvāṇi atha

original: 1.059.028a yāval lokā dhariṣyanti tiṣṭhantv etāni sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: yāvat lokāḥ dhariṣyanti tiṣṭhantu etāni sarvaśas

original: 1.059.028c matkṛtāni surāḥ sarve tad anujñātum arhatha
analyzed: mad kṛtāni surāḥ sarve tat anujñātum arhatha

original: 1.059.029a evam uktāḥ surāḥ sarve pratyūcur munipuṃgavam
analyzed: evam uktāḥ surāḥ sarve pratyūcuḥ muni puṃgavam

original: 1.059.030a evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ te tiṣṭhantv etāni sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: evam bhavatu bhadram te tiṣṭhantu etāni sarvaśas
gagane tāni anekāni vaiśvānara pathāt bahis
nakṣatrāṇi muni śreṣṭha teṣu jyotiḥṣu jājvalan
avākśirāḥ triśaṅkuḥ ca tiṣṭhatu amara saṃnibhaḥ
viśvāmitraḥ tu dharma ātmā sarva devaiḥ abhiṣṭutaḥ

original: 1.059.032c ṛṣibhiś ca mahātejā bāḍham ity āha devatāḥ
analyzed: ṛṣibhiḥ ca mahā tejāḥ bāḍham iti āha devatāḥ

original: 1.059.033a tato devā mahātmāno munayaś ca tapodhanāḥ
analyzed: tatas devāḥ mahātmānaḥ munayaḥ ca tapodhanāḥ
jagmuḥ yathāgatam sarve yajñasya ante narottama

original: 1.060.001a viśvāmitro mahātmātha prasthitān prekṣya tān ṛṣīn
analyzed: viśvāmitraḥ mahātmā atha prasthitān prekṣya tān ṛṣīn
abravīt nara śārdūla sarvān tān vana vāsinaḥ
mahā vighnaḥ pravṛttaḥ ayam dakṣiṇām āsthitaḥ diśam

original: 1.060.002c diśam anyāṃ prapatsyāmas tatra tapsyāmahe tapaḥ
analyzed: diśam anyām prapatsyāmaḥ tatra tapsyāmahe tapaḥ
paścimāyām viśālāyām puṣkareṣu mahātmanaḥ

original: 1.060.003c sukhaṃ tapaś cariṣyāmaḥ paraṃ tad dhi tapovanam
analyzed: sukham tapaḥ cariṣyāmaḥ param tat hi tapaḥ vanam
evam uktvā mahā tejāḥ puṣkareṣu mahā muniḥ
tapaḥ ugram durādharṣam tepe mūla phala aśanaḥ

original: 1.060.005a etasminn eva kāle tu ayodhyādhipatir nṛpaḥ
analyzed: etasmin eva kāle tu ayodhyā adhipatiḥ nṛpaḥ
ambarīṣaḥ iti khyātaḥ yaṣṭum samupacakrame

original: 1.060.006a tasya vai yajamānasya paśum indro jahāra ha
analyzed: tasya vai yajamānasya paśum indraḥ jahāra ha

original: 1.060.006c pranaṣṭe tu paśau vipro rājānam idam abravīt
analyzed: pranaṣṭe tu paśau vipraḥ rājānam idam abravīt

original: 1.060.007a paśur adya hṛto rājan pranaṣṭas tava durnayāt
analyzed: paśuḥ adya hṛtaḥ rājan pranaṣṭaḥ tava durnayāt
arakṣitāram rājānam ghnanti doṣāḥ nareśvara

original: 1.060.008a prāyaścittaṃ mahad dhy etan naraṃ vā puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: prāyaścittam mahat hi etat naram vā puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: 1.060.008c ānayasva paśuṃ śīghraṃ yāvat karma pravartate
analyzed: ānayasva paśum śīghram yāvat karma pravartate

original: 1.060.009a upādhyāya vacaḥ śrutvā sa rājā puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: upādhyāya vacaḥ śrutvā sa rājā puruṣa ṛṣabha
anviyeṣa mahā buddhiḥ paśum gobhiḥ sahasraśas

original: 1.060.010a deśāñ janapadāṃs tāṃs tān nagarāṇi vanāni ca
analyzed: deśān janapadān tān tān nagarāṇi vanāni ca
āśramāṇi ca puṇyāni mārgamāṇaḥ mahīpatiḥ
sa putra sahitam tāta sa bhāryam raghunandana
bhṛgu tunde samāsīnam ṛcīkam saṃdadarśa ha
tam uvāca mahā tejāḥ praṇamya abhiprasādya ca
brahmarṣim tapasā dīptam rājarṣiḥ amita prabhaḥ

original: 1.060.012e pṛṣṭvā sarvatra kuśalam ṛcīkaṃ tam idaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: pṛṣṭvā sarvatra kuśalam ṛcīkam tam idam vacaḥ
gavām śata sahasreṇa vikriṇīṣe sutam yadi
paśoḥ arthe mahābhāga kṛtakṛtyaḥ asmi bhārgava

original: 1.060.014a sarve parisṛtā deśā yajñiyaṃ na labhe paśum
analyzed: sarve parisṛtāḥ deśāḥ yajñiyam na labhe paśum

original: 1.060.014c dātum arhasi mūlyena sutam ekam ito mama
analyzed: dātum arhasi mūlyena sutam ekam itas mama

original: 1.060.015a evam ukto mahātejā ṛcīkas tv abravīd vacaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ mahā tejāḥ ṛcīkaḥ tu abravīt vacaḥ

original: 1.060.015c nāhaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ naraśreṣṭhaṃ vikrīṇīyāṃ kathaṃ cana
analyzed: na aham jyeṣṭham nara śreṣṭham vikrīṇīyām katham cana

original: 1.060.016a ṛcīkasya vacaḥ śrutvā teṣāṃ mātā mahātmanām
analyzed: ṛcīkasya vacaḥ śrutvā teṣām mātā mahātmanām
uvāca nara śārdūlam ambarīṣam tapasvinī

original: 1.060.017a mamāpi dayitaṃ viddhi kaniṣṭhaṃ śunakaṃ nṛpa
analyzed: mama api dayitam viddhi kaniṣṭham śunakam nṛpa

original: 1.060.018a prāyeṇa hi naraśreṣṭha jyeṣṭhāḥ pitṛṣu vallabhāḥ
analyzed: prāyeṇa hi nara śreṣṭha jyeṣṭhāḥ pitṛṣu vallabhāḥ

original: 1.060.018c mātḥṇāṃ ca kanīyāṃsas tasmād rakṣe kanīyasaṃ
analyzed: mātḥṇām ca kanīyāṃsaḥ tasmāt rakṣe kanīyasam

original: 1.060.019a uktavākye munau tasmin munipatnyāṃ tathaiva ca
analyzed: ukta vākye munau tasmin muni patnyām tathā eva ca

original: 1.060.019c śunaḥśepaḥ svayaṃ rāma madhyamo vākyam abravīt
analyzed: śunaḥśepaḥ svayam rāma madhyamaḥ vākyam abravīt

original: 1.060.020a pitā jyeṣṭham avikreyaṃ mātā cāha kanīyasaṃ
analyzed: pitā jyeṣṭham avikreyam mātā ca āha kanīyasam

original: 1.060.020c vikrītaṃ madhyamaṃ manye rājan putraṃ nayasva mām
analyzed: vikrītam madhyamam manye rājan putram nayasva mām
gavām śata sahasreṇa śunaḥśepam nareśvaraḥ
gṛhītvā parama prītaḥ jagāma raghunandana

original: 1.060.022a ambarīṣas tu rājarṣī ratham āropya satvaraḥ
analyzed: ambarīṣaḥ tu rājarṣiḥ ratham āropya sa tvaraḥ
śunaḥśepam mahā tejāḥ jagāma āśu mahā yaśāḥ
śunaḥśepam nara śreṣṭha gṛhītvā tu mahā yaśāḥ
vyaśrāmyat puṣkare rājā madhyāhne raghunandana
tasya viśramamāṇasya śunaḥśepaḥ mahā yaśāḥ

original: 1.061.002c puṣkaraṃ śreṣṭham āgamya viśvāmitraṃ dadarśa ha
analyzed: puṣkaram śreṣṭham āgamya viśvāmitram dadarśa ha

original: 1.061.003a viṣaṇṇavadano dīnas tṛṣṇayā ca śrameṇa ca
analyzed: viṣaṇṇa vadanaḥ dīnaḥ tṛṣṇayā ca śrameṇa ca

original: 1.061.003c papātāṅke mune rāma vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha
analyzed: papāta aṅke muneḥ rāma vākyam ca idam uvāca ha

original: 1.061.004a na me 'sti mātā na pitā jñātayo bāndhavāḥ kutaḥ
analyzed: na me asti mātā na pitā jñātayaḥ bāndhavāḥ kutas

original: 1.061.004c trātum arhasi māṃ saumya dharmeṇa munipuṃgava
analyzed: trātum arhasi mām saumya dharmeṇa muni puṃgava

original: 1.061.005a trātā tvaṃ hi muniśreṣṭha sarveṣāṃ tvaṃ hi bhāvanaḥ
analyzed: trātā tvam hi muni śreṣṭha sarveṣām tvam hi bhāvanaḥ

original: 1.061.005c rājā ca kṛtakāryaḥ syād ahaṃ dīrghāyur avyayaḥ
analyzed: rājā ca kṛta kāryaḥ syāt aham dīrgha āyuḥ avyayaḥ

original: 1.061.006a svargalokam upāśnīyāṃ tapas taptvā hy anuttamam
analyzed: svarga lokam upāśnīyām tapaḥ taptvā hi anuttamam

original: 1.061.006c sa me nātho hy anāthasya bhava bhavyena cetasā
analyzed: sa me nāthaḥ hi anāthasya bhava bhavyena cetasā

original: 1.061.006e piteva putraṃ dharmātmaṃs trātum arhasi kilbiṣāt
analyzed: pitā iva putram dharma ātman trātum arhasi kilbiṣāt
tasya tat vacanam śrutvā viśvāmitraḥ mahā tapāḥ

original: 1.061.007c sāntvayitvā bahuvidhaṃ putrān idam uvāca ha
analyzed: sāntvayitvā bahuvidham putrān idam uvāca ha
yatkṛte pitaraḥ janayanti śubha arthinaḥ
paraloka hita arthāya tasya kālaḥ ayam āgataḥ

original: 1.061.009a ayaṃ munisuto bālo mattaḥ śaraṇam icchati
analyzed: ayam muni sutaḥ bālaḥ mattaḥ śaraṇam icchati
asya jīvita mātreṇa priyam kuruta putrakāḥ
sarve su kṛta karmāṇaḥ sarve dharma parāyaṇāḥ
paśu bhūtāḥ narendrasya tṛptim agneḥ prayacchata

original: 1.061.011a nāthavāṃś ca śunaḥśepo yajñaś cāvighnato bhavet
analyzed: nāthavān ca śunaḥśepaḥ yajñaḥ ca avighnataḥ bhavet

original: 1.061.011c devatās tarpitāś ca syur mama cāpi kṛtaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: devatāḥ tarpitāḥ ca syuḥ mama ca api kṛtam vacaḥ

original: 1.061.012a munes tu vacanaṃ śrutvā madhuṣyandādayaḥ sutāḥ
analyzed: muneḥ tu vacanam śrutvā madhuṣyanda ādayaḥ sutāḥ
sa abhimānam nara śreṣṭha sa līlam idam abruvan
katham ātma sutān hitvā trāyase anya sutam vibho

original: 1.061.013c akāryam iva paśyāmaḥ śvamāṃsam iva bhojane
analyzed: akāryam iva paśyāmaḥ śva māṃsam iva bhojane

original: 1.061.014a teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā putrāṇāṃ munipuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: teṣām tat vacanam śrutvā putrāṇām muni puṃgavaḥ
krodha saṃrakta nayanaḥ vyāhartum upacakrame

original: 1.061.015a niḥsādhvasam idaṃ proktaṃ dharmād api vigarhitam
analyzed: niḥsādhvasam idam proktam dharmāt api vigarhitam
atikramya tu mad vākyam dāruṇam roma harṣaṇam
śva māṃsa bhojinaḥ sarve vāsiṣṭhāḥ iva jātiṣu
pūrṇam varṣa sahasram tu pṛthivyām anuvatsyatha
kṛtvā śāpa samāyuktān putrān muni varaḥ tadā
śunaḥśepam uvāca ārtam kṛtvā rakṣām nirāmayām
pavitra pāśaiḥ āsaktaḥ rakta mālya anulepanaḥ

original: 1.061.018c vaiṣṇavaṃ yūpam āsādya vāgbhir agnim udāhara
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam yūpam āsādya vāgbhiḥ agnim udāhara

original: 1.061.019a ime tu gāthe dve divye gāyethā muniputraka
analyzed: ime tu gāthe dve divye gāyethāḥ muni putraka
ambarīṣasya yajñe asmin tatas siddhim avāpsyasi

original: 1.061.020a śunaḥśepo gṛhītvā te dve gāthe susamāhitaḥ
analyzed: śunaḥśepaḥ gṛhītvā te dve gāthe su samāhitaḥ

original: 1.061.020c tvarayā rājasiṃhaṃ tam ambarīṣam uvāca ha
analyzed: tvarayā rāja siṃham tam ambarīṣam uvāca ha
rāja siṃha mahāsattva śīghram gacchāvahe sadaḥ
nivartayasva rāja indra dīkṣām ca samupāhara

original: 1.061.022a tad vākyam ṛṣiputrasya śrutvā harṣaṃ samutsukaḥ
analyzed: tat vākyam ṛṣi putrasya śrutvā harṣam samutsukaḥ
jagāma nṛpatiḥ śīghram yajña vāṭam atandritaḥ
sadasya anumate rājā pavitra kṛta lakṣaṇam

original: 1.061.023c paśuṃ raktāmbaraṃ kṛtvā yūpe taṃ samabandhayat
analyzed: paśum rakta ambaram kṛtvā yūpe tam samabandhayat

original: 1.061.024a sa baddho vāgbhir agryābhir abhituṣṭāva vai surau
analyzed: sa baddhaḥ vāgbhiḥ agryābhiḥ abhituṣṭāva vai surau
indram indrānujam ca eva yathāvat muni putrakaḥ
tatas prītaḥ sahasrākṣaḥ rahasya stuti tarpitaḥ

original: 1.061.025c dīrgham āyus tadā prādāc chunaḥśepāya rāghava
analyzed: dīrgham āyuḥ tadā prādāt śunaḥśepāya rāghava

original: 1.061.026a sa ca rājā naraśreṣṭha yajñasya ca samāptavān
analyzed: sa ca rājā nara śreṣṭha yajñasya ca samāptavān
phalam bahuguṇam rāma sahasrākṣa prasāda jam
viśvāmitraḥ api dharma ātmā bhūyas tepe mahā tapāḥ
puṣkareṣu nara śreṣṭha daśa varṣa śatāni ca
pūrṇe varṣa sahasre tu vrata snātam mahā munim
abhyāgacchan surāḥ sarve tapaḥ phala cikīrṣavaḥ
abravīt su mahā tejāḥ brahmā su ruciram vacaḥ

original: 1.062.002c ṛṣis tvam asi bhadraṃ te svārjitaiḥ karmabhiḥ śubhaiḥ
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ tvam asi bhadram te sva arjitaiḥ karmabhiḥ śubhaiḥ

original: 1.062.003a tam evam uktvā deveśas tridivaṃ punar abhyagāt
analyzed: tam evam uktvā deveśaḥ tridivam punar abhyagāt

original: 1.062.003c viśvāmitro mahātejā bhūyas tepe mahat tapaḥ
analyzed: viśvāmitraḥ mahā tejāḥ bhūyas tepe mahat tapaḥ
tatas kālena mahatā menakā paramā apsarāḥ
puṣkareṣu nara śreṣṭha snātum samupacakrame
tām dadarśa mahā tejāḥ menakām kuśika ātmajaḥ
rūpeṇa apratimām tatra vidyutam jalade yathā

original: 1.062.006a dṛṣṭvā kandarpavaśago munis tām idam abravīt
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā kandarpa vaśagaḥ muniḥ tām idam abravīt

original: 1.062.006c apsaraḥ svāgataṃ te 'stu vasa ceha mamāśrame
analyzed: apsaraḥ svāgatam te astu vasa ca iha mama āśrame
anugṛhṇīṣva bhadram te madanena su mohitam

original: 1.062.007a ity uktā sā varārohā tatrāvāsam athākarot
analyzed: iti uktā sā varārohā tatra āvāsam atha akarot
tapasaḥ hi mahā vighnaḥ viśvāmitram upāgataḥ

original: 1.062.008a tasyāṃ vasantyāṃ varṣāṇi pañca pañca ca rāghava
analyzed: tasyām vasantyām varṣāṇi pañca pañca ca rāghava
viśvāmitra āśrame saumya sukhena vyaticakramuḥ

original: 1.062.009a atha kāle gate tasmin viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ
analyzed: atha kāle gate tasmin viśvāmitraḥ mahā muniḥ
sa vrīḍaḥ iva saṃvṛttaḥ cintā śoka parāyaṇaḥ
buddhiḥ muneḥ samutpannā sa amarṣā raghunandana
sarvam surāṇām karma etat tapaḥ apaharaṇam mahat
ahorātra apadeśena gatāḥ saṃvatsarāḥ daśa
kāma moha abhibhūtasya vighnaḥ ayam pratyupasthitaḥ
viniḥśvasan muni varaḥ paścāt tāpena duḥkhitaḥ

original: 1.062.013a bhītām apsarasaṃ dṛṣṭvā vepantīṃ prāñjaliṃ sthitām
analyzed: bhītām apsarasam dṛṣṭvā vepantīm prāñjalim sthitām
menakām madhuraiḥ vākyaiḥ visṛjya kuśika ātmajaḥ

original: 1.062.013e uttaraṃ parvataṃ rāma viśvāmitro jagāma ha
analyzed: uttaram parvatam rāma viśvāmitraḥ jagāma ha

original: 1.062.014a sa kṛtvā naiṣṭhikīṃ buddhiṃ jetukāmo mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: sa kṛtvā naiṣṭhikīm buddhim jetu kāmaḥ mahā yaśāḥ
kauśikī tīram āsādya tapaḥ tepe su dāruṇam

original: 1.062.015a tasya varṣasahasraṃ tu ghoraṃ tapa upāsataḥ
analyzed: tasya varṣa sahasram tu ghoram tapaḥ upāsataḥ

original: 1.062.015c uttare parvate rāma devatānām abhūd bhayam
analyzed: uttare parvate rāma devatānām abhūt bhayam
amantrayan samāgamya sarve sa ṛṣi gaṇāḥ surāḥ
mahā ṛṣi śabdam labhatām sādhu ayam kuśika ātmajaḥ
devatānām vacaḥ śrutvā sarva loka pitāmahaḥ
abravīt madhuram vākyam viśvāmitram tapodhanam
mahā ṛṣe svāgatam vatsa tapasā ugreṇa toṣitaḥ
mahattvam ṛṣi mukhya tvam dadāmi tava kauśika

original: 1.062.019a brahmaṇaḥ sa vacaḥ śrutvā viśvāmitras tapodhanaḥ
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ sa vacaḥ śrutvā viśvāmitraḥ tapodhanaḥ
prāñjaliḥ praṇataḥ bhūtvā pratyuvāca pitāmaham

original: 1.062.020a brahmarṣi śabdam atulaṃ svārjitaiḥ karmabhiḥ śubhaiḥ
analyzed: brahmarṣi śabdam atulam sva arjitaiḥ karmabhiḥ śubhaiḥ

original: 1.062.020c yadi me bhagavān āha tato 'haṃ vijitendriyaḥ
analyzed: yadi me bhagavān āha tatas aham vijita indriyaḥ

original: 1.062.021a tam uvāca tato brahmā na tāvat tvaṃ jitendriyaḥ
analyzed: tam uvāca tatas brahmā na tāvat tvam jita indriyaḥ

original: 1.062.021c yatasva muniśārdūla ity uktvā tridivaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: yatasva muni śārdūlaḥ iti uktvā tridivam gataḥ
viprasthiteṣu deveṣu viśvāmitraḥ mahā muniḥ
ūrdhva bāhuḥ nirālambaḥ vāyubhakṣaḥ tapaḥ caran
dharme pañcatapāḥ bhūtvā varṣāsu ākāśa saṃśrayaḥ
śiśire salila sthāyī rātri ahāni tapodhanaḥ

original: 1.062.024a evaṃ varṣasahasraṃ hi tapo ghoram upāgamat
analyzed: evam varṣa sahasram hi tapaḥ ghoram upāgamat
tasmin saṃtapyamāne tu viśvāmitre mahā munau

original: 1.062.025a saṃbhramaḥ sumahān āsīt surāṇāṃ vāsavasya ca
analyzed: saṃbhramaḥ su mahān āsīt surāṇām vāsavasya ca

original: 1.062.025c rambhām apsarasaṃ śakraḥ saha sarvair marudgaṇaiḥ
analyzed: rambhām apsarasam śakraḥ saha sarvaiḥ marut gaṇaiḥ
uvāca ātma hitam vākyam ahitam kauśikasya ca

original: 1.063.001a surakāryam idaṃ rambhe kartavyaṃ sumahat tvayā
analyzed: sura kāryam idam rambhe kartavyam su mahat tvayā
lobhanam kauśikasya iha kāma moha samanvitam
tathā uktā sā apsarāḥ rāma sahasrākṣeṇa dhīmatā
vrīḍitā prāñjaliḥ bhūtvā pratyuvāca sureśvaram
ayam surapate ghoraḥ viśvāmitraḥ mahā muniḥ

original: 1.063.003c krodham utsrakṣyate ghoraṃ mayi deva na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: krodham utsrakṣyate ghoram mayi deva na saṃśayaḥ

original: 1.063.003e tato hi me bhayaṃ deva prasādaṃ kartum arhasi
analyzed: tatas hi me bhayam deva prasādam kartum arhasi
tām uvāca sahasrākṣaḥ vepamānām kṛta añjalim

original: 1.063.004c mā bhaiṣi rambhe bhadraṃ te kuruṣva mama śāsanam
analyzed: mā bhaiṣi rambhe bhadram te kuruṣva mama śāsanam
aham kandarpa sahitaḥ sthāsyāmi tava pārśvatas

original: 1.063.006a tvaṃ hi rūpaṃ bahuguṇaṃ kṛtvā paramabhāsvaram
analyzed: tvam hi rūpam bahu guṇam kṛtvā parama bhāsvaram

original: 1.063.006c tam ṛṣiṃ kauśikaṃ rambhe bhedayasva tapasvinam
analyzed: tam ṛṣim kauśikam rambhe bhedayasva tapasvinam

original: 1.063.007a sā śrutvā vacanaṃ tasya kṛtvā rūpam anuttamam
analyzed: sā śrutvā vacanam tasya kṛtvā rūpam anuttamam
lobhayām āsa lalitā viśvāmitram śuci smitā

original: 1.063.008a kokilasya tu śuśrāva valgu vyāharataḥ svanam
analyzed: kokilasya tu śuśrāva valgu vyāharataḥ svanam
saṃprahṛṣṭena manasā tatas enām udaikṣata

original: 1.063.009a atha tasya ca śabdena gītenāpratimena ca
analyzed: atha tasya ca śabdena gītena apratimena ca

original: 1.063.009c darśanena ca rambhāyā muniḥ saṃdeham āgataḥ
analyzed: darśanena ca rambhāyāḥ muniḥ saṃdeham āgataḥ
sahasrākṣasya tat karma vijñāya muni puṃgavaḥ
rambhām krodha samāviṣṭaḥ śaśāpa kuśika ātmajaḥ
yat mām lobhayase rambhe kāma krodha jaya eṣiṇam
daśa varṣa sahasrāṇi śailī sthāsyasi durbhage
brāhmaṇaḥ su mahā tejāḥ tapaḥ bala samanvitaḥ
uddhariṣyati rambhe tvām mad krodha kaluṣīkṛtām
evam uktvā mahā tejāḥ viśvāmitraḥ mahā muniḥ
a śaknuvan dhārayitum kopam saṃtāpam āgataḥ

original: 1.063.014a tasya śāpena mahatā rambhā śailī tadābhavat
analyzed: tasya śāpena mahatā rambhā śailī tadā abhavat

original: 1.063.014c vacaḥ śrutvā ca kandarpo maharṣeḥ sa ca nirgataḥ
analyzed: vacaḥ śrutvā ca kandarpaḥ mahā ṛṣeḥ sa ca nirgataḥ
kopena sa mahā tejāḥ tapaḥ apaharaṇe kṛte

original: 1.063.015c indriyair ajitai rāma na lebhe śāntim ātmanaḥ
analyzed: indriyaiḥ ajitaiḥ rāma na lebhe śāntim ātmanaḥ

original: 1.064.001a atha haimavatīṃ rāma diśaṃ tyaktvā mahāmuniḥ
analyzed: atha haimavatīm rāma diśam tyaktvā mahā muniḥ

original: 1.064.001c pūrvāṃ diśam anuprāpya tapas tepe sudāruṇam
analyzed: pūrvām diśam anuprāpya tapaḥ tepe su dāruṇam
maunam varṣa sahasrasya kṛtvā vratam anuttamam
cakāra apratimam rāma tapaḥ parama duṣkaram
pūrṇe varṣa sahasre tu kāṣṭha bhūtam mahā munim

original: 1.064.003c vighnair bahubhir ādhūtaṃ krodho nāntaram āviśat
analyzed: vighnaiḥ bahubhiḥ ādhūtam krodhaḥ na antaram āviśat
tatas devāḥ sa gandharvāḥ pannaga asura rākṣasāḥ
mohitāḥ tejasā tasya tapasā manda raśmayaḥ
kaśmala upahatāḥ sarve pitāmaham atha abruvan
bahubhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ deva viśvāmitraḥ mahā muniḥ
lobhitaḥ krodhitaḥ ca eva tapasā ca abhivardhate

original: 1.064.006a na hy asya vṛjinaṃ kiṃ cid dṛśyate sūkṣmam apy atha
analyzed: na hi asya vṛjinam kim cit dṛśyate sūkṣmam api atha

original: 1.064.006c na dīyate yadi tv asya manasā yad abhīpsitam
analyzed: na dīyate yadi tu asya manasā yat abhīpsitam
vināśayati trailokyam tapasā sacarācaram

original: 1.064.006g vyākulāś ca diśaḥ sarvā na ca kiṃ cit prakāśate
analyzed: vyākulāḥ ca diśaḥ sarvāḥ na ca kim cit prakāśate

original: 1.064.007a sāgarāḥ kṣubhitāḥ sarve viśīryante ca parvatāḥ
analyzed: sāgarāḥ kṣubhitāḥ sarve viśīryante ca parvatāḥ

original: 1.064.007c prakampate ca pṛthivī vāyur vāti bhṛśākulaḥ
analyzed: prakampate ca pṛthivī vāyuḥ vāti bhṛśa ākulaḥ

original: 1.064.008a buddhiṃ na kurute yāvan nāśe deva mahāmuniḥ
analyzed: buddhim na kurute yāvat nāśe deva mahā muniḥ
tāvat prasādyaḥ bhagavān agni rūpaḥ mahā dyutiḥ
kālāgninā yathā pūrvam trailokyam dahyate akhilam

original: 1.064.009c devarājye cikīrṣeta dīyatām asya yan matam
analyzed: deva rājye cikīrṣeta dīyatām asya yat matam
tatas sura gaṇāḥ sarve pitāmaha purogamāḥ
viśvāmitram mahātmānam vākyam madhuram abruvan

original: 1.064.011a brahmarṣe svāgataṃ te 'stu tapasā sma sutoṣitāḥ
analyzed: brahmarṣe svāgatam te astu tapasā sma su toṣitāḥ
brāhmaṇyam tapasā ugreṇa prāptavān asi kauśika

original: 1.064.012a dīrgham āyuś ca te brahman dadāmi samarudgaṇaḥ
analyzed: dīrgham āyuḥ ca te brahman dadāmi sa marut gaṇaḥ

original: 1.064.012c svasti prāpnuhi bhadraṃ te gaccha saumya yathāsukham
analyzed: svasti prāpnuhi bhadram te gaccha saumya yathāsukham
pitāmaha vacaḥ śrutvā sarveṣām ca divaukasām
kṛtvā praṇāmam muditaḥ vyājahāra mahā muniḥ

original: 1.064.014a brāhmaṇyaṃ yadi me prāptaṃ dīrgham āyus tathaiva ca
analyzed: brāhmaṇyam yadi me prāptam dīrgham āyuḥ tathā eva ca

original: 1.064.014c oṃkāro 'tha vaṣaṭkāro vedāś ca varayantu mām
analyzed: oṃkāraḥ atha vaṣaṭkāraḥ vedāḥ ca varayantu mām
kṣatra veda vidām śreṣṭhaḥ brahmaveda vidām api

original: 1.064.015c brahmaputro vasiṣṭho mām evaṃ vadatu devatāḥ
analyzed: brahma putraḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ mām evam vadatu devatāḥ

original: 1.064.015e yady ayaṃ paramaḥ kāmaḥ kṛto yāntu surarṣabhāḥ
analyzed: yadi ayam paramaḥ kāmaḥ kṛtaḥ yāntu sura ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 1.064.016a tataḥ prasādito devair vasiṣṭho japatāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: tatas prasāditaḥ devaiḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ japatām varaḥ

original: 1.064.016c sakhyaṃ cakāra brahmarṣir evam astv iti cābravīt
analyzed: sakhyam cakāra brahmarṣiḥ evam astu iti ca abravīt

original: 1.064.017a brahmarṣitvaṃ na saṃdehaḥ sarvaṃ saṃpatsyate tava
analyzed: brahmarṣi tvam na saṃdehaḥ sarvam saṃpatsyate tava

original: 1.064.017c ity uktvā devatāś cāpi sarvā jagmur yathāgatam
analyzed: iti uktvā devatāḥ ca api sarvāḥ jagmuḥ yathāgatam
viśvāmitraḥ api dharma ātmā labdhvā brāhmaṇyam uttamam

original: 1.064.018c pūjayām āsa brahmarṣiṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ japatāṃ varam
analyzed: pūjayām āsa brahmarṣim vasiṣṭham japatām varam

original: 1.064.019a kṛtakāmo mahīṃ sarvāṃ cacāra tapasi sthitaḥ
analyzed: kṛta kāmaḥ mahīm sarvām cacāra tapasi sthitaḥ

original: 1.064.019c evaṃ tv anena brāhmaṇyaṃ prāptaṃ rāma mahātmanā
analyzed: evam tu anena brāhmaṇyam prāptam rāma mahātmanā

original: 1.064.020a eṣa rāma muniśreṣṭha eṣa vigrahavāṃs tapaḥ
analyzed: eṣa rāma muni śreṣṭhaḥ eṣa vigrahavān tapaḥ

original: 1.064.020c eṣa dharmaḥ paro nityaṃ vīryasyaiṣa parāyaṇam
analyzed: eṣa dharmaḥ paraḥ nityam vīryasya eṣa parāyaṇam
śatānanda vacaḥ śrutvā rāma lakṣmaṇa saṃnidhau
janakaḥ prāñjaliḥ vākyam uvāca kuśika ātmajam
dhanyaḥ asmi anugṛhītaḥ asmi yasya me muni puṃgava

original: 1.064.022c yajñaṃ kākutstha sahitaḥ prāptavān asi dhārmika
analyzed: yajñam kākutstha sahitaḥ prāptavān asi dhārmika
pāvitaḥ aham tvayā brahman darśanena mahā mune

original: 1.064.023c guṇā bahuvidhāḥ prāptās tava saṃdarśanān mayā
analyzed: guṇāḥ bahuvidhāḥ prāptāḥ tava saṃdarśanāt mayā

original: 1.064.024a vistareṇa ca te brahman kīrtyamānaṃ mahat tapaḥ
analyzed: vistareṇa ca te brahman kīrtyamānam mahat tapaḥ

original: 1.064.024c śrutaṃ mayā mahātejo rāmeṇa ca mahātmanā
analyzed: śrutam mayā mahā tejaḥ rāmeṇa ca mahātmanā

original: 1.064.025a sadasyaiḥ prāpya ca sadaḥ śrutās te bahavo guṇāḥ
analyzed: sadasyaiḥ prāpya ca sadaḥ śrutāḥ te bahavaḥ guṇāḥ

original: 1.064.026a aprameyaṃ tapas tubhyam aprameyaṃ ca te balam
analyzed: aprameyam tapaḥ tubhyam aprameyam ca te balam

original: 1.064.026c aprameyā guṇāś caiva nityaṃ te kuśikātmaja
analyzed: aprameyāḥ guṇāḥ ca eva nityam te kuśika ātmaja

original: 1.064.027a tṛptir āścaryabhūtānāṃ kathānāṃ nāsti me vibho
analyzed: tṛptiḥ āścarya bhūtānām kathānām nā asti me vibho
karma kālaḥ muni śreṣṭha lambate ravi maṇḍalam

original: 1.064.028a śvaḥ prabhāte mahātejo draṣṭum arhasi māṃ punaḥ
analyzed: śvas prabhāte mahā tejaḥ draṣṭum arhasi mām punar

original: 1.064.028c svāgataṃ tapasāṃ śreṣṭha mām anujñātum arhasi
analyzed: svāgatam tapasām śreṣṭha mām anujñātum arhasi
evam uktvā muni śreṣṭham vaidehaḥ mithilā adhipaḥ
pradakṣiṇam cakāra āśu sa upādhyāyaḥ sa bāndhavaḥ
viśvāmitraḥ api dharma ātmā saharāmaḥ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
svam vāṭam abhicakrāma pūjyamānaḥ mahā ṛṣibhiḥ
tatas prabhāte vimale kṛta karmā narādhipaḥ
viśvāmitram mahātmānam ājuhāva sa rāghavam
tam arcayitvā dharma ātmā śāstra dṛṣṭena karmaṇā

original: 1.065.002c rāghavau ca mahātmānau tadā vākyam uvāca ha
analyzed: rāghavau ca mahātmānau tadā vākyam uvāca ha

original: 1.065.003a bhagavan svāgataṃ te 'stu kiṃ karomi tavānagha
analyzed: bhagavan svāgatam te astu kim karomi tava anagha

original: 1.065.003c bhavān ājñāpayatu mām ājñāpyo bhavatā hy aham
analyzed: bhavān ājñāpayatu mām ājñāpyaḥ bhavatā hi aham

original: 1.065.004a evam uktaḥ sa dharmātmā janakena mahātmanā
analyzed: evam uktaḥ sa dharma ātmā janakena mahātmanā
pratyuvāca muniḥ vīram vākyam vākya viśāradaḥ
putrau daśarathasya imau kṣatriyau loka viśrutau

original: 1.065.005c draṣṭukāmau dhanuḥ śreṣṭhaṃ yad etat tvayi tiṣṭhati
analyzed: draṣṭu kāmau dhanuḥ śreṣṭham yat etat tvayi tiṣṭhati

original: 1.065.006a etad darśaya bhadraṃ te kṛtakāmau nṛpātmajau
analyzed: etat darśaya bhadram te kṛta kāmau nṛpa ātmajau
darśanāt asya dhanuṣaḥ yatheṣṭam pratiyāsyataḥ

original: 1.065.007a evam uktas tu janakaḥ pratyuvāca mahāmunim
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu janakaḥ pratyuvāca mahā munim

original: 1.065.007c śrūyatām asya dhanuṣo yad artham iha tiṣṭhati
analyzed: śrūyatām asya dhanuṣaḥ yat artham iha tiṣṭhati

original: 1.065.008a devarāta iti khyāto nimeḥ ṣaṣṭho mahīpatiḥ
analyzed: devarātaḥ iti khyātaḥ nimeḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ mahīpatiḥ

original: 1.065.008c nyāso 'yaṃ tasya bhagavan haste datto mahātmanā
analyzed: nyāsaḥ ayam tasya bhagavan haste dattaḥ mahātmanā
dakṣa yajña vadhe pūrvam dhanuḥ āyamya vīryavān

original: 1.065.009c rudras tu tridaśān roṣāt salilam idam abravīt
analyzed: rudraḥ tu tridaśān roṣāt salilam idam abravīt

original: 1.065.010a yasmād bhāgārthino bhāgān nākalpayata me surāḥ
analyzed: yasmāt bhāga arthinaḥ bhāgān na akalpayata me surāḥ
vara aṅgāni mahārhāṇi dhanuṣā śātayāmi vaḥ

original: 1.065.011a tato vimanasaḥ sarve devā vai munipuṃgava
analyzed: tatas vimanasaḥ sarve devāḥ vai muni puṃgava
prasādayanti deveśam teṣām prītaḥ abhavat bhavaḥ

original: 1.065.012a prītiyuktaḥ sa sarveṣāṃ dadau teṣāṃ mahātmanām
analyzed: prīti yuktaḥ sa sarveṣām dadau teṣām mahātmanām
tat etat devadevasya dhanuḥ ratnam mahātmanaḥ

original: 1.065.013c nyāsabhūtaṃ tadā nyastam asmākaṃ pūrvake vibho
analyzed: nyāsa bhūtam tadā nyastam asmākam pūrvake vibho

original: 1.065.014a atha me kṛṣataḥ kṣetraṃ lāṅgalād utthitā mama
analyzed: atha me kṛṣataḥ kṣetram lāṅgalāt utthitāḥ mama

original: 1.065.014c kṣetraṃ śodhayatā labdhvā nāmnā sīteti viśrutā
analyzed: kṣetram śodhayatā labdhvā nāmnā sītā iti viśrutā

original: 1.065.015a bhūtalād utthitā sā tu vyavardhata mamātmajā
analyzed: bhū talāt utthitā sā tu vyavardhata mama ātmajā
vīrya śulkā iti me kanyā sthāpitā iyam a yoni jā

original: 1.065.016a bhūtalād utthitāṃ tāṃ tu vardhamānāṃ mamātmajām
analyzed: bhū talāt utthitām tām tu vardhamānām mama ātmajām
varayām āsuḥ āgamya rājānaḥ muni puṃgava
teṣām varayatām kanyām sarveṣām pṛthivīkṣitām

original: 1.065.017c vīryaśulketi bhagavan na dadāmi sutām aham
analyzed: vīrya śulkā iti bhagavat na dadāmi sutām aham
tatas sarve nṛpatayaḥ sametya muni puṃgava
mithilām abhyupāgamya vīryam jijñāsavaḥ tadā
teṣām jijñāsamānānām vīryam dhanuḥ upāhṛtam

original: 1.065.019c na śekur grahaṇe tasya dhanuṣas tolane 'pi vā
analyzed: na śekuḥ grahaṇe tasya dhanuṣaḥ tolane api vā

original: 1.065.020a teṣāṃ vīryavatāṃ vīryam alpaṃ jñātvā mahāmune
analyzed: teṣām vīryavatām vīryam alpam jñātvā mahā mune
pratyākhyātāḥ nṛpatayaḥ tat nibodha tapodhana
tatas parama kopena rājānaḥ muni puṃgava
arundhan mithilām sarve vīrya saṃdeham āgatāḥ
ātmānam avadhūtam te vijñāya muni puṃgava
roṣeṇa mahatā āviṣṭāḥ pīḍayan mithilām purīm

original: 1.065.023a tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe kṣayaṃ yātāni sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: tatas saṃvatsare pūrṇe kṣayam yātāni sarvaśas
sādhanāni muniḥ eṣṭha tatas aham bhṛśa duḥkhitaḥ
tatas deva gaṇān sarvān tapasā aham prasādayam
daduḥ ca parama prītāḥ catur aṅga balam surāḥ

original: 1.065.025a tato bhagnā nṛpatayo hanyamānā diśo yayuḥ
analyzed: tatas bhagnāḥ nṛpatayaḥ hanyamānāḥ diśaḥ yayuḥ
avīryāḥ vīrya saṃdigdhā sa amātyāḥ pāpa kāriṇaḥ
tat etat muni śārdūla dhanuḥ parama bhāsvaram
rāma lakṣmaṇayoḥ ca api darśayiṣyāmi suvrata

original: 1.065.027a yady asya dhanuṣo rāmaḥ kuryād āropaṇaṃ mune
analyzed: yadi asya dhanuṣaḥ rāmaḥ kuryāt āropaṇam mune

original: 1.065.027c sutām ayonijāṃ sītāṃ dadyāṃ dāśarather aham
analyzed: sutām a yoni jām sītām dadyām dāśaratheḥ aham
janakasya vacaḥ śrutvā viśvāmitraḥ mahā muniḥ

original: 1.066.001c dhanur darśaya rāmāya iti hovāca pārthivam
analyzed: dhanuḥ darśaya rāmāya iti ha uvāca pārthivam

original: 1.066.002a tataḥ sa rājā janakaḥ sacivān vyādideśa ha
analyzed: tatas sa rājā janakaḥ sacivān vyādideśa ha
dhanuḥ ānīyatām divyam gandha mālya vibhūṣitam
janakena samādiṣṭhāḥ sacivāḥ prāviśan purīm

original: 1.066.003c tad dhanuḥ purataḥ kṛtvā nirjagmuḥ pārthivājñayā
analyzed: tat dhanuḥ puratas kṛtvā nirjagmuḥ pārthiva ājñayā
śatāni pañcāśat vyāyatānām mahātmanām

original: 1.066.004c mañjūṣām aṣṭacakrāṃ tāṃ samūhas te kathaṃ cana
analyzed: mañjūṣām aṣṭa cakrām tām samūhaḥ te katham cana

original: 1.066.005a tām ādāya tu mañjūṣām āyatīṃ yatra tad dhanuḥ
analyzed: tām ādāya tu mañjūṣām āyatīm yatra tat dhanuḥ

original: 1.066.005c suropamaṃ te janakam ūcur nṛpati mantriṇaḥ
analyzed: sura upamam te janakam ūcuḥ nṛpati mantriṇaḥ
idam dhanuḥ varam rājan pūjitam sarva rājabhiḥ
mithilā adhipa rāja indra darśanīyam yadi icchasi

original: 1.066.007a teṣāṃ nṛpo vacaḥ śrutvā kṛtāñjalir abhāṣata
analyzed: teṣām nṛpaḥ vacaḥ śrutvā kṛtāñjaliḥ abhāṣata
viśvāmitram mahātmānam tau ca ubhau rāma lakṣmaṇau
idam dhanuḥ varam brahmam janakaiḥ abhipūjitam

original: 1.066.008c rājabhiś ca mahāvīryair aśakyaṃ pūrituṃ tadā
analyzed: rājabhiḥ ca mahā vīryaiḥ aśakyam pūritum tadā

original: 1.066.009a naitat suragaṇāḥ sarve nāsurā na ca rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: na etat sura gaṇāḥ sarve na asurāḥ na ca rākṣasāḥ
gandharva yakṣa pravarāḥ sa kiṃnara mahoragāḥ

original: 1.066.010a kva gatir mānuṣāṇāṃ ca dhanuṣo 'sya prapūraṇe
analyzed: kva gatiḥ mānuṣāṇām ca dhanuṣaḥ asya prapūraṇe
āropaṇe samāyoge vepane tolane api vā

original: 1.066.011a tad etad dhanuṣāṃ śreṣṭham ānītaṃ munipuṃgava
analyzed: tat etat dhanuṣām śreṣṭham ānītam muni puṃgava
darśaya etat mahābhāga anayoḥ rāja putrayoḥ
viśvāmitraḥ tu dharma ātmā śrutvā janaka bhāṣitam

original: 1.066.012c vatsa rāma dhanuḥ paśya iti rāghavam abravīt
analyzed: vatsa rāma dhanuḥ paśya iti rāghavam abravīt

original: 1.066.013a maharṣer vacanād rāmo yatra tiṣṭhati tad dhanuḥ
analyzed: mahā ṛṣeḥ vacanāt rāmaḥ yatra tiṣṭhati tat dhanuḥ

original: 1.066.013c mañjūṣāṃ tām apāvṛtya dṛṣṭvā dhanur athābravīt
analyzed: mañjūṣām tām apāvṛtya dṛṣṭvā dhanuḥ atha abravīt
idam dhanuḥ varam brahman saṃspṛśāmi iha pāṇinā

original: 1.066.014c yatnavāṃś ca bhaviṣyāmi tolane pūraṇe 'pi vā
analyzed: yatnavān ca bhaviṣyāmi tolane pūraṇe api vā

original: 1.066.015a bāḍham ity eva taṃ rājā muniś ca samabhāṣata
analyzed: bāḍham iti eva tam rājā muniḥ ca samabhāṣata

original: 1.066.015c līlayā sa dhanur madhye jagrāha vacanān muneḥ
analyzed: līlayā sa dhanuḥ madhye jagrāha vacanāt muneḥ
paśyatām nṛ sahasrāṇām bahūnām raghunandanaḥ

original: 1.066.016c āropayat sa dharmātmā salīlam iva tad dhanuḥ
analyzed: āropayat sa dharma ātmā sa līlam iva tat dhanuḥ

original: 1.066.017a āropayitvā maurvīṃ ca pūrayām āsa vīryavān
analyzed: āropayitvā maurvīm ca pūrayām āsa vīryavān

original: 1.066.017c tad babhañja dhanur madhye naraśreṣṭho mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: tat babhañja dhanuḥ madhye nara śreṣṭhaḥ mahā yaśāḥ
tasya śabdaḥ mahān āsīt nirghāta sama niḥsvanaḥ
bhūmikampaḥ ca su mahān parvatasya iva dīryataḥ

original: 1.066.019a nipetuś ca narāḥ sarve tena śabdena mohitāḥ
analyzed: nipetuḥ ca narāḥ sarve tena śabdena mohitāḥ

original: 1.066.019c vrajayitvā munivaraṃ rājānaṃ tau ca rāghavau
analyzed: vrajayitvā muni varam rājānam tau ca rāghavau
pratyāśvastaḥ jane tasmin rājā vigata sādhvasaḥ
uvāca prāñjaliḥ vākyam vākya jñaḥ muni puṃgavam
bhagavan dṛṣṭa vīryaḥ me rāmaḥ daśaratha ātmajaḥ

original: 1.066.021c atyadbhutam acintyaṃ ca atarkitam idaṃ mayā
analyzed: atyadbhutam acintyam ca a tarkitam idam mayā

original: 1.066.022a janakānāṃ kule kīrtim āhariṣyati me sutā
analyzed: janakānām kule kīrtim āhariṣyati me sutā
sītā bhartāram āsādya rāmam daśaratha ātmajam

original: 1.066.023a mama satyā pratijñā ca vīryaśulketi kauśika
analyzed: mama satyā pratijñā ca vīrya śulkā iti kauśika

original: 1.066.023c sītā prāṇair bahumatā deyā rāmāya me sutā
analyzed: sītā prāṇaiḥ bahu matā deyā rāmāya me sutā
bhavataḥ anumate brahmam śīghram gacchantu mantriṇaḥ

original: 1.066.024c mama kauśika bhadraṃ te ayodhyāṃ tvaritā rathaiḥ
analyzed: mama kauśika bhadram te ayodhyām tvaritāḥ rathaiḥ

original: 1.066.025a rājānaṃ praśritair vākyair ānayantu puraṃ mama
analyzed: rājānam praśritaiḥ vākyaiḥ ānayantu puram mama
pradānam vīrya śulkāḥ kathayantu ca sarvaśas

original: 1.066.026a muniguptau ca kākutsthau kathayantu nṛpāya vai
analyzed: muni guptau ca kākutsthau kathayantu nṛpāya vai
prīyamāṇam tu rājānam ānayantu su śīghra gāḥ

original: 1.066.027a kauśikaś ca tathety āha rājā cābhāṣya mantriṇaḥ
analyzed: kauśikaḥ ca tathā iti āha rājā ca ābhāṣya mantriṇaḥ
ayodhyām preṣayām āsa dharma ātmā kṛta śāsanāt
janakena samādiṣṭāḥ dūtāḥ te klānta vāhanāḥ

original: 1.067.001c trirātram uṣitvā mārge te 'yodhyāṃ prāviśan purīm
analyzed: tri rātram uṣitvā mārge te ayodhyām prāviśan purīm
te rāja vacanāt dūtāḥ rāja veśma praveśitāḥ
dadṛśuḥ deva saṃkāśam vṛddham daśaratham nṛpam
baddhāñjali puṭāḥ sarve dūtāḥ vigata sādhvasāḥ
rājānam prayatāḥ vākyam abruvan madhura akṣaram
maithilaḥ janakaḥ rājā sa agnihotra puraskṛtaḥ
kuśalam ca avyayam ca eva sa upādhyāya purohitam
muhur muhur madhurayā sneha saṃyuktayā girā
janakaḥ tvām mahā rāja pṛcchate sa puraḥsaram
pṛṣṭvā kuśalam avyagram vaidehaḥ mithilā adhipaḥ
kauśika anumate vākyam bhavantam idam abravīt
pūrvam pratijñā viditā vīrya śulkā mama ātmajā
rājānaḥ ca kṛta āmarṣāḥ nirvīryāḥ vimukhīkṛtāḥ

original: 1.067.008a seyaṃ mama sutā rājan viśvāmitra puraḥsaraiḥ
analyzed: sā iyam mama sutā rājan viśvāmitra puraḥsaraiḥ
yadṛcchayā āgataiḥ vīraiḥ nirjitā tava putrakaiḥ

original: 1.067.009a tac ca rājan dhanur divyaṃ madhye bhagnaṃ mahātmanā
analyzed: tat ca rājan dhanuḥ divyam madhye bhagnam mahātmanā
rāmeṇa hi mahā rāja mahatyām jana saṃsadi

original: 1.067.010a asmai deyā mayā sītā vīryaśulkā mahātmane
analyzed: asmai deyā mayā sītā vīrya śulkā mahātmane

original: 1.067.010c pratijñāṃ tartum icchāmi tad anujñātum arhasi
analyzed: pratijñām tartum icchāmi tat anujñātum arhasi
sa upādhyāyaḥ mahā rāja purohita puraskṛtaḥ

original: 1.067.011c śīghram āgaccha bhadraṃ te draṣṭum arhasi rāghavau
analyzed: śīghram āgaccha bhadram te draṣṭum arhasi rāghavau

original: 1.067.012a prītiṃ ca mama rājendra nirvartayitum arhasi
analyzed: prītim ca mama rāja indra nirvartayitum arhasi

original: 1.067.012c putrayor ubhayor eva prītiṃ tvam api lapsyase
analyzed: putrayoḥ ubhayoḥ eva prītim tvam api lapsyase
evam videha adhipatiḥ madhuram vākyam abravīt
viśvāmitra abhyanujñātaḥ śatānanda mate sthitaḥ

original: 1.067.014a dūtavākyaṃ tu tac chrutvā rājā paramaharṣitaḥ
analyzed: dūta vākyam tu tat śrutvā rājā parama harṣitaḥ

original: 1.067.014c vasiṣṭhaṃ vāmadevaṃ ca mantriṇo 'nyāṃś ca so 'bravīt
analyzed: vasiṣṭham vāmadevam ca mantriṇaḥ anyān ca saḥ abravīt
guptaḥ kuśika putreṇa kausalyā ānanda vardhanaḥ

original: 1.067.015c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā videheṣu vasaty asau
analyzed: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā videheṣu vasati asau
dṛṣṭa vīryaḥ tu kākutsthaḥ janakena mahātmanā

original: 1.067.016c saṃpradānaṃ sutāyās tu rāghave kartum icchati
analyzed: saṃpradānam sutāyāḥ tu rāghave kartum icchati

original: 1.067.017a yadi vo rocate vṛttaṃ janakasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: yadi vaḥ rocate vṛttam janakasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 1.067.017c purīṃ gacchāmahe śīghraṃ mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ
analyzed: purīm gacchāmahe śīghram mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ

original: 1.067.018a mantriṇo bāḍham ity āhuḥ saha sarvair maharṣibhiḥ
analyzed: mantriṇaḥ bāḍham iti āhuḥ saha sarvaiḥ mahā ṛṣibhiḥ

original: 1.067.018c suprītaś cābravīd rājā śvo yātreti sa mantriṇaḥ
analyzed: su prītaḥ ca abravīt rājā śvas yātrā iti sa mantriṇaḥ
mantriṇaḥ tu narendrasya rātrim parama satkṛtāḥ

original: 1.067.019c ūṣuḥ pramuditāḥ sarve guṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ samanvitāḥ
analyzed: ūṣuḥ pramuditāḥ sarve guṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ samanvitāḥ
tatas rātryām vyatītāyām sa upādhyāyaḥ sa bāndhavaḥ

original: 1.068.001c rājā daśaratho hṛṣṭaḥ sumantram idam abravīt
analyzed: rājā daśarathaḥ hṛṣṭaḥ sumantram idam abravīt

original: 1.068.002a adya sarve dhanādhyakṣā dhanam ādāya puṣkalam
analyzed: adya sarve dhana adhyakṣāḥ dhanam ādāya puṣkalam
vrajantu agre su vihitāḥ nānā ratna samanvitāḥ
catur aṅga balam ca api śīghram niryātu sarvaśas
mama ājñā sama kālam ca yāna yugyam anuttamam

original: 1.068.004a vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca jābālir atha kāśyapaḥ
analyzed: vasiṣṭhaḥ vāmadevaḥ ca jābāliḥ atha kāśyapaḥ

original: 1.068.004c mārkaṇḍeyaś ca dīrghāyur ṛṣiḥ kātyāyanas tathā
analyzed: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ ca dīrgha āyuḥ ṛṣiḥ kātyāyanaḥ tathā

original: 1.068.005a ete dvijāḥ prayāntv agre syandanaṃ yojayasva me
analyzed: ete dvijāḥ prayāntu agre syandanam yojayasva me

original: 1.068.005c yathā kālātyayo na syād dūtā hi tvarayanti mām
analyzed: yathā kāla atyayaḥ na syāt dūtāḥ hi tvarayanti mām

original: 1.068.006a vacanāc ca narendrasya sā senā caturaṅgiṇī
analyzed: vacanāt ca narendrasya sā senā caturaṅgiṇī
rājānam ṛṣibhiḥ sārdham vrajantam pṛṣṭhatas anvagāt
gatvā caturaham mārgam videhān abhyupeyivān

original: 1.068.007c rājā tu janakaḥ śrīmāñ śrutvā pūjām akalpayat
analyzed: rājā tu janakaḥ śrīmām śrutvā pūjām akalpayat

original: 1.068.008a tato rājānam āsādya vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam
analyzed: tatas rājānam āsādya vṛddham daśaratham nṛpam

original: 1.068.008c janako mudito rājā harṣaṃ ca paramaṃ yayau
analyzed: janakaḥ muditaḥ rājā harṣam ca paramam yayau
uvāca na nara śreṣṭhaḥ nara śreṣṭham mudā anvitam

original: 1.068.009a svāgataṃ te mahārāja diṣṭyā prāpto 'si rāghava
analyzed: svāgatam te mahā rāja diṣṭyā prāptaḥ asi rāghava
putrayoḥ ubhayoḥ prītim lapsyase vīrya nirjitām

original: 1.068.010a diṣṭyā prāpto mahātejā vasiṣṭho bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: diṣṭyā prāptaḥ mahā tejāḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ bhagavān ṛṣiḥ

original: 1.068.010c saha sarvair dvijaśreṣṭhair devair iva śatakratuḥ
analyzed: saha sarvaiḥ dvijaśreṣṭhaiḥ devaiḥ iva śatakratuḥ

original: 1.068.011a diṣṭyā me nirjitā vighnā diṣṭyā me pūjitaṃ kulam
analyzed: diṣṭyā me nirjitāḥ vighnāḥ diṣṭyā me pūjitam kulam
rāghavaiḥ saha saṃbandhāt vīrya śreṣṭhaiḥ mahātmabhiḥ
śvas prabhāte narendra indra nirvartayitum arhasi
yajñasya ante nara śreṣṭha vivāham ṛṣi saṃmatam
tasya tat vacanam śrutvā ṛṣi madhye narādhipaḥ
vākyam vākya vidām śreṣṭhaḥ pratyuvāca mahīpatim

original: 1.068.014a pratigraho dātṛvaśaḥ śrutam etan mayā purā
analyzed: pratigrahaḥ dātṛ vaśaḥ śrutam etat mayā purā

original: 1.068.014c yathā vakṣyasi dharmajña tat kariṣyāmahe vayam
analyzed: yathā vakṣyasi dharma jña tat kariṣyāmahe vayam

original: 1.068.015a tad dharmiṣṭhaṃ yaśasyaṃ ca vacanaṃ satyavādinaḥ
analyzed: tat dharmiṣṭham yaśasyam ca vacanam satya vādinaḥ
śrutvā videha adhipatiḥ param vismayam āgataḥ
tatas sarve muni gaṇāḥ paraspara samāgame

original: 1.068.016c harṣeṇa mahatā yuktās tāṃ niśām avasan sukham
analyzed: harṣeṇa mahatā yuktāḥ tām niśām avasan sukham

original: 1.068.017a rājā ca rāghavau putrau niśāmya pariharṣitaḥ
analyzed: rājā ca rāghavau putrau niśāmya pariharṣitaḥ
uvāsa parama prītaḥ janakena su pūjitaḥ
janakaḥ api mahā tejāḥ kriyāḥ dharmeṇa tattva vid

original: 1.068.018c yajñasya ca sutābhyāṃ ca kṛtvā rātrim uvāsa ha
analyzed: yajñasya ca sutābhyām ca kṛtvā rātrim uvāsa ha
tatas prabhāte janakaḥ kṛta karmā mahā ṛṣibhiḥ
uvāca vākyam vākya jñaḥ śatānandam purohitam
bhrātā mama mahā tejāḥ yavīyān ati dhārmikaḥ

original: 1.069.002c kuśadhvaja iti khyātaḥ purīm adhyavasac chubhām
analyzed: kuśadhvajaḥ iti khyātaḥ purīm adhyavasat śubhām
vāri āphalaka paryantām piban ikṣumatīm nadīm
sāṃkāśyām puṇya saṃkāśām vimānam iva puṣpakam

original: 1.069.004a tam ahaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi yajñagoptā sa me mataḥ
analyzed: tam aham draṣṭum icchāmi yajña goptā sa me mataḥ

original: 1.069.004c prītiṃ so 'pi mahātejā iṃmāṃ bhoktā mayā saha
analyzed: prītim saḥ api mahā tejāḥ iṃmām bhoktā mayā saha
śāsanāt tu narendrasya prayayuḥ śīghra vājibhiḥ
samānetum nara vyāghram viṣṇum indra ājñayā yathā
ājñayā tu narendrasya ājagāma kuśadhvajaḥ
sa dadarśa mahātmānam janakam dharma vatsalam
saḥ abhivādya śatānandam rājānam ca api dhārmikam
rāja arham paramam divyam āsanam ca adhyarohata

original: 1.069.008c upaviṣṭāv ubhau tau tu bhrātarāv amitaujasau
analyzed: upaviṣṭau ubhau tau tu bhrātarau amita ojasau
preṣayām āsatuḥ vīrau mantri śreṣṭham sudāmanam
gaccha mantri pate śīghram aikṣvākam amita prabham
ātmajaiḥ saha durdharṣam ānayasva sa mantriṇam

original: 1.069.010a aupakāryāṃ sa gatvā tu raghūṇāṃ kulavardhanam
analyzed: aupakāryām sa gatvā tu raghūṇām kula vardhanam
dadarśa śirasā ca enam abhivādya idam abravīt
ayodhyā adhipate vīra vaidehaḥ mithilā adhipaḥ
sa tvām draṣṭum vyavasitaḥ sa upādhyāya purohitam
mantri śreṣṭha vacaḥ śrutvā rājā sa ṛṣi gaṇaḥ tadā

original: 1.069.012c sabandhur agamat tatra janako yatra vartate
analyzed: sa bandhuḥ agamat tatra janakaḥ yatra vartate
sa rājā mantri sahitaḥ sa upādhyāyaḥ sa bāndhavaḥ

original: 1.069.013c vākyaṃ vākyavidāṃ śreṣṭho vaideham idam abravīt
analyzed: vākyam vākya vidām śreṣṭhaḥ vaideham idam abravīt
viditam te mahā rājaḥ ikṣvāku kula daivatam

original: 1.069.014c vaktā sarveṣu kṛtyeṣu vasiṣṭho bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: vaktā sarveṣu kṛtyeṣu vasiṣṭhaḥ bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
viśvāmitra abhyanujñātaḥ saha sarvaiḥ mahā ṛṣibhiḥ

original: 1.069.015c eṣa vakṣyati dharmātmā vasiṣṭho me yathākramam
analyzed: eṣa vakṣyati dharma ātmā vasiṣṭhaḥ me yathākramam
tūṣṇīṃbhūte daśarathe vasiṣṭhaḥ bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
uvāca vākyam vākya jñaḥ vaideham sa purohitam

original: 1.069.017c tasmān marīciḥ saṃjajñe marīceḥ kaśyapaḥ sutaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt marīciḥ saṃjajñe marīceḥ kaśyapaḥ sutaḥ

original: 1.069.018a vivasvān kaśyapāj jajñe manur vaivaivataḥ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: vivasvān kaśyapāt jajñe manuḥ vaivaivataḥ smṛtaḥ

original: 1.069.018c manuḥ prajāpatiḥ pūrvam ikṣvākus tu manoḥ sutaḥ
analyzed: manuḥ prajāpatiḥ pūrvam ikṣvākuḥ tu manoḥ sutaḥ

original: 1.069.019a tam ikṣvākum ayodhyāyāṃ rājānaṃ viddhi pūrvakam
analyzed: tam ikṣvākum ayodhyāyām rājānam viddhi pūrvakam

original: 1.069.019c ikṣvākos tu sutaḥ śrīmān vikukṣir udapadyata
analyzed: ikṣvākoḥ tu sutaḥ śrīmān vikukṣiḥ udapadyata

original: 1.069.020a vikukṣes tu mahātejā bāṇaḥ putraḥ pratāpavān
analyzed: vikukṣeḥ tu mahā tejāḥ bāṇaḥ putraḥ pratāpavān
bāṇasya tu mahā tejāḥ anaraṇyaḥ pratāpavān

original: 1.069.021a anaraṇyāt pṛthur jajñe triśaṅkus tu pṛthoḥ sutaḥ
analyzed: anaraṇyāt pṛthuḥ jajñe triśaṅkuḥ tu pṛthoḥ sutaḥ
triśaṅkoḥ abhavat putraḥ dhundhumāraḥ mahā yaśāḥ
dhundhumārāt mahā tejāḥ yuvanāśvaḥ mahā rathaḥ
yuvanāśva sutaḥ śrīmān māndhātā pṛthivīpatiḥ

original: 1.069.023a māndhātus tu sutaḥ śrīmān susaṃdhir udapadyata
analyzed: māndhātuḥ tu sutaḥ śrīmān susaṃdhiḥ udapadyata

original: 1.069.023c susaṃdher api putrau dvau dhruvasaṃdhiḥ prasenajit
analyzed: susaṃdheḥ api putrau dvau dhruvasaṃdhiḥ prasenajit

original: 1.069.024a yaśasvī dhruvasaṃdhes tu bharato nāma nāmataḥ
analyzed: yaśasvī dhruvasaṃdheḥ tu bharataḥ nāma nāmataḥ

original: 1.069.024c bharatāt tu mahātejā asito nāma jāyata
analyzed: bharatāt tu mahā tejāḥ asitaḥ nāma jāyata

original: 1.069.025a saha tena gareṇaiva jātaḥ sa sagaro 'bhavat
analyzed: saha tena gareṇa eva jātaḥ sa sagaraḥ abhavat
sagarasya asamañjaḥ tu asamañjāt atha aṃśumān
dilīpaḥ aṃśumataḥ putraḥ dilīpasya bhagīrathaḥ

original: 1.069.026c bhagīrathāt kakutsthaś ca kakutsthasya raghus tathā
analyzed: bhagīrathāt kakutsthaḥ ca kakutsthasya raghuḥ tathā

original: 1.069.027a raghos tu putras tejasvī pravṛddhaḥ puruṣādakaḥ
analyzed: raghoḥ tu putraḥ tejasvī pravṛddhaḥ puruṣādakaḥ

original: 1.069.027c kalmāṣapādo hy abhavat tasmāj jātas tu śaṅkhaṇaḥ
analyzed: kalmāṣapādaḥ hi abhavat tasmāt jātaḥ tu śaṅkhaṇaḥ
sudarśanaḥ śaṅkhaṇasya agnivarṇaḥ sudarśanāt

original: 1.069.028c śīghragas tv agnivarṇasya śīghragasya maruḥ sutaḥ
analyzed: śīghragaḥ tu agnivarṇasya śīghragasya maruḥ sutaḥ

original: 1.069.029a maroḥ praśuśrukas tv āsīd ambarīṣaḥ praśuśrukāt
analyzed: maroḥ praśuśrukaḥ tu āsīt ambarīṣaḥ praśuśrukāt
ambarīṣasya putraḥ abhūt nahuṣaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ

original: 1.069.030a nahuṣasya yayātis tu nābhāgas tu yayātijaḥ
analyzed: nahuṣasya yayātiḥ tu nābhāgaḥ tu yayāti jaḥ
nābhāgasya bhabhūva ajaḥ ajāt daśarathaḥ abhavat
tasmāt daśarathāt jātau bhrātarau rāma lakṣmaṇau
ādi vaṃśa viśuddhānām rājñām parama dharmiṇām
ikṣvāku kula jātānām vīrāṇām satya vādinām
rāma lakṣmaṇayoḥ arthe tvad sute varaye nṛpa
sadṛśābhyām nara śreṣṭha sadṛśe dātum arhasi
evam bruvāṇam janakaḥ pratyuvāca kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: 1.070.001c śrotum arhasi bhadraṃ te kulaṃ naḥ kīrtitaṃ param
analyzed: śrotum arhasi bhadram te kulam naḥ kīrtitam param
pradāne hi muni śreṣṭha kulam niravaśeṣataḥ
vaktavyam kula jātena tat nibodha mahā mune

original: 1.070.003a rājābhūt triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ svena karmaṇā
analyzed: rājā abhūt triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ svena karmaṇā
nimiḥ parama dharma ātmā sarva sattvavatām varaḥ

original: 1.070.004a tasya putro mithir nāma janako mithi putrakaḥ
analyzed: tasya putraḥ mithiḥ nāma janakaḥ mithi putrakaḥ

original: 1.070.004c prathamo janako nāma janakād apy udāvasuḥ
analyzed: prathamaḥ janakaḥ nāma janakāt api udāvasuḥ

original: 1.070.005a udāvasos tu dharmātmā jāto vai nandivardhanaḥ
analyzed: udāvasoḥ tu dharma ātmā jātaḥ vai nandivardhanaḥ

original: 1.070.005c nandivardhana putras tu suketur nāma nāmataḥ
analyzed: nandivardhana putraḥ tu suketuḥ nāma nāmataḥ
suketoḥ api dharma ātmā devarātaḥ mahā balaḥ
devarātasya rājarṣeḥ bṛhadrathaḥ iti śrutaḥ
bṛhadrathasya śūraḥ abhūt mahā vīraḥ pratāpavān
mahāvīrasya dhṛtimān sudhṛtiḥ satya vikramaḥ
sudhṛteḥ api dharma ātmā dhṛṣṭaketuḥ su dhārmikaḥ

original: 1.070.008c dhṛṣṭaketos tu rājarṣer haryaśva iti viśrutaḥ
analyzed: dhṛṣṭaketoḥ tu rājarṣeḥ haryaśvaḥ iti viśrutaḥ

original: 1.070.009a haryaśvasya maruḥ putro maroḥ putraḥ pratīndhakaḥ
analyzed: haryaśvasya maruḥ putraḥ maroḥ putraḥ pratīndhakaḥ
pratīndhakasya dharma ātmā rājā kīrtirathaḥ sutaḥ
putraḥ kīrtirathasya api devamīḍhaḥ iti smṛtaḥ
devamīḍhasya vibudhaḥ vibudhasya mahīdhrakaḥ
kīrtirātasya rājarṣeḥ mahāromā vyajāyata
mahāroṃṇaḥ tu dharma ātmā svarṇaromā vyajāyata
tu rājarṣeḥ hrasvaromā vyajāyata
tasya putra dvayam jajñe dharma jñasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 1.070.013c jyeṣṭho 'ham anujo bhrātā mama vīraḥ kuśadhvajaḥ
analyzed: jyeṣṭhaḥ aham anujaḥ bhrātā mama vīraḥ kuśadhvajaḥ

original: 1.070.014a māṃ tu jyeṣṭhaṃ pitā rājye so 'bhiṣicya narādhipaḥ
analyzed: mām tu jyeṣṭham pitā rājye saḥ abhiṣicya narādhipaḥ

original: 1.070.014c kuśadhvajaṃ samāveśya bhāraṃ mayi vanaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: kuśa dhvajam samāveśya bhāram mayi vanam gataḥ

original: 1.070.015a vṛddhe pitari svaryāte dharmeṇa dhuram āvaham
analyzed: vṛddhe pitari svaryāte dharmeṇa dhuram āvaham
bhrātaram deva saṃkāśam snehāt paśyan kuśadhvajam

original: 1.070.016a kasya cit tv atha kālasya sāṃkāśyād agamat purāt
analyzed: kasya cit tu atha kālasya sāṃkāśyāt agamat purāt
sudhanvā vīryavān rājā mithilām avarodhakaḥ

original: 1.070.017a sa ca me preṣayām āsa śaivaṃ dhanur anuttamam
analyzed: sa ca me preṣayām āsa śaivam dhanuḥ anuttamam

original: 1.070.017c sītā kanyā ca padmākṣī mahyaṃ vai dīyatām iti
analyzed: sītā kanyā ca padma akṣī mahyam vai dīyatām iti

original: 1.070.018a tasyāpradānād brahmarṣe yuddham āsīn mayā saha
analyzed: tasya apradānāt brahmarṣe yuddham āsīt mayā saha

original: 1.070.018c sa hato 'bhimukho rājā sudhanvā tu mayā raṇe
analyzed: sa hataḥ abhimukhaḥ rājā sudhanvā tu mayā raṇe
nihatya tam muni śreṣṭha sudhanvānam narādhipam
sāṃkāśye bhrātaram śūram abhyaṣiñcam kuśadhvajam

original: 1.070.020a kanīyān eṣa me bhrātā ahaṃ jyeṣṭho mahāmune
analyzed: kanīyān eṣa me bhrātā aham jyeṣṭhaḥ mahā mune
dadāmi parama prītaḥ vadhvau te muni puṃgava

original: 1.070.021a sītāṃ rāmāya bhadraṃ te ūrmilāṃ lakṣmaṇāya ca
analyzed: sītām rāmāya bhadram te ūrmilām lakṣmaṇāya ca
vīrya śulkām mama sutām sītām sura sutā upamām

original: 1.070.022a dvitīyām ūrmilāṃ caiva trir vadāmi na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: dvitīyām ūrmilām ca eva tris vadāmi na saṃśayaḥ
dadāmi parama prītaḥ vadhvau te raghunandana
rāma lakṣmaṇayoḥ rājan go dānam kārayasva ha

original: 1.070.023c pitṛkāryaṃ ca bhadraṃ te tato vaivāhikaṃ kuru
analyzed: pitṛ kāryam ca bhadram te tatas vaivāhikam kuru

original: 1.070.024a maghā hy adya mahābāho tṛtīye divase prabho
analyzed: maghā hi adya mahā bāho tṛtīye divase prabho

original: 1.070.024c phalgunyām uttare rājaṃs tasmin vaivāhikaṃ kuru
analyzed: phalgunyām uttare rājan tasmin vaivāhikam kuru
rāma lakṣmaṇayoḥ arthe dānam kāryam sukha udayam
tam uktavantam vaideham viśvāmitraḥ mahā muniḥ
uvāca vacanam vīram vasiṣṭha sahitaḥ nṛpam
acintyāni aprameyāni kulāni nara puṃgava

original: 1.071.002c ikṣvākūṇāṃ videhānāṃ naiṣāṃ tulyo 'sti kaś cana
analyzed: ikṣvākūṇām videhānām na eṣām tulyaḥ asti kaḥ cana
sadṛśaḥ dharma saṃbandhaḥ sadṛśaḥ rūpa saṃpadā
rāma lakṣmaṇayoḥ rājan sītā ca ūrmilayā saha

original: 1.071.004a vaktavyaṃ na naraśreṣṭha śrūyatāṃ vacanaṃ mama
analyzed: vaktavyam na nara śreṣṭha śrūyatām vacanam mama

original: 1.071.005a bhrātā yavīyān dharmajña eṣa rājā kuśadhvajaḥ
analyzed: bhrātā yavīyān dharma jñaḥ eṣa rājā kuśadhvajaḥ
asya dharma ātmanaḥ rājan rūpeṇa apratimam bhuvi
sutāḥ dvayam nara śreṣṭha patnī artham varayāmahe
bharatasya kumārasya śatrughnasya ca dhīmataḥ

original: 1.071.006c varayema sute rājaṃs tayor arthe mahātmanoḥ
analyzed: varayema sute rājan tayoḥ arthe mahātmanoḥ
putrāḥ daśarathasya ime rūpa yauvana śālinaḥ
lokapāla upamāḥ sarve deva tulya parākramāḥ
ubhayoḥ api rāja indra saṃbandhena anubadhyatām
ikṣvāku kulam avyagram bhavataḥ puṇya karmaṇaḥ
viśvāmitra vacaḥ śrutvā vasiṣṭhasya mate tadā
janakaḥ prāñjaliḥ vākyam uvāca muni puṃgavau
sadṛśam kula saṃbandham yat ājñāpayathaḥ svayam

original: 1.071.010c evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ vaḥ kuśadhvajasute ime
analyzed: evam bhavatu bhadram vaḥ kuśadhvaja sute ime
patnyau bhajetām sahitau śatrughna bharatau ubhau
eka ahnā rāja putrīṇām catasḥṇām mahā mune
pāṇīn gṛhṇantu catvāraḥ rāja putrāḥ mahā balāḥ
uttare divase brahman phalgunībhyām manīṣiṇaḥ
vaivāhikam praśaṃsanti bhagaḥ yatra prajāpatiḥ

original: 1.071.013a evam uktvā vacaḥ saumyaṃ pratyutthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: evam uktvā vacaḥ saumyam pratyutthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: 1.071.013c ubhau munivarau rājā janako vākyam abravīt
analyzed: ubhau muni varau rājā janakaḥ vākyam abravīt

original: 1.071.014a paro dharmaḥ kṛto mahyaṃ śiṣyo 'smi bhavatoḥ sadā
analyzed: paraḥ dharmaḥ kṛtaḥ mahyam śiṣyaḥ asmi bhavatoḥ sadā
imāni āsana mukhyāni āsetām muni puṃgavau
yathā daśarathasya iyam tathā ayodhyā purī mama

original: 1.071.015c prabhutve nāsit saṃdeho yathārhaṃ kartum arhathaḥ
analyzed: prabhu tve na asit saṃdehaḥ yathārham kartum arhathaḥ
tathā bruvati vaidehe janake raghunandanaḥ
rājā daśarathaḥ hṛṣṭaḥ pratyuvāca mahīpatim
yuvām asaṃkhyeya guṇau bhrātarau mithileśvarau
ṛṣayaḥ rāja saṃghāḥ ca bhavadbhyām abhipūjitāḥ

original: 1.071.018a svasti prāpnuhi bhadraṃ te gamiṣyāmi svam ālayam
analyzed: svasti prāpnuhi bhadram te gamiṣyāmi svam ālayam
śrāddha karmāṇi sarvāṇi vidhāsye iti ca abravīt

original: 1.071.019a tam āpṛṣṭvā narapatiṃ rājā daśarathas tadā
analyzed: tam āpṛṣṭvā narapatim rājā daśarathaḥ tadā
muni indrau tau puraskṛtya jagāma āśu mahā yaśāḥ

original: 1.071.020a sa gatvā nilayaṃ rājā śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā vidhānataḥ
analyzed: sa gatvā nilayam rājā śrāddham kṛtvā vidhānataḥ

original: 1.071.020c prabhāte kālyam utthāya cakre godānam uttamam
analyzed: prabhāte kālyam utthāya cakre godānam uttamam
gavām śata sahasrāṇi brāhmaṇebhyaḥ narādhipaḥ

original: 1.071.021c ekaikaśo dadau rājā putrān uddhiśya dharmataḥ
analyzed: ekaikaśas dadau rājā putrān uddhiśya dharmataḥ
suvarṇa śṛṅgāḥ saṃpannāḥ sa vatsāḥ kāṃsya dohanāḥ
gavām śata sahasrāṇi catvāri puruṣa ṛṣabhaḥ

original: 1.071.023a vittam anyac ca subahu dvijebhyo raghunandanaḥ
analyzed: vittam anyat ca su bahu dvijebhyaḥ raghunandanaḥ
dadau godānam uddiśya putrāṇām putra vatsalaḥ

original: 1.071.024a sa sutaiḥ kṛtagodānair vṛtaś ca nṛpatis tadā
analyzed: sa sutaiḥ kṛta godānaiḥ vṛtaḥ ca nṛpatiḥ tadā
lokapālaiḥ iva ābhāti vṛtaḥ saumyaḥ prajāpatiḥ

original: 1.072.001a yasmiṃs tu divase rājā cakre godānam uttamam
analyzed: yasmin tu divase rājā cakre godānam uttamam

original: 1.072.001c tasmiṃs tu divase śūro yudhājit samupeyivān
analyzed: tasmin tu divase śūraḥ yudhājit samupeyivān
putraḥ kekaya rājasya sākṣāt bharata mātulaḥ

original: 1.072.002c dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭvā ca kuśalaṃ rājānam idam abravīt
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭvā ca kuśalam rājānam idam abravīt
kekaya adhipatiḥ rājā snehāt kuśalam abravīt
yeṣām kuśala kāmaḥ asi teṣām saṃprati anāmayam
svasrīyam mama rāja indra draṣṭu kāmaḥ mahīpate
tad artham upayātaḥ aham ayodhyām raghunandana

original: 1.072.005a śrutvā tv ahaym ayodhyāyāṃ vivāhārthaṃ tāv ātmajān
analyzed: śrutvā tu ahaym ayodhyāyām vivāha artham tau ātmajān

original: 1.072.005c mithilām upayātās tu tvayā saha mahīpate
analyzed: mithilām upayātāḥ tu tvayā saha mahīpate
tvarayā abhupayātaḥ aham draṣṭu kāmaḥ svasuḥ sutam
atha rājā daśarathaḥ priya atithim
dṛṣṭvā parama satkāraiḥ pūjā arham samapūjayat

original: 1.072.007c tatas tām uṣito rātriṃ saha putrair mahātmabhiḥ
analyzed: tatas tām uṣitaḥ rātrim saha putraiḥ mahātmabhiḥ
ṛṣīn tadā puraskṛtya yajña vāṭam upāgamat
yukte muhūrte vijaye sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitaiḥ
bhrātṛbhiḥ sahitaḥ rāmaḥ kṛta kautukamaṅgalaḥ

original: 1.072.009a vasiṣṭhaṃ purataḥ kṛtvā maharṣīn aparān api
analyzed: vasiṣṭham puratas kṛtvā mahā ṛṣīn aparān api
rājā raśarathaḥ rājan kṛta kautukamaṅgalaiḥ
putraiḥ nara vara śreṣṭha dātāram abhikāṅkṣate
dātṛ pratigrahītṛbhyām sarva arthāḥ prabhavanti hi
svadharmam pratipadyasva kṛtvā vaivāhyam uttamam
iti uktaḥ parama udāraḥ vasiṣṭhena mahātmanā
pratyuvāca mahā tejāḥ vākyam parama dharma vid

original: 1.072.013a kaḥ sthitaḥ pratihāro me kasyājñā saṃpratīkṣyate
analyzed: kaḥ sthitaḥ pratihāraḥ me kasya ājñā saṃpratīkṣyate

original: 1.072.013c svagṛhe ko vicāro 'sti yathā rājyam idaṃ tava
analyzed: sva gṛhe kaḥ vicāraḥ asti yathā rājyam idam tava
kṛta kautuka sarvasvāḥ vedi mūlam upāgatāḥ

original: 1.072.014c mama kanyā muniśreṣṭha dīptā vahner ivārciṣaḥ
analyzed: mama kanyāḥ muni śreṣṭha dīptāḥ vahneḥ iva arciṣaḥ
sajjaḥ aham tvad pratīkṣaḥ asmi vedyām asyām pratiṣhitaḥ

original: 1.072.015c avighnaṃ kurutāṃ rājā kimarthaṃ hi vilambyate
analyzed: avighnam kurutām rājā kimartham hi vilambyate
tat vākyam janakena uktam śrutvā daśarathaḥ tadā

original: 1.072.016c praveśayām āsa sutān sarvān ṛṣigaṇān api
analyzed: praveśayām āsa sutān sarvān ṛṣi gaṇān api
abravīt janakaḥ rājā kausalyā ānanda vardhanam

original: 1.072.017c iyaṃ sītā mama sutā sahadharmacarī tava
analyzed: iyam sītā mama sutā sahadharmacarī tava

original: 1.072.017e pratīccha caināṃ bhadraṃ te pāṇiṃ gṛhṇīṣva pāṇinā
analyzed: pratīccha ca enām bhadram te pāṇim gṛhṇīṣva pāṇinā

original: 1.072.018a lakṣmaṇāgaccha bhadraṃ te ūrmilām udyatāṃ mayā
analyzed: lakṣmaṇa āgaccha bhadram te ūrmilām udyatām mayā

original: 1.072.018c pratīccha pāṇiṃ gṛhṇīṣva mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ
analyzed: pratīccha pāṇim gṛhṇīṣva mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ

original: 1.072.019a tam evam uktvā janako bharataṃ cābhyabhāṣata
analyzed: tam evam uktvā janakaḥ bharatam ca abhyabhāṣata
gṛhāṇa pāṇim māṇḍavyāḥ pāṇinā raghunandana
śatrughnam ca api dharma ātmā abravīt janaka īśvaraḥ
śruta kīrtyā mahā bāho pāṇim gṛhṇīṣva pāṇinā

original: 1.072.021a sarve bhavantaḥ saṃyāś ca sarve sucaritavratāḥ
analyzed: sarve bhavantaḥ saṃyāḥ ca sarve su carita vratāḥ

original: 1.072.021c patnībhiḥ santu kākutsthā mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ
analyzed: patnībhiḥ santu kākutsthāḥ mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ

original: 1.072.022a janakasya vacaḥ śrutvā pāṇīn pāṇibhir aspṛśan
analyzed: janakasya vacaḥ śrutvā pāṇīn pāṇibhiḥ aspṛśan

original: 1.072.022c catvāras te catasṛṇāṃ vasiṣṭhasya mate sthitāḥ
analyzed: catvāraḥ te catasṛṇām vasiṣṭhasya mate sthitāḥ

original: 1.072.023a agniṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā vediṃ rājānam eva ca
analyzed: agnim pradakṣiṇam kṛtvā vedim rājānam eva ca

original: 1.072.023c ṛṣīṃś caiva mahātmānaḥ saha bhāryā raghūttamāḥ
analyzed: ṛṣīn ca eva mahātmānaḥ saha bhāryāḥ raghu uttamāḥ
yathā uktena tathā cakruḥ vivāham vidhi pūrvakam
puṣpa vṛṣṭiḥ mahatī āsīt antarikṣāt su bhāsvarā
divya dundubhi nirghoṣaiḥ gīta vāditra nisvanaiḥ

original: 1.072.025a nanṛtuś cāpsaraḥsaṃghā gandharvāś ca jaguḥ kalam
analyzed: nanṛtuḥ ca apsaraḥ saṃghāḥ gandharvāḥ ca jaguḥ kalam
vivāhe raghu mukhyānām tat adbhutam iva abhavat
īdṛśe vartamāne tu tūrya udghuṣṭa ninādite

original: 1.072.026c trir agniṃ te parikramya ūhur bhāryā mahaujasaḥ
analyzed: tris agnim te parikramye ūhuḥ bhāryāḥ mahā ojasaḥ
atha upakāryām jagmuḥ te sa dārāḥ raghunandanaḥ
rājā api anuyayau paśyan sa ṛṣi saṃghaḥ sa bāndhavaḥ
atha rātryām vyatītāyām viśvāmitraḥ mahā muniḥ
āpṛcchya tau ca rājānau jagāma uttara parvatam
viśvāmitraḥ gate rājā vaideham mithilā adhipam
āpṛcchya atha jagāma āśu rājā daśarathaḥ purīm

original: 1.073.003a atha rājā videhānāṃ dadau kanyādhanaṃ bahu
analyzed: atha rājā videhānām dadau kanyādhanam bahu
gavām śata sahasrāṇi bahūni mithilā īśvaraḥ
kambalānām ca mukhyānām kṣauma koṭi ambarāṇi ca
hasti aśva ratha pādātam divya rūpam su alaṃkṛtam

original: 1.073.005a dadau kanyā pitā tāsāṃ dāsīdāsam anuttamam
analyzed: dadau kanyā pitā tāsām dāsī dāsam anuttamam
hiraṇyasya suvarṇasya muktānām vidrumasya ca
dadau parama saṃhṛṣṭaḥ kanyādhanam anuttamam
dattvā bahu dhanam rājā samanujñāpya pārthivam
praviveśa sva nilayam mithilām mithilā īśvaraḥ
rājā api ayodhyā adhipatiḥ saha putraiḥ mahātmabhiḥ
ṛṣīn sarvān puraskṛtya jagāma sa bala anugaḥ
gacchantam tu nara vyāghram sa ṛṣi saṃgham sa rāghavam

original: 1.073.009a ghorāḥ sma pakṣiṇo vāco vyāharanti tatas tataḥ
analyzed: ghorāḥ sma pakṣiṇaḥ vācaḥ vyāharanti tatas tatas

original: 1.073.009c bhaumāś caiva mṛgāḥ sarve gacchanti sma pradakṣiṇam
analyzed: bhaumāḥ ca eva mṛgāḥ sarve gacchanti sma pradakṣiṇam
tān dṛṣṭvā rāja śārdūlaḥ vasiṣṭham paryapṛcchata

original: 1.073.010c asaumyāḥ pakṣiṇo ghorā mṛgāś cāpi pradakṣiṇāḥ
analyzed: asaumyāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ ghorāḥ mṛgāḥ ca api pradakṣiṇāḥ

original: 1.073.010e kim idaṃ hṛdayotkampi mano mama viṣīdati
analyzed: kim idam hṛdaya utkampi manaḥ mama viṣīdati

original: 1.073.011a rājño daśarathasyaitac chrutvā vākyaṃ mahān ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: rājñaḥ daśarathasya etat śrutvā vākyam mahān ṛṣiḥ

original: 1.073.011c uvāca madhurāṃ vāṇīṃ śrūyatām asya yat phalam
analyzed: uvāca madhurām vāṇīm śrūyatām asya yat phalam

original: 1.073.012a upasthitaṃ bhayaṃ ghoraṃ divyaṃ pakṣimukhāc cyutam
analyzed: upasthitam bhayam ghoram divyam pakṣi mukhāt cyutam

original: 1.073.012c mṛgāḥ praśamayanty ete saṃtāpas tyajyatām ayam
analyzed: mṛgāḥ praśamayanti ete saṃtāpaḥ tyajyatām ayam

original: 1.073.013a teṣāṃ saṃvadatāṃ tatra vāyuḥ prādur babhūva ha
analyzed: teṣām saṃvadatām tatra vāyuḥ prādur babhūva ha

original: 1.073.013c kampayan medinīṃ sarvāṃ pātayaṃś ca drumāṃḥ śubhān
analyzed: kampayan medinīm sarvām pātayan ca drumān śubhān

original: 1.073.014a tamasā saṃvṛtaḥ sūryaḥ sarvā na prababhur diśaḥ
analyzed: tamasā saṃvṛtaḥ sūryaḥ sarvāḥ na prababhuḥ diśaḥ

original: 1.073.014c bhasmanā cāvṛtaṃ sarvaṃ saṃmūḍham iva tad balam
analyzed: bhasmanā ca āvṛtam sarvam saṃmūḍham iva tat balam

original: 1.073.015a vasiṣṭha ṛṣayaś cānye rājā ca sasutas tadā
analyzed: vasiṣṭhaḥ ṛṣayaḥ ca anye rājā ca sa sutaḥ tadā

original: 1.073.015c sasaṃjñā iva tatrāsan sarvam anyad vicetanam
analyzed: sa saṃjñāḥ iva tatra āsan sarvam anyat vicetanam

original: 1.073.016a tasmiṃs tamasi ghore tu bhasmacchanneva sā camūḥ
analyzed: tasmin tamasi ghore tu bhasma channā iva sā camūḥ
dadarśa bhīma saṃkāśam jaṭā maṇḍala dhāriṇam

original: 1.073.017a kailāsam iva durdharṣaṃ kālāgnim iva duḥsaham
analyzed: kailāsam iva durdharṣam kālāgnim iva duḥsaham
jvalantam iva tejobhiḥ durnirīkṣyam pṛthagjanaiḥ
skandhe ca āsajya paraśum dhanuḥ vidyut gaṇa upamam

original: 1.073.018c pragṛhya śaramukhyaṃ ca tripuraghnaṃ yathā haram
analyzed: pragṛhya śara mukhyam ca tripura ghnam yathā haram

original: 1.073.019a taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīmasaṃkāśaṃ jvalantam iva pāvakam
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā bhīma saṃkāśam jvalantam iva pāvakam
vasiṣṭha pramukhāḥ viprāḥ japa homa parāyaṇāḥ

original: 1.073.019e saṃgatā munayaḥ sarve saṃjajalpur atho mithaḥ
analyzed: saṃgatāḥ munayaḥ sarve saṃjajalpuḥ atho mithas
kaccit pitṛ vadha amarṣī kṣatram nā utsādayiṣyati
pūrvam kṣatra vadham kṛtvā gata manyuḥ gata jvaraḥ

original: 1.073.020e kṣatrasyotsādanaṃ bhūyo na khalv asya cikīrṣitam
analyzed: kṣatrasya utsādanam bhūyas na khalu asya cikīrṣitam
evam uktvā arghyam ādāya bhārgavam bhīma darśanam

original: 1.073.021c ṛṣayo rāma rāmeti madhurāṃ vācam abruvan
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ rāma rāma iti madhurām vācam abruvan

original: 1.073.022a pratigṛhya tu tāṃ pūjām ṛṣidattāṃ pratāpavān
analyzed: pratigṛhya tu tām pūjām ṛṣi dattām pratāpavān
rāmam dāśarathim rāmaḥ jāmadagnyaḥ abhyabhāṣata

original: 1.074.001a rāma dāśarathe vīra vīryaṃ te śrūyate 'dhutam
analyzed: rāma dāśarathe vīra vīryam te śrūyate a dhutam

original: 1.074.001c dhanuṣo bhedanaṃ caiva nikhilena mayā śrutam
analyzed: dhanuṣaḥ bhedanam ca eva nikhilena mayā śrutam

original: 1.074.002a tad adbhutam acintyaṃ ca bhedanaṃ dhanuṣas tvayā
analyzed: tat adbhutam acintyam ca bhedanam dhanuṣaḥ tvayā

original: 1.074.002c tac chrutvāham anuprāpto dhanur gṛhyāparaṃ śubham
analyzed: tat śrutvā aham anuprāptaḥ dhanuḥ gṛhya aparam śubham

original: 1.074.003a tad idaṃ ghorasaṃkāśaṃ jāmadagnyaṃ mahad dhanuḥ
analyzed: tat idam ghora saṃkāśam jāmadagnyam mahat dhanuḥ
pūrayasva śareṇa eva sva balam darśayasva ca

original: 1.074.004a tad ahaṃ te balaṃ dṛṣṭvā dhanuṣo 'sya prapūraṇe
analyzed: tat aham te balam dṛṣṭvā dhanuṣaḥ asya prapūraṇe
dvandva yuddham pradāsyāmi vīrya ślāghyam idam tava

original: 1.074.005a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rājā daśarataḥs tadā
analyzed: tasya tat vacanam śrutvā rājā daśarataḥ tadā
viṣaṇṇa vadanaḥ dīnaḥ prāñjaliḥ vākyam abravīt
kṣatra roṣāt praśāntaḥ tvam brāhmaṇasya mahā yaśāḥ

original: 1.074.006c bālānāṃ mama putrāṇām abhayaṃ dātum arhasi
analyzed: bālānām mama putrāṇām abhayam dātum arhasi
bhārgavāṇām kule jātaḥ svādhyāya vrata śālinām
sahasrākṣe pratijñāya śastram nikṣiptavān asi

original: 1.074.008a sa tvaṃ dharmaparo bhūtvā kāśyapāya vasuṃdharām
analyzed: sa tvam dharma paraḥ bhūtvā kāśyapāya vasuṃdharām
dattvā vanam upāgamya mahā indra kṛta ketanaḥ
mama sarva vināśāya saṃprāptaḥ tvam mahā mune

original: 1.074.009c na caikasmin hate rāme sarve jīvāmahe vayam
analyzed: na ca ekasmin hate rāme sarve jīvāmahe vayam
bruvati evam daśarathe jāmadagnyaḥ pratāpavān
an ādṛtya eva tat vākyam rāmam eva abhyabhāṣata

original: 1.074.011a ime dve dhanuṣī śreṣṭhe divye lokābhiviśrute
analyzed: ime dve dhanuṣī śreṣṭhe divye loka abhiviśrute
dṛḍhe balavatī mukhye su kṛte viśvakarmaṇā
atisṛṣṭam suraiḥ ekam tryambakāya yuyutsave

original: 1.074.012c tripuraghnaṃ naraśreṣṭha bhagnaṃ kākutsha yat tvayā
analyzed: tripura ghnam nara śreṣṭha bhagnam kākutsha yat tvayā

original: 1.074.013a idaṃ dvitīyaṃ durdharṣaṃ viṣṇor dattaṃ surottamaiḥ
analyzed: idam dvitīyam durdharṣam viṣṇoḥ dattam sura uttamaiḥ

original: 1.074.013c samānasāraṃ kākutstha raudreṇa dhanuṣā tv idam
analyzed: samāna sāram kākutstha raudreṇa dhanuṣā tu idam

original: 1.074.014a tadā tu devatāḥ sarvāḥ pṛcchanti sma pitāmaham
analyzed: tadā tu devatāḥ sarvāḥ pṛcchanti sma pitāmaham
śitikaṇṭhasya viṣṇoḥ ca bala abala nirīkṣayā
abhiprāyam tu vijñāya devatānām pitāmahaḥ

original: 1.074.015c virodhaṃ janayām āsa tayoḥ satyavatāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: virodham janayām āsa tayoḥ satyavatām varaḥ

original: 1.074.016a virodhe ca mahad yuddham abhavad romaharṣaṇam
analyzed: virodhe ca mahat yuddham abhavat roma harṣaṇam
śitikaṇṭhasya viṣṇoḥ ca paraspara jaya eṣiṇoḥ

original: 1.074.017a tadā taj jṛmbhitaṃ śaivaṃ dhanur bhīmaparākramam
analyzed: tadā tat jṛmbhitam śaivam dhanuḥ bhīma parākramam
huṃkāreṇa mahādevaḥ stambhitaḥ atha trilocanaḥ
devaiḥ tadā samāgamya sa ṛṣi saṃghaiḥ sa cāraṇaiḥ

original: 1.074.018c yācitau praśamaṃ tatra jagmatus tau surottamau
analyzed: yācitau praśamam tatra jagmatuḥ tau sura uttamau

original: 1.074.019a jṛmbhitaṃ tad dhanur dṛṣṭvā śaivaṃ viṣṇuparākramaiḥ
analyzed: jṛmbhitam tat dhanuḥ dṛṣṭvā śaivam viṣṇu parākramaiḥ

original: 1.074.019c adhikaṃ menire viṣṇuṃ devāḥ sarṣigaṇās tadā
analyzed: adhikam menire viṣṇum devāḥ sa ṛṣi gaṇāḥ tadā

original: 1.074.020a dhanū rudras tu saṃkruddho videheṣu mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: dhanuḥ rudraḥ tu saṃkruddhaḥ videheṣu mahā yaśāḥ
devarātasya rājarṣeḥ dadau haste sa sāyakam

original: 1.074.021a idaṃ ca viṣṇavaṃ rāma dhanuḥ parapuraṃjayam
analyzed: idam ca viṣṇavam rāma dhanuḥ parapuraṃjayam

original: 1.074.021c ṛcīke bhārgave prādād viṣṇuḥ sa nyāsam uttamam
analyzed: ṛcīke bhārgave prādāt viṣṇuḥ sa nyāsam uttamam
ṛcīkaḥ tu mahā tejāḥ putrasya apratikarmaṇaḥ

original: 1.074.022c pitur mama dadau divyaṃ jamadagner mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: pituḥ mama dadau divyam jamadagneḥ mahātmanaḥ
nyasta śastre pitari me tapaḥ bala samanvite

original: 1.074.023c arjuno vidadhe mṛtyuṃ prākṛtāṃ buddhim āsthitaḥ
analyzed: arjunaḥ vidadhe mṛtyum prākṛtām buddhim āsthitaḥ

original: 1.074.024a vadham apratirūpaṃ tu pituḥ śrutvā sudāruṇam
analyzed: vadham apratirūpam tu pituḥ śrutvā su dāruṇam

original: 1.074.024c kṣatram utsādayaṃ roṣāj jātaṃ jātam anekaśaḥ
analyzed: kṣatram utsādayam roṣāt jātam jātam anekaśas
pṛthivīm ca akhilām prāpya kāśyapāya mahātmane
yajñasya ante tadā rāma dakṣiṇām puṇya karmaṇe
dattvā mahā indra nilayaḥ tapaḥ bala samanvitaḥ

original: 1.074.026c śrutavān dhanuṣo bhedaṃ tato 'haṃ drutam āgataḥ
analyzed: śrutavān dhanuṣaḥ bhedam tatas aham drutam āgataḥ
