original: 1.074.027a tad idaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ rāma pitṛpaitāmahaṃ mahat
analyzed: tat idam vaiṣṇavam rāma pitṛpaitāmaham mahat
kṣatra dharmam puraskṛtya gṛhṇīṣva dhanuḥ uttamam
yojayasva dhanuḥ śreṣṭhe śaram parapuraṃjayam

original: 1.074.028c yadi śaknoṣi kākutstha dvandvaṃ dāsyāmi te tataḥ
analyzed: yadi śaknoṣi kākutstha dvandvam dāsyāmi te tatas

original: 1.075.001a śrutvā taj jāmadagnyasya vākyaṃ dāśarathis tadā
analyzed: śrutvā tat jāmadagnyasya vākyam dāśarathiḥ tadā
gauravāt yantrita kathaḥ pituḥ rāmam athā abravīt

original: 1.075.002a śrutavān asmi yat karma kṛtavān asi bhārgava
analyzed: śrutavān asmi yat karma kṛtavān asi bhārgava
anurundhyāmahe brahman pituḥ ānṛṇyam āsthitaḥ
vīrya hīnam iva aśaktam kṣatra dharmeṇa bhārgava

original: 1.075.003c avajānāmi me tejaḥ paśya me 'dya parākramam
analyzed: avajānāmi me tejaḥ paśya me adya parākramam

original: 1.075.004a ity uktvā rāghavaḥ kruddho bhārgavasya varāyudham
analyzed: iti uktvā rāghavaḥ kruddhaḥ bhārgavasya vara āyudham
śaram ca pratisaṃgṛhya hastāt laghu parākramaḥ

original: 1.075.005a āropya sa dhanū rāmaḥ śaraṃ sajyaṃ cakāra ha
analyzed: āropya sa dhanuḥ rāmaḥ śaram sajyam cakāra ha

original: 1.075.005c jāmadagnyaṃ tato rāmaṃ rāmaḥ kruddho 'bravīd vacaḥ
analyzed: jāmadagnyam tatas rāmam rāmaḥ kruddhaḥ abravīt vacaḥ
brāhmaṇaḥ asi iti pūjyaḥ me viśvāmitra kṛtena ca

original: 1.075.006c tasmāc chakto na te rāma moktuṃ prāṇaharaṃ śaram
analyzed: tasmāt śaktaḥ na te rāma moktum prāṇa haram śaram
imām vā tvad gatim rāma tapaḥ bala sama arjitān

original: 1.075.007c lokān apratimān vāpi haniṣyāmi yad icchasi
analyzed: lokān apratimān vā api haniṣyāmi yat icchasi

original: 1.075.008a na hy ayaṃ vaiṣṇavo divyaḥ śaraḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ
analyzed: na hi ayam vaiṣṇavaḥ divyaḥ śaraḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ
moghaḥ patati vīryeṇa bala darpa vināśanaḥ
vara āyudha dharam rāma draṣṭum sa ṛṣi gaṇāḥ surāḥ
pitāmaham puraskṛtya sametāḥ tatra saṃghaśas
gandharva apsarasaḥ ca eva siddha cāraṇa kiṃnarāḥ

original: 1.075.010c yakṣarākṣasanāgāś ca tad draṣṭuṃ mahad adbhutam
analyzed: yakṣa rākṣasa nāgāḥ ca tat draṣṭum mahat adbhutam
jaḍīkṛte tadā loke rāme vara dhanuḥ dhare
nirvīryaḥ jāmadagnyaḥ asau ramaḥ rāmam udaikṣata
tejobhiḥ hata vīrya tvāt jāmadagnyaḥ jaḍīkṛtaḥ

original: 1.075.012c rāmaṃ kamala patrākṣaṃ mandaṃ mandam uvāca ha
analyzed: rāmam kamala pattra akṣam mandam mandam uvāca ha

original: 1.075.013a kāśyapāya mayā dattā yadā pūrvaṃ vasuṃdharā
analyzed: kāśyapāya mayā dattā yadā pūrvam vasuṃdharā

original: 1.075.013c viṣaye me na vastavyam iti māṃ kāśyapo 'bravīt
analyzed: viṣaye me na vastavyam iti mām kāśyapaḥ abravīt

original: 1.075.014a so 'haṃ guruvacaḥ kurvan pṛthivyāṃ na vase niśām
analyzed: saḥ aham guru vacaḥ kurvan pṛthivyām na vase niśām

original: 1.075.014c iti pratijñā kākutstha kṛtā vai kāśyapasya ha
analyzed: iti pratijñā kākutstha kṛtā vai kāśyapasya ha

original: 1.075.015a tad imāṃ tvaṃ gatiṃ vīra hantuṃ nārhasi rāghava
analyzed: tat imām tvam gatim vīra hantum na arhasi rāghava
manojavam gamiṣyāmi mahendram parvata uttamam

original: 1.075.016a lokās tv apratimā rāma nirjitās tapasā mayā
analyzed: lokāḥ tu apratimāḥ rāma nirjitāḥ tapasā mayā

original: 1.075.016c jahi tāñ śaramukhyena mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ
analyzed: jahi tām śara mukhyena mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ
akṣayyam madhu hantāram jānāmi tvām sureśvaram
dhanuṣaḥ asya parāmarśāt svasti te astu paraṃtapa
ete sura gaṇāḥ sarve nirīkṣante samāgatāḥ
tvām apratima karmāṇam apratidvandvam āhave

original: 1.075.019a na ceyaṃ mama kākutstha vrīḍā bhavitum arhati
analyzed: na ca iyam mama kākutstha vrīḍā bhavitum arhati
tvayā trailokya nāthena yat aham vimukhīkṛtaḥ

original: 1.075.020a śaram apratimaṃ rāma moktum arhasi suvrata
analyzed: śaram apratimam rāma moktum arhasi suvrata
śara mokṣe gamiṣyāmi mahendram parvata uttamam

original: 1.075.021a tathā bruvati rāme tu jāmadagnye pratāpavān
analyzed: tathā bruvati rāme tu jāmadagnye pratāpavān

original: 1.075.021c rāmo dāśarathiḥ śrīmāṃś cikṣepa śaram uttamam
analyzed: rāmaḥ dāśarathiḥ śrīmān cikṣepa śaram uttamam

original: 1.075.022a tato vitimirāḥ sarvā diśā copadiśas tathā
analyzed: tatas vitimirāḥ sarvāḥ diśā ca upadiśaḥ tathā
surāḥ sa ṛṣi gaṇāḥ rāmam praśaśaṃsuḥ udāyudham

original: 1.075.023a rāmaṃ dāśarathiṃ rāmo jāmadagnyaḥ praśasya ca
analyzed: rāmam dāśarathim rāmaḥ jāmadagnyaḥ praśasya ca
tatas pradakṣiṇīkṛtya jagāma ātma gatim prabhuḥ

original: 1.076.001a gate rāme praśāntātmā rāmo dāśarathir dhanuḥ
analyzed: gate rāme praśānta ātmā rāmaḥ dāśarathiḥ dhanuḥ
varuṇāya aprameyāya dadau haste sa sāyakam

original: 1.076.002a abhivādya tato rāmo vasiṣṭha pramukhān ṛṣīn
analyzed: abhivādya tatas rāmaḥ vasiṣṭha pramukhān ṛṣīn
pitaram vihvalam dṛṣṭvā provāca raghunandanaḥ
jāmadagnyaḥ gataḥ rāmaḥ prayātu caturaṅgiṇī
ayodhyā abhimukhī senā tvayā nāthena pālitā

original: 1.076.004a rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā rājā daśarathaḥ sutam
analyzed: rāmasya vacanam śrutvā rājā daśarathaḥ sutam
bāhubhyām saṃpariṣvajya mūrdhni ca āghrāya rāghavam

original: 1.076.005a gato rāma iti śrutvā hṛṣṭaḥ pramudito nṛpaḥ
analyzed: gataḥ rāmaḥ iti śrutvā hṛṣṭaḥ pramuditaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: 1.076.005c codayām āsa tāṃ senāṃ jagāmāśu tataḥ purīm
analyzed: codayām āsa tām senām jagāma āśu tatas purīm
patākā dhvajinīm ramyām tūrya udghuṣṭa nināditām
sikta rāja pathām ramyām prakīrṇa kusuma utkarām
rāja praveśa sumukhaiḥ pauraiḥ maṅgala vādibhiḥ
saṃpūrṇām prāviśat rājā jana oghaiḥ samalaṃkṛtām

original: 1.076.008a kausalyā ca sumitrā ca kaikeyī ca sumadhyamā
analyzed: kausalyā ca sumitrā ca kaikeyī ca sumadhyamā
vadhū pratigrahe yuktāḥ yāḥ ca anyāḥ rāja yoṣitaḥ

original: 1.076.009a tataḥ sītāṃ mahābhāgām ūrmilāṃ ca yaśasvinīm
analyzed: tatas sītām mahābhāgām ūrmilām ca yaśasvinīm
kuśadhvaja sute ca ubhe jagṛhuḥ nṛpa patnayaḥ
maṅgala ālāpanaiḥ ca eva śobhitāḥ kṣauma vāsasaḥ
devatāyatanāni āśu sarvāḥ tāḥ pratyapūjayan
abhivādya abhivādyān ca sarvāḥ rāja sutāḥ tadā

original: 1.076.011c remire muditāḥ sarvā bhartṛbhiḥ sahitā rahaḥ
analyzed: remire muditāḥ sarvāḥ bhartṛbhiḥ sahitāḥ rahaḥ
kṛta dārāḥ kṛtāstrāḥ ca sa dhanāḥ sa suhṛd janāḥ
śuśrūṣamāṇāḥ pitaram vartayanti nara ṛṣabhāḥ
teṣām ati yaśāḥ loke rāmaḥ satya parākramaḥ
svayambhūḥ iva bhūtānām babhūva guṇavattaraḥ

original: 1.076.014a rāmas tu sītayā sārdhaṃ vijahāra bahūn ṛtūn
analyzed: rāmaḥ tu sītayā sārdham vijahāra bahūn ṛtūn

original: 1.076.014c manasvī tadgatas tasyā nityaṃ hṛdi samarpitaḥ
analyzed: manasvī tad gataḥ tasyāḥ nityam hṛdi samarpitaḥ

original: 1.076.015a priyā tu sītā rāmasya dārāḥ pitṛkṛtā iti
analyzed: priyā tu sītā rāmasya dārāḥ pitṛ kṛtāḥ iti

original: 1.076.015c guṇād rūpaguṇāc cāpi prītir bhūyo vyavardhata
analyzed: guṇāt rūpa guṇāt ca api prītiḥ bhūyas vyavardhata

original: 1.076.016a tasyāś ca bhartā dviguṇaṃ hṛdaye parivartate
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca bhartā dviguṇam hṛdaye parivartate

original: 1.076.016c antarjātam api vyaktam ākhyāti hṛdayaṃ hṛdā
analyzed: antarjātam api vyaktam ākhyāti hṛdayam hṛdā
tasya bhūyas viśeṣeṇa maithilī janakātmajā

original: 1.076.017c devatābhiḥ samā rūpe sītā śrīr iva rūpiṇī
analyzed: devatābhiḥ samā rūpe sītā śrīḥ iva rūpiṇī
tayā sa rājarṣi sutaḥ abhirāmayā
sameyivān uttama rāja kanyayā
atīva rāmaḥ śuśubhe atikāmayā
vibhuḥ śriyā viṣṇuḥ iva amara īśvaraḥ
